story:
What is Notaty?

Notaty is a mobile app, to send and received notifications.
Yet, it is far more than just notification.


The application is wide. It is available and suitable for all company, organization, buildings, and online system integration.


Anyone can create channel with simply one click.
Even register is not necessary.




Notaty have its own Notaty Store for public channels.


It is also integrated with website panel, with powerful sending and reporting tools!


How important is Notaty?

We all looks for a simple and efficient solution about notification.
It is just almost there but can’t be reached.

Notaty is the solution.
See how it is different from other:







About Out Team

A whole development team of 5 experienced software engineers is gathered, in the field of iPhone/Android app development, Server side programming, Website development and SEO etc.
But we do not have enough resource to start up in full thrust. Now only a few of us is developing in slow progress.
When we have resource, we will also have a marketing team to boost up the Notaty user number.

Stretch Goal

The initial goal is already very attractive.
But the 2nd phase is even greater!

  • Granting subscribers’ personal information permission to Channel owner.
    Just like granting Facebook user profile permission, channel owner can access more detail about their subscriber!
  • Two way messaging
    It is almost an online customer service function. Subscriber can response or give feedback to channel owner.
  • Enrollment/questionnaire message and result report
    Invitation and questionnaire can never be easier.
  • Paid subscription!
    Oh GREAT! Generate profit from your channel!
  • Channel rating system
    A good channel is very valuable. Valuable channel makes exposure. Exposure makes profit.


How do we use the fund ?

  • iPhone App Development ~$7000
  • Android App Development ~$7000
  • Website Development ~$4000
  • Core Intelligent Notification System ~$4000
  • Marketing and Promotion ~$8000


Risks & Challenges

There is no technical risk at all.
The only risk and challenges is the growing speed of Notaty.
So we will put a very large effort on marketing and push promotion with cooperation with development team.
We have experience and strategy in this field and is confident to boost up Notaty in short.
All we need is your support! Your generous fund will definitely affect the outcome.


Perks

All the perks will be available as soon as the 2nd version of Notaty App, and it should be ready on July this year.
Of course, if you decide to send the message later, our user pool will grow large day by day.

The only limit is, all the image/ads/message content should be legal, ethical, and not offending.


FAQ

We will add FAQ section here when we receive any of your question or feedback.






Thank you !

story:
Video en Español

Vídeo em Português

Vidéo en Français

 

 

This has happened to thousands of people.  Perhaps too late for each, but you are have time.

Shortly after the robbery, even before you may have realized it has taken place, your car will be disassembled to be sold for parts or with another identity hundreds kilometers away from you.

 


It is a complete Geolocation device. In LocMyCar we use all the available technologies and adapt them to locate your vehicle under any circumstances. You will be able to trace your vehicle even if it is hidden in a building or in a garage. Wherever your vehicle is located, only you, using your Smartphone (IOS or Android,) will know the exact location of your vehicle.

English version

 

Video en Español

 

What kinds of technologies are used by LocMyCar to obtain an exact location?

The combination of all the available technologies makes your vehicle virtually impossible to be hidden. Remember GPS is not enough. 

LocMyCar reports to you immediately if your vehicle has been stolen.

The device can be places in your vehicle also it can be place without being permanently installed.

The installation requires 10 minutes to install the device. (Even less if is done by a professional). One of the advantages is that you will not have to worry about the battery because it lasts for several days and the application let you know when it needs to be charged. It is recommended to charge the device using the car charger (Android micro USB type) before the installation.

English version

Video en Español

 

A lot. I will explain in further detail below.

What impact would this have on your family economy?

LocMyCar gives you the peace of mind that no one will be able to take away your car. Remember that for families, buying a car is a big financial investment (only superseded by the purchase of a home).Taking in to account that your car is almost all the time outside in the public or open spaces it is important to reconsider this option 

If you think closely, protecting your vehicle is inexpensive compared to the risk of the loss.

Most people think that only high prices cars are stolen, but statistics show that is not true. It is true that high priced cars are very attractive to thieves, but the midrange and even low-range cars are easier to steal and there is a great demand of parts of such vehicles. Therefore, the mid-priced cars are also stolen because it is very profitable.

Most stolen vehicles in USA are as follows in order of highest to lowest.

(Honda Civic, Toyota Camry, Tollota Corolla, Chervrolet Silverado, Acura Integra, Cadillac Escalade, Ford F-350, Nissan Altima, Chevrolet Tahoe)

 

Honda Civic

 

 

                           Toyota Camry

 

Toyota Corolla

 

Chevrolet Silverado

 The most stolen vehicles in Europe are as follows (in order of highest to lowest.)

(Seat León, VW Golf, BMW Serie 3, Seat Ibiza, VW Pasat, Renault Mégane, Audi A4, Ford Escort, Ford Fiesta, Ford Focus).

 

Seat León

 

VW Golf

 

  Bmw serie 3

 

Seat Ibiza

Statistics show that the average age of stolen vehicle is between 3 and 6 year old. Approximately 71% of stolen vehicles never appear.

 

 

If you want to control the path of your vehicle when you take your kids or anyone else, you can do it very easily. You only have to watch your Smartphone and see on the spot the itinerary, speed, most recent location and the distance.

You can download the technical data sheet in English and Spanish

English. http://www.seguridadcentinela.com/descargas/dat...

En español.  http://seguridadcentinela.com/descargas/fichate...

 

Today we have a fully operative prototype and the mobile application is also complete.

Everything is ready to start mass production.

 

 

 

We have been working on LocMyCar for over a year and we have come a long way. Now we need to be able to make a good quantity of devices and, in this way, make LocMyCar a reality. The further along we are, the cheaper it will be for everyone. We all are going to live calmer and we will make possible that the experience of having a car is more agreeable

 

So why should you support us?

  • Be the first one to get one.
  • You will feel more calm and confident in everything that has to do with your car.
  • Because you worked hard to get your car.
  • Because we are sure that LocMyCar will improve your life.

If you like our project, tell everyone. You can use the apps that are just under the initial video. Talk about us to others. Spread the word.

FAQ
 

Q: What are the differences between a conventional GPS and LocMyCar?

A: The GPS technology use triangulation by satellite. This system is effective outdoor and when there are no obstacles such high-rise buildings. In LocMyCar, we have achieve what is called Total Location. This means that we do not have these previous limitations. We have added a number of technologies (Interior Locations, BLE, and GSM) and we use them to work together. In this way, LOCMYCAR can locate your car in any circumstance. In addition, LocMycar warns you via your Smartphone at the same time the theft is taking place.

 

Q: Why is it so important TOTAL GEOLOCATION?

A: Remember that the first thing criminals will do is hide your vehicle to remove or change its identity. If your car has been hidden, the GPS will not be able to locate it. If you really want to recover your vehicle, you need something else. You need  LocMycar. TOTAL GEOLOCATION.

 

Q: What if there is no GSM coverage?

A: If your vehicle is in an area with no GSM coverage the system will not be able to communicate with you. As soon as signal the device recovers the coverage, the communication will be restored. Is there no option when coverage is lost?

No, not at all. First, it’s not unusual finding areas without GSM coverage. Furthermore, LocMycar shows you the path the thief has followed. It can give you an idea where your vehicle is. Remember that if your vehicle does not currently have GSM coverage, there is an alternative system, which emits a signal that can be received by your Smartphone and that can be detected from the exterior of the buildings. Your vehicle will continue emitting the signal until you find it. If you move near the zone where the tracking was lost, your Smartphone will warn you are close to your vehicle.

 

Q: What countries can use LocMyCar?

A: LocMyCar practically works in all countries of the world. We have contracted with an international telephony platform that works with the major carriers to ensure service anywhere. At the bottom of the page, you will see countries with rates. If your country is not listed, contact us and we will tell you the fee for your country.

 

Q. There really is no MONTHLY COST REALLY?

A: The monthly fee for all those who support us at the crowdfunding phase will never be charged. After that, new clients will pay a monthly fee plus the phone company rate. The absence of monthly charges is a promotion for those for all those who trust us in this LocMyCar's initial phase

 

Q: If interior location is not a free service, how can LocMyCar not charge monthly fees?

A: Certainly, indoor location services represent a cost to us. However, our company already has licenses to provide this service to other customers and as a reward to all who support us in this project, we will assume that cost. Those who do not use this opportunity will have lost its great offer.

 

Q: Is it easy to install?

A: It is very easy. We send instructions with the device. You can do it yourself or ask a professional. In any case, it will take less than 10 minutes. Remember that you can also run perfectly without installing. You only need to charge the battery.

 

Q: DO ALL THE SYSTEMS USED FOR THE LOCATION THE SAME PRECISION? 

A: Depending on the system used for location, different colors are used in the map.

The red flag is the most accurate. Generally have a margin of error of about 5 m.
The green flag has a margin of error ranging from 15-40 m.
The magenta flag has a variable margin shown in the chart itself.

When the system interprets that the vehicle has stopped, it shows a totally different flag

 

Q: How can LocMyCar detects that the vehicle has been stolen?

A: When the vehicle moves, you receive a warning in your Smartphone. To receive such warning you must “arm” the system, otherwise you will not receive the notification. In both cases, the system will geo-track ALWAYS the vehicle, which you can see all time in your smartphone. When the vehicle is not on alarm, LocMyCar only uses GPS. Once the owner checks the robbery, he only must activate the alarm in his Smartphone and immediately 6 locating and 2 tracking systems will be activated

 

Q: If my vehicle has been stolen, will I be able of finding it when they hide it in a private place?

A: LocMyCar is prepared for this case. The device emits a coded signal with the device identity that can detect if the vehicle is in a private building. The reception distance varies between 30-70 m. Looking at the map, you will know the area in which the vehicle has been hidden, but once you go near that area, you can determine with certainty where the vehicle is. No matter it is hidden in a private place. You can do it from outside the building without entering.

 

Q: What kind of smartphone do I need?

A: LocMyCar works with iOS 6 and Android version 4.3 or higher. Both cases require you to have Bluetooth 4.0.  Most of the current mobile phones meet these requirements.

 

Q: Who gets notice of the theft?

A: It can notify the owner or more assigned persons. The owner has a code and just he can decide if the notice it´s sent to him or additional people.  It´s up to you.

 

Q: How does LocMyCar work when I want to know where I have parked?

A: Pressing the button to know where I´ve parked, the application will return a map showing the location of your car right at the time it was stopped.

 

Q: Can this be misused and can invade my privacy?

A: The system can only be installed by the vehicle owner. The application has a code and only vehicle owner would know where he is.

 

Q: If it is used as control parental may it increase the telephone rate?

A: No

 

Q: HOW IS THE TELEPHONE RATE HANDLED?

A: As stated above, we have obtained a good price, with a phone company that offer international coverage. The device has a pre-installed phone card that allows this correct functioning. The card is in fully operational at the moment of the delivery, but only it will start billing from the 1st of the following month of the delivery. The price will be $5, 50 per month (Duty free). To avoid bank charges, the billing will be quarterly. 

 

Q: Which countries have the telephone rate of € 5,50 per month?

USA, Europe, Mexico, Colombia and Ecuador. For other countries, please consult the rates.

 

Web English: http://seguridadcentinela.com/en/locmycar/

Web Español:http://seguridadcentinela.com/locmycar/

Email: info@seguridadcentinela.com

Facebook LocMyCar

story:
Hey fellow Chaturbate pervs and other internet people!

I'm @BoobiesTrap, a Chaturbate user, occassional broadcaster, experienced moderator and, as it happens to be, a software engineer in real life.


Those of you broadcasting, modding or otherwise familiar with chat apps & bots on Chaturbate know the problem (everybody else: there is an explanation below ;-) ): finding bots that offer what you want and work together, remembering all the commands, and dealing with annoyances that come with somee of those bots.

In this project, I will develop a bot that bundles most commonly used features into on bot that offers customisation, intuitive and consistent commands, clean code and compatibility with as many other bots as possible.

The problem

Chaturbate's chat system lacks basic functionality. There is no access control, no fine grained moderation and while silencing individual users is working fine, unsilencing them again is an all-or-none operation.
To make up for it, Chaturbate allows broadcasters to run small applications that enhanve the chat with additional features, such as control over graphics, sending notifications, censoring words or auto-moderation.

As nice as it sounds, a lot of bots are badly written and instable, hard to use due to cryptic commands and barely configurable. And combining multiple bots often leads to compatibility issues, inconsistent commands (was it !b or /b again?) and duplicated features.
Sadly, this even applies to popular and widely used bots, such as Ultrabot (which offers great functionality but has some odd quirks to it and a lot of unused features), CrazyNote (which offers everything anybody needs in regard to sending notices, but has hard to remember commands) or my very own censorship bot (which is very limited in what it does).
In addition to that, spots for bots are limited to three, so more often than not broadcasters have to decide for one and against another bot to run.

The solution

In theory, the solution to all this is pretty easy: what if there was one bot that includes all commonly used functionality, has clean code is easy on ressources making it run stable, is easy to extend to avoid "patchwork code" (which is what makes many existing bots unstable), offers intuitive and consistent commands that are easy to remember and is well documented and easy to learn?

Imagine you could:

/allow graphics #all
/block graphics #grey
/allow graphics nice_gray_guy
/block all-caps #all
/allow all-caps #moderators
/set notice.color blue
/set notice.weight bold
/allow notice #moderators
/notice Hey everybody!
/silence #grey
/unsilence that_one_grey_you_kinda_like
/help
/list permissions
/list commands
...

Yes, you got that right. with only very few commands, that also do exactly what they say, you could control everything. Giving or taking individual permissions to entire groups or individual users independently, changing all settings without restarting the bot, and so on.

Cool, right?

Sadly there is a reason such bot does not exist yet: creating it, and creating it in a way that not only the developer and some models but as many people as possible like how it works, is not an easy task.

The finances

Designing and programming this piece of software unfortunately takes some time. Being a freelance programmer, investing time in this project means investing less time in other projects that get me money - and as a matter of fact, we all need to earn some cash every now and then.

At a rough estimate, planning what features to implement and how to make them work together will take 5 hours, developing interfaces for individual parts to be easily integrated into the bot will take 15 hours, programming those interfaces and all features another 15 hours, and smoothing all edges to make it easdy to work with for broadcasters another 5. For testing and bug fixing, it is common to estimate the one to two times the development time, so adds another 40 to 80 hours.
The funding goal of $750 covers the time I need to invest to come up with clean and stable code.

If the funding goal is not reached, I will still work on this bot, potentially leaving out some features or spending less time focusing on performance (leaving the  bot more prone to crashes when Chaturbate servers are busy) or publishing only a basic version of the bot as a resource for other developers and using it to offer more efficient custom bots.

The challenge

Of course funding the development is only one challenge. Your challenge. Programming it isn't easy either - that is my challenge.


I know the theory. I studied computer science in university for 6 years. I know how to design effective software, I know about efficient data storage, I know about elegant framework design.

I know the code. Working as a freelance web developer for years, I have a very decent knowledge of Javascript, the language Chaturbate uses for thier apps & bots, as it is also the most common scripting language used on websites.

I know the platform. I am a user on Chaturbate for more than two years, modded many rooms, cammed myself, and have many friends in the Chaturbate community, moderators, models and developers alike. I know what is needed, I know what is there, I know what is missing.

I have the experience. I wrote over 15 different apps and bots for chaturbate so far, simple ones to feature packed custom creations for individual models. So far, none of my bots & apps is, to my knolwedge, known to crash or function improperly. I count that as a big success.


However dedicating bots to individual tasks is a whole different story than including all kinds of functionality in one bot without any of the parts interfering with each other.
On one hand, each part should be isolated fomr each other, to keep the code clean and easy to maintain (in programming, this is called KISS - "keep it simple, stupid!", on the other hand repetition should be avoided to reduce the risk of bugs - if 5 parts do the same thing, good luck finding the buggy one! (this is called DRY - "do not repeat yourself").
This means core functionality must be seperate and accessible by individual parts of the bot.

Keeping the balance of extensibility & flexibility, simple code and additional features is most likely the biggest challenge here, and solving it requires a lot of planning and intelligent code design. And lots of DRY KISSes.

Your personal perks

If you donate towards this project, you not only help creating this bot, you will also gain some benefits yourself, depending on your donation:

  • Every donation starting from $25 will get you listed as supporter of this project in the bot's full description with either your real name, your chaturbate username or a Twitter handle. Higher donations include links to your profiles and individual mentions as sponsors. This will make sure your donation will not go unnoticed.
  • Broadcasters who donate $100 will receive a custom bot based on the work of this bot that can include any additional functionality on top (or instead) of what this bot offers. Those custom bots can also be limited to only work in your room if you wish so.
  • Developers who donate $100 will get a fully documented copy of the base framework developed for this bot, making it easy for them to write their own bots that are compatible with this bot and can interact with it.
  • If you donate as much as $150 towards this project, your chat messages on Chaturbate will be highlighted in every room the bot is running in, making you stand out as the VIP you were for this project. 

Other ways to help

I get it - you spend all your money on the pretty girls already. Or like me, you are one poor university student. That's cool. No worries, you can still help.

While donating money is obviously the best way to help make this happen, spreading the news and getting some attention for this project helps as well. you can, for example:

  • Tweet about this project and retweet my own tweets on this
  • Tell your favorite camgirls about this on Kik, Snapchat or wherever you communicate with them
  • Send your rich friends here and tell them to donate for you
  • Contact me to help out with testing later down the road (this is important!)
  • Share your ideas with me
story_txt:
Hey fellow Chaturbate pervs and other internet people!I'm @BoobiesTrap, a Chaturbate user, occassional broadcaster, experienced moderator and, as it happens to be, a software engineer in real life.
Those of you broadcasting, modding or otherwise familiar with chat apps & bots on Chaturbate know the problem (everybody else: there is an explanation below ;-) ): finding bots that offer what you want and work together, remembering all the commands, and dealing with annoyances that come with somee of those bots.In this project, I will develop a bot that bundles most commonly used features into on bot that offers customisation, intuitive and consistent commands, clean code and compatibility with as many other bots as possible.


The problem
Chaturbate's chat system lacks basic functionality. There is no 
access control, no fine grained moderation and while silencing 
individual users is working fine, unsilencing them again is an 
all-or-none operation.To make up for it, Chaturbate allows 
broadcasters to run small applications that enhanve the chat with 
additional features, such as control over graphics, sending 
notifications, censoring words or auto-moderation.
As nice as it sounds, a lot of bots are badly written and instable, hard to use due to cryptic commands and barely configurable. And combining multiple bots often leads to compatibility issues, inconsistent commands (was it !b or /b again?) and duplicated features.Sadly, this even applies to popular and widely used bots, such as Ultrabot (which offers great functionality but has some odd quirks to it and a lot of unused features), CrazyNote (which offers everything anybody needs in regard to sending notices, but has hard to remember commands) or my very own censorship bot (which is very limited in what it does).In
 addition to that, spots for bots are limited to three, so more often 
than not broadcasters have to decide for one and against another bot to 
run.


The solution
In theory, the solution to all this is pretty easy: what if there was one bot that includes all commonly used functionality, has clean code is easy on ressources making it run stable, is easy to extend to avoid "patchwork code" (which is what makes many existing bots unstable), offers intuitive and consistent commands that are easy to remember and is well documented and easy to learn?
Imagine you could:
/allow graphics #all/block graphics #grey/allow graphics nice_gray_guy/block all-caps #all/allow all-caps #moderators/set notice.color blue/set notice.weight bold/allow notice #moderators/notice Hey everybody!/silence #grey/unsilence that_one_grey_you_kinda_like/help/list permissions/list commands...
Yes, you got that right. with only very few commands, that also do exactly what they say, you could control everything. Giving or taking individual permissions to entire groups or individual users independently, changing all settings without restarting the bot, and so on.
Cool, right?
Sadly there is a reason such bot does not exist yet: creating it, and creating it in a way that not only the developer and some models but as many people as possible like how it works, is not an easy task.


The finances
Designing and programming this piece of software unfortunately takes some time. Being a freelance programmer, investing time in this project means investing less time in other projects that get me money - and as a matter of fact, we all need to earn some cash every now and then.
At a rough estimate, planning what features to implement and how to make them work together will take 5 hours, developing interfaces for individual parts to be easily integrated into the bot will take 15 hours, programming those interfaces and all features another 15 hours, and smoothing all edges to make it easdy to work with for broadcasters another 5. For testing and bug fixing, it is common to estimate the one to two times the development time, so adds another 40 to 80 hours.The funding goal of $750 covers the time I need to invest to come up with clean and stable code.
If the funding goal is not reached, I will still work on this bot, potentially leaving out some features or spending less time focusing on performance (leaving the  bot more prone to crashes when Chaturbate servers are busy) or publishing only a basic version of the bot as a resource for other developers and using it to offer more efficient custom bots.


The challenge

Of course funding the development is only one challenge. Your challenge. Programming it isn't easy either - that is my challenge.

I know the theory. I studied computer science in university for 6 years. I know how to design effective software, I know about efficient data storage, I know about elegant framework design.
I know the code. Working as a freelance web developer for years, I have a very decent knowledge of Javascript, the language Chaturbate uses for thier apps & bots, as it is also the most common scripting language used on websites.

I know the platform. I am a user on Chaturbate for more than two years, modded many rooms, cammed myself, and have many friends in the Chaturbate community, moderators, models and developers alike. I know what is needed, I know what is there, I know what is missing.
I have the experience. I wrote over 15 different apps and bots for chaturbate so far, simple ones to feature packed custom creations for individual models. So far, none of my bots & apps is, to my knolwedge, known to crash or function improperly. I count that as a big success.

However dedicating bots to individual tasks is a whole different story than including all kinds of functionality in one bot without any of the parts interfering with each other.
On one hand, each part should be isolated fomr each other, to keep the code clean and easy to maintain (in programming, this is called KISS - "keep it simple, stupid!", on the other hand repetition should be avoided to reduce the risk of bugs - if 5 parts do the same thing, good luck finding the buggy one! (this is called DRY - "do not repeat yourself").
This means core functionality must be seperate and accessible by individual parts of the bot.
Keeping the balance of extensibility & flexibility, simple code and additional features is most likely the biggest challenge here, and solving it requires a lot of planning and intelligent code design. And lots of DRY KISSes.

Your personal perks
If you donate towards this project, you not only help creating this 
bot, you will also gain some benefits yourself, depending on your 
donation:

Every donation starting from $25 will get you listed as 
supporter of this project in the bot's full description with either your
 real name, your chaturbate username or a Twitter handle. Higher 
donations include links to your profiles and individual mentions as 
sponsors. This will make sure your donation will not go unnoticed.
Broadcasters who donate $100 will receive a custom bot based 
on the work of this bot that can include any additional functionality on
 top (or instead) of what this bot offers. Those custom bots can also be
 limited to only work in your room if you wish so.
Developers who donate $100 will get a fully documented copy 
of the base framework developed for this bot, making it easy for them to
 write their own bots that are compatible with this bot and can interact
 with it.
If you donate as much as $150 towards this project, 
your chat messages on Chaturbate will be highlighted in every room the 
bot is running in, making you stand out as the VIP you were for this 
project. 


Other ways to help
I get it - you spend all your money on the pretty girls already. Or like me, you are one poor university student. That's cool. No worries, you can still help.
While donating money is obviously the best way to help make this happen, spreading the news and getting some attention for this project helps as well. you can, for example:

Tweet about this project and retweet my own tweets on this

Tell your favorite camgirls about this on Kik, Snapchat or wherever you communicate with them
Send your rich friends here and tell them to donate for you

Contact me to help out with testing later down the road (this is important!)

Share your ideas with me

story:
Short Summary

The objective of this project is to create a social network based on the MemeSpeak platform.  Messages can be immediately created and posted for Facebook users and WhatsAPP messaging. As the MemeSpeak system is used by speaking animation creators, a shadow social network of related conversation will be created automatically as users submit new faces for speaking animation and post them in messages and on other social networks or blogs. The shadow network is in fact the CONVERSATION that links similar topics and subject words and presents them as CONVERSATIONS...or conversation playlists.


Background: MemeSpeak is a Cloud based conversational social network system that turns text messages into speaking faces. The link to avatar faces engaged in CONVERSATIONS can then be posted to social networks, blogs or sent in text messages (e.g. WhatsAPP) in place of text messaging or text blogging. The system supports multiple language text inputs and natural language audio outputs in English, French, Spanish, German, Polish, Portuguese, Mandarin, Cantonese, Hindi, Vietnamese, Russian, Italian, Hebrew, Japanese, Korean, Indonesian, Arabic and Czech. Think of it as WhatsAPP, but with video messaging longer than 10 seconds...in fact, potentially much longer because the video itself is not transmitted


The system can support hundreds of thousands of concurrent mobile or PC video clients and/or creators. Viewers do not need to be members of MemeSpeak™ to view the conversations on social networks or blogs. Any mobile platform with an internet browser can use the MemeSpeak™ system.

Globally, the website will appear in multiple Unicode-supported languages. The system can be scaled and hosted on Cloud networks to support 100,000's of concurrent viewers.

The animations, created through text-to-speech on the MemeSpeak™ website, which has most of the features of YouTube, allow users to create the animations and connect them through dynamic "learning" playlists of textual (and emotional) memes (which are automatically hash tagged) – then, they are distributed freely among friends or members of any existing social networks Facebook, Twitter, etc – only the textual links to the animations are shared or transmitted. (In fact, any social network can utilize generic avatar episodes or the novel MemeSpeak™ playlist pages can be embedded.) The meme tags are also searchable, unlike most blog commentary, through Google, etc. and evolve through SEO.

The MemeSpeak platform system is already available on cloud servers for PC and mobile users at www.memespeaker.com. IPhone and an Android APPS ("memespeaktheapp" ) which interface to the cloud system are free and available on iTunes and Google Play. However, the APPS are not necessary for a mobile connection which can be handled through any mobile browser on any handset in all of the supported languages.http://www.memespeaker.com/FAQ.html

MemeSpeakTHEAPP on Google Play and iTunes

https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=MemeSpeak+Inc&hl=en
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/memespeaktheapp/id924348965?mt=8

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Mark Krebs has been CEO, CTO and inventor for several technology startups ranging from text retrieval system (Sigscan Systems) to video for mobile (Logovision Wireless; Movidity). In all of these companies, he has contributed the fundamental intellectual property and filed patents. He has also managed the systems development and business development. In MemeSpeak Inc he is the CEO and CTO. The first release of the technology has been completely developed and is recently available on cloud servers at www.memespeaker.com. Mark has also developed both iPhone and Android mobile APPs which interface to the multiuser cloud system. The multiuser technology of MemeSpeak, fast animation compositing time and minimal export size of the animations are all novel technologies. MemeSpeak is a system that can be used by anyone, in many languages, to create talking animations to represent their opinions and comment on the opinions of others, in place of textual blogging or text messages.

Mark Krebs patents

https://www.google.ca/webhp?sourceid=chrome-instant&ion=1&espv=2&ie=UTF-8#q=mark%20sinclair%20krebs

https://patents.justia.com/inventor/forbes-j-burkowski

Previous Startups

https://www.google.ca/search?newwindow=1&site=&source=hp&q=movidity&oq=movidity&gs_l=hp.3..0.2426.3249.0.3670.9.9.0.0.0.0.265.1095.0j3j3.6.0.msedr...0...1c.1.64.hp..4.5.952.0.hv9PIk3qR2c

https://ca.finance.yahoo.com/news/memespeak-cloud-mobile-talking-avatar-123000602.html

What the money will be used for

Anyone can use this system right now..go to http://www.memespeaker.com or get the APP from iTunes or Google Play...but you don't need the APP to use the system from mobile - just browse to the website.

 The creation of the Web Series requires users to submit and create speaking faces and distribute them on their social network pages and through text messaging. This will create the MemeSpeak social network in which all speaking avatars can reference others in conversations that can be shared and viewed on social networks and blogs by non-users of the system.

Original the text links of the animations are posted or sent in messages. Funding will be used to attract animation user/creators for this purpose through news releases, Google Video Ads, Facebook ads & Twitter ads.

New graphical face selections will be created.

We will also develop business for specific user type..e.g. journalism, ad creation, chat messaging, audience interaction(with e.g. Reality TV, maybe eBay for advertising).

https://www.facebook.com/pages/MemeSpeak-Inc/1382396945408241

The challenge is to increase SEO and encourage social network and messaging creator/users to develop speaking animations and conversation lists instead of text messages.
Subscription on memespeaker.com is through PayPal and it is international. Our objective in this project will be to obtain 1000 creator/subscribers.

Avatar creation and sharing by users will provide a viral marketing push for MemeSpeak. When avatars are posted to social networks or blogs, they are permanent and anyone can view them, until the creator takes them down.

 https://plus.google.com/106469444421327647929/p...

story:
We Miss Nick!

Nick used to play games with us online all the time but now he is engaged, which is awesome, but he is saving all of his money for his wedding.  Nick works with kids all day and is using his salary to give his future wife a wonderful wedding. The downfall is we have all moved on to PS4 and he is still stuck in PS3 land.  
We miss playing online with Nick and want to get him a PS4 so we can be reunited.  
We would like to get nick a PS4, Battlefield 4, Witcher 3, FIFA , and 1 year of PSN.
If Nick makes more than he needs.
Any excess funds will go into my 18 month old daughter's school fund.

ZION.CITY is the first DECENTRALIZED SOCIAL NETWORK & MESSAGING SYSTEM for 

THE INTERNET OF THINGS

Our Mission is to help People & Things come together as ONE and work for greater good of our Planet and all of the mankind. Our technology provides complete ONLINE PRIVACY for You and 20 billion + SMART DEVICES that about to join the network of The Internet of Things in next 5 years.

ZION.CITY was built on the next generation Blockchain crypto technology (Decentralized Internet Operational System (Bitcoin, Ethereum alike)) and powered by Artificial Emotional Intelligence Bots to help You to optimize Your personal and Business processes to save time and money to set you FREE to Live, Love and Do Things that makes You and others happy.

We used simple cognitive architecture to achieve infinite scalability of finite systems in ONE network so the more People & Things join the network the faster and more efficient it works. With unique User Interface Design we optimized entire Internet social sharing and messaging experience in one simple to use Application that is FREE for everyone to join..


WELCOME TO THE FUTURE OF THE INTERNET OF PEOPLE & THINGS


WELCOME TO THE EVOLUTION BY OPTIMIZATION...



               

         

           

       

        

        

         

         

         





 



"And the Lord calls his people to come to ZION, they are of ONE HEART and ONE MIND, they [will] dwell in righteousness there [will] be NO POOR among them."

story:
Works with the Gidjit App!

Gidjit Beacons work with the Gidjit Smart Launcher app (available for download today) and allows you to find iPhone actions fast.

What is the Gidjit App?

The Gidjit App (Available Today for FREE) allows you to organize iPhone actions based on your environment. You can organize iPhone actions to appear in the Gidjit app based on:



What kind of Actions can you do in the Gidjit App?

Have panels show up based on Location, Time of Day, Motion, and more.


Even Access from the Notification Center!

(Swipe Down From the Top of the Screen)


Panels created based on 'Location' are for general areas (House, Office, Gym, etc.). The panel will be displayed  within approx. 50 yard radius of the assigned location. In order to organize actions based on a specific room, you will need the Gidjit Beacon.

What are Gidjit Beacons?



Gidjit Beacons let your phone know when you are in the same room as the Beacon. You can then find and access the actions you associated with that particular room in the Gidjit App. 

As you change rooms (and come within distance of a different Gidjit Beacon), the Gidjit app will also change and will display the actions  you have associated with the new Beacon. 


About Gidjit Beacons: 

(Demo. Video Below)


Features:

  • Adjustable broadcast range (Detect from as close as 1ft. or as far as approx. 80ft.) 
  • Waterproof
  • Multi-User friendly (The same Beacon can be used with multiple phones and each can customize accordingly)
  • No plugs! Gidjit Beacons run on low cost, easily replaceable batteries which will last about 12-18 months (CR2477)
  • 3M adhesive material on back for mounting to just about any surface or place them in drawer or cabinet
  • 50mm x 15mm (Roughly the size of a half-dollar)

Fast and Easy Setup:



Q: What Chip does the Gidjit Beacon use?

A: Gidjit Beacons use a Nordic NRF51822 Chip

Q: What happens when you have two (or more) Gidjit Beacons within a close range of each other? Will both of the panels which list the assigned Smart Devices and other Apps be displayed in the Gidjit App?

A: Yes, if your phone is within range of more than one Gidjit Beacon, the panels relating to those Beacons will be displayed (With the closest Beacon listed first). You can always adjust the broadcast range of one of the Beacons if you do not want them both displayed from that location. 

Q: Did your team develop the Gidjit Beacon?

A: No, after testing numerous Beacons from various manufacturers, we were able to successfully alter a Beacon manufactured by Minew Tech. to work best with the Gidjit app. 

Q: Will other Beacons work with the Gidjit app?

A: Not at this time. The reason being is that we are trying to raise funds in order to cover the overhead associated with further developing the Gidjit app. HOWEVER, the UUID, Major, Minor, etc. of the Gidjit Beacons can be  changed if you wish to use with a different application.


The Gidjit Team:

We need your Help:


We need your help raising funds in order to further develop the Gidjit app. We currently provide the app for free with no advertisements or in-app purchases. There are a lot of overhead expenses (Servers, Licensing, Advertising, Fees, etc.) that go towards the development of the app which is what the funding will be used to assist with.  


Try before you Buy!!!

Download the Gidjit Smart Launcher app today and try it out. Tutorial videos are also available on YouTube (Username: Team Gidjit).

      



Risks and Challenges

- Currently the Gidjit App is only available for iPhone and iPad. We plan on developing an App for Android in the near future.

- Currently there are thousands of Apps which can be launched using the Gidjit App but not all Apps can be launched directly from the Gidjit App. We continue to add more daily and are working with App developers to make their apps launch-able through Gidjit.

- We are currently working on adding Samsung SmartThings devices to work from the Gidjit App. Although this is not necessarily a risk or challenge, we want to make our backers aware of the current status of the app.

- We are currently working with a manufacturer to create the Gidjit Beacons. There are currently no known issues that will prevent us from creating our product beyond issues that are outside of our control. If issues arise, we will work promptly on fixing the issue and plan on updating all backers throughout and after the campaign.


Other ways you can Help:

If you do not wish to purchase the Gidjit Beacons you can also help us by downloading the Gidjit app (Free Download) and provide us with your feedback. 
Please let us know:
What kinds of things would you like to quickly access? 
What do you like about the app? 
What do you dislike about the app?
Send comments to admin@gidjit.com
story_txt:
Works with the Gidjit App!
Gidjit Beacons work with the Gidjit Smart Launcher app (available for download today) and allows you to find iPhone actions fast.


What is the Gidjit App?
The Gidjit App (Available Today for FREE) allows you to organize iPhone actions based on your environment. You can organize iPhone actions to appear in the Gidjit app based on:


What kind of Actions can you do in the Gidjit App?



Have panels show up based on Location, Time of Day, Motion, and more.



Even Access from the Notification Center!
(Swipe Down From the Top of the Screen)





Panels created based on 'Location' are for general areas (House, Office, Gym, etc.). The panel will be displayed  within approx. 50 yard radius of the assigned location. In order to organize actions based on a specific room, you will need the Gidjit Beacon.
What are Gidjit Beacons?







Gidjit Beacons let your phone know when you are in the same room as the Beacon. You can then find and access the actions you associated with that particular room in the Gidjit App. 
As you change rooms (and come within distance of a different Gidjit Beacon), the Gidjit app will also change and will display the actions  you have associated with the new Beacon. 




About Gidjit Beacons: 
(Demo. Video Below)




Features:


Adjustable broadcast range (Detect from as close as 1ft. or as far as approx. 80ft.) 
Waterproof
Multi-User friendly (The same Beacon can be used with multiple phones and each can customize accordingly)
No plugs! Gidjit Beacons run on low cost, easily replaceable batteries which will last about 12-18 months (CR2477)
3M adhesive material on back for mounting to just about any surface or place them in drawer or cabinet
50mm x 15mm (Roughly the size of a half-dollar)


Fast and Easy Setup:








Q: What Chip does the Gidjit Beacon use?
A: Gidjit Beacons use a Nordic NRF51822 Chip
Q: What happens when you have two (or more) Gidjit Beacons within a close range of each other? Will both of the panels which list the assigned Smart Devices and other Apps be displayed in the Gidjit App?
A: Yes, if your phone is within range of more than one Gidjit Beacon, the panels relating to those Beacons will be displayed (With the closest Beacon listed first). You can always adjust the broadcast range of one of the Beacons if you do not want them both displayed from that location. 
Q: Did your team develop the Gidjit Beacon?
A: No, after testing numerous Beacons from various manufacturers, we were able to successfully alter a Beacon manufactured by Minew Tech. to work best with the Gidjit app. 
Q: Will other Beacons work with the Gidjit app?
A: Not at this time. The reason being is that we are trying to raise funds in order to cover the overhead associated with further developing the Gidjit app. HOWEVER, the UUID, Major, Minor, etc. of the Gidjit Beacons can be  changed if you wish to use with a different application.

The Gidjit Team:


We need your Help:

We need your help raising funds in order to further develop the Gidjit app. We currently provide the app for free with no advertisements or in-app purchases. There are a lot of overhead expenses (Servers, Licensing, Advertising, Fees, etc.) that go towards the development of the app which is what the funding will be used to assist with.  



Try before you Buy!!!Download the Gidjit Smart Launcher app today and try it out. Tutorial videos are also available on YouTube (Username: Team Gidjit).      


Risks and Challenges- Currently the Gidjit App is only available for iPhone and iPad. We plan on developing an App for Android in the near future.- Currently there are thousands of Apps which can be launched using the Gidjit App but not all Apps can be launched directly from the Gidjit App. We continue to add more daily and are working with App developers to make their apps launch-able through Gidjit.- We are currently working on adding Samsung SmartThings devices to work from the Gidjit App. Although this is not necessarily a risk or challenge, we want to make our backers aware of the current status of the app.- We are currently working with a manufacturer to create the Gidjit Beacons. There are currently no known issues that will prevent us from creating our product beyond issues that are outside of our control. If issues arise, we will work promptly on fixing the issue and plan on updating all backers throughout and after the campaign.Other ways you can Help:If you do not wish to purchase the Gidjit Beacons you can also help us by downloading the Gidjit app (Free Download) and provide us with your feedback. Please let us know:What kinds of things would you like to quickly access? What do you like about the app? What do you dislike about the app?
Send comments to admin@gidjit.com

story:
FAQ

Which phones are compatible with Instant?
Instant is compatible with iPhone 5, 6 and 6S  and Android Devices.

What devices are compatible with the wireless Option?

Android and Iphone devices are compatible with the Wireless Option. Thats why we develop the Instant Wireless Receptor thats comes free with the purcharse of the Intant device.

How much extra battery does Instant provide?

Instant provides an additional 2000 mAh battery  which is equivalent to more than 10 hours extra talk time, 8 hours extra video play, 8 hours extra game time and 6 hours extra internet time. And 2800 mAh in the Ex Model  which is equivalent to more than 16 hours extra talk time, 12 hours extra video play, 12 hours extra game time and 9 hours extra internet time

When or where i can see videos of the product?

We are working in this awesome content also we are working in our website.

How thin is Instant?
Instant its only 4.5 mm thick. 

How do you charge Instant?
There is a Micro Usb Port for charge Instant so you can charge both your phone and the Battery device simultaneously.

How long does it take to charge Instant and the Phone?

It takes about 1h 30 min to fully charge the Instant and 3 hours to fully charge the Instant and Your Phone together. 

Can Instant Case protect my phone?

Yes, although Instant Case is thin and sleek, it is very robust. The outer shell bumper and the case protects your phone from all-around, making it shock-proof.

What color options are available?

Instant and Instant EX are available in the following three colors: Black and Blue, Purple and Green. And the limited Black version for Instant and EX versions.

Instant have a warranty? 
We will provide a one (1) year limited warranty. 

How much is shipping and handling?
Shipping is FREE worldwide.

When will my Instant be delivered?
We anticipate delivery in August 2016 for Indiegogo Backers and September for Worlwide.

story:
Hello,

I'm Daniel, but you probably know me as dadi11. I am active user of xda-developers, android phones and maintainer of Android custom roms for LG G3 and LG Optimus G. 
I have too weak PC for compiling process (only dual-core processor with 8GB ram - 4GB bought with your help on the last indiegogo campaign!) which makes it very long (4-6 hours for 1 rom!), unstable and very electricity-wasting. If I would like to compile roms for all LG G3 variants and Optimus G (8 builds at all) it would take forever! 

What I Need

Breaking it down for you folks in more detail:

  • I need to buy new PC with high parameters especially processor.
  • or rent build server - cheapest is ~15 eur/month
  • I haven't got money, it's too expensive for a student without job and living on his own.
  • If we don't reach the goal, I will dedicate the money on for example additional RAM, or try to replace at least processor for better one

What You Get

  • If we reach the goal, you can expect from me many roms, more often updates, and better more stable builds.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you want, but can't contribute, it doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Please get the word out and make some noise about my campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • If you can't donate, you can also consider sending me your old PC/hardware parts if you have any. It would be also very helpful.

And that's all there is to it. In conclusion, if you're rich or addicted to flashing roms on your phone, then you may consider donating.

story:
About Us

Cyber Privacy Project (CPP)  protects privacy rights at risk in today's Internet, technology-driven, and social media world.  It upholds privacy rights as fundamental to our democratic society by realizing the potential of the privacy protections in the U.S. Constitution and laws.  CPP launched its crowdfunding on Constitution Day to remind us of the stakes we all have in defending the constitutional rights for protecting privacy.  Supporting CPP supports privacy.

In upholding privacy as a fundamental constitutional right, CPP upholds privacy protections based in First Amendment rights of privacy and anonymity, Fourth Amendment rights against unreasonable searches and seizures, Fifth and Fourteenth Amendment rights to due process and protecting liberty, and Ninth Amendment unenumerated rights.  CPP also advocates privacy principles in international human rights, state constitutions, and ethics codes. 

CPP is notable among privacy advocates for its emphasis on how Technology can both undermine and support privacy.  Some technologies built into implementing privacy policies--like programming-in periodic purging of data--can protect personal information. In fact, privacy principles and advocacy can be considered a "social technology" that protects all of our rights.  In short, supporting CPP can improve the social technology of privacy protection.


CPP Amicus Brief in the Hiibel Case: Full Text


Goals and Approaches

The Cyber Privacy Project seeks to advance privacy policy recommendations by serving as a source for the media and public debates. CPP addresses issues relevant to wide ranging audiences about new forms of technology, communications, and surveillance. It pursues privacy protections for diverse groups across the political spectrum.  It seeks to protect not just against technology-driven privacy invasions but also by drawing on the beneficial aspects of technology for supporting privacy.

CPP helps identify and advance new constitutional arguments and principles for protecting privacy rights. CPP has written amicus ("Friend of the Court") briefs in three major constitutional rights cases (Hiibel, Crawford and Frank) against intrusive requirements like voter ID laws. 

To read more about CPP goals, click here.  

 

Privacy News

Privacy issues appear daily in headlines of newspapers, on TV and Internet, and in blogs and on social media. Identifying and raising awareness of privacy threats and solutions is an essential feature of the CPP's effort to combat government and commercial intrusions on privacy. As a resource to the media and public, CPP informs journalists and leaders on issues the privacy community is addressing.  To read recent privacy-related headlines, click here. 

To hear a CPP interview on NPR's "Talk of the Nation," listen here.


Publications

CPP members have published numerous articles and opinion pieces, given interviews, served as media sources, and made public presentations on privacy and identification issues. These resources provide professional policy analyses, including law journal and media articles, in the fields of privacy. 

CPP's article about "Reinstating Justifiable Reliance" as a more secure constitutional law and the "Right to Travel" create stronger foundations for protecting privacy and related constitutional rights. Links to our other amicus briefs and articles appear under the CPP Publications.

Projects

Cyber Privacy Project works on a wide range of privacy-related projects and issues including: Voter ID laws, National Identification Systems (NIDS) like "Real ID," Air ID and Body Scanning requirements, Immigration ID schemes, and Medical confidentiality and consent.

Protecting priceless privacy isn't free; it requires significant funding for staff and resources need to accomplish these and other projects:

    • To serve as a ongoing policy watchdog, media source, and commentator for the American public on privacy issues.
    • To continue to research and write amicus ("Friend of the Court") briefs developing and advancing privacy rights arguments and protections. This is a priority for CPP support and budgeting, particularly for the ability to accept (rather than turn down) invitations to write amicus briefs to protect privacy.
    • To develop constitutional standards, like "justifiable reliance," which create stronger standards for privacy projection than "reasonable expectations." Providing time and expertise for innovative writing and communication is another priority in creating the social-technology of privacy protection.
    • To further research privacy issues such as the misuse and hacking of social security numbers and how access to personal information contributes to identity theft.
    • To maintain contact and cooperation with other groups to create a larger collaborative opposition to privacy threats.  For example, CPP worked  with several organizations on constitutional arguments opposed to the Voter ID requirement in Indiana and Wisconsin.  These organizations include the ACLU, NAACP, Advancement Project, and Charles Hamilton Houston Institute.
    • To develop educational efforts and cooperation  between organizations to press states not to adopt or to repeal Voter ID legislation.  CPP’s research on the “Cost of ‘Free’ Voter IDs” contributed to a constitutional challenges to Voter ID laws in Indiana and Wisconsin. CPP director was the only social scientist invited to submit an amicus brief for the Wisconsin Voter ID "cert" petition (requesting Supreme Court review).
    • To support constitutional challenges to "Real ID" (national driver’s license) and universal E-Verify (electronic employment verification) systems.
    • To continue to educate and encourage businesses and organizations for privacy and security protections to drop use of Social Security numbers as identifiers.
    • To research and write articles and books about "Citizenship as Foundation of Rights" as an educational resource that explains the constitutional foundations for our rights against the threats a national ID system makes against U.S. civil liberties, particularly the constitutional rights to vote, work and travel.
    • To provide internships for public policy and law students to develop knowledge and expertise on privacy and constitutional issues.  Another budget priority is to provide partial stipends for summer internships for students who otherwise could not take on public interest summer projects like background for amicus briefs and other publications. 

 For more information on CPP projects, click here.

CPP Amicus Brief in the Wisconsin Voter ID Case: Full Text


Why is CPP Using Crowd Funding?   
  • First, preserving privacy is important for everybody: Walking outside in a crowd used to be a chance for anonymity and privacy. Now with facial recognition surveillance technology, everyone's privacy can be compromised.
  • Second, privacy is pricey to protect.  Like preserving freedom, protecting privacy isn't free, and needs support to pursue actively.
  • Third, few foundations and funding organizations support privacy projects.
  • Fourth, CPP is  asked to submit amicus ("Friend of the Court") briefs on significant constitutional issues that require multiple hours of research, analysis and writing. Because of their scope, fast timing, and court requirements, briefs are some of the hardest projects to fund on a timely basis.
  • Fifth, CPP helps educate interns about privacy issue, thus, helping to develop future privacy experts and advocates.

In Short
So contributing to CPP invests in the preservation of all of our privacy.  Supporters interested in periodic updates about progress on projects of special interest are welcome to request them. Our launch on Constitutional Day reminds everyone that supporting CPP supports constitutional privacy rights for us all. Joining our campaign by becoming a CPP supporter today can help us protect everyone's privacy for the future.

Contact Us
Send question, comments, concerns, and support to  cyberprivacyproject@hotmail.com

story:
Endurance is an early stage startup with offices in Moscow (Russia) and San Rafael (US, California). We are the most creative and focused startup you have ever seen. We make robots and lasers and ship them worldwide.

The reason why we are here is because we made a SelfieBot and we need your support!


New way to make video calls using your mobile gadgets




On the 10-th of August, 2015 we presented our SelfieBot. It helps your mobile devices make video calls and selfie video. We transform your mobile device into smart machine.  Now to make a video call you don't need to hold a mobile device.

(current fully 3D printed prototype)

Our revolutionary gadget will give you a new dimension of freedom during video calls. It can be used for both many personal and business purposes! 


How SelfieBot can be used?




Key SelfieBot features:

  • Motion autotracking during video calls or video recording.


  • Camera orientation remote control.


  • Biplane rotation.


  • Wireless charging of mobile devices.


  • Helps your mobile device to see at night.



Why buy SelfieBot?

  • Smart hardware gadget  (mount, wireless charger, external power bank) with the “follow me” function, night vision, motion sensors, voice control system, accelerometer control for your Android, Windows, iOS mobile device. 
  • Affordable price.
  • Cool, futuristic design.


Who needs SelfieBot?

  • Video bloggers and those who make selfie videos
  • Parents with small children
  • Senior people to be always in touch with their relatives
  • Photographers who make time-lapse
  • Offices


SelfieBot adds new functions to your mobile gadget transforming it easily into a smart machine:  a WiFi camera or perfect video phone. 


I bet you do not have a smart dock with a wireless charger and external power bank for your mobile device. I bet you’ve never before tested a face tracking function on your mobile device during a conference call. SelfieBot gives you an opportunity to experience it. 

This small gadget is a revolutionary step in the robotics industry.


What is it for?

  • Making comfortable* video calls and video calls when it is dark.
  • Turning your mobile device into a WiFi camera.
  • Wirelessly charging your mobile device.
  • Making selfie videos (webcast and recording).
  • Mounting your mobile device the way you want.
  • Turning your mobile device into a baby monitor,
  • Virtually attending classes at school.
  • Effectively holding meetings at work.
  • Convenient time-lapse.

* No need to carry a phone or tablet in your hand, no need to sit in front of the camera


Who will find SelfieBot extremely useful?

For home:

  • Those who communicate a lot and need hands free during video calls.
  • Those who make video calls at night with light off.
  • Video bloggers and performers.
  • People of art profession to make selfie videos.
  • Senior people and large families for better communication.
  • Those who would like to look after their apartments when stay away.
  • Parents with small children.
  • Those who make time-lapse shots and capture pictures while driving.
  • Those who travel a lot and need a universal cradle/charger for mobile devices.


What will it give to business?

  • more effective and convenient remote negotiations / meetings;
  • remote coaching or mentoring;
  • medical consultations, patient monitoring, virtual patient visit ;
  • replacement of meeter greeters;
  • portable advertising vehicle for presentations and sales;
  • remote consultations and surveys.


SelfieBot is so easy to control that even a kid of two can handle it.


SelfieBot features

You can find the project issues and features on  GitHub. 


We plan to make SelfieBot movements smart, make it follow you perfectly. So that it will react to you and your motion if you are nearby. 


 A new design. 3D printed. You have a unique opportunity to make your own design.

Near-term plans while Indiegogo campaign is still in progress

  • Polish up the new design
  • Add infrared diodes to enable night vision
  • Test motion sensors
  • Add a replaceable cradle (holder) for a 12 inch tablet
  • Complete a fully transparent interface
  • Make a SelfieBot compatible with iOS, Windows
  • Complete and test a wireless charger
  • Increase the power bank capacity up to 5000 mAh
  • Complete and test the “follow me” function
  • Create accelerometer control via a remote mobile device.


Current board


How it works (interface)

  

 

Follow me function


Accelerometer control


Movement sensor 


Night vision in our SelfieBot



Risks & Challenges


On AlphaCamp 2015

Loss of functionality. Other platforms may not support the transparent interface designed for Android.

We plan to:

  • Add an additional Bluetooth module, compatible with the new standards of communication.
  • Make it possible to exchange data via USB.
  • Make a more detailed study of API.
  • Add  an accelerometer  control function.
  • Add the Face Recognition function to make SelfieBot rotation automatic.

Hurdles: 

  • What kind of servo is the best for our SelfieBot? 
  • How long will the servos work fail-safe and under what conditions? 
  • How long will the battery work without recharging and what capacity is perfect for us?
  • What voltage range is the most optimal for the correct work of SelfieBot?

Ways to clear them:

  • Testing different servos, we will find the most perfect one (spell of service, max weight, voltage and min. price) for the smart SelfieBot.
  • Testing servos in different machines under various conditions.
  • Testing the SelfieBot operation with batteries of different capacity.
  • Testing the SelfieBot endurance under critical conditions (e.g. with a higher voltage battery.
More:
  • Crash tests of SelfieBot.
  • Search for the optimal price-quality solution.


Our financial goal


We are raising 20,000 USD to make 100 units and ship them to all our contributors. Endurance has about 10 people working full time and all of them work without salary. We are proud of it. Indeed, they are very motivated and focused. We need 20,000 USD to make beta shipments and  do some R&D.

We are inviting everyone interested in robotics to support the young entrepreneur team. It is important for us to enter the market and get feedbacks from our customers. 


Perks

5 USD

We put your name on our “thank you list”.

25 USD

We make a personal card with an engraved "thank you" message. Engraved with our Endurance L-Cheapo diode laser. Something like this.

100 USD

We ship you a hacker pack (microchips, servos and sketches to make your own SelfieBot on a 3D printer).

So you can make your own selfybot and even more!

150 USD

We ship you a SelfieBot


250 USD

We ship you a SelfieBot family / office pack (2 units). Save 16.6% on pre-order

500 USD

We can create and send you a SelfieBot with a unique design.

20,000 USD

We give you a full commercial SelfieBot license.


If we don't reach entire goal


If we do not reach the entire goal we will still continue with R&D and shipments. We’ve already raised 5K USD (off Indiegogo) from angel investors. 

Meanwhile, as part of R&D we plan to modify SelfieBot + do some tests:

  • Test various solutions concerning energy consumption.
  • Do crash tests and test it under critical conditions.
  • Search for a better quality-price solution using different batteries and servos.
  • Acquire more equipment to increase mass production (now it takes us 1 week to make 1 SelfieBot).
  • Improve the software stability.

Our SelfieBot is based on a small size arduino and uses 2 powerful servos to hold a smartphone or a tablet. To receive signals from the smartphone or tablet we use a bluetooth module. For a longer operation time we added a battery with the capacity of 2 600mAh and now we are working at a sleep function, which contains an IR sensor and will save energy when there is nobody near by.


The Impact

The Endurance project is an assembly of very smart engineer folks, mostly students from the top Russian tech universities. 

SelfieBot Team

We want to bring civilian robots into our life to make it easier. Making SelfieBot for a smartphone and tablets, we help make video phone calls and selfie videos easier and provide you with a perfect dock for your mobile device. Now you can turn your mobile gadget into a WiFi camera very easily.


A lot of similar projects on kickstarter and indiegogo did not take off or had some difficulties with that. Endurance have already taken off, we just need some help and an additional lift to fly faster. We will make this solution much cheaper than the similar solution of the current competitors and we will create a perfect “follow me” function.

Confidence

Endurance is a very open company. We neither keep it secret nor try to hide anything.

We make a youtube webcast channel when our developers come and discuss problems (see it on YouTube)

You can email me as many question as you want. Normally, I reply to everyone and have about 100 outgoing messages a day.


My non-robotics track record

For over a decade my team and I launched several successful startups.

"For 10 years I had been sitting in headquarters of top Russian banks until I realized that I had just wasted my time doing nothing. In May of 2015 I quit UniCredit Bank and started Endurance."

securebiosys.com an emotion detector startup. The technology was sold to one Russian bank.

Zem invest business - microlending business with total amount of funding exceed 1 M USD and we earned more than 50% to our investors during 2 years.


Other ways you can help

Please,  share our campaign with your friends on your Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter, Instagram. Write a post somewhere like Reddit, etc.… We will be happy if you help us promote our solution on the market.

We’ll appreciate any opinions and thoughts concerning our project. Feel free to write us: gf@endurancerobots.com


Visit us
