Full presentation on SlideShare (eng. version) and Russian version.


Who needs SelfieBot (extended list)?

Video Bloggers
Take your own pictures using your phone/tablet/GoPro camera. The “follow me” function will turn the camera and take your video even if you move and walk around.  

Parents with little kids
Transform your phone/tablet into a user-friendly video baby monitor. Now your phone/tablet is a very useful video baby monitor with the night vision mode and “follow me” function.


Busy Moms and Dads
You are too busy and often are absent from home but you want to see how your kid is doing. Call your SelfieBot and  communicate with your little one even if he/she is very little. He/she will see and hear you.  They do not need to hold a phone or tablet, do not need to press any buttons to answer. SelfieBot has the function of auto answer.

Securityfirms

Your SelfieBot with a phone/tablet is an excellent mobile security module, in which a phone/tablet serves as a mobile WiFi camera. It operates in 2g, 3g, 4g, WiFi. It has infrared night vision, a motion sensor, text function or other forms of information sharing.  

Heads of companies
If you are unable to be physically present at every meeting you have to attend, SelfieBot will allow you to virtually visit every meeting almost at a time without expending time in going there. Just put a SelfieBot at your partners’ offices or wherever you need, and communicate with them via any messenger, incl. Skype, Viber, Hangouts.


Photographers

Make videos and pictures remotely. Choose a view and camera angle remotely and take pictures or videos using a phone or GoPro camera. Remote photography/video is possible now.  SelfieBot powers from mains and batteries as well. The wireless power bank of SelfieBot enables up to 8 hours of independent operation.


Those who communicate a lot

Just call from your mobile devices hands free. You don’t need to hold them making video calls.  Our easy-to use gadget will make video calls easier especially when it is dark because it has infrared uplighting. The “follow me” function will be turning the device after you if you move around. You will not need to stay put to remain in picture.

Those who are in love

If you want to communicate with your loved one at night without turning on the light, night video connection is available now as the device has infrared uplighting. What is most important, you don’t need to hold your phone or tablet in your hands. Put it on the SelfieBot and it will follow you. You wake up and the SelfieBot wakes up with you because it has motion sensors.


Those who have aged parents
You can call them anytime and your parents do not need to answer the call as the auto-answer function of the device is on.  The telephone or tablet on the dock is always charged. You can control the device and turn it biplaneto find your parents in the room.

Those who cook a lot 

You can watch your favorite film while being busy in the kitchen cooking something; you will not miss a moment of it as the screen of your tablet will turn the direction you go to follow your every movement. You canalso communicatewithpeoplewhilecooking. Our SelfieBot will hold your communication device for you and will keep you in sight whenever you go in the kitchen. The “follow me” function gives you the freedom you need.  And the wireless charger of SepfieBot will charge your phone/tablet on the dock.

Those who go in for sports and like to make selfies

Do you want to know if you do your exercises correctly? SelfieBot will follow you and make pictures and videos of your performance. Professional coaches will find it useful for their video classes.  

Creative persons

If you like to tell stories and share those stories with your friends you don’t need to sit now in front of the camera. Youarefreetomove. Thanks to the “follow me” function the camera will keep you in sight.  

You can talk, tell stories, teach lessons, deliver lectures, draw or whatever, and the camera will watch and follow you on its own.  Onlinewebinarsaremucheasier with SelfieBot.

Small enterprises

You are often absent but would like to know how well your stuff works, would like to communicate with your employees. Leave a SelfieBot in the office with a phone or tablet, call it and communicate as much as you like.  Now your office is always accessible via a video call. Now it’s easy for you to hold inspections or give trainings. Just change your angle of view if necessary and communicate. You can have another SelfieBot at home with your phone or tablet to communicate with people hands free.  This way your communication device is always charged and online and will keep you in view.


Those who like big companies

SelfieBot helps friends get together. That who is unable to come can still be virtually present at your table and participate in your conversation using any messenger he/she likes. SelfieBot gives him/her an opportunity to follow the speaker, manually changing the view angle. SelfieBot is equipped with an external speaker to hear well the one you speak with. It also has a built-in battery to power the device and enables its work up to 8 hours.


Medical institutions
A doctor can communicate with his/her patients remotely to check the patient’s condition or to solve their minor health problems.  A SelfieBot in a hospital ward will make it easier for patients’ relatives to say hello to their dear ones and wish them well. 
Show rooms and demo stands

Turn your ordinary tablet into a movable advertising vehicle. It will attract much more attention. It will provide an interactive connection with the advertiser. Push a button to get a special product offer.  SelfieBot easily transforms phones and tablets into an advertising media, which will surely help increase sales.

Timecafes

SelfieBotmakesuselesscustomers’ identificationtokensinTimecafes. A SelfieBot in the cafe  will remember every customer and will count their time. A customer will need only to check in and out with the SelfieBot. The SelfieBot will give them a bill, when they leave, to be paid at the cashier.

Hotels and restaurants

SelfieBot provides guests and customers with the telepresence function giving them the opportunity to communicate with the manager if necessary. 

Banks and Insurance offices

A SelfieBot with a tablet will effectively substitute meter-greeters at the entrance of banks and insurance offices. The device identifies (recognizes ) customers,  gives answers to simple questions thanks to the voice menu function, and keeps them in picture. It also may help  detect unwanted clients.

Points of sales

SelfieBot will turn an ordinary tablet or phone into an effective tool to increase sales.  The rotating gear allows turning the camera to show clients these or those goods or products. The telepresence function provides communication with a distant sales manager.


FAQ

1.  What operating systems and devices does the SelfieBot support?

Currently SelfieBot supports only Android devices. But we are working on iOS and Windows support. We plan to support them before the end of September 2015.

2.  What powers the SelfieBot?

It uses Li-ion 2600mAh battery and can work up to 4 hoursand even charge your mobile device. We are going to make models, which will use batteries with 5200mAh capacity or bigger. The SelfieBot ispowered from AC power supply through a compatible. The SelfieBot is equipped now with a special controller to check the current, which will turn it off if needed. It is built in the battery block.

3.  Does the SelfieBot cost 150 USD? What is a "full commercial SelfieBot license," as advertised on your Indiegogo page?

For our Indiegogo campaign we made a special price of 150 USD. Later on the price will be around  200-250 USD.

We also offer a SelfieBot made after a customer’s design, at the price of 500 USD.

Under the full commercial SelfieBot  license we mean a nonexclusive license we’ll give to a contributor who gives us 20,000 USD provided he/she wants it.

4.  Does the SelfieBot come with the white stand, as can be seen in this photo?

Actually, we are working at several designs. The device will come with a black, white and even transparent stands, + a hacker pack (without a stand).

5. How do you see the SelfieBot helping people with disabilities?

In fact, this model is a part of another project of ours - telepresence robot. The SelfieBot will help them be always in touch with their caregivers and dear ones and vice versa. When you call the SelfieBot it connects you automatically with your interlocutor. He/she does not need to do anything to answer your call. You can see and hear them at once. It is convenient for a disabled person might not be always able to answer your call himself/herself. With this device they will never feel alone.

6. On your Indiegogo page, it says: "SelfieBot rotates your mobile device on 2 axes tracking your movements." What part of the bot, exactly, rotates the mobile device? Can you send a video of this in action?

Here it is the link: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Rmr-Qeb4wgk.  The cradle (holder) rotates your mobile device.

7. When will you start shipping the SelfieBot to customers? When will the Indiegogo campaign end?

The Indiegogo campaign will end on the 24 of September 2015 and we plan to start shipping our units to our backers in October 2015.

8. How do you control the SelfieBot? (Remote control, buttons on the device, or what?)

Either manually, using the transparent buttons on the screen of another mobile device (tablet or smartphone), or automatically, using the “follow me” function. We also plan to make it possible to control the SelfieBot remotely using the accelerometer of your mobile device. You will rotate your cell phone being far away from the SelfieBot, and it will rotate in the direction you choose.

9. What do you mean by “transparent buttons on the screen of another mobile device"?

Transparent buttons appear on the screen of your device when you run Skype or Hangouts; using them you can rotate the  SelfieBot.You can you see it here: https://res.cloudinary.com/indiegogo-media-prod-cld/image/upload/c_limit,w_695/v1439631307/xepbchybiytufmafp3gs.jpg

10. What exactly does the ‘follow me” function do? Does it exist right now?

The “follow me” function makes the SelfieBot turn after the user if he/she moves around while using the device. The function does exist.

11. Do you have to download the SelfieBot app to use the follow me/ facial recognition functions?

Yes, you have to download the SelfieBot app to the device you mount on the SelfieBot. Otherwise how can the SelfieBot automatically log the facial recognition, if you use FaceTime or Skype? So you download the SelfieBot app, run it, and make a connection with the SelfieBot via bluetooth protocol. Your mobile gadget sends signals to the SelfieBot, in which direction to rotate. And no special apps are needed for the devices of SelfieBot's interlocutors.

12. Is there a SelfieBot app currently available to users?

Yes.  You can find it here: https://github.com/deadtr/Selfiebot

13. ill software be available  only on the Google play store, or iOS/Microsoft as well?

Currently, our App is available for  Android only. Windows and iOS will be ready a bit later.

14. Do users have to download a separate app on another device to control the SelfieBot?

Not on another device but on the one they use to contact the SelfieBot. So you mount one device on the SelfieBot and another person calls you using his/her device. If your caller wants to control your SelfieBot he/she needs to download our app; if he/she does not want to control the SelfieBot and is happy with the “follow me” function he/she will not need any additional apps.

15.  How long does the robot's battery last without charging?

Several hours. We plan to increase it up to 24.

16. What happens if two people (the caller and the receiver) have downloaded the SelfieBot app to control the bot? What if they give conflicting instructions?

A great point. You can select who controls the SelfieBot. There is a select mode.

17. And, just to be clear, how many different ways are there to control the mobile device? "Control" meaning switching on and off, rotating the device, etc.

Two ways: manual and automatic. You can control the SelfieBot from any other device: PC, smartphone or tablet.

18. Apart from rotating the cradle so that the smartphone can follow the user around, does the SelfieBot have other functions?

Quite a lot. 

  • SelfieBot on/off;
  • infrared lighning on / off;
  • “follow me” function on/off.
  • Movement sensors on / off.

19.  Just to be clear, will the iOS, Windows, web versions of the app all be completed by the time you start shipping?

Yes, we hope it will be even sooner. 

20.  How can you decide whether you want the robot to be stationary (rooted), controlled by another device, or move automatically?

It depends on what you do. If you talk to someone in the kitchen then you’ll probably want the SelfieBot to move after you (“follow me” function). If you talk to someone at a business meeting then you’ll probably prefer to move it yourself (manual mode).

21.  How do you switch between making the SelfieBot stationary, controlled, or on "follow me" mode?

When you run a Selfiebot you run an app on its local mobile device. When connected to the SelfieBot you can choose the manual mode or the “follow me” function mode.

22. Can you  switch off the "follow me" function?

Yes.

23. If so, how?

Just take it off from a checkbox.

24. Is there a password before you connect to a particular SelfieBot? Can people hack into others' SelfieBots and control their directions?

You have your Mac address and your personal SelfieBot name so if you use our server you know where to connect to.

25. Can people hack into others' SelfieBots and control their directions?

We take security seriously, and make sure that SeflieBot as secure as possible. but we do not think that it is something people would like to hack. You have to hack someone’s smartphone first.

26.  Regarding the face tracking function -- will the robot be programmed to recognize one user's face, or any? Will it be able to move when anyone in the frame is moving around (e.g. babies, people in your apartment when you are away, etc.)?

Once you started talking to someone it remembers you and then will track you. Actually, you can change the person to be followed if you wish ad hoc but more likely you will have to re-start the “follow me” function.

27. Do you have to download the SelfieBot app to use the follow me/ facial recognition functions? Because if you're using FaceTime or Skype, how can the SelfieBot automatically log the facial recognition?

Once the SelfieBot recognizes you it will track your movements... even if someone else is in the frame, it will still follow you.

28. Can the SelfieBot "forget" what you look like and stop tracking you?

No, it cannot forget you during the call and will track you till the end of the call even if somebody else is nearby.

29. Once the SelfieBot's app (the app, not actual robot, right?) recognizes your face, when will it forget your face? Only until the end of the conversation, or forever? Only the app you are using will remember your face, right? If a stranger downloads SelfieBot's app, will they know my face?

Nope. It is for local application only.  No face recognition or face database. After you stop the conversation and disconnect the “follow me” function. The “follow me” function will be working for one session. Only until the end of the conversation.

30. What happens in the "follow me" feature if there are multiple people in the frame? Who does the facial recognition feature track?

It will follow the leader, the one who is closer to the camera.

31. How big is the SelfieBot (measurements) and how heavy?

It’s about 7-8 inch high and 1.5-2 pounds weight.

32. Which parts of the SelfieBot are 3D-printed?

Everything what you see outside is fully 3D-printed!

33. Is the SelfieBot app available on desktop and tablet?

Right now only the Android version is available https://github.com/deadtr/SelfieBot/releases

but we hope to make an html web page on our server to allow access to the SelfieBot, which is in Moscow.

34. I don't use an Android device so unfortunately cannot download SelfieBot's app, unfortunately.

Surely, you use iPhone, do you? We will make it for iOS in the middle of September.

Actually you can download our app and connect to the SelfieBot remotely https://github.com/deadtr/SelfieBot/releases

35. You also mention that users use the app connect to particular SelfieBots via bluetooth.

Exactly. To pair the SelfieBot with your mobile gadget you have to use bluetooth connection since your WiFi can be busy.

36. If I'm an interlocutor connecting to your SelfieBot remotely, how far does the bluetooth work?

Normally,  if you are far away you connect using our server. Bluetooth connection is used to pair a SelfieBot with a mobile device (a cell phone or a tablet).

37. Would I be able to connect to a SelfieBot from any country?

By all means. You may try it anytime when I am in our office.

Your SelfieBot with a phone/tablet is an excellent
mobile security module, in which a phone/tablet serves as a mobile WiFi camera.
It operates in 2g, 3g, 4g, WiFi. It has infrared night vision, a motion sensor,
text function or other forms of information sharing.  

Heads of companies
If you are unable to be physically present
at every meeting you have to attend, SelfieBot will allow you to virtually
visit every meeting almost at a time without expending time in going there.
Just put a SelfieBot at your partners’ offices or wherever you need, and
communicate with them via any messenger, incl. Skype, Viber, Hangouts. 

Photographers
Make videos and pictures
remotely. Choose a view and camera angle remotely and take pictures or videos
using a phone or GoPro camera. Remote photography/video is possible now.  SelfieBot powers from mains and batteries as well.
The wireless power bank of SelfieBot enables up to 8 hours of independent
operation.

Those who communicate a lot
Just call from your mobile devices hands
free. You don’t need to hold them making video calls.  Our easy-to use gadget will make video calls
easier especially when it is dark because it has infrared uplighting. The “follow
me” function will be turning the device after you if you move around. You will not
need to stay put to remain in picture.

Those who are in love
If you want to communicate with your loved one at night without turning on
the light, night video connection is available now as the device has infrared
uplighting. What is most important, you don’t need to hold your phone or tablet
in your hands. Put it on the SelfieBot and it will follow you. You wake up and the
SelfieBot wakes up with you because it has motion sensors. 

Those who have aged parents
You can call them anytime and your parents do not need to answer the
call as the auto-answer function of the device is on.  The telephone or tablet on the dock is always charged.
You can control the device and turn it biplaneto find your parents in the room. 
Those who
cook a lot 
You can watch your favorite film while being
busy in the kitchen cooking something; you will not miss a moment of it as the
screen of your tablet will turn the direction you go to follow your every
movement. You canalso communicatewithpeoplewhilecooking. Our SelfieBot
will hold your communication device for you and will keep you in sight whenever
you go in the kitchen. The “follow me” function gives you the freedom you need.
 And the wireless charger of SepfieBot
will charge your phone/tablet on the dock. 

Those who go in for sports and like to make selfies
Do you want to know if you do your exercises correctly? SelfieBot will
follow you and make pictures and videos of your performance. Professional coaches
will find it useful for their video classes.  

Creative persons
If you like to tell stories and share those stories with your friends you don’t
need to sit now in front of the camera. Youarefreetomove. Thanks to the
“follow me” function the camera will keep you in sight.  
You can talk, tell stories, teach lessons, deliver lectures, draw or
whatever, and the camera will watch and follow you on its own.  Onlinewebinarsaremucheasier with
SelfieBot.
Small enterprises
You are often absent but would like to know how well your stuff works,
would like to communicate with your employees. Leave a SelfieBot in the office
with a phone or tablet, call it and communicate as much as you like.  Now your office is always accessible via a video
call. Now it’s easy for you to hold inspections or give trainings. Just change
your angle of view if necessary and communicate. You can have another SelfieBot
at home with your phone or tablet to communicate with people hands free.  This way your communication device is always charged
and online and will keep you in view. 

Those who like big companies
SelfieBot helps friends get together. That who is unable to come can still be
virtually present at your table and participate in your conversation using any
messenger he/she likes. SelfieBot gives him/her an opportunity to follow the
speaker, manually changing the view angle. SelfieBot is equipped with an external
speaker to hear well the one you speak with. It also has a built-in battery to
power the device and enables its work up to 8 hours.

Medical institutions
A doctor can communicate with his/her patients remotely to check the
patient’s condition or to solve their minor health problems.  A SelfieBot in a hospital ward will make it
easier for patients’ relatives to say hello to their dear ones and wish them
well.  
Show rooms and demo stands
Turn your ordinary tablet into a movable
advertising vehicle. It will attract much more attention. It will provide an interactive
connection with the advertiser. Push a button to get a special product
offer.  SelfieBot easily transforms
phones and tablets into an advertising media, which will surely help increase
sales. 
Timecafes
SelfieBotmakesuselesscustomers’ identificationtokensinTimecafes. A SelfieBot in the cafe  will remember every customer and will count
their time. A customer will need only to check in and out with the SelfieBot.
The SelfieBot will give them a bill, when they leave, to be paid at the cashier.

Hotels and restaurants 
SelfieBot
provides guests and customers with the telepresence function giving them the
opportunity to communicate with the manager if necessary.  
Banks and Insurance offices
A SelfieBot
with a tablet will effectively substitute meter-greeters at the entrance of
banks and insurance offices. The device identifies (recognizes
) customers,  gives answers to simple
questions thanks to the voice menu function, and keeps them in picture. It also
may help  detect unwanted clients. 
Points of sales
SelfieBot
will turn an ordinary tablet or phone into an effective tool to increase
sales.  The rotating gear allows turning the
camera to show clients these or those goods or products. The telepresence function
provides communication with a distant sales manager. 


FAQ
1.  What operating systems and
devices does the SelfieBot support?
Currently
SelfieBot supports only Android devices. But we are working on iOS and Windows
support. We plan to support them before the end of September 2015.
2.  What powers the SelfieBot? 
It uses
Li-ion 2600mAh battery and can work up to 4 hoursand even charge your mobile
device. We are going to make models, which will use batteries with 5200mAh
capacity or bigger. The SelfieBot ispowered from AC power supply through a
compatible. The SelfieBot is equipped
now with a special controller to check the current, which will turn it off if
needed. It is built in the battery block.
3.  Does the SelfieBot cost 150 USD? What is a "full commercial SelfieBot license," as advertised on your Indiegogo page?
For our Indiegogo campaign we made
a special price of 150 USD. Later on the price will be around  200-250 USD.
We also offer a SelfieBot made
after a customer’s design, at the price of 500 USD.
Under the full commercial
SelfieBot  license we mean a nonexclusive
license we’ll give to a contributor who gives us 20,000 USD provided he/she
wants it.
4.  Does the SelfieBot come with
the white stand, as can be seen in this photo?
Actually, we are working at
several designs. The device will come with a black, white and even transparent
stands, + a hacker pack (without a stand).
5. How do you see the SelfieBot helping people with disabilities?
In fact, this model is a part of
another project of ours - telepresence robot. The SelfieBot will help them be
always in touch with their caregivers and dear ones and vice versa. When you
call the SelfieBot it connects you automatically with your interlocutor. He/she
does not need to do anything to answer your call. You can see and hear them at
once. It is convenient for a disabled person might not be always able to answer
your call himself/herself. With this device they will never feel alone.
6. On your Indiegogo page, it says: "SelfieBot rotates your mobile
device on 2 axes tracking your movements." What part of the bot, exactly,
rotates the mobile device? Can you send a video of this in action?
Here it is the link: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Rmr-Qeb4wgk.  The cradle (holder) rotates your mobile
device.
7. When will you start shipping the SelfieBot to customers? When will
the Indiegogo campaign end?
The Indiegogo campaign will end on
the 24 of September 2015 and we plan to start shipping our units to our backers
in October 2015.
8. How do you control the SelfieBot? (Remote control, buttons on the
device, or what?)
Either manually, using the
transparent buttons on the screen of another mobile device (tablet or
smartphone), or automatically, using the “follow me” function. We also plan to
make it possible to control the SelfieBot remotely using the accelerometer of your
mobile device. You will rotate your cell phone being far away from the
SelfieBot, and it will rotate in the direction you choose.
9. What do you mean by “transparent buttons on the screen of another
mobile device"?
Transparent buttons appear on the
screen of your device when you run Skype or Hangouts; using them you can rotate
the  SelfieBot.You can you see it here: https://res.cloudinary.com/indiegogo-media-prod-cld/image/upload/c_limit,w_695/v1439631307/xepbchybiytufmafp3gs.jpg
10. What exactly does the ‘follow me” function do? Does it exist right
now?
The “follow me” function makes the
SelfieBot turn after the user if he/she moves around while using the device.
The function does exist.
11. Do you have to download the SelfieBot app to use the follow me/
facial recognition functions?
Yes, you have to download the
SelfieBot app to the device you mount on the SelfieBot. Otherwise how can the
SelfieBot automatically log the facial recognition, if you use FaceTime or
Skype? So you download the SelfieBot app, run it, and make a connection with
the SelfieBot via bluetooth protocol. Your mobile gadget sends signals to the
SelfieBot, in which direction to rotate. And no special apps are needed for the
devices of SelfieBot's interlocutors.
12. Is there a SelfieBot app currently available to users?
Yes.  You can find it here: https://github.com/deadtr/Selfiebot
13. ill software be available  only on the Google play store, or
iOS/Microsoft as well?
Currently, our App is available for  Android only. Windows and iOS will be ready a
bit later.
14. Do users have to download a separate app on another device to
control the SelfieBot?
Not on another device but on the
one they use to contact the SelfieBot. So you mount one device on the SelfieBot
and another person calls you using his/her device. If your caller wants to
control your SelfieBot he/she needs to download our app; if he/she does not
want to control the SelfieBot and is happy with the “follow me” function he/she
will not need any additional apps.
15.  How long does the robot's
battery last without charging?
Several hours. We plan to increase
it up to 24.
16. What happens if two people (the caller and the receiver) have
downloaded the SelfieBot app to control the bot? What if they give conflicting
instructions?
A great point. You can select who
controls the SelfieBot. There is a select mode.
17. And, just to be clear, how many different ways are there to control
the mobile device? "Control" meaning switching on and off, rotating
the device, etc.
Two ways: manual and automatic.
You can control the SelfieBot from any other device: PC, smartphone or tablet. 
18. Apart from rotating the cradle so that the smartphone can follow the
user around, does the SelfieBot have other functions?
Quite a lot.  



SelfieBot on/off;


infrared lighning on / off;


“follow me” function on/off.


Movement sensors on / off.


19.  Just to be clear, will the
iOS, Windows, web versions of the app all be completed by the time you start
shipping?
Yes, we hope it will be even
sooner.  
20.  How can you decide whether
you want the robot to be stationary (rooted), controlled by another device, or
move automatically?
It depends on what you do. If you
talk to someone in the kitchen then you’ll probably want the SelfieBot to move
after you (“follow me” function). If you talk to someone at a business meeting
then you’ll probably prefer to move it yourself (manual mode). 
21.  How do you switch
between making the SelfieBot stationary, controlled, or on "follow
me" mode?
When you run a Selfiebot you run
an app on its local mobile device. When connected to the SelfieBot you can
choose the manual mode or the “follow me” function mode.
22. Can you  switch off the
"follow me" function? 
Yes.
23. If so, how?
Just take it off from a checkbox.
24. Is there a password before you connect to a particular SelfieBot?
Can people hack into others' SelfieBots and control their directions?
You have your Mac address and your
personal SelfieBot name so if you use our server you know where to connect to.
25. Can people hack into others' SelfieBots and control their
directions?
We take security seriously, and
make sure that SeflieBot as secure as possible. but we do not think that it is
something people would like to hack. You have to hack someone’s smartphone first.
26.  Regarding the face tracking
function -- will the robot be programmed to recognize one user's face, or any?
Will it be able to move when anyone in the frame is moving around (e.g. babies,
people in your apartment when you are away, etc.)?
Once you started talking to
someone it remembers you and then will track you. Actually, you can change the
person to be followed if you wish ad hoc but more likely you will have to
re-start the “follow me” function.
27. Do you have to download the SelfieBot app to use the follow me/
facial recognition functions? Because if you're using FaceTime or Skype, how
can the SelfieBot automatically log the facial recognition?
Once the SelfieBot recognizes you
it will track your movements... even if someone else is in the frame, it will
still follow you. 
28. Can the SelfieBot "forget" what you look like and stop
tracking you?
No, it cannot forget you during
the call and will track you till the end of the call even if somebody else is
nearby.
29. Once the SelfieBot's app (the app, not actual robot, right?)
recognizes your face, when will it forget your face? Only until the end of the
conversation, or forever? Only the app you are using will remember your face,
right? If a stranger downloads SelfieBot's app, will they know my face?
Nope. It is for local application
only.  No face recognition or face
database. After you stop the conversation and disconnect the “follow me”
function. The “follow me” function will be working for one session. Only until
the end of the conversation. 
30. What happens in the "follow me" feature if there are
multiple people in the frame? Who does the facial recognition feature track?
It will follow the leader, the one
who is closer to the camera.
31. How big is the SelfieBot (measurements) and how heavy?
It’s about 7-8 inch high and 1.5-2
pounds weight.
32. Which parts of the SelfieBot are 3D-printed?
Everything what you see outside is
fully 3D-printed!
33. Is the SelfieBot app available on desktop and tablet?
Right now only the Android version
is available https://github.com/deadtr/SelfieBot/releases
but we hope to make an html web
page on our server to allow access to the SelfieBot, which is in Moscow.
34. I don't use an Android device so unfortunately cannot download
SelfieBot's app, unfortunately.
Surely, you use iPhone, do you? We
will make it for iOS in the middle of September.
Actually you can download our app
and connect to the SelfieBot remotely https://github.com/deadtr/SelfieBot/releases
35. You also mention that users use the app connect to particular
SelfieBots via bluetooth.
Exactly. To pair the SelfieBot
with your mobile gadget you have to use bluetooth connection since your WiFi
can be busy.
36. If I'm an interlocutor connecting to your SelfieBot remotely, how
far does the bluetooth work?
Normally,  if you are far away you connect using our
server. Bluetooth connection is used to pair a SelfieBot with a mobile device
(a cell phone or a tablet).
37. Would I be able to connect to a SelfieBot from any country?

By all means. You may try it
anytime when I am in our office.



Endurance in social networks:



LinkedIn
Facebook
Twitter
Google Groups
AngelList
CrunchBase
YouTube
Instagram

story:
BlackDeeper Pro Smart Fish finder - wireless sonar

BlackDeeper Pro fish finder is the first of its kind portable, wireless sonar, compatible with iOS and Android devices, specially designed to find the location of fish, depth, water temperature, bottom contour and much more.


We know where the fish are hiding. Find them with your smartphone!

BlackDeeper Pro – smart sonar is a first of its kind, portable, wireless fish finder specially designed for amateur and professional fishermen.

You can count on BlackDeeper Pro

Find Fish


High accuracy sonar shots reveal most of the fish species with a crystal clarity, and allows you to target your prey with confidence.

See Depth


BlackDeeper Pro sonar is powerful enough to perfectly function in the depths from 1.5 ft (0.5 m) to ~130 ft (40 m) below the surface in both salt and fresh waters.

Explore Bottom Structure


Enhance your fishing experience with the detailed view of the bottom terrain, and fish holding habitat using innovative BlackDeeper Pro Smart Imaging technology.

Know Temperature


BlackDeeper Pro temperature sensors provide accurate fluctuations of the water temperature so you always know the perfect biting time.

Reveal New Spots


With castable BlackDeeper Pro and its mounting solutions you can explore the lake, river or sea from every angle. Scan places other fish finders cannot reach.

Catch & Share


Become next generation angler with all in one solution - join global community of smart fishermen and inspire others by sharing your monsters.

Ultimate Portable Sonar.


With the weight of only 0.22lb/ 100grams and 2.6"/ 65mm diameter, BlackDeeper Pro is smaller and lighter than any other traditional sonar. Specially designed to fit into your fishing tackle box, so you could take your personal sonar anywhere you go and use it in places most sonars can't, like from kayak, shore, or dock.


BlackDeeper Pro uses Bluetooth technology to transfer sonar readings to your smartphone or tablet from up to 150ft/ 45 meters. Bluetooth connection enables lower battery consumption and no cellular data required for the device to operate, so you can use Internet connection on your smartphone or tablet while fishing.

Smart Imaging.


Featured technology provides crystal clear, picture-like images of the fish targets and bottom structure with amazing detail straight to your smartphone or tablet. Fish are vividly revealed as clearly defined targets and separated from the structures, so you can instantly understand of what you see and no interpretation needed.

Dual Coverage Sonar.


BlackDeeper Pro dual frequency feature allows excellent observation of the underwater at all depths in 90 kHz (55°) and 290 kHz (15°) radius. Wide beam provides ample search area for fish, bait fish and structure. Precise narrow beam gives high accuracy returns of fish, structure, detail and bottom profile. With BlackDeeper Pro you can both cast wide or focus on the bottom.

Spy. Catch. Release.


Get the full control of all sonar functions and features with user friendly BlackDeeper Pro mobile app. Adjust the sensitivity of a sonar returns to increase/decrease details displayed, switch between different frequencies for wider or more accurate exploration, put the device into a low power consumption sleep mode or wake it up with your iOS or Android device and much more.

Wireless Sonar Updates.


Conveniently update your device on the go by using your Android or iOS smartphone or tablet and BlackDeeper Pro app. You’ll get the newest features and best performance from your sonar by keeping it up to date with the latest software.

Share.


Caught a monster? Use BlackDeeper Pro mobile app to take pictures and share them with your friends anywhere in the world on Facebook, Twitter and Google+.


Discover

Whatever your passion is, BlackDeeper Pro will help you make it unforgettable experience. Take it to your next scuba diving adventure, fishing trip, or use it to reveal the depths of your garden pond. Have a look how others use BlackDeeper Pro. Be creative!

story:
LYNQ GIVES YOU THE PORTS YOU'LL NEED FOR YOUR NEW MACBOOK, CHROMEBOOK or USB-C Equipped PC!
More Ports. More Power!

LYNQ is designed to bring the ports you're used to back to the new MacBook or ChromeBook. It connects to your computer's USB (Type C) port and gives you all the ports you'll ever need! LYNQ will even let you charge your MacBook and mobile phone at the same time while using both.

LYNQ works with more and more devices to bring more ports for more power!

Mobile phone

 Notebook

Microsoft Lumia 950XL

Apple Macbook 12'' 2015

Google Nexus 5X

Apple Macbook 12'' 2016

Google Nexus 6P

Google Chromebook Pixel

LG G5

Samsung TabPro S

Moto X 4

HP Elite X3

HUAWEI P9

HP Spectre X360 15

ZUK Z1

ACER H7

LETV Max Pro

ACER Switch 12 S

Dell XPS13

DELL LATITUDE 13 7000

Dell XPS15

DELL LATITUDE 11 500 Series

ASUS VivoBook TP301 & TP501

LG Gram 15

ASUS ZenBook 3

Lenovo YOGA 4S

ASUS Transformer 3Pro


CONNECT TO ALL THE DEVICES YOU ALREADY OWN AND MORE.


MEET THE PORTS

LYNQ gives you all the ports you need to connect to the devices you love.



CONNECT MORE

LYNQ gives you 3 extra powered USB ports that lets you connect printers, portable hard-drives, keyboard, MIDI instruments, thumb drives and more! Plus, you can charge your iPhone.


ACCESS MORE (SD/MicroSD)

LYNQ has a standard SD and a micro SD card reader built in. You can access high capacity (HC) and extra capacity XC cards up to 2 Terabyte.  You can also keep your high-capacity micro-SD card installed and turn LYNQ into portable USB-C backup drive for your laptop.


SEE MORE – ULTRA-HD 4K VIDEO

Get smooth, full screen HD (1080P) or Ultra-HD (2160P) with LYNQ. It mirrors or extends the video from your MacBook's USB C port to any large screen TV or  projector. It's the perfect way to share videos, presentations and more.



NETWORK MORE – ETHERNET

Connect to your work's secure wired network or administer network devices such as modems and routers with LYNQ's built-in Ethernet high-speed port. IT supports speeds from 10BaseT to 1000BaseT and is always there in case you ever need it.

CHARGE MORE

When connected to your MacBook, LYNQ can charge and sync your iPhone, iPad or Android devices.


CHARGE EVEN MORE

LYNQ doesn't get in the way of you charging your new MacBook. It's USB Type-C port also allows you to connect your wall charger to recharge your laptop. You can continue to use connected drives and peripherals without skipping a beat. 



WHY LYNQ ?

ARE YOU READY FOR THE USB-C REVOLUTION? The latest and upcoming models of Apple's MacBook, and other PC' Laptops are getting thinner and manufacturers are moving away from the larger USB (Type A) connector to the smaller, USB (Type C) connector. This makes many of the existing devices we own unable to easily connect to the newer computers. Plus, these thinner laptops lack many of the extra ports we need like SD card readers, video output and more. LYNQ is design to ease the transition to the newer USB Type-C equipped computers and give you all the ports you need to connect with the devices you already own.

Dollar for dollar, LYNQ offers more ports than the Apple AV Multi-port adapter designed for the MacBook 12". Plus, early bird supporters can take advantage of LYNQ early bird pricing at only $75!



We've got most of the final engineering and testing on the way. With your support we can afford extra time and care to make LYNQ the best solution for bringing back the ports to your laptop.



HELP US MAKE LYNQ A REALITY

We've been working hard to make LYNQ the best multi-port expansion hub. We believe that many customers of new MacBooks and similar PCs will be left without the support to connect to the devices they already own. We've spent the last few months engineering and testing all of LYNQ's components to ensure the product is stable, efficient and reliable. Now, we need to raise enough funds to cover final tooling, certification and minimum production. By supporting LYNQ, we can raise enough money to make LYNQ a reality and bring the ports back to your MacBook.

ABOUT US

The LYNQ team is on a mission to create new and unique ways to allow our customers to connect devices and expand capabilities. LYNQ USB expansion hub is the start of our movement.

With a successful launch of the LYNQ hub, we will continue to develop and bring to market products backed by quality and innovation.

RISKS & CHALLENGES

When working with overseas manufacturers, there is always a risk of production delays and supply-chain bottle-necks. Our team has years of product design and development experience which includes dealing with suppliers in China. We are confident that our technical and supply chain experience will ensure LYNQ meets it's production schedule on time.

SPREAD THE WORD!

Help us spread the word about LYNQ as far and wide as possible. We sincerely appreciate any and all help we can get to make this campaign (our first) a success!!

LYNQ gives you 3 extra powered USB ports that lets you connect printers, portable hard-drives, keyboard, MIDI instruments, thumb drives and more! Plus, you can charge your iPhone.






ACCESS MORE (SD/MicroSD)

LYNQ has a standard SD and a micro SD card reader built in. You can access high capacity (HC) and extra capacity XC cards up to 2 Terabyte.  You can also keep your high-capacity micro-SD card installed and turn LYNQ into portable USB-C backup drive for your laptop.





SEE MORE – ULTRA-HD 4K VIDEO

Get smooth, full screen HD (1080P) or Ultra-HD (2160P) with LYNQ. It mirrors or extends the video from your MacBook's USB C port to any large screen TV or  projector. It's the perfect way to share videos, presentations and more.


  


NETWORK MORE – ETHERNET
Connect to your work's secure wired network or administer network devices such as modems and routers with LYNQ's built-in Ethernet high-speed port. IT supports speeds from 10BaseT to 1000BaseT and is always there in case you ever need it.




CHARGE MORE
When connected to your MacBook, LYNQ can charge and sync your iPhone, iPad or Android devices.



CHARGE EVEN MORE

LYNQ doesn't get in the way of you charging your new MacBook. It's USB Type-C port also allows you to connect your wall charger to recharge your laptop. You can continue to use connected drives and peripherals without skipping a beat. 







WHY LYNQ ?
ARE YOU READY FOR THE USB-C REVOLUTION? The latest and upcoming models of Apple's MacBook, and other PC' Laptops are getting thinner and manufacturers are moving away from the larger USB (Type A) connector to the smaller, USB (Type C) connector. This makes many of the existing devices we own unable to easily connect to the newer computers. Plus, these thinner laptops lack many of the extra ports we need like SD card readers, video output and more. LYNQ is design to ease the transition to the newer USB Type-C equipped computers and give you all the ports you need to connect with the devices you already own.
Dollar for dollar, LYNQ offers more ports than the Apple AV Multi-port adapter designed for the MacBook 12". Plus, early bird supporters can take advantage of LYNQ early bird pricing at only $75!






We've got most of the final engineering and testing on the way. With your support we can afford extra time and care to make LYNQ the best solution for bringing back the ports to your laptop.







HELP US MAKE LYNQ A REALITY
We've been working hard to make LYNQ the best multi-port expansion hub. We believe that many customers of new MacBooks and similar PCs will be left without the support to connect to the devices they already own. We've spent the last few months engineering and testing all of LYNQ's components to ensure the product is stable, efficient and reliable. Now, we need to raise enough funds to cover final tooling, certification and minimum production. By supporting LYNQ, we can raise enough money to make LYNQ a reality and bring the ports back to your MacBook.
ABOUT US

The LYNQ team is on a mission to create new and unique ways to allow our customers to connect devices and expand capabilities. LYNQ USB expansion hub is the start of our movement.
With a successful launch of the LYNQ hub, we will continue to develop and bring to market products backed by quality and innovation.

RISKS & CHALLENGES 
When working with overseas manufacturers, there is always a risk of production delays and supply-chain bottle-necks. Our team has years of product design and development experience which includes dealing with suppliers in China. We are confident that our technical and supply chain experience will ensure LYNQ meets it's production schedule on time.
    SPREAD THE WORD! Help us spread the word about LYNQ as far and wide as possible. We sincerely appreciate any and all help we can get to make this campaign (our first) a success!!

story:
A Short Overview:

Most modern televisions, computers, and smartphones have screens with artificial blue light (ranging from 400-470nm) that gradually suppress melatonin and wear down eyes due to their intensity. The prolonged exposure to harsh blue light emitted from these LED screens causes health problems that can disrupt one’s daily life, such as eyestrain, headaches, dry eyes, blurred vision, migraines, and disturbed ability to sleep. In response, our team has designed a 0.3 mm thickness adhesive tempered glass screen protector with blue light UV filtering technology for phones, computers, tablets, televisions, and other devices. This screen protector protects from dust, dirt, and fingerprints as well as physical damage like scratches and cracks. It protects the eyes from excessive blue light exposure without distorting the colors on the screen. Unlike common alternatives, this screen protector will prove to be very beneficial to those doing color-sensitive work for extended periods of time, such as graphic design, drawing, and editing.

Maya Duff and Onastasia  Ebright are co-founders of Perfect Society, Lauren Langford is the research specialist, and JaBria Bishop is the general specialist. All four women are sophomores studying various fields at Duke University competing in the Duke Startup Challenge.

What We Need & What You Get

In order to continue making this product a reality, we need to raise $5,000 to participate in the next stage of our challenge- the Duke Startup Challenge Summer Program where we will be working full time in the startup with mentorship and gain experience in entrepreneurship.

This money, however, does not go towards the challenge, it only proves that our product is worth Duke's continued investment. Your contribution will help fund our ongoing research and go towards raw materials and resources needed to continue product development.

While there are alternatives on the market, Perfect Society's tempered glass screen protectors are set apart because they do not alter the color of the screen, are simple to apply, and will provide protection for your device from hard drops, scratches, and liquids. We expect to keep the price reasonable, between $7.95 and $25.95, depending on the size of the screen.

The Product

For a blue light filter, we have designed a tempered glass screen protector equipped with UV filtering technology that will absorb the artificial blue light and prevent it from penetrating too far into the retina. We intend to manufacture the screen covers with dimensions for the most popular device brands and products on the market, but we will also encourage consumers to customize dimensions for their other devices.

This screen cover will be affordable, durable, and effective. The benefits of better sleep, preserved eye health, and protected melatonin levels will make this product worth its cost.

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge for our product is that not enough people are aware of the severity of this problem. Many people are aware of the potential of negative health issues when using electronic devices yet tend to overlook them. However, if they were alerted to the actual consequences of prolonged exposure to blue light, they would search for an easy solution, as the only other alternative would be trying to avoid spending more than two hours at a time on electronic devices with LED screens, which is nearly impossible in this day and age. Our solution will be to increase awareness through social media campaigns and advertisements starting in business and university communities.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share our product with others! Perfect Society is not only working to develop a product that will help everyone, but we are also donating to charities like UNICEF to make an even bigger difference, and we ask that you help us in our journey in any way you can.

story:
Iphone to Printer Cloud Device

Print Pass founders started Print Pass after traveling the world and struggling to print out their flight boarding passes at each hotel. Hotel printers are the worst and not even one of them was easy to use. It took over 15 minutes to print one boarding pass. Another aspect they disliked is handing over their password to every computer, and not knowing what hotels are doing with that information. Another issue they faced is printing at the office. Every time they tried to print on a new floor or from a new device it seemed they had to contact technical support. So Print Pass was created, which allows for no hassle when printing from any device any where in the world.  

 

By contributing to this campaign you will:

1. Help us manufacture the device at mass scale as currently we are using Raspberry Pi which is cheap but we need to get the costs down.

2. Help get are mission out there to make printing hassle free to the world.

Risks & Challenges

  • Only tested on HP printers currently as most offices where tested only had HP printers.
  • Buy more printers and test more outcomes.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please tell any offices, hotels or just your buddies about this cool device.  You can use indiegogo share tools or anyway you choose to get the word out about Print Pass.  If you are in the bay area feel free to email us and you can come check it out in action at a office in North Beach.

story:
Short Summary: 

This design is the first of 3 designs ready to be manufactured for all Iphones.

      Features: 

  1. Enjoy your content hands free with the collapsable kick-stand that can sit horizontally or vertically. 

  2. Store up to 2 cards, cash, and a spare key in the inner compact that comes with a built-in mirror.

  3. Easily transport this all-in-one case with the attachable lanyard that can be worn around your neck or wrist.
  4. Take unobstructed pictures with a carefully designed camera hole that provides ample room to snap the perfect photo!       

Get yours today at 1/3 of the retail value with your pledge of $20 or more.

story:
SMOVE PRO™ is the most advanced 3-axis stabilizer supporting both smartphones and GoPro/action cameras, utilizing industry leading motors.

SMOVE PRO™ supports all size smartphones (iPhone 7Plus shown above). It features a slick, modern design making it super easy to use with a thin, ergonomic handle housing replaceable batteries and an intuitive control interface.

SMOVE PRO™ makes livestreaming easy with a proprietary Auto Portrait control button to easily switch your smartphone from landscape to portrait position - the only 3-axis stabilizer with this capability.

SMOVE PRO™ supports the entire line of GoPro cameras - both the Hero models (Hero 3/4/5) & Session "cube" camera models (Session 4/5) - along with all other brand name action cameras that utilize the standard GoPro sports action mounting frame.

Say goodbye to jittery and shaky videos - get professional looking, smooth videos using your smartphone with the SMOVE stabilizer.

Stabilizes your smartphone videos and charges your phone at the same time.  Easily portable, small enough to carry, throw in your pocket or bag.

 

Get 180-360° panorama shots automatically captured and stitched for you.

SMOVE's Auto Face Follow™ recognizes faces and automatically rotates to follow.

SMOVE is perfect for livestreaming to social media channels.
 

We set out to design and develop the smartest and most versatile smartphone stabilizer. After a year of development and testing, SMOVE is now ready for manufacturing.

Our team is comprised of design experts and makers of unmanned aerial vehicles, and previously manufactured high performance flight controller systems, smart gimbal systems systems for aircraft, and handheld stabilizing gimbals.

SMOVE is being produced with our manufacturing partner of digital imaging products, with over fifty production and quality control engineers.  If you love what we are doing, support our campaign to produce SMOVE!

 

FAQ

Can SMOVE charge my smartphone and work at the same time?

Yes, SMOVE is the only stabilizer that provides power to your smartphone while operating at the same time.  This way your smartphone battery gets a boost from using SMOVE.

How long does SMOVE last before needing to recharge it?

If you plan to use SMOVE intermittently, you can use it for days without needing to recharge it. If you plan to exhaust SMOVE in one outing, plan on at least six hours of SMOVE operation.

Why did you name the stabilizer SMOVE?

We thought it would be fun to combine Smooth plus Move into one word.

Is it hard to become a SMOVE operator?

It's very easy to use - you'll get smooth, non shaky video within minutes of using SMOVE.

Does SMOVE support iPhone 7 and iPhone 7 Plus or Samsung Galaxy S7 and S7 Edge?

Yes, SMOVE supports all iPhones 5 through 7 Plus, and all Samsung Galaxy smartphones.

What is the maximum smartphone weight for SMOVE?

We have tested the iPhone 6s Plus (approx 200g) and it works well. The maximum weight is upwards 300g.

Will the Smove compensate for horizontal and vertical movement?

Yes, SMOVE compensates the horizontal or vertical movement according to the handheld direction.

Does SMOVE use brushless motors?

Yes, SMOVE uses brushless motors.

If I change my mind, what is the refund policy?

You can request a refund within ten days of your transaction after which the period will be over, follow these steps. 

Do you have an example of a 360 panorama taken by SMOVE?

Here is an automatically stitched and captured 360 panorama example, click to enlarge.

Does SMOVE ship with a lightning adapter?

Manufacturer's regulations prevent an iPhone lightning adapter in the box - which some iPhone users may already have. Please make sure yours is MFI certified, ie http://amzn.to/2kkn0fy

Is SMOVE 2-axis or 3-axis stabilizer?

SMOVE is a 2-axis stabilizer perfect for everyday use/personal videos. SMOVE PRO (shown below) is a 3-axis stabilizer suited for more extreme, active use cases and supports GoPro and other cameras.

Can SMOVE support GoPro and/or other action cameras?

SMOVE supports smartphones of all sizes, but because its smartphone holder is not interchangeable, it cannot support GoPro.  SMOVE PRO supports not only smartphones but also GoPro and other action cameras. 

Is the SMOVE battery swappable? 

While SMOVE's battery is rechargeable, but not swappable, SMOVE PRO's battery is both rechargeable and swappable.

What is the size/dimensions of SMOVE PRO? 

SMOVE and SMOVE PRO are approximately the same size. SMOVE PRO dimensions are 296mm x 107mm x 31mm.

What is the difference between 2-axis and 3-axis?

This link is a helpful resource explaining the differences.

 

IMAGE GALLERY

And we’re a group of science and design junkies who are focused on the business and leisure travel lifestyle. We’ve already created universal adaptors, USB-C hubs and chargers that are sold in Best Buy and loved by many. Now on to our newest product...

The Nucleus Powerhub came about when we got totally fed up with carrying around an endless number of cables, chords and adaptors. We teamed up with Transphorm , one of the world’s leading GaN FET solution providers on the market, to bring you a high-quality, sleek, tiny and powerful GaN charger and hub duo that you can take with you anywhere and use anytime.

story:
BUY YOUR ZUS CABLES HERE: WWW.NONDA.CO. SHIPPING NOW.

Stop wasting your money on cables that don't last. Meet the ZUS Super Duty Cable, the world's first cable with a Lifetime Guarantee. Choose from 3 cable options when you back us: lightning, micro USB, or USB-C to USB. Check out below how people have stress-tested the ZUS Cable.

 

What Our Backers Are Saying

 
 

The ZUS Cable is aramid fiber reinforced for superior strength. 

What is aramid fiber? It's the stuff that bulletproof vests are made of. It's the stuff that allowed Curiosity to survive 65,000 pounds of force on its descent to Mars. With aramid fiber, the ZUS Cable can handle being crushed or tossed around.

 

In a third-party test conducted by German test lab, TÜV, the ZUS Cable bent over 15,000 times, that's 50% more than the more expensive brand Belkin.

 

With a unique 90-degree plug, the ZUS Super Duty Cable is adept at fitting in narrow spaces. It also pairs perfectly with the ZUS Smart Car Charger for on-the-road charging.

Due to popular demand, we're now offering a straight USB version of our ZUS lightning cable, which you can select on the survey that will be sent to you 10 days after your purchase date.

 
 

The tough nylon braiding material keeps the ZUS Cable inherently tangle-free. Each cable also comes with a complementary velcro tie to keep things further organized.

 
 

We found that 4 feet (48 inches or 1.2m) was the perfect length for charging inside your car. 40 to 46 inches is the typical length needed to have your phone hanging from your car's window or dashboard.

Most other cables come in 3 feet or 6 feet, so they are either too short or too long. The ZUS Super Duty Cable gives you just the right reach.

 

Every ZUS Cable is covered by a lifetime warranty. If your cable breaks from normal wear and tear, we’ll replace it.

 
 

Our USB-C cable is a full USB-C spec cable. This means that it meets the following requirements:

- 56K Ohm Resistor

- Vbus IR drop of less than 500mV

- GND IR drop of less than 250mV at 3A

Also, our lightning cable is MFi Certified.

 

nonda is a smart hardware startup based in Palo Alto, California. We wanted to create a charging cable that would set a new industry standard for better and more durable cables. We don't believe in having to settle with poor performing cables, so we set out to create the best charging cable.

We're a group of smart hardware enthusiasts, app developers, go-getters, and industry specialists. The members on our hardware team hail from Foxconn, so we have high standards for ourselves. We love what we do and hope to share our vision of what the future of smart hardware will look like with the world.

 
 

1. Why haven’t I received survey? 

If you ordered after June 20th 2016,  your survey will be sent to you 10 days after the purchase date. You can contact our customer service at iggcs@nonda.us for further assistance. 

2. How do I select which cables I want? 
For backers who made an order between May 3rd and June 20th 2016, you should have received a survey from Backerkit asking you for your cable preferences via the email you used to register on Indiegogo. For orders placed after June 20th, you should receive a survey from Backerkit 10 days after your purchase date.
 
3. I got the perk with the ZUS Car Charger that comes in a FREE GIFT BOX. When can I expect to receive my package?
For the following select countries, your package will be delivered just in time for Christmas when you place an order by November 28th and complete your survey by December 9th.
 

Australia, Austria, Bahrain, Belgium, Bulgaria, Canada, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Egypt, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hong Kong, Hungary, Italy, Ireland, Israel, Kuwait, Latvia, Lebanon, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Monaco, Netherlands, New Zealand, Oman, Poland, Portugal, Qatar, Romania, Saudi Arabia, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Arab Emirates, United Kingdom, United States

 4. What payment options do I have?

You can pay via credit card or PayPal. Select a perk and you'll see the available payment methods at checkout.
 
5. What cable options do you offer? 
We offer 3 cable options: Lightning, Micro USB, and USB-A to USB-C.
 
6. I paid for the wrong perk. How can I get a refund?
No worries. If you bought your order after June 20th 2016, you have 10 days to refund your order after you've placed it. You can follow these steps here.

If you ordered after June 20th 2016,  your survey will be sent to you 10 days after the purchase date. You can contact our customer service at iggcs@nonda.us for further assistance. 

2. How do I select which cables I want? 

For backers who made an order between May 3rd and June 20th 2016, you should have received a survey from Backerkit asking you for your cable preferences via the email you used to register on Indiegogo. For orders placed after June 20th, you should receive a survey from Backerkit 10 days after your purchase date.
 

3. I got the perk with the ZUS Car Charger that comes in a FREE GIFT BOX. When can I expect to receive my package?
For the following select countries, your package will be delivered just in time for Christmas when you place an order by November 28th and complete your survey by December 9th.
 

Australia, Austria, Bahrain, Belgium, Bulgaria, Canada, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Egypt, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hong Kong, Hungary, Italy, Ireland, Israel, Kuwait, Latvia, Lebanon, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Monaco, Netherlands, New Zealand, Oman, Poland, Portugal, Qatar, Romania, Saudi Arabia, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Arab Emirates, United Kingdom, United States
 4. What payment options do I have?


You can pay via credit card or PayPal. Select a perk and you'll see the available payment methods at checkout.
 
5. What cable options do you offer? 
We offer 3 cable options: Lightning, Micro USB, and USB-A to USB-C.
 
6. I paid for the wrong perk. How can I get a refund?
No worries. If you bought your order after June 20th 2016, you have 10 days to refund your order after you've placed it. You can follow these steps here.

story:
Show Off Your Sleek, Glassy Look & Feel of Your iPhone with Full Protection

Phone Ring Gorilla Bundle for iPhone X

 

 

Phone Ring Gorilla Bundle for iPhone 8/8 Plus, iPhone 7/7 Plus

 In The News

Style

Testimonial

"It is truly a work of art. I love it." --- J. Sommers on July 24, 2017.

Testimonial

"I love my red O-ring on my iPhone 7 plus even more than I thought I would, but one color doesn’t seem to be enough, so I have purchased a gold one. This is a great product and easy to install. I’ve never been very good at placing a protective screen, so I do have a few very small bubbles, not enough to bother me. As you come out with new colors, I’ll probably buy more. It’s so easy to take on and off that I can color coordinate any time. I chose the gold this time." --- J. Sommers on August 10, 2017.

iPhone is beautiful, but plastic or rubber cases usually ruin the premium design, just like a diamond hidden in a plastic or rubber package

Vihoo’s Phone Ring is a 2-piece hinged diamond-cut premium aluminum magnetic case for the iPhone. It showcases the natural look and feel of your iPhone.

  • The 2-piece hinged structure ensures the perfect fit for the iPhone

  • Smoothly opens and closes for easy on/off. Integrated magnets keeps Phone Ring closed and allows Phone Ring to close with a "Snap"!

  • Ergonomic cutouts for power and volume buttons provide maximum comfort for thumbs and fingers

  • The soft rubber interior lining prevents scratches from ruining the beauty of the iPhone

Testimonial 

"This case is perfect! It's simple but solid enough to actually provide some protection for my phone. I've used other ring-like phone cases in the past, but unlike other cases, this one doesn't feel like I can snap it in half when it isn't on my phone. The locking mechanism is also very secure. Overall great case, hoping they come out with the same type of case for the new iPhones whenever they come out." --- Z. on August 4, 2017

The Phone Ring’s precision diamond-cut 2-piece hinged aluminum ring, in conjunction with the 3D full cover glass, blends seamlessly; resulting in a completely smooth surface, allowing iPhone users to feel the iPhone the way Apple designed it to feel.

Testimonial

"This is the best case I’ve ever had. I love it. It is super light, very easy to install and looks slick. Seamless fit the glass protector. Make your phone feel like your phone does not have a case. Having owned almost every iPhone released I am constantly looking for a quality case that protects the phone but isn’t heave (heavy) or bulky. I’ve purchased well over a dozen or more cases and this one is by far the best." --- T. Phelps on July 31, 2017.

"I purchased the black version and it perfectly matches the finish of my iPhone. The metal also has the same feel as the iPhone. It clips on easily and the magnet holding it together is very strong, will not come apart unless you try. I love this case. It is tricky to install the screen protector but the finished product looked great. Great fit and finish! It is easy to position correctly, then with a little pressure the adherence began, drawing itself to the screen." --- S. Kelly on July 31, 2017.

Protection

The sleek design of the diamond-cut 2-piece hinged aluminum ring implements integrated cushions and complex honeycomb-like structure within structure design using earthquake dynamics (patent pending)  to protect iPhones by dissipating energy from drops.  An integrated self-locking mechanism at the base of the Phone Ring prevents the Phone Ring from opening during the point of impact.

Vihoo phone ring with Vihoo 3D full-cover glass screen protector provides the ultimate drop protection

  • Repeatedly drop-tested: 7-foot drops onto brick and concrete floors
  • Successfully drop tested from 16-foot drop onto hardwood floor

* Military-grade drop only require phones to survive the 4-foot drops.

Vihoo's nano liquid glass protector, which is 600% more scratch resistant than tempered glass, can be applied to the iPhone's exposed rear to provide scratch protection that is 100% transparent

  • Protects the aluminum at nano-level while being completely invisible to the human eye and undetectable to human touch

Wireless Charging & Signal

If you’re worried about the aluminum interfering with the cellular signal, don’t. Due to the Phone Ring’s 2-piece hinged magnetic bumper design, all of the antennas are uncovered; which results in no signal interference. Current Phone Ring users can attest to that.

 

How To Install

 

Time Line

 

Who We Are

We are Vihoo, and we want you to share in our passion for making the best, better, through coupling exemplary engineering with intuitive design. Lead by two iPhone lovers, Jack and Harry, who have simply grown to hate cases: one NASA engineer and one serial start-up veteran.

Jack Yang: Founder/That Super-Smart Friend

    Aeronautics & Astronautics degree at Stanford, gravitational wave satellite program at NASA, office automation image processing program at Xerox’s PARC lab. Started an online 3D object recognition social network software company and a CIGS thin film solar module manufacturing company. Invented the Phone Ring.

Harry Reninger: Commercial Ninja/Startup Wizard

    A global go-getter who's launched four startups in the last ten years, helping lead all of them to international success.  Has lived in Europe and Asia, but is happy to be back home in Northern California.

Frequently Asked Questions

  • About Phone Ring

What is Phone Ring?

  • Phone Ring is the best case to protect your iPhone without destroying its design

What’s so special about Phone Ring?

  • The 2-piece hinged design allows the user to showcase and feel the iPhone like it was designed to while ensuring the best fit and protection.

Who created Phone Ring?

  • Vihoo is a startup in Palo Alto, CA, the center of Silicon Valley. We utilize human intelligence to create IOT devices and robots to make people's’ lives more convenient and meaningful.
  • We are iPhone lovers who are tired of hiding our iPhone in rubber or plastic cases. We solved this problem, and we want to share the solution with you.
  • Phone Ring is one of Vihoo's projects. We take advantage of our premium factory and industrial design ability to redefine iPhone protection while returning iPhone's design back in your hand.   

Whom does Phone Ring create for?

  • Phone Ring is for iPhone lovers and everyone who loves iPhone's design and style
  • Putting the iPhone's design back in your hand while providing protection is our purpose.

When & Where can I buy Phone Ring?

  • You can buy Phone Ring on Indiegogo Now!

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/ring-only-pr...

  • Take a look at our crowdfunding campaign, choose the best option for yourself, and preorder to be one of the first people to showcase and protect your iPhone like never before!

How much does Phone Ring cost?

Phone Ring consist of 3 components:

  • Vihoo phone ring
  • 3D Vihoo Corning glass protector
  • Vihoo nano liquid protector.

The cost is listed below:

  • This Crowdfunding Campaign

Why are you crowdfunding?

  • High-quality mass production from design

 

  • How can you achieve Phone Ring’s premium quality?

How do guarantee top quality?

  • We use Apple certified factory and the same precision cutting process for iPhones to manufacture the phone ring.

What kind of factory do you use?

  • We use Apple certified factory in China to make the phone ring.
  • We use the largest smartphone screen protector factory in China to make the 3D Corning glass protector.
  • The award-winning Nano-liquid glass protector is made in Germany.

What does the Phone Ring consist of?

  • Phone Ring
  • 3D Corning Glass Protector
  • Nano Liquid Glass Protector

 

  • How to choose the best Phone Ring option for me?

Which iPhone models do Phone Ring work with?

  • Phone Ring is available for iPhone 7/7 Plus, iPhone 8/8 Plus, and iPhone X.

What colors are available?

  • We offer  Black, Silver, Red, Pantone Lapis Blue, Pantone Pink Yarrow, Pantone Flame, and Pantone Greenery; 2017 Pantone Color Of The Year

Why do you offer Pantone fashion colors?

  • Just as the iPhone is not just a phone, the Phone Ring is not just a phone case. It is a fashion accessory that allows users show off the iPhone's exquisite design.

Why do you only offer black and white 3D Vihoo Corning glass protector? Which one should I choose?

  • No matter the color, the face of all iPhone X are Black
  • No matter the color, the face of all iPhone 7 and 8 are Black or White.

Which option is best for me?

  • For overall edge drop protection: Phone Ring.
  • For drop protection and  full-screen protection: Phone Ring + 3D cornering Glass
  • For full protection:  Phone Ring + 3D Cornering Glass+ Nano Liquid Glass

How does Phone Ring protect my iPhone?

  • The 2-piece hinged design of the Phone Ring itself along with the integrated protection systems within the ring helps dissipate energy during the point of impact, keeping the iPhone safe.

Does the case add a lot of bulk to my iPhone?

  • Phone Ring does not add any bulk to your iphone. Phone Ring maintains the slim aluminum bezel appearance and feel of a bare iPhone.

Can I access the charging port, etc?

  • Yes. Phone Ring was designed with this in mind so users will be able to easily plug in their chargers

 

  • About the Magnets

What are these magnets? Will they affect or damage my phone or credit cards?

  • The magnets in the ring allows easy on/ easy off
  • The magnets have been extensively tested and will not damage phones and credit cards near them; they will also not affect the iPhone, cellular data, wi-fi, etc.

 

  • Delivery

When does shipping begin?

  • iPhone 8: late September
  • Shipping rates vary depending on your country

When can I expect it to reach my doorsteps?

  • All orders are expected to be delivered to your doorsteps for October 2017.

Where does it ship to?

  • Everywhere except Japan*
  • *Japan customers please go to this link: https://camp-fire.jp/projects/view/44109?token=...

How much is shipping?

  • Shipping rates vary depending on your country. Please see reward details for all other locations. Local taxes not included.

What are the risks and challenges of getting the device today?

  • We are aware there will be many  risks and challenges along the way. We are using Indiegogo as a way to validate our product. We want your help to keep us and our team accountable at every step of the process. If any obstacles get in our way which may delay the expected delivery date we will inform you all. We truly appreciate your support!

Distribution Partnership

I am interested in a distribution partnership.

  • Please contact wecare@vihoo.us and include the region(s) or platform(s) you distribute to in the email.

Customer Service

Is there a warranty?

  • Yes, all of our products come with a One Year Lifetime Warranty. This warranty covers manufacturing defects in the phone ring, 3D Vihoo Corning glass, and nano liquid protector. It does not cover gradual wear and tear throughout it's lifetime that is to be expected from normal use. We do not 100% guarantee the protection of your iPhone, no case, glass protector, or nano liquid protector is unbreakable!

How do I order an extra phone ring, glass protector, or nano liquid protector?

  • Check out perks or just pre-order again for another case. Contact us If you need any assistance with this.

What is your refund policy during the Indiegogo campaign?

  • See these steps on How to Request a Refund. During the Indiegogo campaign, you can process the refund at any time by contacting support@indiegogo.com or searching their help center. Refunds are processed on a case-by-case basis. At some point, we have to lock refunds in order to go into production and shipment. We will not be able to refund orders once they have been shipped.

What is your return and exchange policy?

  • After receiving your product and not satisfied, you may exchange it for a new one within 30 days, less shipping and handling fees.
  • Indiegogo processes refunds during the campaign. If you would like a refund, we're sorry to see you go and would appreciate hearing about any problems with our campaign that prompted your cancellation (wecare@vihoo.us). Please see here for the refund.

How do I choose more than one rewards?

  • To get more than one perk, please make a new contribution for each perk.
  • If you have special request, please send email to wecare@vihoo.us.

How can I check the status of my pre-order?

  • After pre-ordering on Indiegogo, you are going to have an account created by default.
  • You can verify your pre-order information by logging back into Indiegogo with the email you used for the pre-order.  

If I have other questions, who should I contact?

  • Press: media@vihoo.us
  • Support: wecare@vihoo.us
