story:
Click Here for Español!


Summary

There is no need to add anything to the horrific images that reached all of us about the refugee crisis. Thousands upon thousands of people trying to escape from war, which makes them risking their lives and the lives of their loved ones seeking  to live in peace.

Theirs is an exasperating situation, and when they finally reach a new destination, they have to start all over again trying to get some food, a roof for shelter, and find a charger for their cell phone so they can be somehow connected. 

They desperately try to talk to their relatives, to  someone they can tell they made it, that they reached firm ground and they are safe. They also depend on their cell phones in order to access useful and often vital information in real time, and to  exchange information and advice about how to go on, which road to take, how transportation works, or simply just to find a place to rest. As they say: “A good pair of shoes, a sleeping bag and a smartphone is just about all we need for this journey.” This is why it´s vital for them to have full battery charge during the whole day.

With this campaign I propose a solution to this problem. This is one of the main difficulties the refugees have face daily and which is almost vital for their physical integrity, for after traveling hundreds of kilometers on foot with their families, old people and children amongst them, and the few belongings with in order to make it safely to their destination. 

I call on you to contribute with whatever you can so that we can get a solar battery charger to for each refugee so that his/her mobile phone can be operational at anytime. (See in the gallery)

This way, they will be able to use the GPS, find the right roads and maps, communicate with their fellow countrymen while informing others what is going on during the journey and most important, to be able to be in contact with their families in foreign countries.

We don’t have much time left , thousands and thousands of people arrive each day, if we want to help we must do it now!


How will we do it?

We will ship the solar chargers straight to Greece, which as of today is the main arriving spot for these refugees, to a distribution center. We will coordinate delivery together with several NGO’s and International agencies present there at the moment.


What do we need

The first main goal is to raise $100.000 in order to deliver at least 6000 solar chargers.

100% of the raised money will be destined to the purchase of the solar chargers directly to the manufacturers, and it will cover the costs of shipping, importing, customs duties and delivery to the several distribution points.                                      *All documents will be deposited with a Notary Public to guarantee the transparency of this campaign.          

The more money we raise the more chargers we will be able to deliver, and more people we will help. There is no limit, the limit is just only what each one is willing and able to contribute.

Unused funds will be destined to charities involved in helping refugees. 


How can you help?

By donating money. But if you can not donate, you can also help us a lot!! Just spread the word, let others know this charity campaign amongst your friends and family so that we can reach a lot more people. You can also use the Indiegogo diffusion tools. 


My commitment

To dedicate my time and effort so that we together can help the refugees endure this situation they are going through and make it less terrible with the use of technology.

Count on you!

Español


Breve historia

No hace falta agregar nada sobre las tremendas imágenes que a todos nos van 
llegando de la crisis de los refugiados. Miles y miles de personas tratando de escapar de la guerra, una realidad terrible que los hace arriesgar sus vidas y 
las de sus seres queridos para poder estar a salvo y vivir en paz. 

Su situación es desesperante, y cuando llegan a un nuevo lugar, sus prioridades son encontrar comida, un techo bajo el que cobijarse y un lugar donde poder cargar sus teléfonos. Usan sus móviles para comunicarse con sus familias y poder decirle que lo lograron, que llegaron y están vivos. Además necesitan estar conectados para conocer en tiempo real información útil e intercambiar consejos sobre qué ruta seguir, el funcionamiento de los transportes o un lugar donde dormir.                  Como ellos mismos dicen: “Unos buenos zapatos, un saco de dormir y un 
smartphone es el equipo básico para este viaje”.  Por este motivo es vital 
que puedan tener cargada todo el tiempo la batería de sus móviles.

A través de esta campaña propongo una solución a uno de los principales problemas que tienen los refugiados a diario y que es casi vital para 
su integridad, mientras hacen cientos de kilómetros caminando con sus 
familias, muchos ancianos y niños, y sus pocos pertenencias a cuestas para 
llegar a salvo a su destino.

Te invito a que aportes tu granito de arena, para que entre todos, podamos hacerle llegar a cada refugiado un cargador solar móvil para que tenga su teléfono operativo en todo momento. (Puedes verlo en la galería)

De esta forma, podrán utilizar el GPS y saber el camino correcto, comunicarse 
con sus compatriotas informando sobre lo que va sucediendo durante la 
travesía y lo más importante, estar en contacto con sus familiares en otros 
países.

No tenemos mucho tiempo, miles de personas llegan día tras día... Tenemos 
que actuar ya! 


Como lo haríamos?

Enviaremos los cargadores solares directo a Grecia, lugar que hoy por hoy es 
el centro de llegada masivo de refugiados, a un punto de entrega operativo  
para que puedan ser repartidos. Coordinaremos la entrega con las ONG y otras 
agencias internacionales presentes en el lugar. 


Lo que necesitamos

El primer objetivo es recaudar $100.000 para poder asegurar la entrega de al 
menos 6000 cargadores solares.

El 100% de lo recaudado será destinado a la compra de los cargadores solares 
de forma directa a los fabricantes y cubrirá los gastos de transporte, aranceles 
de importación y envío a los distintos puntos de distribución.  
*Toda la documentación será depositada bajo Notario Público para garantizar la 
transparencia de la campaña.

Mientras más dinero recaudemos, más cargadores podremos entregar y a más 
refugiados podremos ayudar. No hay límite, el límite está en lo que cada uno 
esté dispuesto y pueda dar.

Los fondos no utilizados serán destinados a las organizaciones de ayuda a los 
refugiados.


Cómo puedes ayudar?

Donando dinero para esta causa. Si no tienes dinero igual puedes ayudar! 
Difunde esta campaña solidaria entre tus amigos, familiares y conocidos para 
llegar a mucha más gente. Puedes utilizar también las herramientas de difusión 
de Indiegogo.


Mi compromiso

Dedicar mi tiempo y esfuerzo para que entre todos podamos ayudar a los 
refugiados a que esta situación que están viviendo sea menos terrible con el 
apoyo de la tecnología.

Cuento contigo!
story_txt:
Click Here for Español!

Summary
There is no need to add anything to the horrific
images that reached all of us about the refugee crisis. Thousands upon thousands of people trying to escape
from war, which makes them risking their lives and the lives of their loved ones
seeking  to live in peace. 
Theirs is an exasperating situation,
and when they finally reach a new destination, they have to start all over
again trying to get some food, a roof for shelter, and find a charger for their
cell phone so they can be somehow connected.  
They desperately try to talk to their relatives, to  someone
they can tell they made it, that they reached firm ground and they are safe.
They also depend on their cell phones in order to access useful and often vital
information in real time, and to  exchange
information and advice about how to go on, which road to take, how transportation
works, or simply just to find a place to rest. As they say: “A good pair of shoes, a sleeping bag and
a smartphone is just about all we need for this journey.” This is why it´s vital for them to have full battery
charge during the whole day.
With this
campaign I propose a solution to this problem. This is one of the main
difficulties the refugees have face daily and which is almost vital for their
physical integrity, for after traveling hundreds of
kilometers on foot with their families, old people and children amongst them,
and the few belongings with in order to
make it safely to their destination. 

I call on you to
contribute with whatever you can so that we can get a solar battery charger to for each refugee so that his/her mobile phone can be operational at
anytime. (See in the gallery)
This way, they
will be able to use the GPS, find the right roads and maps, communicate with
their fellow countrymen while informing others what is going on during the
journey and most important, to be able to be in contact with their families in
foreign countries. 
We don’t have
much time left , thousands and thousands of people arrive each day, if we want to help we must do it now!

How will we do
it?
We will ship the
solar chargers straight to Greece, which as of today is the main arriving spot
for these refugees, to a distribution center. We will coordinate delivery
together with several NGO’s and
International agencies present there at the moment.
What do we need 
The first main
goal is to raise $100.000 in order to deliver at least 6000 solar chargers. 
100% of the raised money will be destined to the purchase of the solar chargers directly to
the manufacturers, and it will cover the costs of shipping, importing, customs
duties and delivery to the several distribution points.                                      *All
documents will be deposited with a Notary Public to guarantee the
transparency of this campaign.

           The more money
we raise the more chargers we will be able to deliver, and more people we will
help. There is no limit, the limit is just only what each one is willing and able to
contribute.
Unused funds
will be destined to charities involved in helping refugees.  
How can you
help?
By donating
money. But if you can not donate, you can also help us a lot!! Just spread the
word, let others know this charity campaign amongst your friends and family so
that we can reach a lot more people. You can also use the Indiegogo diffusion tools.  
My commitment 
To dedicate my time and effort so that we
together can help the refugees endure this situation they are going through and
make it less terrible with the use of technology.
Count on you!
Español
Breve historiaNo hace falta agregar nada sobre las tremendas imágenes que a todos nos van llegando de la crisis de los refugiados. Miles y miles de personas tratando de escapar de la guerra, una realidad terrible que los hace arriesgar sus vidas y las de sus seres queridos para poder estar a salvo y vivir en paz.  Su situación es desesperante, y cuando llegan a un nuevo lugar, sus prioridades son encontrar comida, un techo bajo el que cobijarse y un lugar donde poder cargar sus teléfonos. Usan sus móviles para comunicarse con sus familias y poder decirle que lo lograron, que llegaron y están vivos. Además necesitan estar conectados para conocer en tiempo real información útil e intercambiar consejos sobre qué ruta seguir, el funcionamiento de los transportes o un lugar donde dormir.                  Como ellos mismos dicen: “Unos buenos zapatos, un saco de dormir y un smartphone es el equipo básico para este viaje”.  Por este motivo es vital que puedan tener cargada todo el tiempo la batería de sus móviles. A través de esta campaña propongo una solución a uno de los principales problemas que tienen los refugiados a diario y que es casi vital para su integridad, mientras hacen cientos de kilómetros caminando con sus familias, muchos ancianos y niños, y sus pocos pertenencias a cuestas para llegar a salvo a su destino. Te invito a que aportes tu granito de arena, para que entre todos, podamos hacerle llegar a cada refugiado un cargador solar móvil para que tenga su teléfono operativo en todo momento. (Puedes verlo en la galería)De esta forma, podrán utilizar el GPS y saber el camino correcto, comunicarse con sus compatriotas informando sobre lo que va sucediendo durante la travesía y lo más importante, estar en contacto con sus familiares en otros países.No tenemos mucho tiempo, miles de personas llegan día tras día... Tenemos que actuar ya! Como lo haríamos?Enviaremos los cargadores solares directo a Grecia, lugar que hoy por hoy es el centro de llegada masivo de refugiados, a un punto de entrega operativo  para que puedan ser repartidos. Coordinaremos la entrega con las ONG y otras agencias internacionales presentes en el lugar. Lo que necesitamosEl primer objetivo es recaudar $100.000 para poder asegurar la entrega de al menos 6000 cargadores solares. El 100% de lo recaudado será destinado a la compra de los cargadores solares de forma directa a los fabricantes y cubrirá los gastos de transporte, aranceles de importación y envío a los distintos puntos de distribución.  *Toda la documentación será depositada bajo Notario Público para garantizar la transparencia de la campaña.Mientras más dinero recaudemos, más cargadores podremos entregar y a más refugiados podremos ayudar. No hay límite, el límite está en lo que cada uno esté dispuesto y pueda dar.Los fondos no utilizados serán destinados a las organizaciones de ayuda a los refugiados.Cómo puedes ayudar?Donando dinero para esta causa. Si no tienes dinero igual puedes ayudar! Difunde esta campaña solidaria entre tus amigos, familiares y conocidos para llegar a mucha más gente. Puedes utilizar también las herramientas de difusión de Indiegogo.Mi compromisoDedicar mi tiempo y esfuerzo para que entre todos podamos ayudar a los refugiados a que esta situación que están viviendo sea menos terrible con el apoyo de la tecnología.Cuento contigo!

We are so deeply grateful to all who stepped forward to help us bring this powerful visualization into reality.  You have not wasted your money.   The perceived lack of success of this fundraiser is but an illusion.  We will not be deterred in our determination to do our very best to provide all who are in need ~ or in any way interested ~ with the best possible tools for Soul Growth.  The Oracle WILL live !  It just might take a little longer than we had hoped !   So what else is new ! ? !       : - )

Welcome to the NEW YEAR ! 

CLICK FOR SOULGROWTH.ORG


THE ORACLE WILL HELP PEOPLE AND BUSINESSES ~
ESPECIALLY EVENT PROMOTERS !  

This Super-Smart On-line Calendar will help you get in sync with spiritual events and happenings in your town, region, and around the country.

IT WILL INCLUDE (all at no cost):

A comprehensive Listing of Concerts, Festivals, Gatherings, Holidays, Workshops, Lectures, Retreats, Meditations and a whole lot more, for ALL Spiritual Paths.  

A "Personal Events Assistant" to look for - and SHARE - Happenings and Events that fit your specific interests and notify you immediately when your requested events are found.

Reminders delivered to your Inbox as the event dates near.

Your ability to Share your Events, Reflections, and Photos with others.

A Platform for Event Presenters to reach a wide, yet Targeted Audience when your event is in their areas of Interest, Geographic area, and Date ranges.

AND SO MUCH MORE !   Unique "Perks" below !

And it ain't cheap !   The web work alone is estimated to be over 20 grand.  And we ain't rich !   (At least not financially)   We're just a group of people who care deeply.   Please help.


 

We Offer The Best Perks !   Details below.
Email Questions about Perks to Info@SoulGrowth.org

        The Oracle will help you find
   every event - so you can discover - 
     or stay on - your chosen "Path" !

         Businesses that need to reach people . . .



                          Just in Case . . .   : - )

IMAGINE ~ Taking a wonderful vacation in Hawaii . . . 
                             Just by helping a good cause !

story:
About Me:

You can follow this project on Facebook at:

https://www.facebook.com/bsides3.photoscan

By trade I am a motion graphics/3D animator. In my spare time I am married man and father of five who likes to tinker with technology. I spend many evenings learning new techniques and ways to incorporate them into my daily workflow. I have been tinkering with 3D scanning for over a year now, and think I have come up with a more affordable solution than what is available currently. The design will be cheaper than the pi3Dscan by half and the quality will be better. The setup will be portable and wireless.
Campaign Goals:
  • Design a more affordable photogrammetry rig based off of existing technology. Current high end rigs range in prices of well over $100,000.00, while consumer grade rigs range in prices around $10,000.00. My rig will be less than $5000 to create.
  • The goal is to create an initial rig with 36 cameras. If the amount raised is more than the original $1500 the extra money will be used for more cameras. 
  • The design will be able to be charged, making the rig portable and wireless unlike the current solutions in the market.
  • After the initial build, the rig will only take a couple minutes to set up and collapse down for storage.
  • The design is also scale-able to fit various needs.
  • Once the goal of $5000 is raised to fund the full 100 camera rig, I will launch a website with access to the 3D scans it generates.

Price Breakdown:

Pi 3D Scanner for comparison:

What you get:

By supporting this project you will receive 3D scans. The more you give the more you get. If you are a high level funder you will also have access to special build videos and at the max level access to the designs as well.

Example 3D scan:

The scans are created through a process called photogrammetry, the computer analyzes each photo and generates a point cloud of intersecting points. The point cloud is then used to generate a 3D mesh, which can be used in various 3D applications or even 3D printed.

The Purpose of the photo rig:

As you can see in the image above in order to generate a high quality mesh there are a lot of factors that need to be addressed. First the subject needs to be evenly lit (In the sample 3D scan lighting was not addressed). The subject has to be as still as possible (one camera will never work on living subjects) and the photos need to be in focus. This is a very tedious process with one camera. However, with a rig the settings can be set once and only re-adjusted after each tear down and set-up.

Why fund this rig?:

Unlike other rigs on the market which can be very expensive to build, this rig is designed to be affordable for most DIY-ers. Rigs like this:

Cost well over $100,000.00 to create. While the quality of the objects produced by this rig is very nice it, just isn't affordable for most people. There is also a lot of wiring and mess associated with this rig. A similar rig designed for DIY-ers cost around $10,000.00 to create. Which still seems a bit expensive to me. Here is what that rig looks like:

A lot of time went into cleaning up the cables and removing the clutter and mess. The design I have will eliminate all the wiring and clean up this look even more. The goal is to have a rig that can be stored in a small closet and set up quickly when needed, I also wanted to put the price range in an even more affordable range for the average joe. What I have designed should cut the cost in half of the previous rig, and be of better quality.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you know of anyone who would be interested in a project like this please pass it along, the more people that know the more likely this project will be a success.

http://igg.me/at/bsides3

story:
Summary

Accendi brand of Premium Cellular Phone accessories was designed and created in California. We believe that consumers want Premium products, but want to pay less... We have devised a line for this market! 

Basic tempered glass screen protectors for the iPhone 6 cost $29.99-$49.99, and they all lack 1 main component... The ability to protect the entire front surface of the phone! 

You paid a lot of hard earned money to get your iPhone 6 or 6 Plus.. Protect it! 

Our Corona (Italian for Crown) is a WORLD FIRST and gives the ultimate protection using an aluminium frame with HD Clarity. Our Japanese made tempered glass is the highest quality on the market... 

Our glass will not scratch, crack or break from impacts.. But we still back all our products with a lifetime warranty,


What We Need

We are looking to raise about $100,000 to pay for the latest tooling, and first major first order of product. We have already produced prototypes, and we are getting AMAZING feedback from our testers. 


We will be having a PRODUCT LAUNCH PARTY in Los Angeles or Las Vegas in April 2015 - so our TOP level contributors will be invited to the show...



Accendi CORONA
World's First Full protection for iPhone 6 / 6Plus

 

 
Designed in California, introducing the latest series of Premium Tempered Glass Screen Protectors from Accendi. Corona- Italian for Crown...
Fully protects your iPhone 6 / 6Plus including the sides! Our Premium Aluminium siding along with our Premium Tempered Glass gives you a 100% protection on your $200 LCD screen.

Accendi Premium Tempered Glass has SOFT TOUCH treatment and feels like you don't have anything on top of your LCD. Only 0.33mm thick

Accendi Glass will provide HD clarity of your device's screen.

Very easy to replace and includes a Limited Lifetime warranty

 

9H Hardness Shatter Proof Design Oleophobic Coating Anti-Scratch
Anti-Impact HD Clarity Delicate Soft Touch  
       
     

  • Premium High Quality Tempered Glass only 0.33mm thick!
  • Designed to fit the LCD of your specific phone model even inside cases like Otterbox, Trident, Speck etc
  • Delicate Touch - Easy use of LCD
  • Anti Scratch
  • HD Clarity / Pure Transparency
  • Perfect Self Adhesion with no bubbles
  • Oleophobic Coating - Does not collect Oil from hands and deflects water

Package includes:

  • 1 x Accendi Corona - Premium Tempered Glass - 0.33mm - Silver or Black
  • 1 x Dry and Moist Cleaning kit
  • 1 x Life-Time Warranty Registration Card

story:
Is it possible that your webcam can record secretly?


Press reports: the Hustle I CNBC I the Hacker News I The Washington Post

 

It's no secret to anyone that government and intelligence agencies a long time ago had access to private information of citizens. But unfortunately, criminals and malefactors also have been increasingly use the latest web technology. 

Spying through webcams is now easier than ever. Front camera on your laptop, tablet or smartphone can be easily activated anytime without your knowledge. All that they need is just an internet connection.  Even now, when you are reading this you can't be sure that no one's watching for you.


ZigZag it's simple and effective decision:


   ·  No Glue, No scotch tape, No scratches

   ·  Easy to install/uninstall, Good fixation

   ·  Flexible and Durable material - Silicone Rubber


Compatible with Laptop



Compatible with Tablet 

 


Compatible with Smartphone



Ultra thin Design

story:
“Document Privacy When You Want It” - SafeShare Launch

SafeJunction.com – August 2016

Introduction:

We at SafeJunction are passionate about technology and privacy. Our founders have spent more than 90 years collectively as technology professionals.  We believe that consumers need to have access to technology that can protect their fundamental rights to privacy and the pursuit of a secure Internet experience.  We founded SafeJunction to develop and market products that protect the privileged data including private documents and files that are shared between you and your friends, relatives, and business associates.


Campaign Description:

Our "Document Privacy When You Want It" campaign is launched to fund SafeShare-One, our first commercial privacy product - an app that can be easily installed on your computer or smart device that privatizes a file, photo, video, or other object of your choice.  It encrypts it and creates a digitally encrypted “pouch” that can be transmitted anywhere to whomever you wish, whatever location you choose, using whatever transfer means you select. 

The SafeJunction Digital Identity Vault Platform (DIV) is a patented, secure cloud-based identity verification system that assures that access to these privatized “pouches” is secured from prying eyes so that that the identity of those with whom you have already trusted to share can be authenticated without any additional communication on your part.  In future upgrades you will also be able to select the conditions under which the protected DIV pouches can be opened - when, where, for how long, etc.


Importance to us:

We believe that computer and Internet users of all ages have a right to privacy and deserve the means to secure their private digital objects - files, images, videos, messages - as long as the intentions are legal and don't violate any prevailing laws, regulations, or business policies.


What contributors will help us achieve:

If you believe that the Edward Snowden leaks or the Hillary Clinton email controversy are any measure of the importance of digital document privacy, then you already understand the importance of what we are building.  The most sensitive documents that Snowden stole could have been protected from his access if they had been protected using SafeShare technology, although they were located in network data folders where he had clearance to get them.  Attachments located in Hillary Clinton's emails could also have been privatized similarly so that they would be protected on her servers and inaccessible in the wild.  Your own personal health data - gathered by any digital medical device and transmitted using SafeShare technology- will be privatized so that only those healthcare providers you select will be able to view it.  The databases in the cloud where your personal or business data lives might be hacked in the future, but your identity and data will remain protected while being stored anywhere and transmitted by any available means today.


What We Need:

We already have a working Windows demo of the first personal version of our SafeShare product (SafeShare-One).  We will make available a copy of the SafeShare-One demo to anyone interested in contributing. We need additional capital to complete the Windows commercial release and to develop our Mac platform product and then to add our iOS and Android Smartphone and tablet versions of the SafeShare Client.  We will use the contributions raised to fund that development and testing exclusively. 


What You Get:

Any campaign contributor of at least $25 will receive a five-year subscription to SafeShare-One (including client software for all supported platforms)

Early adopters contributing $50 will receive a 5-person Family and Friends Pack SafeShare-One 5-year subscription (including client software for all supported platforms).

$100 contributors will receive a lifetime Family and Friends subscription for both SafeShare-One (including client software for all supported platforms).

Contributions Funding Detail:

·  Windows Development – complete the current Windows version of SafeShare-One and productize it for commercial release.

·  DIV (Digital Identity Vault) Development - Harden and protect the DIV Cloud server.  Upgrade the DIV from its current Demo instance and roll out the Production instance of DIV.

·  Apple iOS development - convert existing Windows Client for Mac use

·  Android App development - convert existing Windows Client for Android use

·  Apple App development - convert Windows and Android Demo Clients for use on iOS devices

·  Complete the Admin Console

Unique perks:

·  Involvement in the completion and roll-out of an exciting ground-breaking personal computing privacy product

·  Ability to secure a lifetime privacy product license

·  Multiple levels and methods of participation including the “Family Pack”

Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal

This campaign will be open-ended.  All funds contributed will be used for the purposes described and contributors will receive a working version of the product according to their contribution level.


What the product contributes to YOU and to the world.

The Document Privacy When You Want It  project is the culmination of more than 5 years of effort that included acquiring the rights to the technology patents, updating the original software code set, building a cloud DIV presence, developing privacy intellectual capital (see blogs below), and convincing the technology community that refining the product using our mutual experiences and ideas was a worthwhile venture.

The current conversation in both the US and Europe regarding individual privacy, the importance of the First and Fourth Amendments to the US Constitution, as well as threats to the security of citizens in the US and abroad brought on by terrorist and splinter groups are worth your involvement. Participation in technology projects and products that will enhance privacy security while stemming the flow of illegal information throughout consumer information channels is extremely worthwhile.

Track Record:

Our backgrounds and experiences speak volumes to the breadth of our commitment to the technology professions. 

Our Team has been working together for more than two years developing a 21st Century technology development and operations methodology that is highly efficient and which works extremely well remotely.  We are agile, make decisions quickly and intuitively, communicate, listen to each other, respect diverse opinions, the inherent challenges of risk, and are solvent.  We are now in a position to share our platform with others who have vision about privacy and technology and the willingness to contribute.


Risks & Challenges

Our main challenge has been refining our first-product focus while acknowledging that the DIV Platform and SafeShare-One products have many purposes, use-cases, and feature sets.  We recently chose the SafeShare-One product name because it includes attractive key  features that seem the simplest, quickest means of getting the core technology into the hands of many users quickly. Other platform and product uses will follow as we gain traction.

We are fairly well along with the usual start-up hurdles that entrepreneurs face:  We have been working together as a team for over two-years now and have been able to self-fund SafeJunction for all pre-launch expenses. 

But now seems an opportune time to kick it up a notch and involve a few other committed technology using contributors to get SafeShare-One completed and launched on multiple platforms.  We need at least of 2000 supporters contributing an average of $50 each to reach our project goal of $100,000.  We trust that the perks offered are attractive enough to warrant your support.


Our Qualifications

The SafeJunction Team has more than 90 years of combined technology industry experience, successfully accomplishing all of the tasks required to get to this point.  The only thing we lack today is start-up capital.  And that's a common problem for entrepreneurs.  The Indiegogo crowdfunding platform seems an ideal place to accomplish our fundraising goals quickly and efficiently AND get our technology into the hands of at least 2000 motivated, interested contributors and future users.  It’s a win-win combination.

Our resources for solving these challenges.

Website:

https://safejunction.com

Social Media:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/safejunction

Facebook:  https://facebook.com/SJPrivacy

Blogs:   https://www.safejunction.com/?page_id=5996

http://thecloudishuge.com

https://closettocloud.blogspot.com

SafeJunction currently also has the following elements available to contributors for review, and feedback:

·  Video

·  Pro-forma financials

·  Pitch Deck

·  Product Roadmap

·  Working Windows SafeShare-One Demo

·  Contracts and other executed legal documents

·  Two-year development track record

·  Financial Stability

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t contribute today, we invite your input and participation in Building the Buzz, but please don’t send any off-shore development offers or shameless self-serving employment requests.  We want to keep our product development efforts in the USA, and will address our staffing needs once we’re funded.  We're just not that far along yet to complicate our current focus, which includes your financial support and start-up participation.  Please mention us to your friends, relatives, and business associates to help Build the Buzz about SafeJunction and SafeShare-One. 

And that's all there is to it.  Please contribute and share the buzz with your friends, family, and colleagues!
story_txt: “Document Privacy When You Want It” - SafeShare LaunchSafeJunction.com – August 2016Introduction:We at SafeJunction are passionate about technology and privacy. Our founders have spent more than 90 years collectively as technology professionals.  We believe that consumers need to have access to technology that can protect their fundamental rights to privacy and the pursuit of a secure Internet experience.  We founded SafeJunction to develop and market products that protect the privileged data including private documents and files that are shared between you and your friends, relatives, and business associates.Campaign Description:Our "Document Privacy When You Want It" campaign is launched to fund SafeShare-One, our first commercial privacy product - an app that can be easily installed on your computer or smart device that privatizes a file, photo, video, or other object of your choice.  It encrypts it and creates a digitally encrypted “pouch” that can be transmitted anywhere to whomever you wish, whatever location you choose, using whatever transfer means you select. The SafeJunction Digital Identity Vault Platform (DIV) is a patented, secure cloud-based identity verification system that assures that access to these privatized “pouches” is secured from prying eyes so that that the identity of those with whom you have already trusted to share can be authenticated without any additional communication on your part.  In future upgrades you will also be able to select the conditions under which the protected DIV pouches can be opened - when, where, for how long, etc.Importance to us:We believe that computer and Internet users of all ages have a right to privacy and deserve the means to secure their private digital objects - files, images, videos, messages - as long as the intentions are legal and don't violate any prevailing laws, regulations, or business policies. story:
Introducing Power Tukxi ! The Cool, Clean & Connected Taxi! Power Tukxi is your solution to these and many more problems that you face for your everyday commute. With your support we want to launch a pilot fleet and differentiate ourselves as the most reliable and affordable provider of sustainable transportation services in India.

At core of our services lies a Power Tukxi , an electric hybrid three wheeler. In contrast to 20 km/liter fuel efficiency of a conventional three wheeler, Power Tukxi delivers 50% improvement and fuel efficiency of 30 km/liter. Our team will convert existing three wheelers into a fleet of Power Tukxi and offer 24 X 7 doorstep pick up services for all of your personal transportation needs.

In additional to being highly fuel efficient each Power Tukxi is always connected to show its GPS location and availability. A Power Tukxi can be booked with a single tap on your smart device for a stress free and Eco-friendly ride to the nearest public transportation point or all the way to your destination. There is no minimum distance that you need to travel and there are no hassles of haggling with the driver.

                                                The Power Tukxi

                                              Key Components of Power Tukxi                     

Affordable and sustainable transportation is need of the hour. We all experience stress of urban driving, especially during rush hours. The infrastructure built for public transportation which could potentially ease this congestion, remains largely underutilized due to lack of last mile connectivity. Power Tukxi is all about bridging this gap, making sustainable transportation affordable and offering you services that make your everyday commute a stress free enjoyable experience.

We are excited to be a part of this invigorating journey and we would like you to be a part of it as well. Please take a look at exclusive and personalized perks below. This is our way of thanking you for your generous support. With your support we want to build and launch pilot fleet of vehicles which will help us gather customer feedback, pivot as necessary and validate our value proposition. We are confident that with your support we transform the way we commute.


When you help us reach our goals, we thank you with exclusive and personalized perks shown below. When you help us exceed our goals, we will give you free ride. For every dollar that we receive in support we give you ONE P T mile (equal to 2 km) of free ride in any Power Tukxi . You can share your PT miles with friends and family. You will also receive exclusive access to our App and priority services on our fleet.




We have identified critical risks and challenges that we will come across with our product and service as we build our organization, validate our technology, gain customer traction and build an ecosystem around them. We have outlined our plan to mitigate the same.

Cost: We understand that our customer segment, perhaps more than any other segment, is cost sensitive. We understand that we need to be constantly and consistently innovate in technology, finance sourcing and strategy domains to optimize cost of our product and services.

Customer Support: We believe that we have one of the toughest customer segments to serve. Our segment not only expects world class customer service but also expects it at a much lower price point. We understand this unique challenge and we are ready to take this on. We believe that delighting our customer segment with Zappo’s style customer service is critical for our success.

Supply Chain: Building and sustaining supply chain is going to be daunting task and our team is very excited to be working on it. We understand that a lean and efficient supply chain that lies at the heart of our venture and we are confident that we can establish it. We will hire the right talent, work with right set of industry experts and mentors, identify and develop strategic suppliers

Quality Assurance : Our team understands that a robust engineering validation is going to be the key for delivering product performance and customer satisfaction. With in-house expertise and more than two decades of combined experience we are well positioned to take on and resolve any engineering issues we may come across. Our engineering goal is to deliver reliable product performance with minimum unscheduled maintenance.

Regulatory Approvals and Safety Issues: Regulatory approvals are going to be pivotal in our start up journey. Our team understands that such approvals are not easy to obtain, time consuming and sometimes capital intensive. We are already working with industry leading experts who can guide and throughout the process. We are in initial stage of engaging state and central regulatory authorities for obtaining necessary approvals for our product.

Frequently asked questions!

  1. What is Power Tukxi?
    Power Tukxi is 2015 way of commuting ! It is a 24X7 door step transportation service of highly fuel efficient three wheelers that takes you anywhere you want in a jiffy. Every Power Tukxi is IoT enabled and connected. You can hail an available Power Tukxi with single tap using our Android app.  There is no minimum distance that you need to travel and there are no hassles of haggling with the driver.  You can book a Power Tukxi to the nearest public transportation point or enjoy our comfortable ride all the way to your destination.

  2. How does the technology work?
    Power Tukxi is powered by our proprietary Intelli-Tukxi system which is a intelligent combination of mechanical and electric drive systems. Our algorithm powered by online analytics chooses best drive mode to maximize fuel efficiency for every trip.
  3. How much saving can one expect and what is the payback period?
    Our technology reduces unit cost of operation (cost to travel per km) by 75%. Depending on the usage our technology can reduce total cost of ownership for a three wheeler by up to 45%. Hence pay off period for our product lies between 12 and 18 months.

  4. Can I pick my perks up in Bangalore, India? 
    Absolutely! we would love to meet you. Local pickup is free and highly recommended.

  5. Where can I learn more about Power Tukxi?

    Visit us and subscribe to our updates at www.powertukxi.com

  6. How can I personalize my perk?
    Please add $5 personalization and free shipping perk in addition to your desired perks. After making your contribution you can send in your personalization request to perks@powertukxi.com.

  7. How can I track my perks?
    After the campaign ends, we will email each individual an electronic receipt  for their contributions which will contain shipping and tracking details.

  8. Can I contribute through paypal?
    The Reserve Bank of India passed a regulation that restricts Indian accounts from receiving funds from accounts outside India. Only Indian accounts can send funds to other Indian accounts via PayPal, which means that our PayPal account will not be able to accept your contributions on Indiegogo. Please select direct credit card payment to make a contribution if you are outside India.

Thank you again for your interest and for your support towards the Power Tukxi project. We will provide regular updates on the project as campaign goes on. Please stay connected, subscribe to us for latest update and share to spread the word.

story:
First video on file encryption.


Second video on file encryption.


*** Consider $1 contribution or Donation before you leave thanks***

QUIENES SOMOS: Representamos una firma de ordenador ( PC- Integral, Inc ) en las ciudades gemelas, Minnesota. Tuvimos un comienzo muy humilde. Hemos estado en operación desde 2006. Hemos crecido en el diseño y desarrollo de productos de seguridad y herramientas, independientemente de las dificultades insuperables. Hasta la fecha se han inventado un sistema de encriptación que hemos utilizado para construir un producto de vanguardia LokDon. 

Queremos ofrecer solución de seguridad que mantiene su privacidad.

LokDon --Providing security solution that upholds your privacy

We are seeking support from you to create an circle where all can connect securely to the internet. I am making this free to all. Our base technology is skcjju-256 crypto. Here we are using 2048 bits of encryption which is 8 times better than AES capability. The method used extends AES bringing it to the front of paring up with quantum computing. I have implored a faster and compressing components from the brainchild to produce the application called 'Secure Text LokDon'. We believe that it is a game changer as there are more things we can achieve by upholding the privacy we hold so dear to our hearts. 

REASONS WHY YOU SHOULD CONTRIBUTE:

(I will make the application free (open source) on iOS, Android and Windows)

1} Our cryptographic surface has a way of compressing data and making it smaller than AES algorithm. The IV, Roundkeys, Subbytes and Rounds (these are scope dependent) adds to the AES ciphertext and that is by far not the case with our system. Our system will redeem appro. 40% percent of every 100% encryption done by AES in unused storage space.

2}  As you can see from line 1 it will increase the speed of SSL/TLS communication protocol used in VPN technology in many private and enterprise environment.

3}  It will be used in conjunction with PGP to provide a circle of trusted users.

4}  It will provide capability of non-constant master keys since the keys are infinite.

5}  The algorithm is not agnostic to just application or programming. It can equally be used in any field requiring security. The millions and billions of combination and permutation is the power in our generated numbers therefore we find them useful in many fields and specific technologies. Smart card for secure ID in the military, highlevel personnels secure ID, Network communication, Video streaming, telecommunication (cable tv) and Mobile device (cellular phone signals),etc.

6}  It will provide absolute visibility for security incident response as and end-point to end-point tool.

7} It will remain formidable and durable in the face of quantum computing since it is 8 times better than the state of the art.

8} From line 5 you could be assured to use it anywhere from embedded to  compressing encryption technology e.g DeciBit WIFI crypto and many technology will find it very useful.

What we want to build:

First Phase: Build a web portal for EBS integration. Modify the present application for local and other authentication methods with open license.

*Modify LokDon application for local and other authentication methods via google, yahoo, msn, facebook, twitter and etc.

* Bring privacy back to users on all major platforms IOS. Android and Windows devices.

* Provide an open source that will allow you to connect securely over the internet.

*Bring to you a circle of trusted users protecting all your mobile communications and data.


We are hoping to increase the bits encrypted to 3072 with the keys capable of changing through an API update process. We also have plans on the works for holding the keys securely in a chip on your device or computer. This plan will extend to sleuth of devices that will be used in traversing the internet from these chip allowing you to secure your local network, IoT and data transfer with ease of confidentiality, security and integrity.

www.skcjju256.com

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oIND8VN1kOw

https://youtu.be/OygPej0I6qI

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=c....


Remember to complete the review for the last link. Thanks for your time.
Logo:

        

Game Pamphlet:  This game will help you keep your mind sharp. Anyone with ADHD can find this very useful too. I have also included solutions to help you along the way.

Other ways to help LokDon:

  • Get the word out about this campaign! (You can use the share tools on this page).

  • Try to let us know what we can do to make the campaign better. I mean don't try to fleece us. We are here for reasons that are quite obvious.

  • Send us your suggestions or whatever you think is needed.

How will the money be spent:

The money you are contributing will assist me in hiring two developers and one Architect. I know that the cost could be more but don't worry I will cover it with my resilient effort.  I promise you that within 6 months we will give you the privacy you need as long as our goal is reached.

Conclusion:

Our base technology is outstanding in all areas tested. We have no fear that it is here to stay. The fact that you are reading this right now is the confidence we have that you will understand the work we have put in to bring this knowledge to you. 

In a dynamic world there is no better way to change a single thing if we can not acknowledge a better idea and make it flourish. We can test it for ourselves and become convinced: It is also our duty for us to make it a public knowledge to educate others in a better way of doing things. This we must do in order to preserve wisdom and the dignity of humanity.

All donation will be put to use as stipulated  and all perks will be sent to the addresses provided within a month of the campaign closing. The encryption between the internet and your computers, car, IoT and handheld devices will be done seamlessly regardless of the capacity. You will be able to re-gain and maintain you privacy once again.

We cannot reach this goal without your help. Please find a way to support us. No podemos alcanzar esta meta sin su ayuda. Por favor, encontrar una manera de apoyarnos.
story_txt:
First video on file encryption.Second video on file encryption.*** Consider $1 contribution or Donation before you leave thanks***QUIENES SOMOS:
Representamos una firma de ordenador ( PC- Integral, Inc ) en las ciudades gemelas, Minnesota. Tuvimos un comienzo muy humilde. Hemos estado en operación desde 2006. Hemos crecido en el diseño y desarrollo de productos de seguridad y herramientas, independientemente de las dificultades insuperables. Hasta la fecha se han inventado un sistema de encriptación que hemos utilizado para construir un producto de vanguardia LokDon. Queremos ofrecer solución de seguridad que mantiene su privacidad.LokDon --Providing security solution that upholds your privacyWe are seeking support from you to create an circle where all can connect securely to the internet. I am making this free to all. Our base technology is skcjju-256 crypto. Here we are using 2048 bits of encryption which is 8 times better than AES capability. The method used extends AES bringing it to the front of paring up with quantum computing. I have implored a faster and compressing components from the brainchild to produce the application called 'Secure Text LokDon'. We believe that it is a game changer as there are more things we can achieve by upholding the privacy we hold so dear to our hearts. REASONS WHY YOU SHOULD CONTRIBUTE:(I will make the application free (open source) on iOS, Android and Windows)1} Our cryptographic surface has a
way of compressing data and making it smaller than AES algorithm. The IV,
Roundkeys, Subbytes and Rounds (these are scope dependent) adds to the AES
ciphertext and that is by far not the case with our system. Our system will
redeem appro. 40% percent of every 100% encryption done by AES in unused storage
space.
2}  As you can see from line 1 it
will increase the speed of SSL/TLS communication protocol used in VPN
technology in many private and enterprise environment.
3}  It
will be used in conjunction with PGP to provide a circle
of trusted users.
4}  It
will provide capability of non-constant master keys since the keys are
infinite.
5}  The
algorithm is not agnostic to just application or programming. It can equally be
used in any field requiring security. The millions and billions of combination
and permutation is the power in our generated numbers therefore we find them
useful in many fields and specific technologies. Smart card for secure ID in
the military, highlevel personnels secure ID, Network communication, Video
streaming, telecommunication (cable tv) and Mobile device (cellular phone
signals),etc.6}  It will provide
absolute visibility for security incident response as and end-point to end-point tool.7} It will remain formidable and durable in the face of quantum computing since it is 8 times better than the state of the art.8} From line 5 you could be assured to use it anywhere from embedded to  compressing encryption technology e.g DeciBit WIFI crypto and many technology will find it very useful.What we want to build:First
Phase: Build a web portal for EBS integration. Modify the present
application for local and other authentication methods with open license.*Modify LokDon application for local and other authentication methods via google, yahoo, msn, facebook, twitter and etc.* Bring privacy back to users on  all major platforms IOS. Android and Windows devices.* Provide an open source that will allow you to connect securely over the internet.*Bring to you a circle of trusted users protecting all your mobile communications and data.We are hoping to increase the bits encrypted to 3072 with the keys capable of changing through an API update process. We also have plans on the works for holding the keys securely in a chip on your device or computer. This plan will extend to sleuth of devices that will be used in traversing the internet from these chip allowing you to secure your local network, IoT and data transfer with ease of confidentiality, security and integrity.

Game Pamphlet:  This game will help you keep your mind sharp. Anyone with ADHD can find this very useful too. I have also included solutions to help you along the way.




Other ways to help LokDon:
Get the word out about this campaign! (You can use the share tools on this page).
Try to let us know what we can do to make the campaign better. I mean don't try to fleece us. We are here for reasons that are quite obvious.
Send us your suggestions or whatever you think is needed.


How will the money be spent:
The money you are contributing will assist me in hiring two developers and one Architect. I know that the cost could be more but don't worry I will cover it with my resilient effort.  I promise you that within 6 months we will give you the privacy you need as long as our goal is reached.

story:
We've had an exclusive alpha and beta release, with amazing results! Through a combination of self-funding and support from a small group of individuals who believe in the product we’ve been able to make it this far. But we need to take You Are A CEO to the next level for our official launch—that’s where YOU come in!

First, What is You Are A CEO?

A product development company that creates products and provides resources that educates, encourages, and inspires people to live an achievement lifestyle. We have created a platform to help you make achievement a habit so it ultimately becomes easier to lead a more fulfilling life. Other social media sites like Facebook, Google+, or Instagram are about connecting with other people to share general information. This platform is designed to provide motivational tools and experiences and help you reset your thinking to apply a positive attitude to achieve your personal goals. In this environment, it’s okay to post about all your accomplishments! Our community wants inspiration and motivation to achieve and continue achieving.

There’s Science and Gamification Involved

You Are A CEO has created an online platform and mobile app that is built on the findings of behavioral scientists. Achieving personal goals requires motivation, small wins, and positive reinforcement. While motivation to achieve can get you started toward your goals, it’s habit—the unconscious behaviors of the brain—that ultimately enables you to succeed. On top of the science, we use principles of gamification mechanics to enable people to create their own achievement environments while keeping themselves in a state of achievement flow—deep huh? :-)

This platform has been developed as a positive gathering place where members forge positive habits for achievement. Members can exchange information and inspiration to triumph through personal breakthroughs and motivation. Now we just need to make a few final adjustments and we can unveil this thing to the world. Would you help us? Please :-)




Click Here to listen to our Inc. Magazine Podcast Interview

Click here to listen to our Men's Health Podcast


Why We Are Raising Money

We are working on an updated version of our app based on the feedback from our beta users. But we need your help to make it as great as we possibly can! Funds from Indiegogo will be used for:

  • Redesigning the UX/UI - we are working to have the best possible user experience that is intuitive, simple and light
  • Integrate wearables and achievement apps through API- we want to allow our users to showcase achievements from various popular wearables and apps automatically and in real-time
  • Move to cloud to scale infrastructure – we are expanding our infrastructure to allow for mass user growth with speed
  • Redesign and develop new onboarding – we want to provide the best possible onboarding experience that delivers guidance with a “learn by doing” approach
  • Build new settings and push notifications – this will allow us to notify our customers to keep them engaged and updated when their friends interact with them on our app

How You Can Help

1. Contribute Today

Make a contribution by clicking the CONTRIBUTE NOW button above and select your contribution and perk. You aren't just contributing to something that can be of benefit to you; you are also supporting people in creating meaningful change in their lives!

2. Share Our Story

Share our IndieGogo campaign via email, Facebook, Twitter, phone calls, text messages and through good old-fashioned conversations. You Are A CEO will continue to come to life because a community wanted and created its development!

3. Leave Your Mark 

Stay tuned for the official announcement about our launch and join the movement by downloading our app and getting your friends and family to join with you! Your achievements have the potential to inspire and motivate others, and together we can inspire and motivate people everywhere to achieve anything.

story:
Welcome to the SpryngThing Project!

My name's Adam Leibler, and I have long sought a simple, effective, and inexpensive solution to the cord fray problems I experienced over the years. The solutions out there either cause more problems than they solve, are too complicated or complex, or just plain don't work. So I combined all the GOOD parts of the various solutions, tried to remove all the bad, and added a few new touches as well. Now, it's ready to share with the world - and YOU!

Here’s why it’s the perfect solution:

  • It’s designed specifically for your cords.
  • It’s made of materials appropriate to the task.
  • It's simple, so it requires no tools or special skills to install, use, or remove.
  • It’s transferable (from one cable to another).


SpryngThing comes in 13 different colors: Purple, Navy Blue, Blue, Forest Green, Green, Yellow, Orange, Red, Burgundy, Gold, Silver, White, and Black. Based on response and demand, we'll do a few polls to determine what new colors will be added to the line up. This means that not only is SpryngThing the solution to protect your cords, but it's a way to color code them, too. That means no more "cord battles" - just get everyone his or her own color SpryngThings!


SpryngThing is made from the best PVC plastic on Earth! It’s both lead and phthalate free, making it the most environment friendly PVC out there, and the PVC filament used to make SpryngThing is also CPSIA (Consumer Product Safety Improvement Act of 2007)-compliant. In addition, it's re-purposed PVC plastic, so there's no additional chemical or manufacturing carbon footprint!

SpryngThing is about as USA as you can get. It’s made right here in the USA by a US Army veteran (that’s me) using materials, packing, and shipping from the US as well.

As we start to make money with SpryngThing, we’re giving some of that money back - 15% to be exact. 5% of our profits will go back into other Indiegogo projects, 5% of our profits will go to programs that help out our military veterans, and 5% will go into educational scholarships.

SpryngThing in action, doing it's thing!


For the past few months, I have been hard at work developing and testing SpryngThing, with the goal of making SpryngThing available online, accessible to everyone around the world.

Now I need YOUR help!

The initial goal is $3,500, and the money we raise here will cover the final precision measurements of several cables, engineering & tooling, initial production costs, creating the packaging, and moving from a provisional patent to a fully patented product.

Risks & Challenges

I don't anticipate any major risks or challenges, but just in case, I've got a group of friends and family with legal, financial, small business, manufacturing, and operational management experience waiting to help out, should the need arise. I've also got a business plan & product release timeline close at hand to help keep things on track.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't afford to contribute and get your own SpryngThing, that's ok! Share, share, SHARE the campaign across the Interwebz, Facebook, Twitter, Pintrest... anywhere you can think of! And don't forget to use the handy Indiegogo share tools to make it easy!
Thanks!

story:
Illest Vapes is the manufacturer of the smartest electronic cigarettes available in the market today.  Coming from engineering and sales backgrounds, the company founders had an idea for a smarter electronic cigarette over a year ago and have been dedicated to bringing that dream to reality.  We have flown around the world, found manufacturing, gone through R&D and testing, and the best part is that currently we don't just have prototypes, we have production ready units AND the app is done.  Currently the app is available in the Apple Store for iphone users and Google Play for Android users.  We have spent a lot of money and time to get this far and now we need your help to complete our vision and go into full production.

Our units are microprocessor-controlled with our patented electronics integrated with Bluetooth 4.0 technology which unlocks a host of features for users.  This technology allows you to monitor how many puffs you take each day, how many cigarettes you would have smoked if you weren't vaping, how much money you're saving not smoking cigarettes, health benefits, and users can set plans to cut back on how much they smoke.  Our graphs show you your smoking trends by day, week, month, or year so you can see how much progress you're making. 

Not only can you track and monitor how much you smoke but in the app you can adjust the amount of vapor you get with each puff.  You can also view your battery life, atomizer resistance, voltage, and wattage.  Simply open the app and the power is at your fingertips.


#smokebomb

Specifications:

Bluetooth 4.0 Smart Chip.

Battery- Single 18650 (2600mAh)

Output Voltage: 3V-5V

Output Wattage: 3W-15W (looking to upgrade to 30W with your help!)

Tank- Kanger Genitank Mega with adjustable airflow

Retail Price: $89.99


Torpedo:

Specifications:
Bluetooth 4.0 Smart Chip

Battery- 900 mAh

Output Voltage: 3V-4.2V

Output Wattage: 5W-12.6W

Tank: Kanger Genitank Mini With Adjustable Airflow

Retail Price: $69.99


Production Schedule:

story:
Available Models:

            iPhone:    iPhone 5/5s  iPhone 6/6s/6 Plus/6s Plus

            Color:       Pink/Silver/Gold


        Samsung:   Galaxy S6/ Galaxy S6 Edge 

        Frame Color :  Gold/Silver

         Cover Color:      Plastic/ Picture

                                                 


Galaxy 6S EDGE

Mobile phone radiation and health


All cell phones emit electromagnetic radiation. according to Dr. Peter Franch of the Center for Immunology Research in Sydney Australia, “Cells are permanently damaged by cellular phone frequencies.” Phone radiation warnings are published in all user manuals by law in legal section, but many users do forget to keep the phone at a safe distance from the head or do not know about the warning. 

The effect of mobile phone radiation on human health is a subject of interest and study worldwide, as a result of the enormous increase in mobile phone usage throughout the world. As of 2016, there were 7.4 billion subscriptions worldwide (but some have more than two, so 4,230 millions users in 2014 gives better picture with then about 97 phones per 100 citizens).[1] Mobile phones use electromagnetic radiation in the microwave range (450–2100 MHz). Other digital wireless systems, such as data communication networks, produce similar radiation.

In 2011, International Agency for Research on Cancer (IARC) classified mobile phone radiation as Group 2B – possibly carcinogenic (not Group 2A – probably carcinogenic – nor the dangerous Group 1). That means that there "could be some risk" of carcinogenicity, so additional research into the long-term, heavy use of mobile phones needs to be conducted.

Source: Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia



After long time of research and work our team was able to met our goal. 

Pyramid is designed to be

  •  Fashionable and durable,
  •  Protects your mobile phone.
  •  Most importantly blocks  Radio Frequency at high effective level.
  •  Eco friendly.
  • All of Pyramid Phone cases ,with radiation absorbing materials, are tested by authorities .


Pyramid Radiation Blocking case Test result by Authorities

What is cellphone radiation & How cellphone works?

         Cell phones work by sending signals to (and receiving them from) nearby cell towers (base stations) using RF waves. This is a form of electromagnetic energy that falls between FM radio waves and microwaves. Like FM radio waves, microwaves, visible light, and heat, RF waves are a form of non-ionizing radiation.

Settings-General-About-Legal-RF Exposure (to check warning about RF exposure on your iPhone)



ABSORBING MATERIAL

Pyramid absorbing material proven to be reduce cellphone radiation by more than 95 percent.





Tips to reduce cell phone radiation exposure!





Our Stretch Goal

If we achieve more than our goal, We will be able to deliver new designs and more cellphone models. And with your help we can also lower the market price range. 

Available Models:

iPhone:    iPhone 5/5s  iPhone 6/6s/6 Plus/6s Plus

Samsung:  Galaxy S6/ Galaxy S6 Edge   





 IS YOUR CELL PHONE SAFE? 

Listen to what experts have to say

story:
#iHELP project is the most comprehensive Emergency Care Network combined with In Case of Emergency (ICE) app (temporarily only Android and iOS in limited scope).


As an idea, project and startup #iHELP was finalist for 2013. Top Business Idea held by Finance newspaper and were chosen among 3444 companies worldwide for WAYRA UK start up accelerator (current Alumni). iHELP project was one of the 20 chosen companies for Johnson & Johnson INNOVATION: Digital Health Master class 2013. from all the world and this year we partnered with Diners Club International.




#iHELP was presented in world known ArcticStartup blog with direct interview with our CEO and inventor, Andraž Ogorevc.


We want to #SaveLives and help globally with our working project and that's why we need your help. The funded amount from this campaign will go into:

  • Development and deployment of iOS iHELP app and Windows Phone app globally,
  • Application localization – professional translation of all our project segments to world languages (Spanish, French, Russian, Portuguese and so on…),
  • Making the greatest, the biggest and most secure defibrillator (#AED) location database from around the world for everyone to use,
  • Animation and additional help with #CPR procedure, #AED localization and overall awareness to Community First Responders, Rescuers and all around community, worldwide,
  • To arrange worldwide partnership for further project development and maintenance.


#iHELP enables people to call for help and organize mutual assistance in any case of emergency, for i.e. traffic accident, sudden cardiac arrest (SCA), strokes and seizures, epileptic or diabetes attack, in home fire or flood etc. So far, #iHELP launched iHELP android application and Helth Card with which we aim to reduce the current high rate of mortality in all cases of emergency, increase the level of public awareness about ways of assistance to any victims and, also, to improve the level of socially responsible community.

We have knowledge and we know how to go global - we have been doing since 2012. and we can be proud of saving lives with our iHELP project. Since, we have developed:

  • SOS alarm platform for Ambulance, Police, Firefighters and Lost person association,
  • Fully functional ICE Android app in English, Slovenian, Bulgarian, German and Croatian language,
  • 112 EMS system for alarming First Responders and professional Rescuers with SMS and smart phone notifications,
  • Most detailed AED location database for Slovenia, Croatia, Austria, New Zealand and UK,
  • Access to personal Health Records for users and rescuers and then some…



#iHELP is exceptional and original. Here's why:
  • #iHELP provides the biggest emergency care network in the World,
  • #iHELP reduces time of help by 6 times or more,
  • #iHELP effectively increases chances of survival in most urgent cases,
  • #iHELP creates a solution that allows a 70% probability of survival in case of Heart Attack and Sudden Cardiac Arrest,
  • #iHELP saves money to users (lower premiums for life & health insurance).

#iHELP smartphone app provides users a quick, easy, and massive sending of SOS alarm messages to family members, friends, professional rescuers, Emergency Medical Service (EMS - 112/911/999) and all users of iHELP mobile application within radius of a 500 meters, or more, from the casualty. The application provides instructions for first aid, overview of the nearest defibrillators (#AED), how far away are the emergency rooms, police and fire stations, how many users are in the immediate vicinity and how far away are the family members or friends.

The great advantage of the #iHELP is that it informs the casualty about the state of response for help: how many people have received SOS alarm message and how many have responded to help, and when they will arrive (cause minutes count!).



Statistics show that according to good scenario, rescuing takes about 10 minutes or more, depending on location, weather and time (traffic jams). With our solution, the arrival of rescuers can be in less than 20 seconds after we activate iHELP rescue network. Due to the rapid arrival of help, the probability of survival can go up to 70% in the case of sudden cardiac arrest!


Official statistics say that by the end of 2015 about 30% of smartphone users will use at least one mobile application for health. (Source: mHealth)

No, iHELP is not the ONLY ICE app out there and here's the comparison:




In need of emergency you (or anybody else) should be able to tell the rescue team or even a single person if you should be treated in special manner or in need of special medications. There could be numerous scenarios, but in many of them you will not be able to speak (any type of seizure or attack, car accident etc.).



That's where the #iHELP Health Card takes control of your life.

iHELP Health Card has all needed information on your medical history, blood type, allergies to medications etc. so that anybody that’s helping you can easily access your short medical records.


Example 1: if the helping hand is someone you know, he/she will be out of their mind (most of the times) and will be unable to communicate information on your medical history. Therefore, he/she can provide your iHELP Health card to Rescue team or person. Fast response + medical history information = #SaveLives!


Example 2: Anyone who is part of the rescue team will, by default, go through your wallet to find additional info about you. That's when he/she finds iHELP Health Card and knows exactly what to do and how to threat you!





iHELP wristband, made of orange rubber, will incorporate iHELP (6 digit) code holding the Health Record of the individual. Every user of iHELP wristband will have to fill in the personal Health Record and it can be done in several languages.
The complete health record will be accessible only to the user whereas the first responders / rescuers will be able to access the following data:

  • Illnesses / conditions
  • Allergies
  • Medications / prescription drugs
  • In case of Emergency contacts (ICE)




The idea of #iHELP developed out of the personal experience of it's founder Andraz. His twin brother had a sudden allergic reaction after a procedure and it required medical assistance and rescuers. Although the emergency station was only few kilometers away it took them more than 40 minutes to arrive. The quick and sound response of the people around that came to help can be thanked for the good outcome. And so we realized that there are always people around us who are willing and trained to help us but we don't know about them nor do they know that we need help. 

The company has detected its opportunity in an area with a high number of specific unresolved problems:
  • over 17.6 million people in the world die every year as a result of cardiovascular diseases;
  • only 7% chance of survival in case of sudden cardiac arrest;
  • poor awareness about the specifics of sudden cardiac arrest among people;
  • complete lack of visibility and availability of defibrillators;
  • late arrival of professional rescue teams at the place of an accident;
  • European Union allocates 200 billion EUR annually for purposes of resolving the problem of cardiovascular diseases.

#iHELP in our community!



iHELP World Ltd. addresses the above issues with an innovative concept - iHELP project!


The aim of the iHELP project is to have the largest rescue network that will be present locally and globally, and thus offer faster emergency help! We want to reduce the current high rate of mortality in the event of sudden cardiac arrest; increase the awareness about possible ways to help victims of cardiac arrest; assist local communities in setting up the defibrillators; and help business partners save their customers, because this way we can save a lot of money. Therefore, the company iHELP World Ltd. has developed iHELP SOS platform, mobile application and iHELP wristband & SOS emergency sticker (in the prototype stage), which will effectively increase the possibility of rescuing and reduce the time of offering first aid in the event of sudden cardiac arrest or an accident, stroke, epileptic seizure, diabetic attack, etc. iHELP project represents an attractive combination of the concept of social entrepreneurship (socially responsible company in building a brand iHELP) on one hand and the concept of saving lives on the other.


Meet #iHELP team!

The founder and initiator of the iHELP project (Andraž Ogorevc) has more than 14 years of experience in corporate waters and is also the innovator - 2 patent (he invented "Public display" for external need and in 2004 he opened a new branch DOOH with external LCD screens). The team has 34 years of experience in saving lives and 10 years of experience in the market of mobile applications. Part of the team are also external consultants and experts of various fields (assistance in saving life) from the members of fire brigades, mountain rescuers and physicians.


Go to top

As an idea, project and startup #iHELP was finalist for 2013. Top Business Idea held by Finance newspaper and were chosen among 3444 companies worldwide for WAYRA UK start up accelerator (current Alumni). iHELP project was one of the 20 chosen companies for Johnson & Johnson INNOVATION: Digital Health Master class 2013. from all the world and this year we partnered with Diners Club International. 



#iHELP was presented in world known ArcticStartup blog with direct interview with our CEO and inventor, Andraž Ogorevc.

story:
Remember when cell phones first started including cameras, and some people wondered why anyone would need a camera on their phone? It's now hard to imagine modern life without the phone camera, and it's amazing how essential cell phones have become to modern life in such a short time. The computing technology that we carry around in our pocket is mind-blowing, and yet there's still so much more to unlock.

Siam 7X is introducing the North American market to dual-screen cellular technology, which opens new doors to connectivity and productivity. The once vacant back side of the phone has been developed into a fully functioning touchscreen, maximizing the precious “real estate” of our pocket-sized mobile device. Plan your grocery list on the front of the phone while using a calculator on the rear side; keep the GPS map up on one screen while accessing your music menu on the reverse; customize the rear cover with your favorite pictures. 


The Siam 7X is transporting users to a new realm of technological possibilities and efficiency, and soon it will be hard to remember how people functioned using only one side of their cell phone.


The front screen of the 4.7” Siam 7X is a full HD screen, and the back is an E Ink display – similar to a Kindle, but with expansive multitasking functionality, including Notifications,  News/Social Feeds,  Media Controls,  Calender, Weather, Widgets and customizable wallpaper. 



The back screen is lockable for when not in use, and the E Ink display is adjustable to users' needs, ensuring clarity no matter the lighting indoors or bright sunshine outside. 


All Kickstarter level supporters receive a pair of BioSport smart earbuds by SMS Audio. The BioSport buds feature professionally tuned 12 mm drivers to deliver studio-mastered sound, are compatible with every major fitness app, and are water resistant. Like the dual-screen cell phone, the BioSport earphones expand the functioning of a standard accessory by incorporating heart monitoring – eliminating the need to haul around multiple devices when working out.



The Siam 7X is available just in time for the holidays, and makes the perfect gift for everyone from casual cellphone users to gadget geeks, who will be excited to know that Siam 7X is an unlocked handset. The phone is compatible with all Android apps, and is available on T-Mobile and AT&T cellular networks.



All Kickstarter supporter to purchase the Siam 7X earn membership in the Owners' Club, which includes a lifetime warranty, accidental coverage, free upgrade to the next model, and invites to special events and promotions.



The Siam 7X dual-scree smart phone has been in development for more than two years, during which time we have devoted immeasurable attention to making sure the product is top-quality, both in terms of the physical device and the business plan to bring it to market. Like any physical product, it’s been important for us to unite all of the right points of interest, source the most reliable and cost-efficient materials, and secure the best assembling partners.

We have devoted particular attention to the back screen function, as this is charting new territory in mobile technology. We’ve located and resolved issues that affected the functioning of various applications for the back screen, and we’ve focused on making sure the back screen communicates seamlessly with the rest of the device so as to prevent “crossed wires” when using functions on the front or back screen – or both at the same time. Our research and enhancements remain ongoing, therefore, we will continuously send software updates to Siam 7X owners.
