story:
NuCrypt is an exclusive hardware encrypted flash drive with USB 3.0 and NFC support to achieve the best possible speeds delivering military grade encryption. Encryption pertains to the most effective way of achieving data security. In order to read encrypted files, you need to have access on secret password or key that will enable you to decrypt the file. Encryption helps in protecting your data by encrypting it. Device encryption is highly essential because this helps protecting your content from unwanted eyes and in case your device is lost, no one can manage to access your data. NuCrypt is very simple and easy to use and can be set up in any computer with an exclusive built in tool or any NFC supported phone with our Smartphone application. First time connecting the USB device the default partition mounts where you can set your password. After the password confirmed, a password hash is generated from it. The second partition gets encrypted with the hash and connects to your desktop. The second partition is the place where you store all your secure data. After unmounting the device the files stay encrypted.



NFC

Afraid of key loggers and other viruses that could capture your password? Fear nothing¬! NuCrypt comes equipped with NFC support which allows you to decrypt your data for the next use without any need to enter your secure password on the PC, eliminating the possibility for any infected system to grab your password. NFC support is supported for now on any NFC supported Android and Windows mobile devices.



When you plug NuCrypt to a USB port for the very first time, a short initialization set-up wizard will prompt you to assign a particular password for the device, along with some simple questions of your preferences with regards to the features of the drive. Once you create your password, the encryption algorithms lock into place and you can now begin using your drive just as you would with any other USB drive. The only noticeable difference is that you will be required to enter your secure password when you plug the drive to a new machine to access your information or unlock the device beforehand by any NFC equipped device.

NuCrypt is unbeatable in both hardware and software side. We provide Twofish, Serpent and AES encryption and on the hardware side, we make use of dedicated processor located on the flash drive. The entire authentication happens in the hardware side. This tends to eliminate any brute force or software-based reverse engineering attempts. Utilizing hardware encryption enables us to have no required software installed in your computer to decrypt the content. If after all you are still scared to enter your password on the computer the content on the drive can be decrypted from any NFC enabled Smartphone running Android or Windows mobile.

NuCrypt features a dual sided USB 3.0 connector which provides with the inbuilt flash memory incredible speeds of 240MB/s read and 145MB/s write speed.



At present, we offer three different simple colors such as silver, black and gold. All the USB flash drives are milled from a single piece of aluminum.




NuCrypt comes equipped with the Xilinx 200 Kgate Spartan 3A FPGA chip which handles all the encrypting and decrypting of the content. This chip allows us to achieve amazing speeds while having AES 256 bit encryption. NuCrypt is specially designed to protect digital media and documents from thef tand water. Our product offers protection for digital media water protection up to 8 in. of water for about 24 hours and shock resistance.







NuCrypt comes with double sided USB 3.0 port. Doesn't matter which way you use the drive it plugs in on the first try always. No more guessing, no more trouble. The ports both sides are reversible and can be connected in any direction without wasting any time.

Working prototype and development board.


We offer Free Shipping. Generally, the Free Shipping option is sent via Post Airmail and delivery takes about 7-25 days to major destinations. Since all post offices that offer international airmail services do not guarantee delivery time for Airmail parcels, the delivery time is provided for reference only. https://ksr-ugc.imgix.net/assets/004/869/714/54... We offer Free Shipping. Generally, the Free Shipping option is sent via Post Airmail and delivery takes about 7-25 days to major destinations. Since all post offices that offer international airmail services do not guarantee delivery time for Airmail parcels, the delivery time is provided for reference only.













NuCrypt is a startup out of Ohio, comprised of engineers, programmers and designers. We have staff in Ohio and Wuxi, China. Some of our team members are University of New York computer science and electrical engineering students. Founder and owner William Lacy worked at another startup in the pro-Security industry for six years before leaving to start NuCrypt. Our primary investor and advisor, Delbert Tucker, is also a hardware encryption developer and a security pro, and has successfully created several other startups.

story:
The Ease Cable Tidy, stores the ipad and iphone plug and cable. It is easy to use, light, compact and provides an ideal solution when commuting and travelling.



The Ease Cable Tidy, is currently only compatible with a type G electrical plug.  The type G plug is mainly used in the United Kingdom, Ireland, Cyprus, Malta, Malaysia, Singapore and Hong Kong.



We design products that make your life easier without inconveniencing someone else's.  Our products are practical, beautiful, easy to use and respectful to people and our planet.


Over two years ago I was gifted an ipad and was quickly faced with the problem of keeping the charger safe when on the go. At the beginning I was storing the charger in the original box but that wasn't practical so I designed and made my own case.




My desire to keep inventing and sharing my creations has led me to start my own company Ease Design Products Ltd.


My mission is to run a good business whilst promoting an ethical and sustainable future; and thus leading by example. I want to ensure everyone involved in the design, manufacturing and sales is being paid and treated fairly and that sustainable energy is being used at all stages.


For example I have paid the students who helped with the CAD design £9 per hour although I was advised to pay them no more than the minimum wage.  I have also chosen manufacturers based in the UK who use sustainable energy and recycled plastic where possible.


About the Ease Cable Tidy


Ease Cable Tidy stores ipad and iphone cable chargers. It is easy to use, light and compact and provides an ideal solution when commuting and travelling.

There is nothing more disappointing than discovering your charger no longer works when you need it urgently. Save yourself the frustration of running out of battery in the middle of an important presentation or work meeting by storing your charger safely. Furthermore storing it using Ease Cable Tidy not only keeps it from being damaged but also protects your clothes, suitcase or bag from getting ripped by the three pin plug. 

The Ease Cable Tidy has a funky design with a transparent lid so you know at a glance whether or not you have packed your cable. It comes in four popular colours you can choose from!


The perks offered are a variety of various combinations of the 4 different colours (White, Pink, Green and Black) of the Ease Cable Tidy with some options to receive them with free p&p. 


Please support me to accomplish my mission by donating any amount or by pre-ordering one or more Ease Cable Tidy by clicking on one of the perk buttons along the right hand side.



Share this with your friends and family via the Indiegogo Share Tools!




Thank you to the following organisations and people for their help and support.
story_txt:
The Ease Cable Tidy, stores the ipad and iphone plug and cable. It is
easy to use, light, compact and provides an ideal solution when commuting
and travelling. 
The Ease Cable Tidy, is currently only compatible with a type G electrical plug.  The type G plug is mainly used in the United Kingdom, Ireland, Cyprus, Malta, Malaysia, Singapore and Hong Kong.
We design
products that make your life easier without inconveniencing
someone else's.  Our products are practical, beautiful, easy to use and
respectful to people and our planet. 


Over two years ago I was gifted an ipad and was quickly
faced with the problem of keeping the charger safe when on the go. At the
beginning I was storing the charger in the original box but that wasn't
practical so I designed and made my own case.




My desire to keep inventing and sharing my creations has
led me to start my own company Ease Design Products Ltd. 





My mission is to run a
good business whilst promoting an ethical and sustainable future; and thus
leading by example. I want to ensure everyone involved in the design,
manufacturing and sales is being paid and treated fairly and that sustainable
energy is being used at all stages. 



For example I have paid the students who
helped with the CAD design £9 per hour although I was advised to pay them no
more than the minimum wage.  I have also chosen manufacturers based in the UK who use
sustainable energy and recycled plastic where possible.


About the Ease Cable Tidy

Ease Cable Tidy stores ipad and iphone cable chargers. It is
easy to use, light and compact and provides an ideal solution when commuting
and travelling. 

There is nothing more disappointing than discovering your
charger no longer works when you need it urgently. Save yourself the
frustration of running out of battery in the middle of an important
presentation or work meeting by storing your charger safely. Furthermore
storing it using Ease Cable Tidy not only keeps it from being damaged but also
protects your clothes, suitcase or bag from getting ripped by the three pin
plug.  
The Ease Cable Tidy has a funky design with a transparent lid
so you know at a glance whether or not you have packed your cable. It comes in four popular colours you can choose from! 


The perks offered are a variety of various combinations of
the 4 different colours (White, Pink, Green and Black) of the Ease Cable
 Tidy with some options to receive them with free p&p.  




Please support me to accomplish my mission by
donating any amount or by pre-ordering one or more Ease Cable Tidy by 
clicking on one of the perk buttons along the right hand side.

organisations and people for their help and support.

story:
Overview

With hYpe we strive to pursue a lighter experience, reliable power, supply anytime and anywhere. With premium quality at an affordable price!

What can you expect?

  • Small size, amazing power of 10`000mAh
  • Can charge up to 3 devices at the same time
  • Wireless and cable charging
  • Digital display with battery indicater
  • With portable lanyard
  • Built-in phone holder
  • Fast charging (50% in 30min)
  • MacBook charging is supported

 

All these features in this little power bank!

 

Our goal was to create a power-bank with all the features you need. But still she had to be small so she can accompany you and alway provide you with the power you need everywhere.

 

Everything you need in one small size with big power

At an unbeatable price!

 

Only for 

 

 

 

        

The Digital Age

Modern day life is a chaotic mix of digital device after digital device. If we’re not using our phones whilst commuting on public transport then we’re using a laptop when we get to work, or a tablet in a business meeting, or a smart watch for notifications on the go - the list is endless. Today, we rely on digital devices to stay ‘in the know’ much like people just decades ago relied on newspapers and just a select few television channels for their information. Digital technologies may be ever-changing and developing but one thing remains an issue - battery life still isn’t good enough!

 

That’s where hYpe comes in, for all those times where your battery life just doesn’t hit the mark. Use it on the go and never be without your digital device again! 

 

 

Black & Red

hYpe comes in a stunning colour scheme of black and red. It’s professional, sleek, stylish and anything but bulky. It’s exactly what the market has been looking for, a power bank with a corporate feel, much unlike the lower specification, cheaper and much bulkier competitors available today. hYpe is different, because we care about appearance - as well as what’s underneath… It’s small size too makes it the perfect portable charging option for your digital devices. 

Powerful

Boasting the impressive power of 10,000mAh, hYpe is unlike many of its competitors. It’s a reliable, easily-portable charging option that you can use on the go with the peace of mind that it’s really going to work. You never need to worry about your smart phone, tablet, laptop or smart watch dying again. 
 

Three Devices? We’ve Got it Covered!

With the ability to charge three devices at the same time (one wireless and two wired), hYpe isn’t just the perfect option when your smart phone battery dies, it’s the perfect option for many digital devices. In the digital age we’re living in, we’re using multiple digital devices at a time, so we need to keep them all connected. hYpe is the solution. 

 

MacBook

As if it couldn’t get better, hYpe supports MacBook charging. This really is a product with fantastic benefits and many more features than the others on the market. 

 

Battery Indicator

hYpe boasts many features including an easy to read digital display. Highlighting the battery status, so you know exactly how much power you have left to use. 

  

 

 

On The Go

All hYpe power banks come complete with a portable lanyard for easy transportation. Combined with the small, lightweight design of the power bank, it’s perfect when you’re on the go. 


 

Phone Holder

The hYpe also features a built-in phone holder for additional comfort and ease of use when you’re out and about. hYpe has been carefully designed with you in mind, recognising that many currently on the market are designed cheaply and often aren’t practical/easy to use. 

 

 

Fast Charging 

In the digital age we’re living in, we want things and we want them fast. A charged battery is one of those things. hYpe is fast charge enabled, allowing for a 50% charge in just thirty minutes - much higher than other power banks on the market today. Your digital device will be fully recharged within four hours too, which is much faster than the other products on the market.   

    

 

Safety

Safety is the most important thing for us, so we can promise you 9 safety measures. We pay attention to every detail of our products.

  • Overvoltage protection
  • Overcharge protection
  • Over discharge protection
  • Over power protection
  • Temperature protection
  • Overcurrent protection
  • Magnetic field protection
  • Interference protection
  • Short circuit protection

 

 

Pledge Today

We hope you like the Indiegogo campaign and we hope to see your name in the pledge section below. As an incentive, we have attached various reward tiers to our package options. Thank you for reading and supporting our project.

Your digital device will be fully recharged within four hours too, which is much faster than the other products on the market.

Safety is the most important thing for us, so we can promise you 9 safety measures. We pay attention to every detail of our products.

Overvoltage protection
Overcharge protection
Over discharge protection
Over power protection
Temperature protection
Overcurrent protection
Magnetic field protection
Interference protection
Short circuit protection

 

 
Pledge Today
We hope you like the Indiegogo campaign and we hope to see your name in the pledge section below. As an incentive, we have attached various reward tiers to our package options. Thank you for reading and supporting our project.

story:
Mobile phones have integrated into our daily life so closely that we are constantly holding our phone at anytime and anywhere.

Did you know that the surface of a smart phone is contaminated with 3.5 times more bacteria than the toilet seat? Plus, more than one-third of the mobile phone users have never cleaned their phone!

Why are our phones so dirty? One of the primary reasons is our own behaviour. The average person checks their mobile phone approximately once every 12 minutes, or 80 times per day. This means our hands are on our devices nonstop, and they are likely accompanying us on nearly every errand and activity, perhaps even when we visit the toilet.

While you might think of yourself as a particularly clean person, and a frequent hand -washer, your hands are actually one of your worst culprits. These appendages are in use constantly, touching everything from door handles to cash to sink taps. Along the way, your hands are capable of collecting enormous amounts of germs. From the fingertips to the elbow, you’ll find an average of 2 and 10 million bacteria. 

A second reason that our phones are so dirty is the heat they produce. Warm environments are where bacteria thrive. Unfortunately, your phone has its own necessary heat-producing mechanisms, and you’re only adding to its warm environment by holding the device in your hands or storing it in your pockets. Those toasty atmospheres mean bacteria can grow and spread.

Your phone is a breeding ground for a wide variety of different organisms; one scientific study discovered roughly 7,000 types of bacteria in 51 smartphone samples. Before you panic, it’s important to note that many of these bacteria are actually naturally occurring, good-for-us bacteria. Much of what is found on our phones is also what is found in our hands and mouths. That same study revealed that 22% of bacterial families overlapped on fingers and phones. A doctor involved with the study said that mobile phones “carry our own personal biome,” which is one way of looking at things.

And you can’t trust other people to be clean either. Research shows that 95% of people don't wash their hands properly. If you're shaking hands with colleagues or touching something that anyone else has ever touched (basically, everything) there’s serious germ potential.

It’s those pathogenic bacteria and other germs you need to be mindful of. Here’s what might be lurking on your mobile:

E. coli

In one study, 16% of phones sampled were found to have E. coli present. This is a type of bacteria that can live in the intestines and be transferred via faecal matter. It causes ailments such as food poisoning, diarrhoea, or occasionally more serious illness.

Staphylococcus aureus

Another common bacteria found on mobile phones is Staphylococcus aureus. This bacteria can be harmful or not depending upon the strain, but certain kinds are responsible for staph infections---typically minor skin infections that can be treated with antibiotics. However, Methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus, also known as MRSA, is a more serious type of staph bacteria that can cause potentially life-threatening infections. In the healthcare settings, where MRSA has been known to spread, it can lead to pneumonia, surgical site infections, or bloodstream infections. This has lead to a great deal of research regarding the role of mobile phones in a hospital or healthcare setting, with many facilities putting stricter phone-cleaning standards in place for their staff.

Influenza

Nobody wants to catch the flu, but this virus can find its way to you via a mobile device. Able to survive on surfaces for as long as 24 hours, is another phone fiend to be avoided. If you don’t want to be ill in bed for a week or more, best get that phone cleaned up regularly.

Clostridium difficile

This bacteria can cause unfortunate bouts of diarrhoea. Let’s just leave it at that.

Streptococcus

The source of strep throat, an illness more common in children, streptococcus bacteria can also cause scarlet fever, impetigo, toxic shock syndrome, or necrotising fasciitis (a flesh-eating disease).

It is a common sense to wash our smelly hair or filthy clothes. However, hardly do we think cleaning our intimate companion: - The Mobile Phone. In fact, the surface of the mobile phone picks up bacteria everywhere it goes. It is believed that contagious diseases could be spread when our body parts make close contact with the mobile phone. 

Germ-infested mobile phones are considered to be "reservoirs of infection in the healthcare environment". Recent international studies show these devices can harbour harmful bacteria such E.coli and Staphylococcus aureus​, which is the most common multi-drug resistant superbug and believed to be the top killer of hospitalised patients.

 

 

REDZOS is specially designed machines that use ultraviolet light to break down the DNA structure of bacteria, viruses and pathogens found on mobile devices. 

 

Specification: 

Internal Space Dimensions: Max Height: 165mm x Max Width: 90mm x Max Depth: 20mm

Comptaible with: 

iPhone X, XS, XS Max, XR, 8 & 8 Plus, 7 Plus, 6 Plus

Samsung S10, S10 Plus, S9, S9 Plus, S8, S8 Plus, 

And other  brand mobile phone which are smaller than - 165mm (H) x 90mm (W) x  20mm (D).

story:
The Smartest Keychain 

 

• Built-in WiFi and Bluetooth technology

• Safe fingerprint scanning technology

• Carries up to five physical keys tucked away safely in one place

• Securely stores up to three electronic access key cards

• 32GB, 64GB or 128GB of wireless flash storage

• Creates a copy of your vehicle’s remote fob with 40-bit code controller chip

• Interacts with a free downloadable app

•  Doubles as a digital time display and alarm clock

•  Accurate, fast and easy to use proximity locating sensor if misplaced

•  Five colors to choose from

•  Rechargeable Li-poly battery

•  Handy bottle opening tool

•  Strong aluminium body

 

 

 

Measurements

 

 

FAQs

 

WHAT DOES OLLKĒ DO?

Ollkē is a compact device that easily fits in your pocket or handbag. It can carry five physical keys and can be programmed with three electronic access cards. It boasts up to 128GB of wireless storage, an alarm clock plus you can copy your vehicle key remote to it too.

 

HOW DOES OLLKĒ ACCESS CARD FUNCTION WORK?

Ollkē has state-of-the-art built-in electronic chip and receiver. All you have to do is copy the access card to the device, store it, and then use it exactly the same way as a regular RFID or NFC access card. Keep them all safe and personal to you via the fingerprint scanner.

 

HOW DOES OLLKĒ VEHICLE REMOTE FUNCTION WORK?

Simply copy your vehicle remote to Ollkē via the secure receiver chip. Store and save the signal, then just use your Ollkē instead of the original. Don’t worry, the process is safe and can only be done with your permission.

 

HOW DOES OLLKĒ WIRELESS STORAGE FUNCTION WORK?

Connect Ollkē to the same WiFi network as your computer on and the drive will be mounted automatically. You can also access the files by connecting the device to computer via micro USB cable.

 

DOES OLLKĒ WIRELESS STORAGE WORK WITH ANY COMPUTER?

Yes, it is compatible with both Apple and Windows computers.

 

WHAT ARE THE SECUIRTY FUNCTIONS OF OLLKĒ?

We value security highly and have integrated a number of features to make Ollkē as safe as possible:

  • RFID access cards are copied only by touching them directly onto Ollkē, never from a distance
  • For security reasons the copying process takes place in multiple stages to ensure that nobody can simply copy your vehicle key or access card without your knowledge.
  • Secure Touch ID fingerprint scanning technology only allows the user to access their own data

 

WILL IT BE LIKELY USED BY CRIMINALS TO DUPLICATE PROXIMITY CARDS & VEHICLE REMOTES?

It has certified low frequency, doesn't have any distance to copy remotely. Plus, it require multiple stages for the copy process to happen. There is no way that someone can copy on the move.

 

IF YOU LEAVE YOUR KEYS/CARDS SOMEWHERE, IT COULD APPARENTLY BE COPIED THERE?

No that can't happen, it has touch ID. If your finger moved away from the device, all wireless functions will turn off.

 

DOES IT HAVE A BATTERY?

Ollkē functions with a rechargeable Lithium polymer battery and charges via a micro USB cable. The battery can last for up to a week before it needs to be recharged again, depending on usage.

 

HOW EASY IS IT TO SET-UP OLLKĒ?

To configure Ollkē all you need to do is download the app, set-up the function you desire and then sync it with the device. It’s so simple that anyone can use it!

 

HOW CAN I CONTROL OLLKĒ?

Ollkē has an OLED touchscreen for easy use and it is controllable directly from the app on your smartphone.

 

WHAT LANGUAGES DOES OLLKĒ OFFER?

Ollkē will be available in English, French, Spanish, Italian, Portuguese, Polish and Russian. Chinese and Japanese will come via firmware and app update later.

 

HOW MANY COLOURS DOES OLLKĒ COME IN?

Ollkē will be produced in five distinctive Black, Silver, Metallic Blue, Metallic Red and Gold. We will be introducing more in the future.

 

HOW MUCH DOES THE APP COST?

The app will be free of charge.

 

WHICH SMARTPHONES SUPPORT OLLKĒ APP?

Ollkē app is supported on Apple iOS 8 and higher, as well as Android 5 devices or higher which support Bluetooth 4.0.

 

HOW MANY PHONES CAN I CONNECT WITH OLLKĒ?

Security is the number one priority for us so we have made Ollkē connectable with only one device, and one fingerprint, at a time. If you want to connect another smartphone, then you will have to reset Ollkē and set up the device again.

 

HOW OLLKĒ WILL NOTIFY ME?

Ollkē will notify you via your smartphone if the Bluetooth signal is lost, indicating that you are leaving the device behind. It will notify you when the battery is low and also if you’ve set an alarm clock.

 

WILL THERE BE CONTINUED SUPPORT/UPDATES FOR THE APP?

Yes! We will continue our work on Ollkē to bring you more and more integration features and support.

 

WILL THE PRODUCT BE ON THE MARKET AFTER THE CAMPAIGN IS OVER?

Ollkē will be available on the market in Q1 of 2018.

 

DO YOU HAVE A WARRANTY?

Ollkē will come with 1 year warranty.

 

I WANT TO BECOME A DISTRIBUTOR. WHO SHOULD I CONTACT?

We’re happy to hear that! Please contact us at info@ollke.com

 

 

PLEASE DO NOT HESITATE TO ASK US

CHAT WITH US

 

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT! 

If you like it, Please SHARE IT and spread the word.

FACEBOOK

TWITTER

INSTAGRAM

Let us create the next BIG THING!

It’s so simple that anyone can use it! HOW CAN I CONTROL OLLKĒ?Ollkē has an OLED touchscreen for easy use and it is controllable directly from the app on your smartphone. WHAT LANGUAGES DOES OLLKĒ OFFER?Ollkē will be available in English, French, Spanish, Italian, Portuguese, Polish and Russian. Chinese and Japanese will come via firmware and app update later. HOW MANY COLOURS DOES OLLKĒ COME IN?Ollkē will be produced in five distinctive Black, Silver, Metallic Blue, Metallic Red and Gold. We will be introducing more in the future. HOW MUCH DOES THE APP COST?The app will be free of charge. WHICH SMARTPHONES SUPPORT OLLKĒ APP?Ollkē app is supported on Apple iOS 8 and higher, as well as Android 5 devices or higher which support Bluetooth 4.0. HOW MANY PHONES CAN I CONNECT WITH OLLKĒ?Security is the number one priority for us so we have made Ollkē connectable with only one device, and one fingerprint, at a time. If you want to connect another smartphone, then you will have to reset Ollkē and set up the device again. HOW OLLKĒ WILL NOTIFY ME?Ollkē will notify you via your smartphone if the Bluetooth signal is lost, indicating that you are leaving the device behind. It will notify you when the battery is low and also if you’ve set an alarm clock. WILL THERE BE CONTINUED SUPPORT/UPDATES FOR THE APP?Yes! We will continue our work on Ollkē to bring you more and more integration features and support. WILL THE PRODUCT BE ON THE MARKET AFTER THE CAMPAIGN IS OVER?Ollkē will be available on the market in Q1 of 2018. DO YOU HAVE A WARRANTY?Ollkē will come with 1 year warranty. I WANT TO BECOME A DISTRIBUTOR. WHO SHOULD I CONTACT?We’re happy to hear that! Please contact us at info@ollke.com  PLEASE DO NOT HESITATE TO ASK USCHAT WITH US THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT! If you like it, Please SHARE IT and spread the word.FACEBOOKTWITTERINSTAGRAMLet us create the next BIG THING!

story:
Problem:

When you think of an iPhone case: 

  • do the words classy, elegant or sophisticated come to your mind?
  • what is more important for you, looks or protection of your iPhone?
  • can you make out the difference between real leather and fake leather?

Solution:

We are proud to present a unique combination of 100% genuine leather and felt material, in a minimalist and timeless design, to enhance the beauty of your iPhone and simultaneously provide amazing protection. 

Material: 

  • Outer: 100% genuine leather (premium quality, vegetable tanned) on the back

 

  • Inner: Soft, gray color felt

Felt is a textile material that is produced by matting, condensing and pressing fibers together.

 

Shell: 

  • Made of poly-carbonate hard plastic
  • Provide amazing protection & not easily breakable
  • Smooth cut-outs for easy access of buttons, camera and ports

 

Models available (in first production run)*:  

  1. iPhone 6 / 6s (with & without logo cut)  
  2. iPhone 7 / 8  
  3. iPhone 7 Plus / 8 Plus  
  4. iPhone X (with & without logo cut)  

*We will add more models (all new iPhone models & few Android phone models as well) in future, subjected to demand and funding.

 

Colors available (in first production run)*: 

*We will add more colors (dark blue, dark brown etc.) in future, subjected to demand and funding.

 

 

Genuine Leather Disclaimer: 

Real leather is a natural product produced as a byproduct from animal hides and therefore differs from hide to hide. Variations in the texture of the leather should not be considered a fault but inherent of the natural beauty and uniqueness of the leather. As every piece of leather is different and may accept color dyes a little differently during the tanning process, this may cause irregularities in the consistency and depth of the color. Leather will always have natural marking such as dents, scars, scratches, wrinkles or blemishes. These natural markings or irregularities should not be considered as a defect but rather indications of genuine leather. We only use premium quality leather sourced from India and do not compromise on getting the finest selection of leather.

 

Usage Guidelines:

If used with care, leather is meant to last forever. For long lasting use, protect your case from getting wet and prolonged exposure to direct sunlight and heat.

story:
Aaron and Ken opened QuikFix Tech Repair in Toledo on August 5th of 2019. Since then, QuikFix Tech Repair has been building a strong reputation as the honest and top-quality tech repair shop in Toledo, even being a finalist in the annual 'Best of Toledo' competition only a few months after opening!

The arrival of COVID-19 has put a strain on the small businesses of the world, and QuikFix is one of them.

If you are fortunate enough to not be financially strained during this hard time, please consider donating to help QuikFix pay the bills!

There is no amount too small to help!

If you donate $100 of more, Aaron or Ken will replace the battery in your smart phone for free and back it with a lifetime warranty!

*storefront service
*will travel up to 1-hour from store
*mail-in accepted

story:
A water waste reduction system in the palm of your hand

As we know the greatest legacy of our planet is water, an essential element in the life of all living beings.

It’s our responsibility as major users of this vital resource, do our part to ensure it, and a good way to start this is by reducing water waste

So with this in mind we introduce: Nemo.

Nemo is an easy installation water waste reduction system, it's ideal to monitor water flow of homes or residential and commercial buildings.

With nemo you'll have all water flow data to monitor, from several sources as you want:

  • taps 
  • showers
  • sprinklers
  • or other generic water flow. 

What Nemo can do?

Well, currently Nemo is a prototype and works installed along the water flow you want to measure.

Using sensors, Nemo capture the water flow data, then these data are transferred by Wi-Fi directly to the application installed on your device, which then processes the information and displays the result in the palm of your hand.

Also, if you want, this data can be sent to the Nemo server (needs an internet connection), that will make more accurate calculations, providing you reports for a variety of functions, ranging from a more accurate water waste reduction report, to a functionality to create economic goals to avoid more waste, saving your water and money.

What you can do with Nemo?

First of all, this is a way to reduce water waste and make a better planet, but besides it with nemo installed on your water flow system, you can easily:

  • Ensure that your water bill stay within budget
    You can follow on your mobile device screen all water volume that was consumed until this moment.
     
  • Create a shared water system without break any walls to install
    If you live in a condo, or somewhere with shared water system, you and your neighbours can install Nemo in each apartment to ensure a fair water bill division, paying what consumed
  • Ensure that no exists any leak in your water system
    An unknown water leak can take several days to be found, and depending of size of this leak and the time that this issue was unresolved, a building structure can become corrupted.

    As each Nemo piece has an ID, what make it easy to identify any unexpected event on your mobile device screen, if a catastrophic leak occurs, Nemo will alert you by App, email, WhatsApp and SMS text message indicating how much water was lost.​
     
  • Measures water flow in real time conserve water
    With your Nemo app installed in your device, you can measure your water consumed in real time for any source you want.

Project timeline

Our participation in Campus Party - Brazil 2016

thanks to freepik.com for drop logo design.

story:
CONTACT

Media, Investors, Updates

https://www.facebook.com/iNyxBed/

 

 iNyx - World's most advanced, futuristic bed. 

 

            

           

  iNyx: One of the world's most                             technologically advanced bed. 

iNyx bed is more like a self-contained bedroom. It comes with blinds that you can close to provide better sleeping conditions. It has a built-in lighting system, sound system, and a projector to watch movies in HD quality, play games or surf the web. And these are just a few of the multitude of iNyx features.

 

Hi-tech yet comfortable

Sleep - it's one of the things that we just can't seem to get enough of these days. Your bed should feel like the ultimate sanctuary and make you happy every time you get into it. King size of iNyx and its features, such as blinds, will guarantee an ultra-comfortable sleep environment for you.

 

iNYX  FEATURES

1. Built-in retractable privacy blinds. You can cover the bed from all sides if you wish. They will shade you from the Sun, artificial light, provide intimacy if needed, or cinema-like conditions.

2. Built-in projector to watch movies, play video games, surf the Web, or work on your computer. You can also easily install your own projector or upgrade iNyx with the newest projector models available, as the time passes.

3. Built-in 5 point sound system.

4. Built-in LED lights. You can choose the colour between ambient red, blue, or white light.

5. Huge home theatre screen sliding down to the foot of the bed. By covering the bed from all sides and projecting a movie, you will have a cinema-like experience.

6. Drink holders where you can safely put drinks like coffee, juice, champagne, or other items.

7. Light system under and above the bed. Use it to create your own light show or set a sensual mood.

8. Easy to assemble and disassemble. Thanks to iNyx design, you can easily fit it into rooms with small door frames or move it to various localizations.

9. Elegant futuristic design.

10. King size bed dimensions (mattress size: 180 cm x 200 cm or 

193 cm × 203 cm (76x80 inches) -US (for testers no mattress will be included)*

11. Thanks to the blinds system iNyx provides high degree of privacy even when you share your bedroom with someone else (roommate, young child).

12. The entire bed can be customised according to your needs and wishes.

13. iNyx has also a built-in aroma dispenser system.

14. Therapeutic LED lighting mode that mimics the night sky. The ceiling of the iNyx is sprinkled with LED lights that look exactly like a peaceful blanket of stars.

The LED lighting feature along with your favourite relaxing music from the built-in sound system and the aromatic smells create ideal conditions in your bedroom before going to sleep.

Shape, size, and distribution of light points can be changed.

15. Detachable roof. iNyx is designed in such a way that you can easily detach and reattach the roof every time you want.

16. Chrome finishing transforms iNyx into a small work of art. 

You can customise iNyx even after purchasing it. For example: buy and use different versions of blinds, or change the lighting system colours by changing the LED bulbs models.

 

FAQ (Frequently Asked Questions)

 

Where and when I can purchase iNyx system/bed?

Follow our Facebook fanpage to be updated on this subject

https://www.facebook.com/iNyxBed/

 

For updates and news follow us on Facebook 

https://www.facebook.com/iNyxBed/

 

CONTACT

Media, Investors

https://www.facebook.com/iNyxBed/

story:
Switch in one second, applicable to all kinds of chargers and power sources!
 

The safe-lock hook, a unique design to secure solid connection!

 

Our factory partner is an MFi licensed manufacturer. So the Thunder-C Lightning plug is produced 100% following the MFi specification. We’d be delighted to explain more details which have never been disclosed.

Besides the Lightning connector, our certified C48 includes a piece of PCB and an official IC with a unique SID, which together make you get rid of your worry about what you often see “not certified” on other iPhones.

In order to enable a certified Lightning plug to resist up to 100N bending force, C48 needs to be entirely wrapped up by a tagger, and after it being laser welded, it takes a two-time molding process to strengthen and form the plug.

Usually a 1M Lightning cable uses a 24AWG wire, but we advance the wire 3 grades to 21AWG, which enables Thunder-C Lightning cable to support 2.4A charge even when it is up to 1.5M long.

There’s a 5.1 kΩ resistance inside the USB-A+USB-C Thunder-C plug, which restricts the output up to 1.5A current Max. so as to prevent any permanent damage from a greater current demand from the other end when it is plugged into the SmartPhone (or NB).

In addition to Thunder-C Lightning cable, we have developed another 4-in-1 Thunder-C cable, including microUSB, USB-A, & two USB-C plugs, supporting all kinds of power sources and all kinds of portable devices other than iPhone.

No matter how many portable devices you have, the Superpower Pack helps you get rid of all the crap always!

You will be amazed by the further application of the 4-in-1 Thunder-C cable when it comes to emergency situation, you can even use the 4-in-1 cable to charge MacBook by an Android phone or a common phone charger.

Support Fast Charge Technology

Because of the upgraded 21AWG wire, both of 4-in-1 Thunder-C & 2-in-1 Type-B Thunder-C cables they are all compatible with fast charge technology including Qualcomm QC 2.0/ 3.0 and Mediatek Pump Express. For your friends or family members who are not iPhone users.

It takes more than 3 years from Orobis Transform to Thunder-C. In fact, the current environment in Taiwan is not fertile for a startup company, particularly for a hardware one. Apart from this, because of the 4 specialized connectors, the development cost of Thunder-C is much higher than that of other cable products. Yet we persist and have accomplished the task.

Specialized connectors: These are the key components of Single Hand Switch hybrid plug, produced by four sets of specialized connector molds.

Yes! The plastic cases of all of the Thunder-C samples you’ve seen are produced by these molds, they are not mockup samples!

These molds reinforce the USB-C adaptors, keeping them strong and sturdy.

Unlike the cheap product, the Type-C connector of Thunder-C is of high quality.

Different from the Lightning plug able to resist up to 100N bending force specified by Apple, the Thunder-C plug, due to a different structure, can resist up to 85N bending force, which is based on the USB Association specification.

Although the current extraction force of our USB-A plug has reached USB Association specification, but we found that many USB ports have become much looser than original state. Therefore, we decided to add the two windows back for our USB-A plug. This change will make our USB-A plug as tight as conventional USB-A plug, and this change is already under processing. So, the Thunder-C you'll get will be this new version.

Not yet! We don’t know why Apple hasn’t started any application for the certification of the Lightning cable with a USB-C plug. This makes Thunder-C Lightning cable unable to be marked as an MFi product to sell in the retail market yet. In fact, this is exactly the reason why we’re here. Perhaps we have to wait for a few months. We need your support to help us get through the last winter. Even more, we believe that your support shown on Indiegogo might be another thrust for the MFi certification.

Nonetheless, the Thunder-C Lightning cable you get is equal to an MFi certified cable. It’s endurable and high quality, and “not certified” shall never appear on your iPhone.

Please share our story with your friends; each of your buzz will be a huge power to help speed up the birth of MFi marked Thunder-C!

story:
After doing some extensive research into the prevention of credit card skimming, I now want to keep my self and others around me protected. 

One of the most logical solutions would be to use some kind of RFID card scrambler like the one featured in the YouTube video. I found, (in my opinion) the best RFID card available here in Australia. It retails for $40 AUD. 

I contacted the company that holds the Australia Patents and we negotiated a deal. One that would allow me to mass produce a batch of these cards which will carry the Australian Patents and Certified to Australian Standards.

The card will be branded "Tutis CCS". Tutis is latin for the word "Protected". "Tutis CCS" stands for "Protected Credit Card Security."

In order to help me achieve my goal, we need your help.

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

We need to produce a batch of 10,000 cards to get it started. For every member that funds us $25 to contribute towards this cause, we will send you your very own "Tutis CCS" branded RFID card. If we are unable to reach our goal of $250,000 (which is 10,000 cards x $25), we will still proceed with the production of these RFID cards and every member that funded us $25 will still receive their very own "Tutis CCS"branded RFID card.

How does it protect my credit card?

E-Field is an auto-response electronic field, which is triggered by the signals used to detect and steal information stored on credit and debit cards. E-Field creates a protective perimeter around cards the second they become vulnerable.
Card details are stored on RFID chips, which can be breached, from a distance of up to 20mt, using an RFID scanner. E-Field is the technology that blocks the threatening signals dispersed by scanning devices.

Everyone should protect their cards and identities as once compromised it can have lifelong repercussions. Companies that provide employees with Corporate cards should also supply each one with a reputable RFID card to minimise risk and the huge burden of administration and recovery of funds and assisting stranded employees when cards are cancelled.

Thank you for taking the time to read our venture. Even if you are unable to donate, there are other ways you can contribute, such as sharing this post to all your friends through social media.

 

From the Jase Phoenix & Associates Team

ABN 52 615 576 595

 

Disclaimer: Jase Phoenix & Associates Pty Ltd, Tutis CCS, its parent and associated companies including any retailers stocking the Tutis CCS RFID Card whether online or in store are not liable for any identity theft that you may incur as a result of electronic skimming.

After doing some extensive research into the prevention of credit card skimming, I now want to keep my self and others around me protected. 
One of the most logical solutions would be to use some kind of RFID card scrambler like the one featured in the YouTube video. I found, (in my opinion) the best RFID card available here in Australia. It retails for $40 AUD. 
I contacted the company that holds the Australia Patents and we negotiated a deal. One that would allow me to mass produce a batch of these cards which will carry the Australian Patents and Certified to Australian Standards.
The card will be branded "Tutis CCS". Tutis is latin for the word "Protected". "Tutis CCS" stands for "Protected Credit Card Security."
In order to help me achieve my goal, we need your help.
 
What We Need & What You Get
 
We need to produce a batch of 10,000 cards to get it started. For every member that funds us $25 to contribute towards this cause, we will send you your very own "Tutis CCS" branded RFID card. If we are unable to reach our goal of $250,000 (which is 10,000 cards x $25), we will still proceed with the production of these RFID cards and every member that funded us $25 will still receive their very own "Tutis CCS"branded RFID card.
How does it protect my credit card?
E-Field is an auto-response electronic field, which is triggered by the signals used to detect and steal information stored on credit and debit cards. E-Field creates a protective perimeter around cards the second they become vulnerable.Card details are stored on RFID chips, which can be breached, from a distance of up to 20mt, using an RFID scanner. E-Field is the technology that blocks the threatening signals dispersed by scanning devices.
Everyone should protect their cards and identities as once compromised it can have lifelong repercussions. Companies that provide employees with Corporate cards should also supply each one with a reputable RFID card to minimise risk and the huge burden of administration and recovery of funds and assisting stranded employees when cards are cancelled.
Thank you for taking the time to read our venture. Even if you are unable to donate, there are other ways you can contribute, such as sharing this post to all your friends through social media.
 
From the Jase Phoenix & Associates Team
ABN 52 615 576 595
 
Disclaimer: Jase Phoenix & Associates Pty Ltd, Tutis CCS, its parent and associated companies including any retailers stocking the Tutis CCS RFID Card whether online or in store are not liable for any identity theft that you may incur as a result of electronic skimming.

story:
What and who is Kweli Wireless?

A wise man once said, "when GOD created the universe that destroyed the impossible"!With your help we can do, together, what appears to be "the impossible".  

The North American Wireless Industry is a $300 Billion a year industry. There is little to no diversity in American wireless provider ownership. The inner city residents spend billions of dollars every year in America on wireless products and services, but the wireless industry, like most other industries in America, invest very little to no money back into our communities. Our communities have been a target for economic predatory behavior for decades. Corporations have systematically plotted to extract the wealth and resources from the inner cities to enrich themselves and their shareholders with much success. Kweli Wireless wants to plug that diversity gap and redirect those lost resources back into our communities.    

With your help we can build a billion dollar company that would help create our own jobs and business, build our own schools and hospitals, buy our own land, cleanup and secure our own streets. 

Today wireless services is an everyday part of life. Mobile, phone services, home security monitor services, broadcasting, wireless remote controls and much much more! These are services that we use  everyday. We promise that we will offer fair and competitive pricing with no gimmicks or fine print. We promise to have clear and transparent billing. We promise that we will provide first class customer service. We promise to have an aggressive approach to the redevelopment of our communities for as long as it takes.

We are asking you to donate as much as you can to help us reach our goal. With your support we will be able to go live in May 2017. 

Some of our community objectives:

  1. Create jobs in low income communities
  2. Builds affordable homes in low income communities
  3. Stimulate business growth in low income communities
  4. Build and fund schools of science and engineering, hospitals, manufacturing and other needed infrastructure development in low income communities
  5. Help to create and fund a security apparatus in low income communities
  6. Promote the circulation of black, brown and native dollars

 

What we need the money for:

1) Federal authorizations and licensing

2) Network infrastructure agreements

3) Product development

4) Staffing

5) Software development for a seamless customer experience

6) Marketing

7) Product & service launch in May 2017

 

What are the capabilities of a wireless service provider?

A wireless service provider can provide:

  1. Mobile Voice Services
  2. Short Messaging and Enterprise Messaging
  3. Mobile Data Connectivity
  4. WLAN Data Connectivity
  5. Hosted Mobile Applications
  6. M2M Solutions for Mobile Computing
  7. Smart Grid Divices
  8. Home Security Monitoring
  9. Vehicle Telematics 
  10. “Internet of Things” (IoT)

 

Competitors:

  1. Boost Mobile                
  2. Straight Talk
  3. Virgin Mobile
  4. Metro PCS
  5. Cricket Wireless
  6. US Cellular              $3.3BN  Yearly Earnings   5 Million wireless connections
  7. T-Mobile                  $24 BN Yearly Earnings    63.2 Million wireless connections
  8. Sprint                       $26 BN  Yearly Earnings   59 Million wireless connections
  9. Verizon                    $70 BN  Yearly Earnings   141 Million wireless connections
  10. AT&T                      $60 BN  Yearly Earnings   129 Million wireless connections

 

Our target market:

1) Black Community:   Population 43 million

2) Latino Community:  Population 50 million

3) Native Community:  Population 3 million

4) Pop Culture

5) White friends and others

 

Business Opportunities

1) Dealer Franchise (Brick & Mortar)

2) Affiliate Programs

 

Kweli Wireless is a different type of service provider! 

  •     100% Black Owned
  •     100% committed to investing in our communities to make them decent and safe places to live
  •     100% committed to simulating business development in our communities
  •     Offer competative but fair pricing
  •     The Service Provider For The People!

With your help we can deliver a little shock and awe to the wireless industry.  There are 50 million Latinos and 43 million black people in American. With these numbers our potential market share is enormous, but when you add in the influence of pop culture, the 2017 "wireless provider landscape" could look drastically different than what is is today! The is history waiting to be claimed!!

 

The Impact

Imagine a world where our communities are safe and prosperous. Imagine a community where our children never went hungry and had the best education. If our communities had a steady flow of economic resources that was aim at combating poverty, literacy, wealth building, community safety, housing, homelessness, education, health, wellness and manufacturing, that would be a place to love and live. With the bless of GOD, Kweli Wireless intends to address all of our community ailments systematically and fight like hell to create a better place for our families. Your donation will help us push towards a productive community that can and will be able to do for self!

story:
Cables are commonly used in daily life, and what's the worst experience  you'd ever had? Right, it's when you want to charge your phone/laptop,  it's broken. Most cables are easily broken, and you have to buy new  cables again and again and again. 

C-Stand is a smart electroluminescent charger cable with fast charging  & stand-up design. It uses a independent chip to achieve smart  control of real-time current. Reduce damage to the batteries of device. 

 

C-Stand is the world's most innovative cable with incredible features:

  • Electroluminescent Visible Current Charge 
  • 60° Stand-up design
  • 2.4A Fast Charging
  • Smart Charging(automatically adjust the current rate according to different device and power status)
  • Most eco-friendly USB Cable ever
  • Built-in security chip for a carefree experience
  • PVC material and Extended reinforcement design 
  • All Two types of cable, support different devices

C-Stand are electroluminescent charge and sync cables that use visible  current technology to show the rate at which your device is charging.  

Visible current technology

 

C-Stand can automatically adjust the current rate according to different  device and power status. When your device is power hungry, the current  will move quickly, When your device is almost fully charged, it will  slow down,When your device is fully charged, the light will shut off. 

Fast and slow charging

The cable supports power delivery up to 5V 2.4A, providing fast charging for your Phone.  

 

 

Never have to worry about breaking your USB cable anymore.  

L-shaped design

The angle between the phone and the desktop is close to 60 degrees, so you can watch the video anytime, anywhere. 

C-Stand has two types of USB-C and Lightning cables, and has been certified by CNAS. 

Certified by CNAS

The C-Stand cable is made of pure copper wire core, and the data transmission performance is up to 480Mb/s. The length is 1M(3ft). The  outer material is TPE transparent material and crystal light  transmission tube, and the line. 

 

The connection between the charging head and the wire is made of black PVC material. The extended design to avoid the cable breakage.  

Due to the smart chip, the USB interface appears to be longer than other cables.

story:
The world’s first mobile App that protect your mobile identity on the internet while surfing or just chat to friends.  

   Total Privacy, Security, Control!


  WARNING: If you use WhatsApp your personal data is at RISK  

Your mobile is invisible to the world, no matter what webpages you visit - no more blocked webpages outside your country, Nativ takes care of it.



Nativ is an Instant Messaging service with a TWIST. It has been developed by a team of technical junkies and visionaries, brought together in Malta in the EU from the UK, South Africa, Australia and Sweden.  

Our goal is straight forward: we want to protect people's privacy while they communicate or visit the internet on their mobile devices, from the tracking and stalking which is currently the order of the day by social networks, search engines and marketing companies. 

The nightmare experience of a friend looking for a job:

Danny want to change jobs and did what we all do - search for jobs on the internet job sites.  He applied for a number and after a few weeks got the job he was looking for.  Celebration time.  Well, that was short lived; he kept getting emails of jobs available, 24x7 a day even from place he did register with.  Opt-out and unsubscribe had no impact at all to the pint he decided to change email address.  Is that familiar?
 Over a beer he suggested, "Wouldn't be great if I can get all these offers when I am looking for a job, and when I got a job it stops instantly and when I need a job again in 2 years, the offers start again.  It feels like my life has been taken over by recruiters and now I get marketing emails from companies I never even heard of."

That is exactly what Nativ protect, your privacy:  Select recruitment firms when you need a job and get all the offers you need, when you found the perfect job, deselect recruitment forms and offers stop immediately - YOU ARE IN CONTROL and manage your privacy.  Danny knows that his email and contact details have been sold to other marketing firms and it will never stop - so he had to change contact details.

Join forces with us and together we will make the difference.  


We all feel like this - they call it Big Data


THE CONTROL IS WITH YOU, WHO WILL SEE YOU OR WHERE YOU LEAVE YOUR DIGITAL FOOTPRINT.

We believe that privacy and security is a fundamental right which must be protected at all costs. Changes to the internet to accommodate IoT (Internet of Things), makes us more vulnerable than ever before to lose our privacy once and for all, and with that, our right to freedom.  

Nativ protects your identity and makes your mobile device invisible to the world and thus limits your digital footprint.  Your mobile number, email or mobile IP/Mac address is not published or made visible at anytime while you explore cyberspace.


BEING THE INDIVIDUAL THAT YOU WANT TO BE IS A FUNDAMENTAL HUMAN RIGHT TO ALL PEOPLE OF THE WORLD! 


The basic Nativ messaging/VOIP is free and ad-free, where you the user choose who you connect and engage with, at anytime.  Befriend your friends with a single click and chat as much as you like or exchange photos and have conversations, retaining your privacy at all times. Messages are encrypted and safe and for your eyes ONLY.  

Configuration of brands and companies you want to engage with, is made easy by simply ticking on and off.  In other words, when you do not select a company, they cannot send you any messages, offers or any other promotional material - YOU ARE IN TOTAL CONTROL. No more unsolicited emails or text messages as your data is never revealed (mobile number, email address etc).

The enhanced Nativ service for mobile phone anonymity when surfing the internet and accessing websites, is subscription based, starting from $1.99 per month and blocks pop-ups, spam links, your history and enables cross-country access.  No more frustration caused by blocked access to a website because you are not in that country - visit and watch what you want at anytime. 

Nativ in the news!

 Hide-my-Mobile

  Nativ

 Privacy

  Protection

Privacy is Freedom


How will we use your money?

The first $80,000 will give us enough money to complete the development and deployment of messaging and VOIP on iPhone and Android. The development of the basic messaging and integrated display of webpages is complete and in Alpha testing.  This will allow us to introduce paid accounts from brands and companies (in the pipeline) after which the Nativ project will be self-sustaining.

However, we have a much bigger vision for Nativ, and we need your help to hire and expand our team. Below are some of our stretch goals:

We will build these features even if the targets are not met, but without additional funding, it will take us much longer. Additional funding will also allow us to build a stronger service that is more resilient and protection against hackers and virus attacks. With your support, we can make internet privacy on the mobile a reality again and protect freedom around the world.


We Would Like to Say THANK YOU!!!

PERKS:

We understand there is no "one-fit-all" service as each of us, as individuals, have different requirements.  Nativ have various packages and you will find one which fits your lifestyle.

  1. FREE Service - Bronze: All Nativ services including identity protection and unblocked websites access with 200MB of data transfer free.
  2. $1,99 pm - Silver: All Bronze services including identity protection and unblocked websites access with 5GB per month data transfer.
  3. $3,99 pm - Gold: All Bronze services including identity protection and unblocked websites access with 75GB per month data transfer.
  4. $5,99 pm - Platinum: All Bronze services including identity protection and unblocked websites access with UNLIMITED data transfer.
We value you contribution and your belief in privacy and spam free internet services and offer you the following:


REFERRALS:

Our contributors are key for us to be successful and tell people about us.  We like to show our appreciation for this by rewarding you with a FREE upgrade from the perk you chose for each referral as below.  Example: A Power User only need 3 referrals that take any package to upgrade free to a Believer package - that is huge.
We track referrals in Indiegogo from the sharing buttons on the top left of the campaign page. 


What does the Press say?

The debate and concerns about our privacy continues around the world and can't be ignored any longer. See the links below from a small sample.

 Belgium takes Facebook to court over privacy breaches and user tracking

 The Online Privacy Lie Is Unraveling

 Marketers Will Drool Over Facebook’s New Signup Ads That Auto-Fill Your Email Or Number

 Smartphone apps: Is your privacy protected?

 Facial Recognition Technology Is Secretly Tracking You, Everywhere





I have questions, how can I reach your team?

For questions related to the Indiegogo campaign, feel free to email us at info@nativcommunication.com or connect with us here. 

How will perks be matched to my Nativ account?

When we request you to download the Nativ App, your email address for registration will be matched with the email address you used to donate to our campaign. 

Make sure your registration email address matches the email you use when you donate on Indiegogo.

If you have any problems or questions, don't hesitate to contact us at support@nativcommunication.com.

Is Nativ Free?

Yes, Basic Nativ accounts will always be free for mobile users with additional packages for higher data users and in the future, virus protection.

Does using Nativ really mean no-one can read any of my IM's or see the sites I visited?

As a general principle, it is impossible to have 100% safety. Nativ does not keep any record of your IM's (you are the only one with a record until you erase it from your mobile) or internet history which can identify your mobile. 

How is Nativ funded so far?

So far, we have had funds from two partners in Nativ who funded the initial development. 

Is it possible to donate via PayPal?

Yes, we have enabled PayPal donations. 

$80,000 seems like a very small amount for a major messaging service and internet protection, how much money do you actually need?

$80,000 is the minimum which we need to get over the start line. When we achieve this, Nativ becomes self-funding to an extent,  and we can then develop the extra services, although this may be  a slower process.  However, if we have $600,000 we would easily be able to accomplish all of the objectives listed above.  Any additional funds above that will bring a whole new world to play,  such as direct commerce from the same message stream with all the privacy and security.

How will I know when to claim my perk or register?

We will notify you via the email address you used to donate here on Indiegogo, when you can register and download your application with the links to be used.  To ensure we provide you with the requested perk, you will also receive a "token" to enter upon registration that will enable the service according to your perk.

Further to the above we will update the campaign page with all this information and status updates to ensure you are being kept informed at all times.

If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us on info@nativcommunication.com.

When can I expect to get my perk?

We are creating something which is very new and challenging in the new internet era where everything is connected.  There will be many challenges (both technical and political) so we cannot guarantee that perks can be delivered on time, despite our best efforts. The service will be made commercially available in stages from September 2015.  Perks dependent on free months, will only start counting once the full service of the perk is available.

For example:  If block access is available from September 2015, then your free months start from October 2015 (the month following the available service).  This ensures that you are not losing any of your perk times.  The Basic features can be used by all, the moment it is made available.

We promise timely and transparent communications if our delivery schedule changes for any reason. 

Other than contributing, how can I help?

You can spread the word about Nativ to your friends. Privacy and Security is most effective if everybody uses it, and the more people who use the service, the better for all.

 Facial Recognition Technology Is Secretly Tracking You, Everywhere








I have questions, how can I reach your team?
For questions related to the Indiegogo campaign, feel free to email us at info@nativcommunication.com or connect with us here. 
How will perks be matched to my Nativ account?
When we request you to download the Nativ App, your email address for registration will be matched with the email address you used to donate to our campaign. 
Make sure your registration email address matches the email you use when you donate on Indiegogo.
If you have any problems or questions, don't hesitate to contact us at support@nativcommunication.com.
Is Nativ Free?
Yes, Basic Nativ accounts will always be free for mobile users with additional packages for higher data users and in the future, virus protection.
Does using Nativ really mean no-one can read any of my IM's or see the sites I visited?
As a general principle, it is impossible to have 100% safety. Nativ does not keep any record of your IM's (you are the only one with a record until you erase it from your mobile) or internet history which can identify your mobile. 
How is Nativ funded so far?
So far, we have had funds from two partners in Nativ who funded the initial development. 
Is it possible to donate via PayPal?
Yes, we have enabled PayPal donations. 
$80,000 seems like a very small amount for a major messaging service and internet protection, how much money do you actually need?
$80,000 is the minimum which we need to get over the start line. When we achieve this, Nativ becomes self-funding to an extent,  and we can then develop the extra services, although this may be  a slower process.  However, if we have $600,000 we would easily be able to accomplish all of the objectives listed above.  Any additional funds above that will bring a whole new world to play,  such as direct commerce from the same message stream with all the privacy and security.

How will I know when to claim my perk or register?
We will notify you via the email address you used to donate here on Indiegogo, when you can register and download your application with the links to be used.  To ensure we provide you with the requested perk, you will also receive a "token" to enter upon registration that will enable the service according to your perk.
Further to the above we will update the campaign page with all this information and status updates to ensure you are being kept informed at all times.
If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us on info@nativcommunication.com.
When can I expect to get my perk?
We are creating something which is very new and challenging in the new internet era where everything is connected.  There will be many challenges (both technical and political) so we cannot guarantee that perks can be delivered on time, despite our best efforts. The service will be made commercially available in stages from September 2015.  Perks dependent on free months, will only start counting once the full service of the perk is available.
For example:  If block access is available from September 2015, then your free months start from October 2015 (the month following the available service).  This ensures that you are not losing any of your perk times.  The Basic features can be used by all, the moment it is made available.
We promise timely and transparent communications if our delivery schedule changes for any reason. 
Other than contributing, how can I help?
You can spread the word about Nativ to your friends. Privacy and Security is most effective if everybody uses it, and the more people who use the service, the better for all.

story:
Flashlight Phone Charger with Sound for On The Go
Titan Channel Partners is proud to offer you a really unique device that not only will charge your phone, but will act like an extra pair of hands on the job.  Ever wish you had an extra hand to hold your phone or flashlight?  Now simply pair your phone with our device point the flashlight where you need it and start talking hands free.  Great for electricians, plumbers, technicians, contractors, carpenters and anyone that needs an extra hand on the job.  When you are done plug your phone into the USB port of the flashlight and recharge your phone.  Help us make this into a reality by supporting our campaign.  We need your support!  Choose from a variety of perks discounted for our loyal supporters.


Who we are and why we do this

Titan Channel Partners has over 50 years of combined experience.  Our team has been in the IT sector working with big box retailers, e-commerce and channel partners for over 25 years.  We have seen a major shift in the industry where the focus has changed from offering quality products for reasonable prices.  Retailers are only interested in squeezing the manufacturers until there is nothing left.  So we are going directly to you, the customer.  No more VCs, Angels, and promises.  We are offering our products directly to you the customer at a significant savings over what you would pay at the store or online.

Having worked years for named retailers and manufacturers we now have the opportunity to offer you a high quality product at a great price. 

Stay tuned for more exciting products from us and thank you for your support.  We hope you participate in this and other great offerings we plan on bringing to all our loyal supporters.

Ways to contribute and support

Even if you cannot financially support us right now, please share this link, email, and embed this link with you friends.  Follow us on Twitter, Facebook and other of your favorite sites.  If our team members recognize you as a loyal supporter they will notify us and you may receive a gift as a token of our appreciation.

However none of these great things can happen until we reach our goal.  So please help us reach out goal and bring you this and other products at a great price.

Frequently Asked Questions

Will it work with my phone?

Yes! Any mobile phone with a bluetooth option can pair with this device.  There is a LED on the device that will let you know when you device as paired successfully.

How long will the battery last?


How does it charge my phone?

There is a USB port on one end of the device that will allow you to plug your phone charging cable and begin charging your phone.

Can you listen to music and make phone calls?

Yes! you can stream your music to our device and take phone calls and use it like a speakerphone.  The speaker is much louder than your mobile phone's speaker.

What are the specifications?

1. Bluetooth Version: V2.1
2. Range: 3 meters
3. Microphone: Yes
4. Channels: 2
5. Total Power: 5W
6. Impedance: 16 ohms
7. Supports Music Format: MP3
8. Power Supply: Built-in Battery
9. Built-in Battery Capacity: 2600mAh
10. Product size: 15cm(L) x 3.5cm(W) x 3.5cm(H)


What accessories does it include?

story:
tl;dr

My wife and I started this project for kids who are scared of monsters and other scary things they might encounter.

Our goal will help us fund:

  • Production of our unique bears.
  • Smart sound boards to allow our bears to talk to your child.
  • Our in house designed flashlight into production.
  • Getting our bears into retail locations across the U.S.

/tl;dr


Who We Are

Hello, we’re Stacey & Martha Miller and we came up with The Protector Bears (Well, more like she did, I just brought the snacks). As parents of five children, we have experienced a lot of sleepless nights. Most of those coming from one (or two or three) of our kids being too scared to sleep by themselves. Then one day, we had a brilliant idea (OK OK, she had a brilliant idea), why not have a teddy bear go to a school to learn how to protect children when they sleep? That’s when we founded Tough Teddy Academy™ and The Protector Bears™.

“A school for bears? Cool!” Yep and it’s only for bears who want to protect children. No lazy bears here! Once a bear has completed their training, they become official Protector Bears™. They will receive a Certificate of Graduation, complete with their name and when they graduated! They also receive a Safety Flashlight (Used to scare off monsters that are planning a sneak attack) and a bracelet for your child that matches the Protector Bears necklace, forever linking them together.

“OK, that sounds good, but does it work?” Yes, it really does work! We have sold hundreds around our local area here, including to friends and family and the feedback we constantly receive is how great the bears are and how their child is no longer afraid to sleep by themselves!

“I’m sold, what do you need from me?” We need your financial support as well as your help to spread the word about what we are doing. We have huge plans for our bears but can’t do them without you so please, anything you can do to help, we are truly grateful.


How we’ll use your money

Once we reach the end of our funding time (and hopefully we get fully funded by then), every single dollar will go to creating our unique bears. Currently, we use a prototype stand in bear (They are graduates of Tough Teddy Academy™ and can still kick monster butt!) and flashlight but we want to use our own design. In order to do this, we need place large orders.  We have the design of the bears already completed but the flashlight design we are leaving up to you (See Perks for more info)!

Our most important goal is to create a truly magical bear that helps your child overcome their fears. The more we raise the better our chances of achieving that.

Sold yet? If not, maybe one of our perks will help motivate you.



Contributor Perks

Let’s face it, perks work too which is why we have created some awesome perk packages for you. Want to have us give you a shout out on Facebook or Twitter? Done! How about getting your name posted on our Funders page on our website? Bam, it’s yours! Or, how about one of our limited quantity prototype bears? Don’t mention it, we’ve already set them to the side just for you.

We have many more perks too! Just see the sidebar to the right --->

Those perks not big enough for you? Well how about these standalone perks.


Standalone Perks

It’s time to roll out the big timers. These are standalone perks which mean they do not include all the perks above it, only the shoutout and getting listed on our Funders page are included. Don’t worry though, these perks are so ginormous they don’t need everything else to go with them.

Let’s start with getting your business listed on our Funders page. Your business’s support means a lot and we want to show everyone who visits our website just how much we appreciate it. Don’t have a business or want something BIGGER? How about getting to name your very own Protector Bear™? Or better yet, getting to name a brand new Protector Bear™ Agent that will be sold worldwide? Oh yea, did we mention your name will also be on the tag letting the world know you named that bear? There is a limit of 6 of these perks though so grab them quick!

Want more? Wow, you guys are tough! How about getting the very first Protector Bear™ Agent from our first run production series? The Graduation Certificates will be marked as the first graduating class and will have 000001 serial numbers (Indicating the very first bear of that line). We only have 6 of these available as well (3 boys, 3 girls) so grab them before they run out!

How about one more standalone perk. We have come up with a few designs of our Safety Flashlight, which is used to scare away scary monsters planning a sneak attack. However, what if YOU designed one for us? Don’t worry, if you don’t know how to draw just let us know how you want it to look and we’ll (Meaning me) sketch it up for you. When you give the OK, we’ll get them made and your name will be on the tag letting everyone know you designed this flashlight.


Other ways to help

Can’t contribute financially but still want to help? Share us on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, MySpace, Text, Snail Mail, Messenger Piegeons, Smoke Signals or whichever way you use to communicate. Please don’t burn down any forests sending smoke signals.

Friends are great, aren’t they? Let them know how great they are by asking them to contribute to us. I’m sure they will thank you with big hugs and food.

Have a question for us? Visit our website to send us an email.


Some Rules

Here are some ground rules to get us started. First, names must be appropriate. This includes your name as well as the name you give the bear (If you buy that perk). Flashlight Designs must also be appropriate. No adult type businesses will be listed on our website, this includes pornographic and those promoting hate.
