story:
Short Summary

JURNL was created after reviewing close to 1 million blogs on BlogCatalog a community of bloggers that we run and seeing how challenging it is for smaller to mid-sized bloggers & publishers to consistently create content. 

 JURNL offers unique features:

* Easiest way to create a community 

* Publish video, audio, text and Q&A in 2 clicks 

* Embed as a discussion forum on your existing site 

* Participation features - inviting people to contribute content and share 

Imagine having a community and being able to ask your members each day a question that they can answer with a video, image or post?  They  then answer, share and challenge the community themselves.

JURNL tools are focused on rewarding your members, encouraging them to create content,  share and invite others to join and create.  The best content gets voted up, best members end up on your leaderboard and can create more  questions, polls and contests, for others to answer with video, images and posts, creating a perfect symbiotic social loop

With JURNL your blog will be running in minutes and looks like: 



or with one click changes to look like this:



or with another click, looks like this: 



  • We know how challenging it is for a blogger to create content and gain exposure.   The largest sites have access to both paid writers and volunteers. Most small to mid-sized bloggers do not.  
  • The solution for small to mid-sized publishers is to build a community of writers.  Though this isn't easy.  That's where JURNL comes in.
  • JURNL makes it simple and worthwhile for writers to join and create content. This aspect of JURNL is and will always be critical because with community small to mid sized bloggers are able to create plenty of content and elevate their publications to be on par with content being created by the world's most popular sites.
  • Most of all JURNL will always be about making it fun, simple and providing publishers with creative ways to create professional looking content that engages both your community and audience.
          


What's Required  

  • We are seeking $25,000 to program the "engine" that creates JURNLs so that anyone that wants a JURNL can create one in minutes.
  • Over the last few months we have been installing JURNLs manually and with customer feedback improving them.  We are now excited to take the final step to launch and make JURNL available to the world. 

                                                           The Impact
  • Funding JURNL will enable us to automate the process of creating each JURNL so that it's self-serve and takes a JURNL user minutes to set up a beautiful publication. 
  • You contribution will make it possible for almost anyone to create a JURNL that costs $9 a month and looks, feels and has features found on the world's leading online publications. 

Risks & Challenges

The hurdle is taking the current JURNL code and developing the technology that with the click of a mouse creates a new instance of JURNL.  

  • Our team of developers has been working on the project for 3 months. They are talented and an experienced, creative group of developers and designers that have launched multiple large applications.  
  • We have a clear outcome for releasing the first version of JURNL and believe that by keeping things simple and clean we will create one of the most fun, and user friendly ways to build an online publication and  community.
  • The publishing industry has large companies including Wordpress & Tumblr. There is a risk that JURNL is seen in the same light as them.  The PR and marketing challenge will be to ensure that JURNL is first and foremost seen as social platform that enables JURNLists to build a community equipped with the best tools to easily create content, invite new members to join and participate and share what's being created.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    We appreciate all shares of this project with friends who enjoy writing, photography and/or creating videos. 

    Thank you for the time you took to read this.  We look forward to sharing JURNL with you.

    Please share JURNL using the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Hey there, my name is Billy Kittleman. I'm putting together a soccer field in San Antonio, TX. The field will measure 80ft x 35ft, so it will be perfect for small games of 3v3 and up to 5v5, making it super easy to find enough players to get a game started. 

Things I need to Start the Field:
200ft x 12ft Barrier Net: $350
Lighting Fixtures: $150
Fence Covers: $80
6x 16ft Posts for Barrier Net: $100
2x Soccer Goals: $120

If you'd like to check it out, you can swing by 1603 Guadalupe St., San Antonio TX 78207 anytime. I work next door from 3pm-10:45pm Mon-Sat and we can talk about the project, and if you're interested, find other ways that you could help be a part of it. Please help spread the word!! And if you've read this far, thank you!!!!

story:
INTRODUCING SNAP

Let's make charging easier! SNAP is a simple yet perfect solution to prevent frayed charging cables, tripping over cables resulting in smashed phones, pointless fiddling to plug in cables in the dark, water damage to Lightning ports, and much more! This innovative magnetic charging adapter will make your life just a bit more convenient.  


FEATURES

  • Magnetic fastening like MagSafe.

SNAP is a MagSafe-like charging adapter for iPhone. With the design concept of MagSafe for MacBook, fastening SNAP Converter and Adapter is just a snap way. This iPhone charging connection system is so easy and simple, it can be done with just one hand!

Just like the Lightning cable itself, SNAP Converter is reversible when charging iPhone. 

  • Cable protection.

SNAP protects cable connector heads from yanking, dramatically expanding cables' lifespans. 


  • No more plugging, just easily detaching.

Never plug and unplug again. SNAP protects the Lightning port from unnecessary friction and excessive wear. 

Dust and pocket lint can interfere with Lightning port connectivity. SNAP Adapter helps protect this port from these materials as well as from light water damage.



IN STOCK AND READY TO SHIP

Mass production is in progress and a batch of SNAP is already in stock. Delivery is 100% guaranteed. 


BEST QUALITY IN THE MARKET

Careful quality inspections are completed before shipment from the manufacturing facility and a one year warranty is included with every SNAP. And because we have already completed a production batch even before completion of this project, we are in the enviable position of being able to confirm the product's production quality before funding has been completed. 


TECH SPECS

Color options (left to right): Silver, Space grey, Gold.

Color options (up to down): Gold, Space grey, Silver.

Color options (up to down): Gold, Space grey, Silver.


FAQ

When do you start shipping?
Shipping will commence almost immediately after we receive your pledge.

Can data be transferred through SNAP?
No. SNAP only supports charging for iPhone.

Will the magnetic forces of SNAP damage the internal components of iPhone?
No. The magnetic field is negligibly small and cannot harm any iPhone components.

How do I know if SNAP is connected and charging my iPhone?
The screen of iPhone wakes up and shows a charging status icon when connection is made.

Will SNAP support Micro-USB or USB-C?
Please note that SNAP in this campaign is specifically for iPhone. It is currently NOT compatible with Micro-USB and USB-C. However, if this campaign is successful, Micro-USB or USB-C-compatible SNAP is definitely a possibility!

Can SNAP connect either side facing up?
Yes. SNAP allows you to connect either side facing up. Connect without thinking.

How firm will SNAP connect the Lightning cable to your iPhone?
It is important to understand that SNAP connects by magnetic force and not by friction. SNAP and your mobile device will likely separate when dangling iPhone from the SNAP-connected Lightning cable or by a forceful movement.

Why did you make an adapter instead of a cable?
If this campaign goes well, a fully integrated SNAP cable is definitely a possibility!

Will SNAP affect charging speeds?
SNAP does not enhance nor impede charging speeds. The exposed parts are nonconductive, so you also don’t have to worry about electric shocks.

What about Apple MFI certification?
Apple MFI certification is one of the things we’re currently looking into.

How much is shipping?
International shipping is already included.

Is it difficult to remove SNAP Converter from iPhone's Lightning port?
There is a narrow gap between SNAP Converter and iPhone, just big enough for your fingernail. So it both fits snuggly and is still able to be remove with just your fingers.


RISKS AND CHALLENGES

Since mass production of SNAP is already in progress, we can hardly list many risks and challenges for this project. Unlike other projects, we are shipping rewards/perks right after this campaign. Delivery of your rewards/perks is 100% guaranteed. The funding from this project allows us to go ahead with production to meet the demand of our backers.
story_txt:
INTRODUCING SNAPLet's make charging easier! SNAP is a simple yet perfect solution to prevent frayed charging cables, tripping over cables resulting in smashed phones, pointless fiddling to plug in cables in the dark, water damage to Lightning ports, and much more! This innovative magnetic charging adapter will make your life just a bit more convenient.  FEATURESMagnetic fastening like MagSafe.SNAP is a MagSafe-like charging adapter for iPhone. With the design concept of MagSafe for MacBook, fastening SNAP Converter and Adapter is just a snap way. This iPhone charging connection system is so easy and simple, it can be done with just one hand!Just like the Lightning cable itself, SNAP Converter is reversible when charging iPhone. Cable protection.SNAP protects cable connector heads from yanking, dramatically expanding cables' lifespans. No more plugging, just easily detaching.Never plug and unplug again. SNAP protects the Lightning port from unnecessary friction and excessive wear. Dust and pocket lint can interfere with Lightning port connectivity. SNAP Adapter helps protect this port from these materials as well as from light water damage.

IN STOCK AND READY TO SHIPMass production is in progress and a batch of SNAP is already in stock. Delivery is 100% guaranteed. 

BEST QUALITY IN THE MARKETCareful quality inspections are completed before shipment from the manufacturing facility and a one year warranty is included with every SNAP. And because we have already completed a production batch even before completion of this project, we are in the enviable position of being able to confirm the product's production quality before funding has been completed. TECH SPECS

story:
SenseC - First Multi-Length Dual Reversible Micro USB cable 



It all starts with a Good Cause.... 


There are more and more electronic devices that require a Micro USB cable for charging and for data transfer. From Our Android phones to Bluetooth speakers to our power bank and to basically every consumer electronics  ……… Imagine how many times you need to plug in a Micro USB cable everyday. 

HD Camera, Mini Wireless Router, Remote control, Wireless mouse .... you name it.

The traditional Micro USB cable are pain in the butt right now because both the USB head and  the Micro USB head are designed to be asymmetric, and there is more than 50% chance that every time you use them, you will plug in the wrong direction. Look at this... 




We run into Frustration like this many times a day. 



What if we can design the Micro USB head to be symmetric so that everyone can plug in the cable without even have to look and check every single time. 

We started our Creative Journey in searching for such a design and finally found our current manufacturing partner who can help us to realize the unique concept with a patented technology. 

This is the first cable product presented by the SuperSenseGroup  @SuperSenseGroup. We are a Team of Electrical Engineer, Designer, Manufacturing Expert, and most importantly we are all Gadget Enthusiasts.

We are in the process to Create a lot more "Sense" to the Consumer Hardware Market. And We called the new designed cable ----


The SenseC Reversible Micro USB Cable

With Proper cooperation with Licensed Chinese manufacturer, and working days and nights on building  ("Intimate" Personal Relationship) with manufacturer staff and agencies, we are able to finalize our design of a Micro USB cable that will take our concepts to the next level. We want to mass produce a Durable, Well-designed, Flip-free & Universal (Reversible) Micro USB cable that will cost no more than a fortune ! And We hope that by doing so, it will make the world a better place, well at least a more efficient place to be. 






1st thing on the Design List: 

REVERSIBLE Micro USB

 + REVERSIBLE USB

- Done! 

We secured the Innovative Reversible Micro USB design, We also confirmed that we are able to add in the Reversible USB head. Now Absolutely ZERO hustle/ attention required in using the SenseC cable. Now it make a lot more Sense!  




2nd on the list:    Nylon-Braided 

- Done!

Tangled-Free! No more messy annoying cable riddle. The Nylon-Braided SenseC add Extra strength to the cable core. The Internal copper wires will no longer be easily damaged when pulled by external force. 


              

                  


                 

                           




3rd on the list:  Gold Plated Heads + Aluminum Shell

- Done!

Gold-Plated Heads & Aluminum Shell to prevent oxidation and to reinforce the cable ends from loosen-out


           







4th on the list:    CUSTOMIZED Length !!!!!!  

                   !!! NEED YOUR SUPPORT !!! 

We want everyone to have the exact length of the SenseC cable they need !!!!  This is kind of an Ambitious Goal, and that's why we need your support! In order to do so, we need to negotiate with our partnering manufacturer, we MUST provide a committed quantity before they will help manufacturing Customized Length Cable for us !!  Please help us to build on the order quantity ! 


We are planning to offer these initial 8 customized length in Perks: 

5 cm ------ Charging from a Handheld Power Bank

10 cm ------ Plugging in your Laptop 

20 cm ------ Charging from Handbag or Pocket

50 cm ------ Connecting wallet outlet to desktop   

100 cm (1 m) ------ Normal standard Length

200 cm (2 m) ------ Long !

300 cm (3 m) ------ Even Longer !!

500 cm (5 m) ------ Longest MicroUSB cable EVER !!!


Support Us Now! We can start making the SenseC cable in Customized Length for every situation and every needs. We have negotiated with licensed manufacturer to offer at least 8 different length of SenseC Reversible Cable that normally are not available for small quantity. We might add more Length choices if there are enough quantity built up! 

                                              

                               Perks Starting at $5 !!




Project Timeline and Production Schedule 







Perks & Distribution Opportunity








COLORS !  COLORS ! 

                  Grey   |   Gold   |   Black   |   Silver

                          Color of your choice to match up with your favorite device! 



We are making the SenseC Reversible Cable affordable enough that you can place the cable wherever you need one: Kitchen, Bathroom, In-Car, Garage or even inside pocket of your Jacket !  Check out the Commuter's Perk

                                 


Reference to Cable Length:


This is How a  100 cm ( 1 Meter ) SenseC  looks like:

 

This is How a   200 cm ( 2 Meters ) SenseC looks like:



This is How a  300 cm ( 3 Meters ) Sense C looks like:


This is How a  500 cm ( 5 Meters ) Sense C  looks like:





SenseC Samples we have built :


4 Color SenseC 


Black SenseC 

Silver SenseC 

Grey SenseC 

Gold SenseC 



Super Early Bird - $5 for  1m SenseC, color of your choice ( Limited qty: 200 )

Early Bird - $6 for choice of 5cm  - 100cm (Limited qty: 500)

Early Bird - $7 for choice of 1m - 3m (Limited qty: 500)

Early Bird - $8 for 5m (Limited qty: 500)

Normal - $7 for choice of 5cm - 100cm

Normal - $8 for choice of 1m - 3m

Normal - $9 for 5m Super long

Commuter Pack - $75 for 10 units of  SenseC of any Length and color

Family Pack - $139 for 20 units of SenseC of any Length and color

Company Pack - $339 for 50 units of SenseC of any Length and color

story:
You will never lose touch with your friends! :)


TWO TYPES AVAILABLE:

everCharge SMART  16GB / 32GB/ 64 GB - with integrated FLASH MEMORY.
   Combines a small charger cable with synchronization function and flash memory      in one cool gadget.

everCharge ZERO - without FLASH MEMORY

   For those who just need a small handy charger cable.


Each of them is available with Lightning or MicroUSB connector.

Lightning for Apple production:

   - iPhone 5,  iPhone 5,  iPhone 5s,  iPhone 6,  iPhone 6 plus

   - iPad mini,  iPad mini 2,  iPad mini 3,  iPad Air 2,  iPad Air 3,  iPad with Retina                display

   - iPod touch 5th Generation  16GB / 32GB / 64GB,  iPod nano 7th  Generation

  MicroUSB for every mobile phone or tablet PC with MicroUSB

   - Android - Samsung Galaxy, HTC, LG, etc.

   - Windows Phone - All versions

   - Blackberry - All versions

Hi, friends!

My name is John. 

Just like you I every day using mobile phone. As you know it is necessary to regularly recharge.

Every day I use the flash memory, too – for my work information, photos, music records, videos etc. So I need the charger cable and flash memory. If they are two separate items, moreover it is not very convenient to use - cable can be long and unhandy, but separate flash memory could be sometimes even too small and therefore so easy to be lost. 

I tried to find a comfortable solution. I did not find anything suitable to buy.

Then I and my friend and colleague Nick created an electronic circuit for our own cables and made prototypes – small, flexible and light charger cables with integrated flash memory, incredible easy to use! 

This cable at the same time can perform three functions combined in one – to charge your phone, to work with flash memory and to perform data synchronization. Instead of two separate devices you can carry with you only one.

Especially handy is to listen recorded music and charge my phone in the car at the same time.

We also created a version without integrated flash memory – for those who need just a small charger cable.

We called them everCharge.

All our friends who saw these new charging cables are excited and also want to get some for herself! 

So we decided to make this World a little bit better and to start a mass production of these cables.  

Our motto is:  everCharge will charge you forever! 



DESIGN

Size kills!

everCharge ZERO  - Super small - 38 mm (1.5 inch) long and 7 mm (0.27 inch) thick.

everCharge SMART  16GB / 32GB / 64GB  - Just 65 mm (2.55 inch) long and 7 mm (0.27 inch) thick.



Available in 9 colors by your choice!

Improved magnetic lock makes it easy to add at key ring.*  
*Key ring is included in the price! 

everCharge is small and flexible

easy to use

wherever you go


FEATURES

1. Intended for Apple and Android devices 

2. Charging function

3. Build in flash memory (16GB/32GB/64GB)

4. Data synchronization and transmission function

5. Flexible and tangle free

6. Double magnetic technology

7. Available in 9 colors

8. Small and portable

9. Keyring included

10. Great price


PRICE

If you will support our project in INDIEGOGO you will receive  everCharge  for a SPECIAL PRICE!

You can get  everCharge  right at your home.* 
  * Free international shipping is included! 

YOUR HELP

People will always be a need for such good charging cables. We believe that everCharge is an awesome product and for mass production we need your help.

We have lots with discounts and special perks available to our Indiegogo backers, and we hope that together we can turn this product into a something special - that you are going to love!

If we don't reach our goal you will get a full refund.


PROJECT STATUS

All  everCharge  prototype samples are ready and tested (see photos).

Funding is needed for mass production:

   - prototype verification in the manufacturer`s company

   - purchase of raw materials

   - producting

   - product quality testing and inspection

   - packaging

   - shipping

We are ready to do it with your help!


TIMELINE




  • OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

  • If you like everCharge but does not want to buy it, please, contribute development of project by sharing information about it in family and with your friends in social networks!

  • Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/everCharge.mobi

  • Twitter: https://twitter.com/everCharge_mobi

  • Check out our website: http://www.evercharge.mobi


  • QUESTIONS

  • We`ll be glad to answer any of your questions!

  • info@evercharge.mobi

  • PERKS

refund.

   - purchase of raw materials
   - producting
   - product quality testing and inspection
   - packaging
   - shipping
We are ready to do it with your help!

TIMELINE






OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELPIf you like everCharge but does not want to buy it, please, contribute development of project by sharing information about it in family and with your friends in social networks!


Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/everCharge.mobi


Twitter: https://twitter.com/everCharge_mobi
Check out our website: http://www.evercharge.mobi

QUESTIONS
We`ll be glad to answer any of your questions!
info@evercharge.mobi
PERKS

story:
We make the World Best MyWatt Cloud 10 channel Wireless Smart Electricity Monitor for Home Energy Monitoring, Cost Calculation Display and Home Appliance Control from Smartphone.


From now on, every Home need MyWatt.  
We can save 15% world electricity energy consumption by using MyWatt.

Pay $100 for MyWatt (SEM3010A), you  can save 20% to 25% of  the monthly electricity bill and save the world from CO2 emission which damage the green world.
Your $100 investment will be pay back within a year. But you can use 10 years with MyWatt.  Your pay back will be 1000% or over.  

MyWatt Cloud is the most strongest  IoT (Internet of Things) product.
Pay $130 for MyWatt Cloud (SEM3110A), you can see your real time electricity graph up to 10 channels at anywhere in the world by smartphone. You can also control your home appliances whenever you needed. You can save the money and secure your home from the smartphone. You can monitor your home whenever you are abroad or vacation from the intruder.

Please introduce MyWatt to your neighbor, the world does not need anymore Atomic Power Plant.

http://smartwattmeter.com/index1.htm
Catalogue : http://smartwattmeter.com/catalog/sem3000EN.pdf


MyWatt SEM3000 Series has the following functions:

MyWatt is simple and easy to use tool that helps you become smarter about the way you use electricity. Find out in a few seconds how much your air conditioner and TV costs to run. Check out how much power your entire house and home appliances is using in real time up to 10 channels. Immediately displays any cost changes to the electricity being consumed by the home. Studies have shown that the average homeowner can stop waisting between 10% ~ 20% of their homes energy if they have an electricity monitor.  Wireless features allow the MyWatt to be displayed in any room of the house and also shows daily, weekly, monthly energy consumption and the cost  in real time. It also shows the real time percentage of monthly target. We can also on-off or timer control of home appliances by PC software or Web Cloud service by using MyWatt Cloud.  We have 2 different type wireless transmitters. (Clamp type CRT3000 and Plug-in type PIT3000/PIT3100)

MyWatt measures both household and industrial power usage by installing a current sensor where the electricity monitor is attached to. MyWatt transmit the measured power wirelessly to the receiver within 40m away and provide the instantaneous and the total electricity of daily/weekly/monthly data with the cost and graph display of the day and week power usage.  MyWattce may have  maximum 10 sensors attachments to enable the monitoring of 10 channels wirelessly. If the software is used in conjunction with a provided USB cable, it can graphically display the data of 1 hour/1 week/1 day/1 month/1 year periods. Additionally, if you buy MyWatt Cloud SEM3110 Monitor and connect LAN cable, it enables Cloud Service that can monitor 1 day, 1 week, 1 month, 1 year and 10 years by graphs from the website remotely for a maximum of 10 channels.
http://smartwattmeter.com

1)  10ch. Wireless power measurement device (a maximum distance of 40m)

2)  Permits monitoring of changing power rate and estimated electricity consumption as the home appliances are turned on or off

3)  Displays instantaneous electricity power and today/this week/this month/last 31days power usages and the cost.

4)  Displays the power consumption graph of today and this week.

5)  Permits the power consumption data logging for 3 years with  10 wireless sensors.

6)  As an option, the power monitoring is possible with optical sensor installed to a digital totalizer meter (under developement).

7)  As an option, 350A wireless power clamp installation available (to a maximum 150kW instantaneous power monitor)
8)  A free PC software enables the power graph of 1 hour/1 day/30 days/12 months/5 years

9)  An optional LAN gateway Model SEM3110 enables graphs of 1 day/1 week/1 month/1 year/10 years power consumption by Web Cloud display

10)  Monitoring CO2 emission and saved

11)  Permits entering of 6 step electricity tier rates or average rate for home and office and building

12)  Displays date, month, year, time and day of the week

13)  It displays the power consumed vs. target power consumption in percentage (%) to enable users to estimate and control the power consumption for the remaining day in 1 month.

14)  It provides the LCD alert when power is maximum accommodation times and a sounding alarm to induce power-savings to comply with the national policy

16)  Displays the LCD alert if the power consumption exceeds the monthly target of each home.

17)  5 different currency display selection (Japan, Korea, UK, USA, China and EU)

18)  433MHz (EU, USA), 429.2MHz (Japan) and 424.7MHz (Korea) wireless selection when order.

19)  CE, FCC and TELEC approval


PC SOFTWARE
http://smartwattmeter.com/soft

20)  Provides hourly, daily and monthly graph on pc-software

21)  Provides real time graph display of measured energy consumption by connection pc

22)  Provides on-off control setting of home appliance by pc-software

23)  Provides 6 step energy cost tier rate setting by pc-software


WEB CLOUD SERVICE
24) We can monitor the cloud service at PC, Smartphone & IPAD. We can make on-off or timer control from the cloud service. 
http://smartwattmeter.com/cloud

25) Dash board display also possible.


26)  Provides 10 channels of daily, weekly, monthly, yearly and by year graphs

27)  Provides now energy, total wattage and money display of the day

28)  Provides comparison graphs of previous /present day, previous week/present week, previous month/present month, previous year/present year

29)  Permits integrated management of up to 999 sites (for a company with numerous branches) by optional service. (under developement)
30) Daily energy target Alarm : by Email or SMS
*Daily/weekly/monthly Energy consumption Notice: by Email or SMS
31) You can download 2 min. interval energy data for a day or month from the cloud service. (You can save the excel file every month to your PC)

OPTIONAL MYWATT CLAMP-ON TYPE WIRELESS TRANSMITTER CRT3000

32) Single or 3-phase electricity current monitoring by wireless data transmission up to 40m distance.   Internal battery can be used 6 months.
33) Provides 30A, 75A, 200A, 350A and 500A Clamps as an Option

photo: CRT3000 Transmitter + 75A Clamp

30A, 75A, 200A, 350A clamp

3-phase application : 3pcs of 30A clamp


OPTIONAL MYWATT PLUG IN TYPE TRANSMITTER PIT3000/PIT3100

34)  Provides 5 different plug type (UK, Germany, USA, Japan)

35)  Remote on-off or reserved timer control by smart phone, web cloud service, and pc-software.

We have 1-clamp, 2-clamp, 3-clamp type , web-cloud service type and mixed type.


What We Need & What You Get

We need this funding for the developing of new feature and get the several different approval like UL, CE and TELEC. And also we need it for the development of Wi-Fi version and Black Box type Wireless Energy Monitoring Device in the future.

We also need the fund for the development of Apps and Web Cloud service with more advanced and more attractive stage.  The extra cost also could provide us more safe energy data storage.

Even though the Funds do not reach the goal, we will make the goods without problem and will deliver the goods to the customer at the end of the R&D finishing.

The Impact

MyWatt SEM3000 could provide the world people with less energy consumption and could save 10% of the new power plant construction. It provides green world.
Now it is the time of Smart Grid and IHD (In Home Display Unit).  MyWatt SEM3000 is a kind of IHD and it is essential to the energy consumer of the advance country.
U.K. will install 50,000,000sets of IHD within 2020 for the energy saving purpose.

Amongst the IHD, MyWatt SEM3000 is the world best item and could easily lead the people how to monitor and save the energy natually.

12% energy saving could make 20% electricity cost saving by tier rate increasemnet.

Risks & Challenges

It is not risky to reach the goal. We almost reached most of the target during the last 30 months R&D and pilot production.  Therefore we need only   6 months from now to reach the target.  Some of the goods, we can supply within 3 months from now. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute now, you can help as below:

  • Ask your neighbor or friends to think about MyWatt contribution to the world energy saving.
  • If you agree, please remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools for the spreading of the world energy saving campaign.

We make the World Best MyWatt Cloud 10 channel Wireless Smart Electricity Monitor for Home Energy Monitoring, Cost Calculation Display and Home Appliance
Control from Smartphone. 
From now on, every Home need MyWatt.   We can save 15% world electricity energy consumption by using MyWatt.Pay $100 for MyWatt (SEM3010A), you  can save 20% to 25% of  the monthly electricity bill and save the world from CO2 emission which damage the green world. Your $100 investment will be pay back within a year. But you can use 10 years with MyWatt.  Your pay back will be 1000% or over.  MyWatt Cloud is the most strongest  IoT (Internet of Things) product. Pay $130 for MyWatt Cloud (SEM3110A), you can see your real time electricity graph up to 10 channels at anywhere in the world by smartphone. You can also control your home appliances whenever you needed. You can save the money and secure your home from the smartphone. You can monitor your home whenever you are abroad or vacation from the intruder. Please introduce MyWatt to your neighbor, the world does not need anymore Atomic Power Plant. 
http://smartwattmeter.com/index1.htm Catalogue : http://smartwattmeter.com/catalog/sem3000EN.pdf




MyWatt SEM3000 Series has the following functions:MyWatt is simple and easy to use tool that helps you become smarter about the way you use electricity. Find out in a few seconds how much your air conditioner and TV costs to run. Check out how much power your entire house and home appliances is using in real time up to 10 channels. Immediately displays any cost changes to the electricity being consumed by the home. Studies have shown that the average homeowner can stop waisting between 10% ~ 20% of their homes energy if they have an electricity monitor.  Wireless features allow the MyWatt to be displayed in any room of the house and also shows daily, weekly, monthly energy consumption and the cost  in real time. It also shows the real time percentage of monthly target. We can also on-off or timer control of home appliances by PC software or Web Cloud service by using MyWatt Cloud.  We have 2 different type wireless transmitters. story:
We are Robotic Fisheries

        Home Of The Smart Pot
                                   

We think our product is beyond amazing! 

The X14 Smart Pot is revolutionary!

Shellfishing has never been easier!

Just drop it in the water and send it off using your smart phone or tablet!

You set the mission parameters.

Select how long the Smart Pot should dwell on the bottom. 

Select how deep the water should be and press GO! 

The Smart Pot will navigate to the selected depth then submerge. 

The Smart Pot will dwell for the selected amount of time on the bottom. 

The Smartpot will resurface and come back to you. 

Shellfishing doesn't get any easier than that!


We have decided to self fund this prototype! Therefore we are no longer requesting donations.

Thank you to everyone who has taken the time to view our product. 
You can continue to follow our progress here ->  Visit our website

story:
MacHub: Premium High-Speed 5-in-1 USB 3.1 Type-C USB Hub for the Apple's new Macbook 12".

If you’re buying a new 12-inch MacBook and scrambling to find cables that work with the laptop’s new USB Type-C port, you have more options than Apple’s pricey cables that are sold individually for unreasonable prices with one single fuction for each.
Our MacHub is the ultimate and limitless solution for your new Macbook. 
5 In 1 USB Type C Hub with USB 3.1 Type-C In, 2 USB3.0 Ports, SD/MMC and MicroSD Card reader.

Experience the next generation technology with Promate’s MacHub-12; a sleek and compact 5-in-1 USB 3.1 Type-C USB Hub that features a USB 3.1 Type-C Charging Port, two USB 3.0 Ports, SD/MMC & microSD Card Reader. Simply plug-in MacHub-12 in your MacBook 12 with the new USB 3.1 Type-C Port and enjoy seamless connectivity. Make up for the lost ports with MacHub-12


Features
  • Sleek & Lightweight
  • Easy Plug-n-Play
  • Aluminum Finish
  • High Speed of up to 5 Gbps for USB 3.0
  • Low Dissipation
  • Smart LED Indicator
  • Card Reader Supports SD, SDHC, SDXC & microSD Cards
  • Maximum Capacity of up to 2 TB
  • Compatible with MacBook 12, Chromebook Pixel 2 and All Other Devices with Type-C Ports.
  • Available in Silver, Gold and Space-Grey colors.

story:
What is Moly X1?

Taking advantage of Microsoft voice cognitive service to release your hand, Moly X1 becomes your personal assistant for the comprehensive, end-to-end search capabilities. Stay connected with Skype, work anywhere with Office, and keep track of your notes anytime with OneNote. The Moly X1 is designed for LTE networks, you are always online with a high speed transmission.

How it works?

1. Digital Assistant

With Moly X1, you can get your personal reminders, open Youtube, share map directions across your device from PC, or even tell sending the mail. Besides, when your Moly X1 is lost, just find it from your PC.

2. Work anywhere

Skype

Make free Skype video calls, share messages with your friend or group at any time anywhere.

OneNote

With OneNote on Moly X1, it’s easy to mark down any idea at any format, including text, picture, and even audio. Pull up your notes for reading or editing anywhere, even when you’re offline.

Mobile Office

Utilize Moly X1’s familiar App with PC powered by Universal Windows App, you can get the free latest mobile versions of Word, PowerPoint, Excel, Outlook and OneNote built in. Your documents are synchronized between Moly X1 and your PC via OneDrive.

3. Connectivity                     

The Moly X1 is designed for LTE networks with faster data transmission to get more things done. Additionally, its Qualcomm ® Snapdragon™ quad-core processor secures the good multitasking and productivity.

We now have two versions available for USA and Europe respectively. Choose the best version for your esteemed self.

1. USA & Canada version: works for major 4G networks in Americas besides global 2G and 3G networks.

2. Europe & Australia version: Works for major 4G networks in Europe and Oceania besides global 2G and 3G networks

4. Security

The privacy is important to everyone, your personal data will be protected well while using Moly X1.

“Currently Windows Mobile seems to be the hardest nut to crack. If I have physical access to the device, I find Android is usually the easiest target. Then comes iPhone, then the Windows Mobile.”

—Hacker and security expert of 15 years, Steve Lord

The Design

1. Moly X1: a little slimmer, a little lighter

The Moly X1 is designed to fit perfectly with your style and holding in your hand. With a thickness of only 0.69cm and a 5.5" high density screen, Moly X1 embodies the harmony between the physical and digital experience for emailing, internet browsing and video streaming.

2. 5.5" JDI Incell HD LCD

X1 delivers a stunning visibility by its ClearBlack technology, its Sunlight Readability Enhancement secures a vivid outdoor viewing, even in the sunlight.

3. 13Mega Pixels Camera

Powered by the 13 mega pixels auto focus camera, you will not miss any  important scene. With the 5 mega pixels front camera, you are ready to have the video call by Skype.

4. Water Resistant Design

With the water-resistant design, it is protected from dust ingress and low pressure water jets from any direction. Looking at Moly X1's dimension, it is amazing indeed.

Product specification

Display Size: 5.5 inch High Density Incell Display

OS: Windows 10 Mobile

CPU: Snapdragon 410 (MSM8916), 4 x A53/1.2 GHz Quad-core

Workiing networks for USA and Canada version:

2G Networks: Worldwide bands, 850/900/1800/1900MHz

3G Networks: UMTS, B1 (2100) / B2 (1900) / B5 (850) for USA

4G Networks: LTE, B2 (1900) / B4 (1700)/B5 (850) / B17 (700) for USA

Working networks for Europe and Australia version:

2G Networks: Worldwide bands, 850/900/1800/1900MHz

3G Networks: UMTS B1 (2100) / B2 (1900) / B8 (900) for Europe

4G Networks: LTE B1 (2100) / B3 (1800) / B7 (2600) /B8 (900) / B20 (800) for Europe

WiFi: 802.11 a/b/g/n

Memory: Internal: 2GB RAM / 16GB flash, External: Up to 128 GB

SIM Card: Micro SIM, card holder required if for Nano SIM

Camera: Main: 13 Megapixels, Auto-focus, Front camera: 5 Megapixels

Battery Capacity: 2,600 mAh

Talk Time: More than 960 mins

Standby time: More than 260 hours

Device Size: (L x W x H): Approx. 154.8 x 78.6 x 6.9 (mm)

Unit Weight: Approx. 139g/ 4.9 oz

Accessories: one each of handset, charger, USB cable ,User Guide,

                          Sim Card tool,Clean cloth,Screen Protector.

Note: The package will only comes with one usb charger.

If you choose the USA & Canada Version,it will come with US Plug Charger.

If you choose the Europe & Australia Version,it will come with EU Plug Charger.

How can you support us?

  • USA and Canada:

Super Early Bird: 40 Packs only, 40% discount and free shipping before X'mas.

Early Bird: 100 packs only, 36% discount and free shipping in Dec 16.

Final Support: 50 packs only, 23% discount and free shipping in earlier Jan 17

  • Europe and Australia

Super Early Bird: 80 Packs only, 40% discount and free shipping before X'mas.

Early Bird: 250 packs only, 36% discount and free shipping in Dec 16.

Final Support: 100 packs only, 23% discount and free shipping in earlier Jan 17.

 

Our Partners

 

Our Team

Our team, in the smart phone field for more than 5 years, now dedicates on the development of Windows phone. From product concept, ID design, mechanical fabrication, hardware enhancement to software development, we are always keen for every detail and pursuing the extreme performance to cater for users’ need.

Building a mobile device is not an easy job, especially a Windows phone which requires more technology knowledge on the software development besides caring for the hardware and mechanicals. However, it is our pleasure to produce a smart device with a hope to become your digital assistant by bringing more convenience for your work and profession.

Why Indiegogo?

When we launched the Moly X1 first generation in Asia market some quarters ago, it caused a good feedback immediately on its Windows 10 mobile OS. People from all around the world began asking if we could release a full version working for USA or Europe. That is the reason that we create the new Moly X1 with improvement on the functionality and modification on the relevant bands to cater for USA and Europe users.

The Fine Print

We will ship the Moly X1 in December 2016 to America/Canada and Europe/Australia by free delivery.

Please note that you will be responsible for any customs fees, duties, VAT, import taxes if occurred.

Disclaimers

Water resistant: Moly X1 is a water-resistant design which means it is protected from dust ingress and low pressure water jets from any direction. Putting your Moly X1 under water and submerging your Moly X1 in liquid (e.g. swimming or shower) is strongly discouraged. 

Voice cognitive service - Cortana: Cortana service is now provided by Microsoft in the countries of Australia, Canada, China, France, Germany, India, Italy, Japan, Spain, United Kingdom, and United States.

We shall not be held responsible for failure or delay in shipment that caused by the war, military operation, epidemics, epizootic, blockade, embargo, fire, earthquakes, floods, and some other natural disasters, as well as the acts of government authorities.
　　
Customers are responsible for assuring the product can be lawfully imported to the destination country. The recipient of an international shipment may be subject to such import taxes, customs duties and fees, which are levied once a shipment reaches the recipient's country. Additional charges for customs clearance must be fulfilled by the recipient; Moly has no control over these charges.

 

#New Moly X1 Windows phone#

Help out by sharing with friends!

Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who needs this!
We can't do this without you. Thank you.

 

Q&A

Q: Does this device have a replaceable battery?

A: No, the battery is built-in and unreplaceable.

Q: Hi I really love the specs on this phone and I am considering it but I have one question what sim card does this phone work with micro SIM or Nano SIM?

A: It works with micro SIM card and you need a card holder to make it work with Nano SIM.

Quad-coreWorkiing networks for USA and Canada version:2G Networks: Worldwide bands, 850/900/1800/1900MHz3G Networks: UMTS, B1 (2100) / B2 (1900) / B5 (850) for USA4G Networks: LTE, B2 (1900) / B4 (1700)/B5 (850) / B17 (700) for USAWorking networks for Europe and Australia version:2G Networks: Worldwide bands, 850/900/1800/1900MHz3G Networks: UMTS B1 (2100) / B2 (1900) / B8 (900) for Europe4G Networks: LTE B1 (2100) / B3 (1800) / B7 (2600) /B8 (900) / B20 (800) for EuropeWiFi: 802.11 a/b/g/nMemory: Internal: 2GB RAM / 16GB flash, External: Up to 128 GBSIM Card: Micro SIM, card holder required if for Nano SIMCamera: Main: 13 Megapixels, Auto-focus, Front camera: 5 MegapixelsBattery Capacity: 2,600 mAhTalk Time: More than 960 minsStandby time: More than 260 hoursDevice Size: (L x W x H): Approx. 154.8 x 78.6 x 6.9 (mm)Unit Weight: Approx. 139g/ 4.9 ozAccessories: one each of handset, charger, USB cable ,User Guide,                          Sim Card tool,Clean cloth,Screen Protector.Note: The package will only comes with one usb charger.If you choose the USA & Canada Version,it will come with US Plug Charger.If you choose the Europe & Australia Version,it will come with EU Plug Charger.How can you support us?USA and Canada:Super Early Bird: 40 Packs only, 40% discount and free shipping before X'mas.Early Bird: 100 packs only, 36% discount and free shipping in Dec 16.Final Support: 50 packs only, 23% discount and free shipping in earlier Jan 17Europe and AustraliaSuper Early Bird: 80 Packs only, 40% discount and free shipping before X'mas.Early Bird: 250 packs only, 36% discount and free shipping in Dec 16.Final Support: 100 packs only, 23% discount and free shipping in earlier Jan 17. Our Partners Our TeamOur team, in the smart phone field for more than 5 years, now dedicates on the development of Windows phone. From product concept, ID design, mechanical fabrication, hardware enhancement to software development, we are always keen for every detail and pursuing the extreme performance to cater for users’ need.Building a mobile device is not an easy job, especially a Windows phone which requires more technology knowledge on the software development besides caring for the hardware and mechanicals. However, it is our pleasure to produce a smart device with a hope to become your digital assistant by bringing more convenience for your work and profession.Why Indiegogo?When we launched the Moly X1 first generation in Asia market some quarters ago, it caused a good feedback immediately on its Windows 10 mobile OS. People from all around the world began asking if we could release a full version working for USA or Europe. That is the reason that we create the new Moly X1 with improvement on the functionality and modification on the relevant bands to cater for USA and Europe users.The Fine PrintWe will ship the Moly X1 in December 2016 to America/Canada and Europe/Australia by free delivery.Please note that you will be responsible for any customs fees, duties, VAT, import taxes if occurred.DisclaimersWater resistant: Moly X1 is a water-resistant design which means it is protected from dust ingress and low pressure water jets from any direction. Putting your Moly X1 under water and submerging your Moly X1 in liquid (e.g. swimming or shower) is strongly discouraged. Voice cognitive service - Cortana: Cortana service is now provided by Microsoft in the countries of Australia, Canada, China, France, Germany, India, Italy, Japan, Spain, United Kingdom, and United States.We shall not be held responsible for failure or delay in shipment that caused by the war, military operation, epidemics, epizootic, blockade, embargo, fire, earthquakes, floods, and some other natural disasters, as well as the acts of government authorities.　　Customers are responsible for assuring the product can be lawfully imported to the destination country. The recipient of an international shipment may be subject to such import taxes, customs duties and fees, which are levied once a shipment reaches the recipient's country. Additional charges for customs clearance must be fulfilled by the recipient; Moly has no control over these charges. #New Moly X1 Windows phone#Help out by sharing with friends!Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who needs this!We can't do this without you. Thank you. Q&AQ: Does this device have a replaceable battery?A: No, the battery is built-in and unreplaceable.Q: Hi I really love the specs on this phone and I am considering it but I have one question what sim card does this phone work with micro SIM or Nano SIM?A: It works with micro SIM card and you need a card holder to make it work with Nano SIM.

story:
We love music. We like listening to our music in the car without needing a USB cable nor Bluetooth, even on our old stereo. With the new iPhone 7 we feel obligated to get rid of our old music players or use adapters. Really? Adapters? An adapter to use such a standard as a jack cable? No!

Here is born the Lightjack cable. Simple, practical and necessary.

The Lightjack maintains the standards from the jack cable and combines it with Apple's decision of using the lighting in it's place. 

 

Don't get distracted while driving! On top of this and never seen before on an AUX cable you get same "remote" there is on the official Apple headphones to turn the volume up or down, change songs or even talk to Siri. 

Plug&Enjoy

story:
Follow us on socials for more:

Instagram: @evolutionwear

Facebook: Clothing evolved

Twitter: @evolutionwear

Snapchat: EvolutionWear™

Charges ANY USB powered device. iPhones 3-7, any Android Device, or any USB powered device.

The World's Fastest SOLAR CHARGER.

from: Evolution Wear™     

 2.7+ AMP USB - Type C Charges 1-3% per minute!

with 14W of total power (Rapid Sol® ) with the best solar wafer's available.

FULLY FUNDED ON KICKSTARTER ON SEPTEMBER 23rd 2016.

OUR PRODUCT IS MUCH FASTER THAN ALL COMPETITORS... WHY? Our Solar Wafer's and our circuit has much better efficiency and stability. Our raw wafer efficiency is 24%! Other's are 18% or less!

 

  • Many others are claiming fast charging, but they do not tell you how long it takes to charge from the Sun.
  • CHARGE YOUR 2016/2017 MACBOOK AIR!
  • Our product's charging times are calculated using the solar technology + battery technology. Not just the battery itself.
  • Our high efficiency solar allows maximum sun and uv light collection.
  • Faster than any other Solar Charger from 0% using sunlight.
  • The Key Features of the now ready production units are:

     

    - USB C output,

    - 2.7 AMP max power

    - 14W total power.

    - 5 LED strobe and power status indicator.

    - LED flashlight.

    - MIcro USB input,

    - USB C output.

    - Carrying case.

    - Snap Clips.

    - USB C - USB A adapter.

We have equipped the Rapid Sol® with the latest USB technology to allow you the fastest charging speed and to plan for the future. One of the only flexible mono crystalline designs in the world. Charges most phones in less than 1 hr. 

ACTUAL DEMONSTRATED CHARGE SPEED.

 IPHONE 6SPLUS WIFI on Bluetooth ON, MAX BRIGHTNESS.

 

(No others have this currently. It works at night too with a 3200 MAH built in battery and LED flashlight!)

THE RAPID SOL ® 14Watts Panel + Built-In Battery.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

$79 early bird price, $84 after early bird is sold out.

 

STEADY SOL 7W 1 AMP OUTPUT. FASTER THAN ALL OTHER 1 AMP PANELS.

$39 Early Bird Price $45 after Early Bird is sold out.

  • Charges phones in less than 2 hours.
  • No built in battery; can charge any external battery very quickly.


 (Charges your phone within 1-2 hrs using the SUN! THIS IS NOT A GLORIFIED BATTERY PACK. OUR SOLAR CAPABILITIES ARE AMONG THE BEST IN THE WORLD Attach to almost anything with our snap clip and attachment buttons!)

You will never leave without your RAPID SOL ®!

  1.  14W total power! (only on RapidSol via smart circuit)
  2. 5.02V x 2.7amp ~ 14Watts (battery and solar combination)

Amazing speed. Longevity. Safe. Light weight,

  1. 9 oz (RapidSol, Steady Sol is 2oz) (9oz includes battery).
  2. 15 inches length X 7.5 inches X .5 inches.  (2mm thickness.)

Ultra Thin Design

24% Raw Efficiency True Grade A Custom  Wafers. (Fastest consumer solar available today)

Even faster speeds available when circuit battery is full!

NREL ACTUAL RESEARCH CHART ON PHOTOVOLTAICS -

SEE BEST RESEARCH CELL EFFICIENCY AND SEE OURS 24%!!

WINTER SOLSTICE SOLAR JACKET

 

 

 

 

Available with Rapid Sol ® or Steady Sol ®.

  (ALREADY!! Limited quantity available to ship sooner)

 

WINTER IS COMING... BE PREPARED.

 

 

ALL RAPID SOL® CHARGERS WILL COME WITH A USB C to USB 3.1 ADAPTER.

- No need to worry!

Current Solar Jacket Inventory List:

Ships before Christmas 2016!

Black units: Men’s- XXL- 7, XL- 6, LG- 5, Med- 5  Women’s- 1 Med

Total: 25 units

White/Blue units: Men-XXL- 5, XL- 5, LG- 5, Med- 5

Women’s- LG- 3, Med- 3  Total: 26 units

White/Pink Units Women's only: LG- 3, Med- 3, Sm- 3

Total: 9 units

 

CHARGE TIME:

10-40% in 10-15 Minutes!

For iPhone 7, Iphone 6s, Iphone 6, iPhone 5s, c, 4, 3. Galaxy s7, s6, s5, s4, s3.

Can charge even a Macbook Air USB C with solar to a usable position! Use the 12,000 MAH battery pack to charge even larger devices.

Our Rapid Sol® charger can handle quick charging better than 99% of quick charging solutions.

 

CHARGING SPEED

  1. Charges an iPhone 6S&5C in 50-65 minutes.
  2. Charges an iPhone 7 in less than 1 hour!
  3. Charges an iPhone 6S+ in 1-2 hours.
  4. Charges an Android Nexus in less than 2 hours.

2.7 AMPS! The Fastest charging solution for your adventures!

 

 

Covered By Entrepreneur.com 

 

 

 

RapidSol and Steady Sol attached to Golf Bag. (production models)

 

Nicole Williams :

White & Blue Women's Solar Jacket

 

Fully Water Resistant Panel

Charge any USB device. (final prototype in these images)

Yes, the RapidSol is faster than others.

Circuit is not water resistant. The panel can have water run across the entire panel face.

Faster than anything available on the market currently.

  1. Features a 2.7 AMP USB C output.
  2. Built In 3200 MAH battery.
  3. Ability quick charge other batteries.
  4. Ability to charge at 50% in cloudy conditions.
  5. 24% Raw Wafer Efficiency. 22% Fully Encapsulated.
  6. Faster than Amorphous Silicon.
  7. Faster than Grade D SunPower reject 17% wafers .ASK ABOUT THIS.
  8. 2.7 AMP USB C charging

Amazing for Golf, Tennis, Beach Going, Traveling, Biking and more.

 

Rapid Sol & Jacket Combo

Includes extra 4400 MAH BATTERY PACK!

Clip on to whatever you like!

Use the battery at night and the built-in LED Flashlight.

The Evolution Wear RapidSol and SteadySol feature GRADE A+ Custom Built Wafers @ 24% raw wafer efficiency, and 22% fully encapsulated. Also a 2.7 AMP Smart Circuit output (no other in the world) MOST OTHERS have wafer efficiency at less than 20%. Charges built in 3200 mah battery with max input of 1.9 Amps. So basically it charges the built in battery very quickly in good sunlight. 

The Steady Sol uses the 1.9AMP panel to output 1 AMP via USB type A steadily.

Have you ever been outside and had your phone or USB powered device die? Or, have you tried other solar chargers/solar backpacks only to be frustrated and not see a real change in your battery level? That has now changed.

Current solar chargers on the market are rigid and slow. The EvolutionWear RapidSol fits on our ActiveSol Shirts, our Winter Solstice Solar Jackets, and  our future Evolution Wear backpacks. We need your pledge to make sure that we can meet our inventory challenges. With your help we can get this product into the hands of great customers like yourself and change the way people view solar.

Dual Functioning MicroUSB & Lightning charging cable (Available upon request RapidSol rewards)

Use the snap clips to attach to your backpack or anything! (production model in photo)

 

RapidSol & SteadySol Packaging

 

 

                                                      

WHY SHOULD YOU BACK THIS PROJECT/ SPEND YOUR HARD EARNED MONEY ON THE RAPIDSOL??

  1. IT ACTUALLY GIVES YOU A NOTICEABLE INCREASE IN BATTERY LIFE AND FAST.
  2. PEOPLE DON'T HAVE TIME TO WAIT HOURS IN THE SUN, THEY NEED SOMETHING THAT WILL WORK QUICKLY i.e. (on lunch break, smoke break, in between sets at a festival, preparing to surf, golfing, hiking, fishing, etc.)
  3. IT CAN SAVE YOU IN URGENT SITUATIONS.
  4. IT IS TRULY THE FASTEST SOLAR BASED CHARGING SOLUTION FOR MOBILE DEVICES IN THE WORLD (currently).

REWARDS

Red RapidSol with Black Case & Black T-shirt

ActiveSol T-Shirt (Available in Black)

 

  **If you have pledged for a reward with a T-Shirt or Jacket included, please message us with your size and color requirements:

Jackets: White & Blue (Male or Female), White & Pink (Female only), Black. Limited quantity available for shipping before Christmas 2016.

Size Chart for Jackets

 

 

 

 

Our 5 LED system lets you know the status of  the built in battery, actual captured sunlight, and charge rate. 

 

 

 

Charging speed average 1-3% per minute only on Rapid Sol.

RapidSol with Case and Carabiner (2.7AMP) Built In 3200 MAH battery

$39 STEADY SOL 1 AMP CHARGER

1.0 AMP STEADY SOL in case ( rear) RapidSol Case will also have the back pocket and carabiner loops.

WHY IS OUR  RapidSol Solar CHARGER THE FASTEST in the World? 

We use a smart circuit technology coupled with a hyper fast  7W 1.9 amp Flexible solar panel in order to give you fast charging speeds.

iPhone 6, 6s, 5c - 0%-50% in 35 MINUTES.

Samsung Galaxy 5,6,7 - 0-100% in less than 1 hr - 2 hrs. (depending if max output is requested by device)

ALL OF OUR COMPETITORS at this point are no where close to anything under 2 hours.

  

7W Panel 22% Fully Encapsulated Efficiency.

 6.5V to 5.5 Volt Regulated Circuit.

 USB C Output.

 2.7 AMP to just under 3 Amp FAST CHARGING circuit.

 1.9 AMP RAW PANEL POWER.

 Built in 3200 MAH battery for storing our sun's power. 

 Charges an iPhone 6s 1.75 times.

 MicroUSB input for topping off at home during night time.

Powered by SunCore Grade A 24% raw efficiency wafers.

  RAPID SOL COLOR OPTIONS (RED OR BLACK)

-CHARGES MOST PHONES IN less than 1 hour (depends on outside and Your Phone's Battery Temperature. The hotter the temp the slower it charges.) Our RapidSol can handle High Heat! But most phones cannot. We have solved this problem with a smart circuit featuring an ARM processor that allows for maximum efficiency. So even if it is too hot, your phone will keep its battery level steady.

 

 

follow us on instagram @evolutionwear

Our Power Banks

12,000 SLEEK 2.1AMP output

(11,000 MAH Version is available for reward not 15,000, They look the identical)

4,400 MAH STANDARD

Our PANEL has a maximum power output of 7W & just under 2 amps with the out from the RapidSol circuit reaching just under ~3 Amps from our USB-C output. The entire RapidSol has an output of 14W!

The RapidSol really is the fastest solar charger available in the world. Bringing mono crystalline based housing power to the flexible sphere with our easy to use t-shirts, jackets and more will give you an amazing experience as a consumer.

Since releasing our Winter Solstice Jacket, we were asked to create much faster solar capability. We have developed a new panel  using our flexible only motto, and have now solved large scale manufacturing and other technical problems. We have expanded our response times and capabilities by teaming up with our partners.

What began as an idea 4 years ago, has become Evolution Wear. This dream has developed into what we hope to become a new era of solar. Human beings have been evolving in many ways, but one area which we can improve on is our carbon footprint.

It is our mission to create multi-purpose, functional clothing & accessories that can make life more convenient. Now we are finally ready to launch our ultra fast solar technology.

Have you ever had one of those days where you were trying to rush to work, class, or decided to go to the beach, play golf and worried about your phone dying? Our EvolutionWear RapidSol will effeciently solve that problem.

FAQ

_________________________________________________________________

Q: Does the solar panel replenish the built In battery on the RapidSol quickly?

A: Yes, absolutely. When receiving sunlight, the RapidSol tells you how much energy you are putting into the battery via the 5LED indicator lights. When flashing 3 or higher, the RapidSol can charge extremely quickly.

Q: Is the RapidSol Water Proof?

 A: The panel itself is water proof, any water on the panel will not harm the panel at all. Limiting water exposure to the circuit is highly recommended as this portion is not completely water proof, however is water resistant.  The STEADY SOL panel is completely water resistant, with a resistant circuit featuring a rubber close loop for the USB circuit.

Q: How fast is the Steady Sol panel compared to the RapidSol?

 A: The SteadySol panel features a 1 AMP output, the RapidSol panel features a 2.7 AMP output.

Q: Can it charge tablets?

A: Absolutely, however, most tablets require sunlight to ensure power is available for charging. It is a solar charger after all!

Q: Will Evolution Wear provide support after the RapidSol is purchased?

A: Yes, absolutely, all products are covered by 1 year standard warranty. Evolution Wear will also provide email and social media based support for all EW products.

Q: What happens if Evolution Wear does not reach its goal?

A: No risk will be taken on your part, the backed amount will not get charged.

Q: What is the wafer efficiency of both of the panels?

A: Both products the RapidSol and SteadySol feature a 22% fully encapsulated wafer efficiency and a 24% raw wafer efficiency. Making them among the most elite tier of solar wafer quality.

 

 

Q: Do you offer a referral system for this campaign?

A: Yes, we do. First, get at least one Evolution Wear™ Rapid Sol USB- C on our Indiegogo campaign. Then, get 4 friends to contribute to our campaign too, and you will be refunded on one Evolution Wear™ Rapid Sol USB-C! Here's how:

1. Log into Indiegogo (NOTE: you must be logged in!) and go to the Evolution Wear™ Rapid Sol USB-C campaign page.

2. Click the Twitter or Facebook icons to share the campaign via social media OR, click the “link” icon to copy your own personal link to share by email, messages or any other private communication with your friends.

3. Your link is personal and can be traced back to YOU. When someone clicks through to the page via your link and contributes to the campaign, Indiegogo’s system will automatically credit you as the referrer.

4. If four of your friends have contributed to the campaign through your link, you will get your total pledge amount for one (1) Evolution Wear™  Rapid Sol USB-C .

Bringing mono crystalline based housing power to the flexible sphere with our easy to use t-shirts, jackets and more will give you an amazing experience as a consumer.Since releasing our Winter Solstice Jacket, we were asked to create much faster solar capability. We have developed a new panel  using our flexible only motto, and have now solved large scale manufacturing and other technical problems. We have expanded our response times and capabilities by teaming up with our partners.What began as an idea 4 years ago, has become Evolution Wear. This dream has developed into what we hope to become a new era of solar. Human beings have been evolving in many ways, but one area which we can improve on is our carbon footprint.It is our mission to create multi-purpose, functional clothing & accessories that can make life more convenient. Now we are finally ready to launch our ultra fast solar technology.Have you ever had one of those days where you were trying to rush to work, class, or decided to go to the beach, play golf and worried about your phone dying? Our EvolutionWear RapidSol will effeciently solve that problem.FAQ_________________________________________________________________Q: Does the solar panel replenish the built In battery on the RapidSol quickly?A: Yes, absolutely. When receiving sunlight, the RapidSol tells you how much energy you are putting into the battery via the 5LED indicator lights. When flashing 3 or higher, the RapidSol can charge extremely quickly.Q: Is the RapidSol Water Proof? A: The panel itself is water proof, any water on the panel will not harm the panel at all. Limiting water exposure to the circuit is highly recommended as this portion is not completely water proof, however is water resistant.  The STEADY SOL panel is completely water resistant, with a resistant circuit featuring a rubber close loop for the USB circuit.Q: How fast is the Steady Sol panel compared to the RapidSol? A: The SteadySol panel features a 1 AMP output, the RapidSol panel features a 2.7 AMP output.Q: Can it charge tablets?A: Absolutely, however, most tablets require sunlight to ensure power is available for charging. It is a solar charger after all!Q: Will Evolution Wear provide support after the RapidSol is purchased?A: Yes, absolutely, all products are covered by 1 year standard warranty. Evolution Wear will also provide email and social media based support for all EW products.Q: What happens if Evolution Wear does not reach its goal?A: No risk will be taken on your part, the backed amount will not get charged.Q: What is the wafer efficiency of both of the panels?A: Both products the RapidSol and SteadySol feature a 22% fully encapsulated wafer efficiency and a 24% raw wafer efficiency. Making them among the most elite tier of solar wafer quality.  Q: Do you offer a referral system for this campaign?A: Yes, we do. First, get at least one Evolution Wear™ Rapid Sol USB- C on our Indiegogo campaign. Then, get 4 friends to contribute to our campaign too, and you will be refunded on one Evolution Wear™ Rapid Sol USB-C! Here's how:1. Log into Indiegogo (NOTE: you must be logged in!) and go to the Evolution Wear™ Rapid Sol USB-C campaign page.2. Click the Twitter or Facebook icons to share the campaign via social media OR, click the “link” icon to copy your own personal link to share by email, messages or any other private communication with your friends.3. Your link is personal and can be traced back to YOU. When someone clicks through to the page via your link and contributes to the campaign, Indiegogo’s system will automatically credit you as the referrer.4. If four of your friends have contributed to the campaign through your link, you will get your total pledge amount for one (1) Evolution Wear™  Rapid Sol USB-C .

story:
Presenting, The Eye Shooter Headband & Smartphone Mount  The Ultimate Smartphone Accessory. Multifuntional By Design. 

Thank you for viewing. I seek your support bringing to market my latest invention, The Eye Shooter!

Turns any good photo video shooter into a Steven Spielberg by helping them capture photos and videos much more creatively. Your head / body can be a natural stabilizer when using the Eye Shooter, especially in hands free headband mode.

More than a headband, it was designed for steady hand held photo-video recording using 3 point stabilization. Smartphone cameras are getting better and better technically, but are not designed for holding. The Eye Shooter was designed to hold your phone/camera, you hold the Eye Shooter. This opens up a whole new world of creative possibilities for millions of smartphone users and photo video enthusiasts worldwide. What's possible? See for yourself in this live as it was shot answer to the question "will my phone fall off?"

 I met Walter Murcia, an amazing high wire artist from the Pirates of the Colombian Caribbean.    I asked him to shoot his high wire performance with the eye shooter headband.

Tom the Doc and Walter. He and his  troupe were into it, so they set up a special performance just for us to record. We shot it all in one take. I was handheld A cam and Walter B cam headband. This is the complete as it was recorded footage 2 cam edited.                    Run time aprox 10 minutes.

 

When smartphone video went HD, as a pro photo videographer, I became more interested in them. The new cameras surpassed my pro SD video cameras. But alas, less than ideal to hold, let alone get creative with. What good is shaky 4k quality video? With the exception of common shots, holding a phone’s camera is not like using a DSLR or video camera. Only high end phones have optical image stabilization. Forget about zooming in without shake. So all kinds of gadgets, holders, and sticks came about, all are 1 trick ponies. Hmmmm! 

You can do better Tom. Think outside the box!

The Eureka moment!!!  Wouldn't it be cool if I could use my phone/camera like a GoPro? What if I could somehow make a smartphone holder to replace all those gadgets. A stabilizer / mount / holder / stand / dash mount /multi tool / for any size smartphone. I could use it in the car, at home, at work and at play. I could reel in that whopper fish hands free. Then, unlike the others, my smartphone is a Computer / HD Camera. I can view, edit, and upload my footage quickly and easily, or download for creative editing. I even live streamed at the fair.

My Mission... Design and Create an affordable multi function smartphone holder for everyday applications, steady photo videography and just for having fun! How much fun? See the playlist of what we captured at the Altamont Fair in upstate NY.  https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLfteGwlH  Everybody had a big smile on, just like IE my mascot/logo, got to love IE and that smile. What do you think of IE? Keep him or what. Please Comment, should I include a IE T Shirt as a perk?

My friends call me the doc,  a lifelong sometimes wacky inventor, a lot like the doc from Back to the Future. I am the Inventor of The Quad Pod Video Camera Stabilizer, The Aero Pod Grow Systems and the Chip Sliders Roulette stackers and trackers. The Prapala, a self propelled fishing lure. and the Aqua Web hand swim fins, ( coming soon if when this campaign succeeds) just to name a few. So I did my thing. Pondered. Created a few drawings. Made clay models and then a few prototypes for proof of concept. All you inventors out there never give up, keep on inventing until you get there. I failed so many times and came close but no cigar, to not even trying anymore. Naaaaaaaa. One more time.......so

I hired a great cad designer, Dorian from Catz Design now in Colorado, Thanks my friend. Together we successfully developed the amazing final designs.

This was the final design and we have since went on to complete the tooling of injection molds and make a small run, and in production. 

We need the funding for next scale of production runs and bring it to market. The hardest part and with your help, we will not fail due to lack of proper funding.

Please, I don't want to go on shark tank, IE says "Mr Wonderful will put me in a martini or something. Mark Cuban will use me as a basketball. Barbera will want to set me up in her NYC penthouse....as a pet. Laury will endlessly parade me on QVC and Robert will turns his kids on me." I will ask IE what he thinks about those guys out in Texas!

 

One of my best inventions is the Quad Pod Pro video camera stabilizer. I created the Eye Shooter based on the 3-4 point stabilization principles and benefits of the Quad Pods. My model here, Chelsie, went on to Playboy.

That experience led me to develope: 

The EYE SHOOTER Smartphone Holder and HEADBAND Mount and it's no 1 trick pony.

DASH MOUNTABLE  with a stick-on dash mounting clip. Mount it anywhere on your Dashboard. It's great for hands free talking, using GPS or as a Dash Cam. I use it everyday.

TRIPOD MOUNTABLE. The main eye ball Socket easily mounts to monopods, tripods, and any tripod adaptors with standard 1/4" 20 thread. Really came in handy setting up stationary shots.

DO FACIES and MIRIES  (just look at people or into any mirror when using selfie viewcam) the selfish stick is a one trick pony, long live the FACIE!

Built in Holder for Led Light. Used to adjust Line of Sight and extra fill light for filming at night. I would like to develope a laser pointer that has a on off button. Very few have. It would be perfect for the eye shooter. I have the experience and you can help make it happen.

 

The headband features a neoprene pad so lite and comfortable Mr Sheep forgot he had it on. Ask my new friend here how it adjusts to fit all, from a child's head to pumpkin size. We even mounted them on a Pony, Elvis the Horse and my new friend here, Mr Sheep.

The innovative strap design doubles as a headband and a neck strap so you can use your smartphone just like a camera. It's not a bulky 2 part velcro but a special stick to itself material. It's lite and comfortable and needs no buckles. 

The creative product development process has been very successfully completed.  For most new product makers, that's the hardest part. For me, it's always been challenging but still the easy part. It's what I do well. My proof of concept testing is done. Cad design and 3D prototypes made, tested, and improved upon. Final tooling of steel injection molds completed.

I own the tooling and all the eye shooters will be made in the USA. Our first small run is complete and I have limited inventory to fulfill delivery to early contributors. 

We have completed the test market phase having introduced the Eye Shooters at a few NY State County fairs. The response was totally positive. Everyone that had a chance to see and shoot with it were impressed with its multi-function capabilities and low price point.

Now comes the next run of production and letting the world know it exists. It's one thing to invent a great product ready for sales but now I need to raise funds to produce it and bring it to market.

As a contributor to my campaign I am offering a number of perks which include getting complimentary Eye Shooters at certain levels.  I know you will agree that an inexpensive alternative to GoPro type cameras and 1 trick pony gadgets would be very well received.

There are billions of smartphones worldwide. The eye shooter works with  most of them. And it makes people smile ala facies, we need a lot more of those in this world.

The Eye Shooter project has satisfied and surpasseds all my design goals and expectations. Now, after many revisions and improvements, it's ready, and I Love it!!!!! You will too.  I guarantee it.  

Thank you for your support my friends. 

Tom the doc Barrera

story:
http://mad-d.com
 

"We will proceed this project and ship product to all backers either project succeeded or failed!"


 

 

mband & mclip are created to make something common uncommonly well.
The perfect accessory to gear up with your earphone to achieve the best user-interaction!
Attach the pair of mband on the both side of the earphone in an instant, making them easier to use, comfortable to wear and looks smarter. You can also remove it and attach it at the back of your neck or on mclip. Even if it’s just for a short moment while ordering food or interacting with people. It makes you look smarter and your life easier!

 

 

 

"A tiny accessory which create an impact and improve
the way you use the earphone forever!"

It’s easy to use, interesting and addictive.

Both attach each other quick and seamlessly which will change the way you use your earphones forever.

"Fine Curves, sleek, classy, easy grip and reliable earphone clamp."


Control the way of using your earphone and utilizing every single possibility with it by clipping it on your clothes or even bags  
 

Having a secure clamp and smooth surface, it's easy to adjust the cable.

 


 

 

The perfect accessory to gear up with your earphone to achieve the best user-interaction!
With its pure and minimalist design, which cater to any looks!


 

It’s unknowingly addictive to use and have fun with

 

 

mband can also be used as a stationary helper on any magnetic surface.

 



Perfect match with mband. mclip can be used in many other ways which would benefits. Tangle-free with your earphone cables.

 

Stands out from the crowd with unique style and characteristic mband.
mband can also spice up your look as a fashion accessories, looking as an ear stud. More design will definitely be coming out in the future.
 

 

 

 




Sleek, classy, easy grip and reliable earphone clamp.


mband / EYEBALL


mband / MONSTER.B


mband / SMILE

 

 

We used Neodymium Magnet for high quality, quick and seamlessly attachment. We pride ourselves for the quality used and the design for durability. We had tested our products and done many prototype to ensure the best quality and measurement.

 

 

 

 

Material : SiIlicon

 


Material : metal and silicon

 

**DISCLAIMER**

About the magnet and earphone sound issue, We use small magnet for mband and we had actually tested our product ample time and so far, all our earphones sound quality are in good condition and no any affection.
But we do discourage using mband with high-end or sensitive studio earphone.
Please note that we are not liable if there's any damage done.

***PLEASE NOTE THAT PRODUCT DOESN'T INCLUDE EARPHONE***

 

 

 


 

 


You can help us by sharing our campaign with your friends too. 

 

We had tested our products and done many prototype to ensure the best quality and measurement.  So now, we really need your support to make this project a reality!  

We’ve already spend a lot of time and money setting up design and molds and now we are left with mass production run and package it to send it out to you guys.

Do follow us for updates!
