story:
LokDon --This provides users and devices a means to connect in a secure manner with ones privacy intact.

We are team of boundless collaborators of information technology. Our team noticed that the main encryption system (AES) for securing all communications over the internet is threatened. So we created a patent-pending encryption instruction codes to address that. The world needed something better than what we have now since more powerful computing can be leveraged by cloud services and super-computing in favor of device compromises. We decided to build a system based on the following:

 

1. Localized Core generators of encryption keys and password and passphrases.

2.  Implored the Russian ‘Matroyshka’ doll ensemble to make the keys impregnable.

3. On-the-fly generation of keys instead of storing the keys.

4. Increased encryption capacity by eight times or more of AES the status quo in both decryption and encryption engine

5. Make the new technology tune-able for quantum computing by using ever changing scopes.

6. The bottom line is that this works perfectly well on mobile devices because they are already constrained in Storage, CPU and RAM.

7. We also involved smart encryption to check the storage, cpu and ram size before encryption or decryption.

8. Adaptable anywhere encryption is needed: IoT and Desktops and server Applications plus Web Application and other Services.

We created this site www.lokdon.com to show you the scholarly work done and the prototype under test; sample. You can find the LokDon.apk for android there. We want to show you our integrated application’s User Interface and User Experience: We are building this as a startup in deploying a secured communication line of products for the future. If you support us you will get a free use of this application when it is finished. We have not decided on the licensing method for now but your support will encourage us to do what is right for the people that made it possible in building lokdon.--(Please lock down your mobile devices).

Take down:

https://igg.me/at/Josiah-Umezurike-lokdon

 

Other ways to help LokDon:


Get the word out about this campaign! (You can use the share tools on this page).

Try to let us know what we can do to make the campaign better. I mean don't try to fleece us. We are here for reasons that are quite obvious.

Send us your suggestions or whatever you think is needed.

How will the money be spent:

The money you are contributing will assist the team in hiring two more developers and one Security solution Architect. I know that the cost could be more but don't worry I will cover it with my resilient effort.  I promise you that within 6 months we will give you the privacy you need as long as our goal is reached.

Conclusion:

Our base technology is outstanding in all areas tested. We have no fear that it is here to stay. The fact that you are reading this right now is the confidence we have that you will understand the work we have put in to bring this knowledge to you. 

In a dynamic world there is no better way to change a single thing if we can not acknowledge a better idea and make it flourish. We can test it for ourselves and become convinced: It is also our duty for us to make it a public knowledge to educate others in a better way of doing things. This we must do in order to preserve wisdom and the dignity of humanity.

All donation will be put to use as stipulated  and all perks will be disbursed accordingly. The encryption between the internet and your computers, car, IoT and handheld devices will be done seamlessly regardless of the capacity. You will be able to re-gain and maintain you privacy once again.

Our base technology is outstanding in all areas tested. We have no fear that it is here to stay. The fact that you are reading this right now is the confidence we have that you will understand the work we have put in to bring this knowledge to you. 
In a dynamic world there is no better way to change a single thing if we can not acknowledge a better idea and make it flourish. We can test it for ourselves and become convinced: It is also our duty for us to make it a public knowledge to educate others in a better way of doing things. This we must do in order to preserve wisdom and the dignity of humanity.
All donation will be put to use as stipulated  and all perks will be disbursed accordingly. The encryption between the internet and your computers, car, IoT and handheld devices will be done seamlessly regardless of the capacity. You will be able to re-gain and maintain you privacy once again.

story:
What is "Data Boy"?

“Data Boy” is a multifunctional mobile phone accessory, designed for both Android and iOS. With a specially designed intelligent chip that has the ability to detect what you're using it for, it combines a storage drive, USB data cable, USB On-The-Go into one cleverly designed product.

It is the first of its kind with the wide number of applications. Anywhere and anytime, Data Boy is there to serve you.

Why we design "Data Boy"?

In daily life, we use a lot of common mobile phone accessories, such as Micro USB data cables, Lightning data cables, flash drives, OTG flash drives and handy 2 in 1 cables. With Data Boy, this is incorporated all into one product. You can even use a mobile phone as a power bank to lend power to other electronic devices for emergency use. We may not use our electronics at the same time, but once we need one of them, it may be a bit late and inconvenient to plug it in the wall.  

And that's our design philosophy behind our Data Boy. It fulfills your need of multi-way charging, data sync, data storage and multi-modes application. Considering the user experience, we put an intelligent chip inside so that it can automatically identify the circuit according to users needs. Very easy!

Special Features

Specification

Reward

story:
Urbanical Charger 

Compact 1500 mAh power bank and wall socket charger in one

A compact and clever 2-in-1 charger for your mobile devices: a Li-Polymer battery power bank with a wall socket charger.

A powerbank, however capacious it is, is never enough. Add a wall charger, and the energy supply will be unlimited – wherever you go.

This compact wall socket charger with Li-Polymer battery fits in your palm. Put it into your pocket or bag – it does not take up much space and weighs about a third of a pound.

Run out of juice? Urbanical charger helps you on the go!

  • A 1500 mAh power bank will breathe life back into your phone or tablet when you’re outdoors.
  • A wall socket charger comes to the rescue if the power bank is already empty, and there is still much work to do.

Li-Polymer battery (2 cells)

USB output:
1000 mA
5 V

Wall socket input:
600 mA
90-220 V

The LED indicator shows current power capacity and blinks while charging.  It has a funny cat’s face.

Urbanical charger does not have caps or additional details which usually get lost – just one piece of solid plastic with all the necessary functionality.

Plug pins are folded inside the body frame and pulled up when necessary. The USB socket is tighter than usual and located in such a way as to prevent the USB cable both from slipping out and from chafing at the plug – a common problem if you charge your phone on the go.


Safety

Urbanical charger has full over-current, over-charge, over-discharge and short circuit protection. We did our best to ensure its safety and reliability in such a compact form.

What We Need & What You Get

We have already invested a lot of efforts and funds in producing Urbanical charger for European plugs. Now we only need funds to produce US version, and we are sure it will be a great product for the US market.

The Recommended Retail price would be $25 per pc. All backers who would support us will be able to get it at a lower price. They will be the first ones in the world to get the Urbanical Chargers from the limited Indiegogo edition made especially for this campaign backers. 
For $1 - thank you.
For $5 - thank you so much.
For $10 - really appreciate your support.
For $19 (+ shipping costs) you will receive 1 piece of Urbanical Charger from the first installment of the limited Indiegogo edition. 
For $35 (+ shipping costs)  you will receive 2 pieces of Urbanical Charger from the first installment of the limited Indiegogo edition. 
For $50 (+ shipping costs) you will receive 3 pieces of Urbanical Charger from the first installment of the limited Indiegogo edition. 
For $150 (+ shipping costs) you will receive 12 pieces.  Don't rack your brain thinking of cool gifts to your friends! + You will get additional free gift: Our fantastic Cryptex USB flash drive 16 Gb in Steampunk antique gold finish (value $49,90)

For $500 (+ shipping costs) you will receive 40 pieces.  Small retailer pack + You will get additional free gift: Our fantastic Cryptex USB flash drive 16 Gb in Steampunk antique gold finish (value $49,90)
For $1000 (+ shipping costs) you will receive 90 pieces.  Medium retailer pack + You will get additional free gift: Our fantastic Cryptex USB flash drive 16 Gb in Steampunk antique gold finish (value $49,90)
For $2000 (+ shipping costs) you will receive 200 pieces.  Large retailer pack + You will get additional free gift: Our fantastic Cryptex USB flash drive 16 Gb in Steampunk antique gold finish (value $49,90)

Development

The original idea and design was offered by a Russian designer Dmitry Yekimov in summer of 2015, and it really impressed and inspired us. Dmitry is a young industrial designer from Moscow. Studies at Bauman Moscow State Technical University. Fond of engineering and technologies. We contacted the author and the design rights owner and agreed that we would make everything we could to bring this product to life. That was in June 2015.

The first stage of product development lasted till the end of September 2015. We faced some issues due to technological constraints and finally estimated actual measurements of the charger. We decided to use lithium polymer batteries to maximize the capacity in such a small product with an irregular shape.

All these months we spent in close cooperation with production managers of the factory where Urbanical Charger will be manufactured.

In October of 2015 we started to source components and calculate launch costs. First prototypes were 3D-printed. 

In November and December several hand-made functional prototypes were ready and we started producing the working prototypes of the European version of the charger (with the European plug and therefore different measurements).

Timeline

  • June 2015 – Inspired by a designer idea, we make a decision to bring this product to life
  • September 2015 – Product development. Engineering, design adjustments, sourcing for components and assembly line
  • October 2015 – First 3D printed prototypes
  • November 2015 – Launch the first hand-made working prototypes
  • December 2015 – Final engineering and design adjustments. Start of tooling production for a European plug version
  • January 2016 – Preparing marketing materials for a crowd funding campaign to launch the US plug version. Making photos and videos, discussing final technical points with production managers
  • February 2016 – the Indiegogo crowd funding campaign launch
  • March 2016 – tooling production  launch for the US plug version
  • April 2016 – mass production launch, once tooling is confirmed and everything is set up
  • May 2016 – estimated delivery time of the first installment and start of perks deliveries to backers
  • June 2016 – all perks are estimated to be delivered to backers

Risks and challenges

We are not new to the manufacturing process and our production factory is quite reliable, so we are confident that we can produce and deliver Urbanical Charger to all our contributors within a reasonable time frame.

Nevertheless, we cannot 100% guarantee the date of delivery we declared on the timeline here. We only can assure you that we will make every effort to be true to our word.

And of course we will keep you informed about our progress.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not able to contribute and take part in backing our campaign, we would very much appreciate any feedback. Do you like it? Would you recommend it to your friends? Tell us your thoughts! And please help us to promote this campaign.

story:
MiQi is Small


Small as a credit card,what can it do?

It is amazing!

MiQi is Powerful

MiQi is powered by Rockchip RK3288. RK3288 is a high performance application processor for high-end tablet, notebook, all-in-one device , smart monitor and TV-Box. Especially it is one of most powerful solution for 4Kx2K TV-Box.

  • Integrates quad-core Cortex-A17(up to 1.8GHz) with separately Neon and FPU coprocessor , also shared 1MB L2 Cache. More than 32bits address will support up to 8GB access space.
  • Powerful GPU is embedded to support smoothly high-resolution (3840x2160) display and mainstream game. Support OpenVG1.1, OpenGL ES1.1/2.0/3.0, OpenCL1.1, RenderScript and DirectX11 etc.
  • Full-format video decoder, including 4Kx2K multi-format decoder.

Antutu score(benchmark by cnxsoft)


"Vellamo Score is very excellent with 3308 points for Chrome Browser, 3,021 points for the stock Browser, 2,019 for multicore, and 1,322 points for the Metal test."




MiQi is Expandable

MiQi includes an HDMI 2.0 port, four USB 2.0 ports, a micro USB port, and 16-pin and 12-pin expansion headers. The board equip with up to 2GB LPDDR3 memory, up to 32GB EMMC storage space, and of course a Micro SDCard interface can be extended more space;


The expansion headers includes Uart x 2, I2S x 1, PWM x 1, SPDIF x 1, I2C x 1, SPI x 1, GPIO. There are 2 PIN for RTC battery input on the 16-pin expansion headers.


MiQi is Productive

We provide dual OS images for MiQi, Lubuntu 14.04 and Android 5.1. We can use Linux Desktop Environment  to do many thing, e.g. surfing the Internet, writing document, listening to the music, editing pictures, ...



MiQi is Versatile

MiQi also runs Android 5.1 OS for entertainment.


Fun dual system allows you to easily switch to download a variety of fun and interesting applications.

MiQi is also a cost-effective, ultra-scalable development tool regardless of IT, electronics enthusiasts, geeks, from which children can get what you want.
Whether office, play games, micro-server, it can be easy to learn programming job.

 MiQi while an open-source product, you can easily get support from the open source community, as you can also implement their own ideas, their share to the community, so that more people benefit, currently supported open source system Ubuntu, Android5.1, Debian,
And this is just the beginning ....
This is MiQi
Small world, big heart, than you think
Your world, because it is different


About the Perks


Perk 1 - $35 ( Single Board)

1GB DDR RAM + 8GB eMMC


Perk 2 - $49

1GB DDR RAM + 8GB eMMC


Perk 3 - $69( Single Board)

2GB DDR RAM + 32GB eMMC

Perk 4 - $79

2GB DDR RAM + 32GB eMMC


Perk 5 - $109

2GB DDR RAM + 32GB eMMC



About the Shipping

We've finished the MiQi board design and produced abount 50 pieces .  We will start manufacturing it in 10 days after the end of this campaign. If successful fundraising, we plan to start shipping in July 5th, 2016.

story:
We are running a diaspora service at poddery.com close to 3 years (we saved this service around 3 years back when it was about to close down. See save.poddery.com for our last campaign).

  • We host more than 2600+ users in the diaspora network
  • We stand up for privacy and resisting surveillance. We host our services outside USA.
  • We added more hardware, active users and more features including xmpp real time chat.

You'll sustain the private communication service for its current users and new users who will join us.


What is at stake?

  1. A diaspora pod with a large user base
  2. It is running since early days of diaspora (after joindiaspora.com and diasp.org)
  3. Best mobile support for xmpp chat (has all important modules enabled in prosody), features comparable with conversations.im

We need to pay for the server and spend time maintaining the service in good shape.

  • We are hosting with scaleway.com. Currently it costs 29.07 USD  for one month (it includes main server at 13.44 USD and backup server at 3.35 USD. Remaining is cost for additional disk space and IP address) and 348.84 USD per year.
  • You'll ensure private communications for over 2600+ users.
  • If we can't raise enough funds for 2 years, we'll keep it running as long as the funds last.
  • All contributors will be listed on poddery.com. See previous contributors list.

What are the maintenance tasks?

  1. Hosting migration (we did linode.com -> knightswarm.com -> gandi.net -> scaleway.com already - better offer or host shutdown their service)
  2. Setting up and maintaining backup of user data
  3. Keep diaspora and prosody (xmpp server for real time chat service) updated
  4. Troubleshoot issues (disk was full, bot users were out of control, bugs that caused issues - imagemagick, oembed)
  5. Integrating new XEPs (like mam, xmpp over https) for adding more features to realtime xmpp chat service
  6. Currently the maintenance is mostly a one man job and since Praveen does not have a day job to sustain his living expenses, paying him for the time he spend maintaining poddery.com will mean supporting his contributions to other Free Software projects as well. We estimate the effort required at 150 USD/day (8 hour) rate as 5 days (40 hours) a year. This fund will be used to pay other podmins in the team as well.

Cost break down (for 2 years)

  1. Hosting charges: 700 USD
  2. Buffer for expansion: 300 USD
  3. Consulting charges (podmin support fund): 1500 USD
  4. Per user charge (per year): (2500/2)/2600 = 50 cents
  5. 2200 USD for current expense, 300 USD buffer for expansion.

Risks & Challenges

Some issues need immediate attention and having someone to look at it as priority will help solve those issues quickly.

Credits

  • Video Editing: Jishnu
  • Campaign Drawing: 夜來霧 - jakobu
  • Homepage design: Abhijith Balan

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute, you can help spread the word:

  • Share this crowd funding campaign with your friends
  • If you are using a different pod, it would be a good time to support your podmin.
  • Help your friends reclaim privacy by introducing diaspora to them.

And that's all there is to it.

If you are from India and don't have a credit card, you can send money directly to Praveen's account via NEFT/IMPS or cash deposits.

My bank account details:
Name: PRAVEEN ARIMBRATHO DIYIL
A/C: 646101503208
Branch: Erandwana, Pune
Bank: ICICI
IFSC: ICIC0006461

You can also send bitcoins to 1DocbXFp8Yp9HReK3A8QKwEjavDGjYapMA

story:
Truly connect to your home and the world

Introducing the Smart Droid by Vewnet the world's first truly mobile surveillance camera bringing people together.

With our long distance controlled Smart Droid you can move from room to room freely, from your smart phone or tablet from any where in the world.

Through our testing process we have found children's behaviour and work ethic changed dramatically with a smart droid in there home.

Even when the camera was off, and animals become more relaxed when there is a familiar person at home all be it a robot.



Stay connected with friends and family

Our vision was to was to give the feeling of being in two places at one time through vision movement and sound.

As of 2015 there are 245 million surveillance cameras worldwide, and behavioural traits of people change when they're being watched.

Our surveillance droid takes away the coldness of prying eyes and allows you to monitor in a way that we can all familiarise through movement, vision and sound.

Leaving your eyes, ears, legs and mouth at home whilst staying connected to your friends and family.

Built in Camera, Microphone, Wheels and Speaker a cute droid which you have control of.



Instant motion detection straight to your smart phone

Sensors for pets and sensors for people, toggle on and off detections for one or the other or both? You choose, it's your home and how you monitor is as equally yours.



We wanted the Vewnet to be beautiful when moving and when stood still, change the clock theme to suit your home LCD screen while movement is optional as it does drain battery while away from the charging point.




Connecting you and the world



App soon to be available on the App Store and Play Store


Security

All information is stored on a local device secured by password protection within your own mini network. The surveillance droid's camera, movement, controls and data are only accessible by the owner.

And any movement notification or location pushed to a 3rd party are just that, unless your username and password are provided.

Specs

Surveillance camera (1080p HD / 30 fps) & Motion Sensor 
LED (12,000 mcd)
Mono Microphone with Speaker 
LCD Smart Screen
Lithium Rechargable Battery 1200mah
Wireless USB Ating 
Rubber tyres for durability on indoor flooring (ie Carpet, Wood, and Ceramic)
Temperature: 0~40ºC Indoor use only

Inside the box

Surveillance Droid
Wireless Charging Dock
USB cable
Vewnet Protected Window Sticker

The future
Together with the help of the Indiegogo community he can take a closer step into the future.
story_txt:
Truly connect to your home and the worldIntroducing the Smart Droid by Vewnet the world's first truly mobile surveillance camera bringing people together.With our long distance controlled Smart Droid you can move from room to room freely, from your smart phone or tablet from any where in the world.Through our testing process we have found children's behaviour and work ethic changed dramatically with a smart droid in there home.Even when the camera was off, and animals become more relaxed when there is a familiar person at home all be it a robot.Stay connected with friends and familyOur vision was to was to give the feeling of being in two places at one time through vision movement and sound.As of 2015 there are 245 million surveillance cameras worldwide, and behavioural traits of people change when they're being watched.Our surveillance droid takes away the coldness of prying eyes and allows you to monitor in a way that we can all familiarise through movement, vision and sound.Leaving your eyes, ears, legs and mouth at home whilst staying connected to your friends and family.Built in Camera, Microphone, Wheels and Speaker a cute droid which you have control of.Instant motion detection straight to your smart phoneSensors for pets and sensors for people, toggle on and off detections for one or the other or both? You choose, it's your home and how you monitor is as equally yours.We wanted the Vewnet to be beautiful when moving and when stood still, change the clock theme to suit your home LCD screen while movement is optional as it does drain battery while away from the charging point.


Connecting you and the worldApp soon to be available on the App Store and Play StoreSecurityAll information is stored on a local device secured by password protection within your own mini network. The surveillance droid's camera, movement, controls and data are only accessible by the owner.And any movement notification or location pushed to a 3rd party are just that, unless your username and password are provided.SpecsSurveillance camera (1080p HD / 30 fps) & Motion Sensor LED (12,000 mcd)Mono Microphone with Speaker LCD Smart ScreenLithium Rechargable Battery 1200mahWireless USB Ating Rubber tyres for durability on indoor flooring (ie Carpet, Wood, and Ceramic)Temperature: 0~40ºC Indoor use onlyInside the boxSurveillance DroidWireless Charging DockUSB cableVewnet Protected Window StickerThe futureTogether with the help of the Indiegogo community he can take a closer step into the future.

story:
YOU ARE IN CONTROL - Life Control the perfect solution for an individual or enterprise – guaranteed secure access system and program in a “for-your- eyes” only mode at all times!

System access and password authentication done for you without compromise!  Protect yourself, your system, your applications eliminating all the frustration of conventional  methods!

THE GENESIS - Life Control created by techies with security and compliance backgrounds who witnessed the extreme frustration of a group of busy healthcare professionals who continuously lost valuable time, money and focus way from their primary function of patient care.  

PROBLEM - The routine of constantly having to go through mundane processes of logging in and logging off their systems and programs together with the hassles associated with multiple password memorization, being locked out, prying eyes, data security breaches and worry.

A SOLUTION ALREADY - Life Control in its prototype version is fully functional that has put a smile back on these professionals by eliminating conventional system access while maintaining maximum security.  Currently being used by professionals on the east coast in United States.

BENEFITS - Given this real world experience – the Life Control team believes that this solution offered as a physical token or a smart phone application will provide the very same benefits to any individual or enterprise.  Everyone has to deal with the same issues of access control, passwords, authentication, breaches and ever prevalent cyber-security threats.

COST EFFECTIVE - A small monthly subscription fee will reap the benefits of this simple yet powerful device so that users can focus on the more important aspects of their work rather than worry about redundant yet required tasks.

USE OF FUNDS - To expand research and development to make this solution more feature and functionality rich.

  • To improve design, marketing and augment working capital.
  • To create a global foot print for a product born in the United States but suited for the whole world.
  • Play a part with us to beat the data breaches, prying eyes and cyber criminals 

RISK -  As with any technological solution there are risks with dynamically and ever-changing technology.  Thus a sizeable portion of the funds would be deployed to research and development in keeping with technology advancements and innovation.

BUZZ - Help by spreading the good word and the advantages – experience the power of a simple device that puts you in charge of your systems and applications.

story:
myAAC: A Product with Life-Changing Benefits

Hello!  We are a group of three high school seniors looking to make a lasting impression on the world.  Our project, named myAAC, comes from a class offered in our school called Biomedical Design and Development.  To start off, our budget was $40, an amount that won't even pay for our lab fees for one day.  As a result, we've turned to Indiegogo in hopes that we can raise enough money to make our invention a reality.  

Within the first month of school this year, we had decided on our task for the year: to create a working case for speech devices, or AAC devices, that are used by non-verbal people all over the world.  It's been a problem for years, and we aim to solve it as effectively as possible.  These devices are expensive, most of the time upwards of $5,000, and with the extra expenses most of these families face, buying another one is out of the question.  To reduce the chances of one of these devices breaking, we have designed a specialized case that we believe can end this possibility once and for all.  We would be one of the only cases on the market designed for these devices, and the only built specifically for protection.  The only way that this goal can be achieved is with your help.

 

What We Need 

As our project has reached the point where we need to build a prototype, and eventually a final product, we realized quickly that our $40 budget was not going to be enough to make our case.  To find out just how much we needed, we completed a cost analysis to find out how much it would eventually come out to.  Between buying materials, getting lab time, making molds, and eventually getting a patent, we came up with a total goal of $10,000.  Most of this will be going towards our patent, which will give us control over our product and out of the hands of companies looking to make as much money as possible.  Our very first case is being made specifically for a young student at The Langan School in Albany, NY, but we don't want to stop there.  We hope to take it further, and possibly create our own company out of our idea which can hopefully help us get through college. 

 

The Impact

We aim to have a worldwide impact on the disabled community, making their lives easier by eliminating the worry of breaking their communication device.  Our project is valuable in that it is something that hasn't been created before, and is a huge improvement on what's available on the market.  Investing in our project will help ease the costs put on families with non-verbal children, and it will impact the disabled population in a positive way.

 

Risks & Challenges

Getting to our goal will be no easy task, but it's one that we are determined to achieve, and most of all do it the right way.  If four years of high school has taught us anything, it's that the most challenging projects are the ones that are the most rewarding in the end.  As a group, our perseverance is strengthened by our passion for our product, and the idea that it could have such a positive impact.  An obstacle that we are bound to hit at some point during our project is improving upon our prototype once tests are finished.  Our plan for this, if any problems come up, is then to brainstorm, and design an idea that we all agree on.  Brainstorming is what got us here in the first place, and it has not failed to bring about new, innovative ideas. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you aren't able to donate at this time, we would ask kindly that you spread the word to anyone who would be willing to listen.  The more people that we have supporting our campaign, the more opportunity we have to help those in need.  And also, don't forget to share our campaign on social media, as well as right here on Indiegogo!  It's only a few steps, and it would help us out tremendously.  Thank you so much for your interest in myAAC, and hopefully we succeed in Protecting the Voice of the Voiceless.

story:
It’s more than wireless – it’s touchless.

Electronic devices have changed the way we live. They give us a constant connection to both an endless amount information and with each other. But, no matter how much the tech inside our electronic devices has evolved, one thing has remained constant. The way we charge them. It’s time for change. With Moye Touchless charging, you can turn any surface into a touchless charging station, so you’ll never have stress about your battery level, searching for outlets or charging cables again. Welcome to the evolution of wireless charging.

 

      

 

 

 

Easy Charge. Easy Go.

The Moye Charging Base generates a large, powerful electromagnetic field that charges your phone no matter how it is positioned. Unlike existing wireless charging systems which require your device to be positioned precisely over a sweet spot, the flexibility of the Moye means you don’t have to think about how you place your phone or whether it’s actually charging or not.

The Moye’s charging base provides a large 25 X 16 cm charging area, where even the largest of phones can easily rest and pick up power.

 

Our sleek, lightweight Moye Charging Cases keep your phone protected and ready for touchless charging. Pick your choice of White or Black cases for iPhone 6, 6S, 6+, 6S+ and iPhone 7!

Charging your phone with the Moye is as safe as plugging it into the wall. Your phone won’t heat up like it does with inductive charging methods, nor will the base emit any dangerous radiation. Safe and sound.

Magnetic Resonance Charging (A4WP)

In a nutshell, the Moye works by transferring electromagnetic waves in the form of electrical energy through the air and into a receiver inside your Moye Case. Energy is transferred through Resonance Charging Technology (A4WP), a new standard of wireless charging invented to resolve the shortcomings of previous Magnetic Induction (Qi) Charging systems. The innovations behind A4WP have led to the standard’s adoption by some of the world’s leading technology manufacturers like Qualcomm, Samsung, Texas Instruments and many more.

The Moye Touchless Charging base has a stunning glossy finish, ideal for matching your pre-existing electronics’ color scheme. Available in White, Rose Gold and Black, our design team built the Moye to be as unobtrusive as possible, opting for a minimalist design with no unnecessary buttons or switches. A simple, discreet LED indicator located at the top of the Moye glows when your device is being charged and a gentle incline on the body of the base lets you easily rest your devices. While you can fix the base under your desk and charge through the surface, the beautiful design means you just might not want to.

 

FAQ

What is “Touchless” Charging?

Touchless charging is a revolutionary charging technique based upon the A4WP wireless charging standard. Essentially, it allows your phone to charge without making physical contact with the Moye Charging Base. This means your phone will charge up to 5cm above the Moye, whether you’re holding it above the base or charging through the surface of your desk or table.

What phones is the Moye case compatible with?

To start, we are manufacturing Moye cases for the following smartphone models:

  • iPhone 6/6s
  • iPhone 6/6s Plus
  • iPhone 7 and iPhone 7 Plus

Will the Moye Case protect my phone?

Yes, the Moye Cases are made of durable, high-grade materials that protect your phone from everyday wear and tear.

Is Touchless charging safe?
Yes, the Moye Touchless Charger emits no radiation and no excess magnetic fields. Plus, unlike other wireless charging methods, the Moye’s resonance charging technology doesn’t heat up your device.

Is Moye compatible with Qi or other wireless charging technologies?

The Moye Touchless Charger utilizes resonance technology to provide touchless charging and is therefore not compatible with other wireless charging technologies like Qi.

Where on Moye’s charging base should I place my phone?

Anywhere you want! Unlike other wireless charging technologies, the Moye supports position-less charging meaning it will charge no matter how your phone is oriented over the charging base.

How fast can the Moye charge my phone?

Charging a full cycle with the Moye takes approximately 2 hours when charging an iPhone 6s. That’s roughly the same amount of time it takes to charge with a standard plug.

story:
Turn your Phone into a Microscope!

Explore your world in 60x with our clip-on Phone Field Microscope.

Everything looks awesome in 60x. But not every phone magnifier is awesome. Many attempts to magnify with a single lens have created less than satisfactory images.

How we got started

60x started as a project at the Australian Science and Mathematics School, where we were exploring ways which we could engage students in science, by empowering them to explore the world around them. We came across a phone attachable microscope designed for currency checking that kids loved. With this, we have run many successful sessions in schools across Australia. We have run hundreds of workshops with schools, museums, and science events, as you can see here > www.60x.co . Through this experience, we realized the limitations of the current version. So we developed our own.

How is our clip-on 60x different?

  • Multiple-lens system - to create a crisp magnified image, with much less distortion and chromatic aberration than single lens or bead designs
  • Full-screen image - we use a lens close to the phone to capture a large view from the camera
  • No external lighting required - by reflecting the light from the camera's flashlight, we can light up an object in day or night
  • Easy to use - all you need to do is clip the microscope onto your phone and open your camera app.

100's of iterations later

We came up with a design that works well. Thanks to the excellent facilities of the New Venture Institute @ Flinders Unversity we were able to 3D print, laser cut, and develop the design for production.

We are 3D printing a limited number of microscopes in time for Christmas. They work just as well, but there is a limit to the numbers that we can 3D print. With your support, we can fund the moulds for mass production.

Who is this for?

We are still discovering this. We have run many workshops with a previous version of the 60x microscope in over 30 schools and museums worldwide. It has been a definite win with kids. But we have found that not only kids, but their parents and grandparents enjoy exploring the word in 60x.

Who else?

  • Gardeners and Farmers - to identify bugs
  • Doctors - to take a closer look at skin for moles and eyes
  • Naturalist - to take on trips and capture the nature
  • Museums - to run sessions with kids
  • Schools - to let kids explore the world around them
  • Universities - as a lab tool
  • Citizen Science - to turbocharge exploration
  • Electronics Repair - to identify faults

 

Why should you be using it? 

There is no reason not to. Pledge NOW !

story:
Conception 

I have absolutely no background in mobile technology however back in April 2017 I texted a friend asking where I can get a good guitar.  I then texted again asking if I should just go to Cash Converters online.  It was right then that it occurred to me that it would be so handy if a link to Cash Converters could be created simply by typing in their name.  I could then follow the link to their website whilst still sending the text to my friend whom could then follow the link to the website.  My friend could also reply with a link to a guitar shop they recommend simply by typing in the name of that guitar shop and choosing the option to create the link if that shop is a subscriber to SMS Link.  

I was then advised by a developer that keywords could be utilised so that when I type 'guitar', a list of local guitar shops whom are subscibers to SMS Link would be displayed from which I can choose one to review.  Similarly, my friend can use the same process when choosing a guitar shop to recommend.

Development

I have three quotes from developers to create an MVP/prototype for this app and consequently need to raise $17,600 for this stage of the project.  The minimum I need to get it started is $8,800.  Any amount would be helpful to get the project started so if my fund raising goal isn't reached it would certainly go a long way to making this app a reality.

The developer I favour also includes face time with industry experts to assist with taking the MVP/prototype to market as part of the package.

The ultimate goal is for all SMS apps to include SMS Link as a default feature.  Once the MVP/prototype is complete we will approach comapnies such as Google, Apple, Samsung etc. to adopt the feature.

Completion

I, and everybody I have discussed this with, believe that this is a fantastic and viable innovation in SMS app technology.  Everybody with an SMS enabled phone can have access to this feature and the benefits to local business is that users would be directed to their website/app/contact details simply by composing a text.  The keyword feature would bring local business to the attention of the user even though they may not know the business exists.

We envisage subscription fees to start from $2 per month so absolutely affordable and viable for any business.

I have a provisional patent for this innovation and am absolutely certain that this is unique.

This is ground breaking technology and I would be delighted if you can assist me with making it a reality.

story:
Collaborate Your Vehicle, Your Life

The technology we carry in our pocket has changed the way we listen to music, connect with others, and navigate the world.  We spend more time organizing our lives through our devices that it's inevitable that they are integrated into our transportation.  In the United States alone, Americans spend approximately 300 hours driving each year and yet there’s no definitive transition from our phones to our vehicles.  Most solutions revolve around the use of cables or Bluetooth and still leave the phone just haphazardly tossed into the cupholder or hanging from a dock mounted to the dashboard.  Moreover, the use of Bluetooth or Aux inputs can create lower quality sound as the conversion is completed from the phone’s internal Digital Analog Converter (DAC) before sending to the head unit. The Gavin Moto Mod bridges that gap and makes us more efficient in connecting our lives.  Once connected to the Galvin Moto Mod the Moto Z series not only becomes the faceplate of the stereo, but also the source of your music, navigation, personal assistant, and so much more.

The Convenience You Take Everywhere

The smartphone is no longer a peripheral device or personal assistant, it’s become an extension of ourselves and a branding of how we identify ourselves.  From the wallpaper background to the specific apps which connect us to our friends and family, smartphones carry our personality, music, and home… so why not our transportation too.

A Synergy Between Your Personality and Your Vehicle

We’re watching the smartphone evolve and by transforming the smartphone with the Galvin Moto Mod you’re not only integrating your Moto Z phone into your vehicle but also collaborating the smartphone and vehicle to be resourceful and ingenious.  It’s more than just a “smart” phone when connected to the Galvin Moto Mod, it becomes a “brilliant” phone.  Just like your phone, your vehicle is an extension of your personality and what better accent to your vehicle than your phone. Once installed the Galvin Moto Mod is the largest and most diverse looking Moto Mod ever created as it takes the shape of your vehicle.

Integrating Driver Safety

Safety on the road is critical to protecting our family and friends.  By physically taking the phone out of hands of drivers the Galvin Moto Mod creates safer roads and driving habits in a world where always connected is causing accidents, many of which are taking our loved ones away.  The Galvin app will include functionality which promotes driver safety and will integrate new “Ease of Use” controls, along with Google Assistant to access many Google services you use to get to your destination safely and enjoy your drive, all while supporting safety on our streets and highways.

By integrating the Galvin Moto Mod into your vehicle, you're creating the largest Moto Mod as it's virtually not an extension of what you drive, but a continuation of your personality and all the hard work you put into organizing your life with your smartphone.  Galvin is the transition to collaborate your life.

 

It's Truly a Motorola Once Again

The Galvin Moto Mod brings Motorola back to its roots.  Motorola began not as a company but as a product brand name in 1930.  It was a brand created by Paul Galvin, one of two brothers (the other being Joseph) who founded Galvin Manufacturing Corporation in 1928.  While Motorola products were not the first or only products produced by Galvin Manufacturing Corporation, the Motorola brand was so well known that Galvin Manufacturing Corporation changed its name to Motorola.  The Galvin Moto Mod is a homage to the success of the Galvin Manufacturing Corporation’s Motorola car radio products and serves to bring the Motorola we know today, back to the brand and product its famous namesake is based.

 

Resource Requirements

The core needs for the Galvin Moto Mod project is in the acquisition of necessary resources.  All these items are allocated directly to the project and ZERO of the funds will be used for personal salaries, wages, or compensation of any kind to myself.  This project is to expand the potential to create efficiencies and safety in our lives and as such the funds will be used to acquire only the resources required to develop this Mod (Stipulation: If the campaign funds exceed 250% of the goal, more outsourcing of software consulting services may be used to expedite the App development).  Funds will be used to purchase resources in developing, prototyping, and launching the product of this project such as:

  • Raw materials (e.g. Electronic Components, DIN Cases, etc.)
  • Equipment and hardware (e.g. 3D Printer, Testing Meters, Oscilloscope, etc.)
  • Software Consulting – Minor Use (e.g. App Development Support, etc.)

Early prototypes are currently in-progress but the resources provided by the campaign funds will expedite much of the development process.

 

Perks

Support for this Indiegogo campaign means you want more out of the products you already own and care about safety on our roads.  The following perks are available when you pledge to this campaign:

$350 Pledge

Essentially a three-fer offer.  Receive a prototype, Early Bird Special on the Galvin Hardware, and two Galvin Apps codes.  Shipping included on hardware and Galvin hardware will include an app code so you get two (4) App codes.  Only six (6) $350 Pledges are available.

$150 Pledge

Early Bird Special on the Galvin Hardware and a Galvin App code Perk.  Galvin hardware will include an app code so you get two (2) App codes.

$100 Pledge

The Galvin Maker Kit.  This perk is for makers who love a project. This includes all hardware, components, and instructions for that do-it-yourselfer who loves to build. This project is a must for a Maker with a Moto Z. Soldering is required. Shipping included on hardware and the hardware kit will include an app code so you get two (2) app codes.

$35 Pledge

Family Galvin App Perk - Receive five (5) Galvin App codes.

$15 Pledge

Good Things Come In Twos Perk – Receive two (2) Galvin App codes.

$8 Pledge

The Galvin App Perk – Receive one (1) Galvin App code.

$1 Pledge

Say you care about this idea and receive a thank you email.  Every little bit counts so show your support with what you can give.

App codes will be distributed once the app is ready for market.  Android is the foundation of the Moto Z series phones and will be the focus and initial launch OS of the Galvin App.  A flexible goal was selected to push this project whether the goal was achieved.  If the goal is not met all funds still go to the development of the Galvin Moto Mod and all perks will be honored for those who pledged.  Prototypes may not contain the same functionality as the final Galvin hardware.

 

The Impact

While I began this project only as a personal goal to create my own Moto Mod for my vehicles (I enjoy classic cars which really didn’t have any tech in them), I began to see the opportunity to create a safer way we get to our destination and be more resourceful with our smartphones.  The idea of Galvin is threefold:

  1. Create a Moto Mod hardware to quickly integrate our smartphones into our vehicles;
  2. Take the phones out of our hands so we can focus on driving; and,
  3. Develop new, safer efficiencies for interacting with the audio device in our vehicles.

The potential is exponential, particularly when looking at the advancement of personal assistants in our smartphones.  The opportunities are endless and moreover will truly impact how we interact with our vehicles.  The objectives of this project are to make better use of what we already took the time to organize in our phones and create a safer driving environment by:

Reducing the time take to interact with our audio devices

Allowing drivers more time to focus on driving and the vehicles it shares on the road, safer roadways become an outcome.

Better use of your media

You already organize your music, playlists, and essentially your life on your smartphones so making better use of what you spent your precious time organizing makes you more efficient.

Elasticity of the App

The hardware and App are developed to work as a seamless integration for those with a Moto Z Series smartphone, but the idea of creating efficiencies and safety in our vehicles will have a greater impact the more it is utilized.  Thus, as a secondary objective once the hardware and App are completed, porting the app to be used outside the Moto Mod will further the values and goals of the Galvin project.

 

Risks & Challenges

When developing an interface device for vehicles, the developer can tread a fine line between trying to integrate functionality while maintaining safety.  Too much integration of services can reduce the safety factor from the device and app, while not enough functionality renders the hardware and app ineffectual.    Finding the correct balance will take time to test, review, and revise to meet the needs of this project.  If not guided by structure and predefined objectives, this project can easily deviate from its intended purpose.  As such, the following mission, vision, and values are established:

Mission

Creating hardware and software which better utilizes smartphone services while promoting vehicle operator safety.

Vision

To get every driver to their destination safely while enjoying the drive.

Values

Safety before functionality.  Two aspects are competing for the performance quality in this project: Safety and Functionality.  The values thus define a priority for decision-making during this project. 

The challenges facing this project align with the development plan as this project contains two main products: The Galvin Hardware and the Galvin App.  The development plan is summarized by the following outline:

  1. Develop the Galvin Hardware
  2. Create the Galvin App for use with the Galvin Hardware
  3. Port the Galvin App as a stand-alone app for use without the Galvin Hardware

 

About the Developer

The development team consists of me, a humble Financial Analyst by day, Safety Professor at my local California State University by night, and hobby electrical engineer/fabricator/coder in my spare time.  I have been working with electronics for the past 15 years and worked for a C-10 Electrical Contractor as the Safety and Human Resources Director to integrate safety and process efficiencies in the workplace.  A natural transition is to bring safety and organization in our personal lives.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Make some noise about the Galvin Moto Mod and Galvin App.  You can find us on Twitter and Instagram:

@pinkinkandchaos

Posting about the Galvin Hardware and App will help spread the word but if you talk about options or functionality you’d like to see it might just become a part of the finished product.  Let me and everyone else know what you want to see in these products by using these hashtags when posting:

            #GalvinMotoMod

            #GalvinApp

            #pincApp

And don’t forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
I&Phone is the complete anti-theft smartphone solution engineered to locate lost or stolen phones. With a simple mobile application and I&Phone card, I&Phone's features establish theft prevention measures to provide phone owners a sense of security and ease.

 

 

 

I&Phone can be utilized anytime anywhere. I&Phone is not limited by any particular distance, making all its features function properly and accordingly. Whether your phone is lost at work, school, home, or a long-distance away, I&Phone will be able to help finding its location with no problem.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Simply place the I&Phone Card rear the mobile phone (NFC function phone) for wireless charging. Charging time is under 1 hour and battery life is 1 month

 

 

 

 

I&Phone Locker is installed on a user's device. In the case that a user's smartphone is stolen or lost, Locker will prevent the phone from being turned off to allow for it to be located. (supported OS: Android 6.0+)

 

I&Phone Finder is installed on another device. In the case that a user's smartphone is stolen or lost, Finder will assist the user in locating the phone. (supported OS: Android 5.0+)

 

You can install apps automatically using NFC features. If you carry the card behind your phone, you can move to a screen where you can install apps.  

I&Phone can be installed by searching from the Google play App Store

 

Generic anti-theft applications can only track lost or stolen phones when they are turned on. I&Phone Locker, through Protected Mode, prevents the smartphone from being turned off in order to track its location. Furthermore, I&Phone captures photos and videos from the front/rear view cameras to identify the thief in the case that the phone is stolen and sends them directly to the user's email and secondary phone. 

 

 

 

 

I&Phone Card supports Android OS only.
Please check the OS of your phone before make a pledge.

 

 

 

When you purchasing the Early Bird, Early Double, Double pack, Family Pack, Group Pack, Mega Pack, we send a free App Code via e-mail. The App is available  use before you received the product.

 

 

 

Iotok Co., Ltd. seeks to develop products and services for “Safe and Fun Outdoor Life”. It has become prevalent that personal information has not been protected and accessed by illegal means. We plan to expand our services to help people in various ways such as kidnap prevention and finding lost pets and stolen goods. Our ultimate goal is to provide safety network services for what you value most.

 

 

 

 

Risk and Challenges

We currently have a functional prototype of I&Phone that is ready for mass production. However, we are aware that there may be necessary changes to meet manufacturing requirements. Our policy is to make sure that our backers are continuously informed of any updates or changes. Our campaign will exhibit full transparency and full updates will be given to our backers when needed. We look forward to providing I&Phone to our backers. Until then, keep your phones safe!

"Service without personal information collection and hacking concern" "I&phone app" does not retrieve personal records after installation. When using app, there is no need to subscribe to any service. Password and phone number entries are only usable without the server, so "Finder" is linked to phone with "Locker" installed. Thus, it is 100% hack-free, securing personal information, files, and records.

story:
www.protwig.com

Welcome to the ProTwig first ever crowdfunding campaign.
Our team have been in the gaming world for more then 30 years combined.

Mobile app games have been evolving like a rocket.
Today's games are so highly developed so you can't keep up with the best players, until now.
 

ProTwig Version 2.0

ProTwig Version 1.0

After we made ProTwig V 1.0 we listen to our costumers and with your help and constructive criticism be built ProTwig 2.0

The handling and positioning of the new and improved ProTwig have been so great that every one of our test panels have been giving us the thumbs up

It doesn't matter if you are a new player or a advanced player in the gaming world, It doesn't matter if you play everyday or once a week, we created ProTwig for everyone to enjoy their gaming on a new level.

Protwig will put back life in those games that you loved on your Console or computer but you quit playing on your device beacuse of bad controls.

Everyone that bought our first version will be very grateful of the new version of ProTwig

The speed and accuracy and firm grip that you will get with the new version will beat all your expectations, you can always count on your controls, that is a promise.

We are ready to manufacture the new and improved ProTwig V 2.0 
Now we need you help and the Indiegogo community to make this a reality so we can continue to offer the latest gaming tools for a great price.

The Idea have always been the same for ProTwig, we want our customers to feel that you are playing on a PS4 or Xbox controller

 

If you are reading this then we want to say thank you for reading and watching our very first crowdfunding campaign, we wish you all the best and keep on gaming.

 

www.protwig.com

story:
You haven‘t heard from us in quite a while. We didn't just lean back and relax. Instead we put our heads together, evaluated all your feedback and comments and came up with a plan what to do as a stretch goal.

We are proud to present to you today High Five® C. This version of High Five® has a USB-C to USB-C connection, fast-charging and data transfer.

Also, we want to give you more freedom in personalizing High Five® by introducing the ABS-version. This lets you choose the color of the High Five® body as well.

High Five® Color has the same connections as the original: USB-C, USB-A, Micro-USB and Lightning.Find all new product information in the tables below, to help you find the version of High Five® that suits you best.

This incredible product has five different connections and is compatible with virtually all your portable devices. High Five® has two parts: a versatile charging cable with connectors at both ends (Micro-USB, Lightning, USB-C) and the robust metal body is a USB-A adapter with ports for the respective connectors. All bundled into a beautiful and compact design that easily attaches to your key ring.
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 


 
 
 

USB-A power source to USB-C end device

USB-A power source to iPhone, iPad or iPod

USB-A power source to Micro-USB end device

 

USB-C power source to iPhone, iPad or iPod

USB-C power source to Micro-USB end device

 
 
 
 
 
 
High Five® becomes one of your everyday essentials. It is conveniently with you on your key ring and brings order to your life, no need to carry more than one cable with you!
 
 
 

 

 

High Five® is made of 12 different metals to tolerate your everyday elements. The cable connectors are magnets to guarantee a firm hold on your key ring.

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

The design was developed in collaboration with Emami Design under the direction of Arman Emami. The Berlin-based design agency Emami Design has received more than 79 international awards to date and has been ranked first in the RED-DOT Ranking for best design concepts for ten years among other design agencies from all across Europe and America.

At the beginning of May our production team started to conceptualize High Five®. We wanted to engineer a product that combines versatility and a beautiful yet compact design.

After sketching first drafts, we digitally transferred the design. Thanks to the amazing technology of 3D printing, we had our first dummy prototype ready in no time, that proved to be  both stylish and compact. Our first functioning prototype was an ultimate success, resulting in the protected design of High Five® which is presented here.

 

 

 

We have an amazing color range to best reflect your personality and lifestyle. Are you a Pink Panther or do you see yourself on an Ocean Wave?

 

 

The high-quality packaging is specifically designed to be small and compact to save natural resources. Our packaging is always made from sustainably produced paper (FSC certified) and is 100% recyclable.

 

 

Back us now and take advantage of the incredible rewards. Save 50% and more depending on the perk you choose! These incredible deals are only available during the campaign.

 

 

 

Vonmählen is a start-up from Northern Germany. We find solutions to the challenges in our innovative world. Vonmählen engineers, designs and crafts superior tech accessories for your lifestyle. Our goal is to create products that are convenient but also top-quality and beautifully designed.
story_txt:
You haven‘t heard from us in quite a while. We didn't just lean back and relax. Instead we put our heads together, evaluated all your feedback and comments and came up with a plan what to do as a stretch goal.We are proud to present to you today High Five® C. This version of High Five® has a USB-C to USB-C connection, fast-charging and data transfer.Also, we want to give you more freedom in personalizing High Five® by introducing the ABS-version. This lets you choose the color of the High Five® body as well.High Five® Color has the same connections as the original: USB-C, USB-A, Micro-USB and Lightning.Find all new product information in the tables below, to help you find the version of High Five® that suits you best.This incredible product has five different connections and is compatible with virtually all your portable devices. High Five® has two parts: a versatile charging cable with connectors at both ends (Micro-USB, Lightning, USB-C) and the robust metal body is a USB-A adapter with ports for the respective connectors. All bundled into a beautiful and compact design that easily attaches to your key ring.              

   USB-A power source to USB-C end deviceUSB-A power source to iPhone, iPad or iPodUSB-A power source to Micro-USB end device USB-C power source to iPhone, iPad or iPodUSB-C power source to Micro-USB end device      
High Five® becomes one of your everyday essentials. It is conveniently with you on your key ring and brings order to your life, no need to carry more than one cable with you!     High Five® is made of 12 different metals to tolerate your everyday elements. The cable connectors are magnets to guarantee a firm hold on your key ring.       The design was developed in collaboration with Emami Design under the direction of Arman Emami. The Berlin-based design agency Emami Design has received more than 79 international awards to date and has been ranked first in the RED-DOT Ranking for best design concepts for ten years among other design agencies from all across Europe and America.At the beginning of May our production team started to conceptualize High Five®. We wanted to engineer a product that combines versatility and a beautiful yet compact design.After sketching first drafts, we digitally transferred the design. Thanks to the amazing technology of 3D printing, we had our first dummy prototype ready in no time, that proved to be  both stylish and compact. Our first functioning prototype was an ultimate success, resulting in the protected design of High Five® which is presented here.   We have an amazing color range to best reflect your personality and lifestyle. Are you a Pink Panther or do you see yourself on an Ocean Wave?  The high-quality packaging is specifically designed to be small and compact to save natural resources. Our packaging is always made from sustainably produced paper (FSC certified) and is 100% recyclable.  Back us now and take advantage of the incredible rewards. Save 50% and more depending on the perk you choose! These incredible deals are only available during the campaign.   Vonmählen is a start-up from Northern Germany. We find solutions to the challenges in our innovative world. Vonmählen engineers, designs and crafts superior tech accessories for your lifestyle. Our goal is to create products that are convenient but also top-quality and beautifully designed.

story:
The latest in technological innovation in projectors portable video, with a variety of features such as music player, video, exhibitor presentations also shares photos in HD, and all this can be done almost anywhere and comfort of carrying everywhere thanks to its compact design that allows our Projector fits easily into a pocket.

------------------------------------------------

 

 

 

Package Details

  • Handheld Projector with MP4 Player
  • CD (Manual + Drive)
  • USB Cable
  • Charging Adapter
  • Earphones
  • Manual (English)

 

INTERFACE

TEAM 


 

FAQ - Frequently Asked Questions


Can I project images onto a wall or do I need a special screen? 
You can project images just about anywhere. A white wall will work best. A white screen is not necessary but can be used.

How bright is this projector? 
Bright enough to use under normal indoor lighting conditions. However, it is recommended to get the room as dark as possible for the best user experience.

Can I charge the projector and have it play at the same time? 
Yes, you will can charge it through the charging adapter while use it at the same time.

I can connect the projector to an audio amplifier?
if you can connect to an amplifier with 3.5 audio jack connection.

Supports1080 HD definition?
if this definition is compatible

Which it is the maximum carrying capacity of the micro SD memory supports ?
micro SD memory up to 64GB

Can you adjust the focal length?
Yes, you can through the adjustment buttons found on our device 

The device is fully developed?
The device was developed by 98%, are working hard to improve the quality of the device

Legal Disclaimer

"Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed."

story:
We love all your enthusiasm for the Google Pixel case.  

 

After a successful launch of the Poetic Turtle skin and folio case, some Google Pixel users expressed they wanted something even more premium, functional and protective.   

By combining the  Poetic signature  360-degree protection with built-in screen protector and a professional look folio case that turns into a flexible stand, we introduce the Poetic Explorer case for the Pixel Slate.  

 

Let's get excited! 

We got you covered!  Lots of Pixel users contacted us stating that they can not even find a case to protect their expensive tablet, and we have a solution for you.  

Poetic Explor for the Google Pixel Slate featuring: 

 

360 DEGREE TRIPLE LAYERS PROTECTION- With interior shock-absorbing TPU  bumper and built-in screen protector.  Wrapped in premium honeycomb texture folio case with secure magnetic wrap closure.   Protect against all kinds of accidental drops and falls.

 

SAFE SCREEN PROTECTION - Extra raised lips and corners of the front hard frame provide super protection from drops, keeping your screen safe.

 

BUILT-IN-SCREEN PROTECTOR and PENCIL HOLDER - Front polycarbonate casing with a built-in screen protector adds a layer of protection without affecting screen responsiveness. Built-in Stylus holder nests inside cover so you will not lose it easily.

 

INFINITE VIEWING and TYPING ANGLE - Thanks to the grippy inner material that offers infinite adjustable viewing angles. The front cover can be folded and form a landscape stand.

 

Estimated delivery time:  End of April 2020

 

Spread the word so we reach the goal sooner

  • Post, share, comment on social media (Facebook, youtube, twitter, Instagram, Reddit, forums)

story:
First time to Indiegogo?

It's super easy!

1. Decide how many StylusFlex you would like then click the pink button that says, "GET THIS PERK."
2. Fill out your shipping information and continue with your payment.
3. Receive and fill out the survey for color choices via email.
4. We receive your color choices and prepare your StylusFlex. 
5. You receive your order and eternal convenience is in your hands :)









Whether you're sitting at a coffee shop or camping in the woods, StylusFlex is for anyone, anywhere...


Sending a Snapchat? Editing photos? StylusFlex makes your life easier.


How many times have you leaned your phone against: coffee, soda can, ketchup, toothbrush cup, apple?!



After our sixth prototype, we shared StylusFlex with users in San Francisco. We learned new ways to use it we had never imagined before. We're still discovering new use cases...

Attach it to anything for the perfect photo.


iPads are like notebooks. Why are we still using our fingers?


StylusFlex as a stand on top of a skateboard. 


Shot with StylusFlex as a stand.


Screens are getting bigger, but our hands aren't (guess evolution just can't catch up to Moore's Law)! Effortlessly reach any part of your screen by wrapping StylusFlex around your fingers.


Minecraft with a stylus is just more fun...


Whether it's watching YouTube videos of cats jumping 10 ft high, reading the news, or Skyping with family, it's frustrating to lean your phone up against the ketchup you're about to use and have it drop. Plug it in, bend it over, and enjoy your cat videos with your meal.

Compatible with tablets.




StylusFlex has a patented design providing for lossless capacity; meaning, every time it reaches the electrostatic grid of your touch screen, the screen will react precisely in the area of its touch without ever having to touch your screen twice. Gone are the days of repeatedly poking your screen with the stylus, waiting for it to react.  

Benefits of using a stylus on a touch screen:

  • Precise touches - you've conquered autocorrect!
  • No smears - keep your screen clean.
  • Take notes - were you really about to use your finger in a meeting?
  • Drawing - finger painting is fun and all but...
  • Games - c'mon, they're just more fun!
  • Busy cooking with saucy hands and can't touch your screen.
  • Professional design applications.



We have a duty to protect our planet.

Our beautiful packaging is made from 100% recyclable earth-friendly material and to offset our use of nonrenewable energy we purchase carbon credits.


Enter Idea

For the past year we have been developing StylusFlex. About a year ago I was using a stylus at work and as I was getting ready to leave, I naturally put the stylus back on my desk. On my commute back home I was writing emails and playing a few games - I needed my stylus. Why did I leave it at work? We then realized, the essence of a stylus is somewhat backwards: they’re meant to be used on our touch screens, 98% of which are mobile devices that are used, well... while you're mobile. But the stylus seemed to stay in one place – kept in our office desks or at our homes. So what was the point of a stylus meant for our mobile devices if it's left at home?

Enter Action

We ventured to solve that problem - to create a stylus that anyone could use and didn’t think twice about bringing with them on-the-go. A stylus that would be comfortable in your hand, but unnoticeable in your pocket. Our first task was figuring out whether it was "styluses" or "styli." This was hard. Ultimately though, after pondering like Socrates, we left no stones unturned and came to the consensus it was "styluses."

Screens are getting bigger! Using a stylus feels natural, like holding a pen, but used on your 21st century touch screen. You can use it when you're drawing, cooking, taking notes, or even when you have gloves on because it's too freezing outside in San Francisco (...meanwhile in Siberia). StylusFlex is unique in its use cases and is the ideal replacement for selfie sticks as they are being banned worldwide, as well as being a great substitute to the $100 Apple Pencil which only works for iPad Pro.



Manufacturing and Delivery

We have been planning meticulously over the past few months to be able to share our passion with you. Our manufacturer is ready to go, and we are asking for your help to make this a reality and get StylusFlex in your hands. We are sure you'll love it. If we reach our funding goal, we would be able to hit the minimum order quantity and place the very first order of StylusFlex. Please join us.




Risks and challenges

Manufacturing a physical product can be a tough journey. In our experience, we've learned that the number one most important factor is your relationship with the supplier. Luckily we were introduced to a high quality manufacturer and have built a trusted relationship with them with transparency and open communication - a requirement for us. However, even though we have working prototypes in our hands that passed quality inspections and contracts in place with our manufacturer ready to go; there's always a possibility of something going unplanned. Because of this, we've buffered our timeline to embrace the unexpected and make sure we deliver your product by November 2016. We would love to ship earlier and are committed to doing everything possible to making this happen.

Our #1 goal is to make the highest quality, most useful stylus on the market and get it into your hands as soon as possible. We will work non-stop to deliver the product on time and make sure you see transparency from start to finish. Feel free to reach out to us personally anytime you have a question, thought, or idea at friends@stylusflex.com. Thank you!

Apple is a trademark of Apple Inc. & Android is a trademark of Google Inc.

story:
Current power banks on the market are heavy, slow with the wireless charging solution constantly disconnecting with the slightest movement. Due to flaws in their design or external stress, Li-ion power banks can catch fire or explode. At EXCITRUS, we saw these problems and decided to do something about it.

 
 

Introducing EXCITRUS NitroCharge 30, the power bank that is revolutionising wireless charging. The NitroCharge 30 is the world's slimmest and lightest wireless 30W power bank with magnetic positioning to ensure your phone is always charging at the maximum speed, even when you are on the move.

 

Weighing only 0.57 lbs (259 grams), NitroCharge 30 is the lightest and slimmest laptop charging power bank on the market. NitroCharge 30 can easily fit in your pocket, bag, or simply your hand. Carry all the power you need in the palm of your hand, say goodbye to battery anxiety once and for all. Having a portable power source around has never been easier or lighter.

How did we make this happen?

ALL the power banks on the market (30W+, designed for laptop charging) use Li-ion batteries, causing them to be thick and bulky, with a higher risk of combusting.

NitroCharge 30 is the first-ever 30W power bank developed using Li-polymer batteries, a breakthrough in the power bank industry. Resulting in a power bank that is much thinner, lighter and safer compared to the other 30W power banks on the market.

NitroCharge 30 has been tested with the iPhone 12's array of MagSafe accessories. NitroCharge 30 is fully compatible with iPhone 12’s wired and wireless charging. The majority of power banks are not powerful enough to charge the iPhone 12 at full speed, with NitroCharge you can fully charge your iPhone 12 in just 70 minutes at the full speed of 20W.

NitroCharge 30’s integrated magnetic positioning technology inside the power bank ensures your phone and NitroCharge 30’s charging coils stay perfectly aligned to maximize the wireless charging speed. The magnetic positioning technology also ensures the two devices won’t get separated even when it is moved.

Here's How It Works

 

The magnets inside NitroCharge 30 work with the magnetic plates to keep your phone on the correct charging spot every single time. NitroCharge 30 uses the strongest type of permanent magnet available commercially, neodymium magnets, to ensure your phone truly stays in place.

Most of us have more than one device with us at all times. Phones, earphones, laptops and more. NitroCharge 30 features 2 separate charging ports and 1 wireless charging pad, allowing you to charge up to 3 devices simultaneously. 

While being the smallest and lightest 30W power bank, NitroCharge 30 can charge almost any USB-C and USB-A devices, including your Nintendo Switch, speakers, cameras and GoPros! 

With NitroCharge 30, no longer do you need to worry about if your battery-powered devices can survive the day. Regardless if it's an iPhone, a Samsung phone, a MacBook, Windows Laptop, or even AirPods, the EXCITRUS NitroCharge 30 has got you covered.

The last thing we wanted was a power bank that took longer to recharge itself than to charge your essential devices. With its 30W USB-C Power Delivery 3.0 input, recharge your NitroCharge 30 to 70% in just 1 hour. 

The NitroCharge 30 features one 30W USB-C port with Power Delivery 3.0, one Qi Compatible Wireless Charging at 10W, and 1 USB-A port with built-in 18W Quick Charge 3.0 to quickly charge your phones, tablets, and USB-C laptops. 

NitroCharge 30 also supports Samsung’s PPS 33W charging protocol, powering up your Samsung at lightning speed. 

The NitroCharge 30 features a high-speed charging indicator light to show you that it’s working. It also includes a digital display indicating the battery level so you’ll always know how much power is remaining. 

We know your time is precious, that’s why NitroCharge 30 supports pass-through charging. Transform NitroCharge 30 into a wireless charging hub for up to 3 devices, while also recharging your NitroCharge 30 at the same time through a single power outlet.

The NitroCharge 30 has passed FCC, RoHS 2.0, IC, and UL2056’s strict safety standards. It is even UL 94 V-0 certified, making it more fireproof than the average household appliance. The NitroCharge 30 also has eight different types of protections, including overcharge protection, voltage protection, temperature monitoring protection, and more.

Unlike many portable chargers that use cheap, slippery plastics for the exterior, the NitroCharge 30 uses a premium fabric that is both stylish and functional. The fabric is specially coated to be water repellent and gives you the perfect grip on the go. 

 

Our mission at EXCITRUS is to create high-quality products that bring ease and convenience to our user’s lives. Our power banks have been embraced by some of the largest US and Canadian retailers, such as Microsoft, Best Buy, Office Depot, Canada Computers, and The Exchange. We plan to continue to bring new and exciting innovations to the tech industry in the coming future.
