We plan to continue to bring new and exciting innovations to the tech industry in the coming future.

story:
180° Rotation

The special design of the magnetic ring makes the charging method more flexible. After connecting the phone, you can also rotate 180 degrees to adjust different angles. You will no longer feel trapped by the charging line when you watch videos or play games. Its length is 1.8m which is long enough for daily use.

Multi-Device Charging

One wire can be used as three wires. It is equipped with three small connectors of different specifications, which subvert the design of the traditional multi-function charging cable. When not in use, keep the charging head on the phone, and also function as a dust plug to better protect your phone.

It also charges multiple devices simultaneously by rotating and adjusting to a right angle. Save space and save you time.

Fast Magnetic Coupling

Is your phone's charging port excessively worn out due to the frequent insertion and removal of the charging cable? Attach the portable connection head to your device to save time and protect the cable. Simply connect the charging cable to quickly pair and start charging immediately. Eliminate the trouble of plugging and unplugging the charging cable and better protect the charging port.

Connecting the charger to the phone has never been easier. Rather you are driving or occupied by a task, just move the charging cable near the connection head and it will magnetically attach. Connect your charging cable to your phone in a fast manner, making your life more convenient.

No Fall Design

The strong magnetic force makes the connection between the charging head and the charging cable more firm, that is, the charging cable can hang up the mobile phone without disconnection. It also ensures the charging stability and protects the mobile phone battery.

Night Light

You don't have to look for a charging cable at night or spend time connecting to the phone's charging port. The unique LED design, the faint little indicator light is enough to help you quickly find the paired phone and charging cable. It's not only cool but also convenient.

Easy To Organize

The magnet can also be easily absorbed on the iron surface, making it easier for you to organize the charging cable, and you don't need to tie the charging cable after use.

Most Durable Cable

The charging cable is made of nylon and is wear-resistant. The outer casing of the cable is designed to ensure internal wiring is always protected. The protective nature of the cable is durable and easy to use, while it is designed to protect against damages that may impact charging time.

Colors

Risks and Challenges

We can guarantee that the first shipment will go out no later than August 2019 if we successfully get funded. We are committed to meet your expectations without any possible delay in production or delivery. We rate the risk of unexpected delays as being very low.
story_txt: 180° RotationThe special design of the magnetic ring makes the charging method more flexible. After connecting the phone, you can also rotate 180 degrees to adjust different angles. You will no longer feel trapped by the charging line when you watch videos or play games. Its length is 1.8m which is long enough for daily use.Multi-Device ChargingOne wire can be used as three wires. It is equipped with three small connectors of different specifications, which subvert the design of the traditional multi-function charging cable. story:
About LENS-MOD

FOR INDIEGOGO'S TRUST AND SAFETY TEAM:-My prototype video: https://youtu.be/1L3j5ew1PBs

Taking an image, freezing a moment, reveals how rich reality truly is.The picture that you took with your camera is the imagination you want to create with reality.Photographs capture a moment that’s gone forever, impossible to reproduce.Just focus on what’s important and capture the good times.Don't miss even a good shot with our  Lens-Mod.Make your best shot better.(PS:Our special Lens mod style shells have magnetic camera cutouts)  

Take your photography to the next level

 

What You Get

You'll get a Moto Z style shell with magnetized lens Cutout to which you can attach the the lens system.The optics consists of :

  1. Macro lens
  2. Fish-eye Lens
  3. Microscopic lenses 
  4. Zoom lenses

 

 

TELEPHOTO ZOOM LENS

MICROSCOPE LENS

WHAT WE NEED

We need your support to make this project a reality.We have the concept and some wonderful people working on it on full and part time.But without your help we cant make it past the production stage.My team has already started working on a prototype device.We need money to 3-D print our first prototype.Thanks in advance

THE IMPACT

Your every contribution will make the smartphone camera even more awesome,however small it might be.Your support will make a long way in the success of this campaign.Our in-house engineering and design teams spend countless hours perfecting the ultimate user experience with uncompromised quality.

TIMELINE

Other Ways You Can Help

You just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • You can get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • You can also suggest changes we make in our product to make it even more awesome.

story:
We developed IODD series and have been manufacturing it.
The world's leading PC maintenance company and security
companies are using IODD.
IODD MINI is the next generation of "IODD-2541".
IODD MINI is USB 3.0 Flash drive with versatile gadget functions.
Don't you mind if someone copy your USB drive or
connect your USB drive to virus-infected PC.
Don't worry , if you use IODD MINI.

Your drive will be highly protected against hacking or
accidental data loss and infection.
For the information of IODD MINI and iODD 2541,
please see these pages.

[IODD homepage] [IODD WIKI] [IODD MINI page]

 

 


This is a necessary gadget for you.​
 

  • For PC engineers, IT engineers.​"Time is gold."


IODD MINI dramatically reduces your PC maintenance time.
External devices that boot up from ISO files with no need for ODD.
With the speed of SSD and USB 3.0, IODD MINI is a great performer in the OS installation and the Norton Ghost Program.

  • For those who need data encryption.​ "Look before you leap."

The encryption device is not safe for all devices.
Most encryption devices are designed to allow developers to access them.
However, IODD MINI is designed so that developers can not solve the password.
The password is only known by the person who set it up.
IODD MINI is the most secure private encryption drive.

 

  • ​For those who tired of playing hide and seek "A lock is better than suspicion."

Your important data.
Are you afraid of seeing someone?
You know.Finding it very easily found
Only your drives become complex.
Encrypt it as a IODD.
No one can access the data.

This is a USB Flash drive.It's a little special.

Also IODD MINI has Virtual DVD-ROM emulator,
If you can boot from a USB CDROM, then you can boot from IODD MINI.
You can easily boot Windows To Go or ISO, VHD images from IODD MINI.
Don't waste a blank DVD.
Copy all your DVD Blu-ray images or ISO files to IODD MINI,
and select what you want to load with browsing button.

So it's handy.

IODD MINI will be something more than IODD-2541.
More lightweight and handy and startup keys.
Supports " win-to-go ".You can boot from any PC.
(can't compare it with PE.)
You can also view data on smart TVs and Android.
Of course, you can set up encryption and see only you.
You don't need to encryption.Of course.

This is a revolution.

IODD MINI has
real-time Hardware AES 256-BIT XTS MILITARY GRADE ENCRYPTION
and Selective Write Protection functions.
All functions can be used with encryption, and No Software Required.

 

Write Protection function is selective.
The last logical safeguard is write protection.
Hard wired write protection make your data only read-only.
If you want to write something,
you can disable write protection temporarily.

That's IODD mini

 

 


 

 




 

IODD MINI is superior to all the functions that others have.
Speed, Encryption, Write Protection, Virtual DVD-ROM,
Mounting VHD, Boot Windows To Go, etc...
IODD MINI can be mounted as 5 flash drives and 1 optical drive at the sametime..

 

 




 

 


 




DO NOT burn DISC. Just Copy to IODD MINI.
CDs, DVDs cannot be recycled.
you have to send it to CD Recycling Center or to throw it to trash bin.
Buying CDs DVDs is Environmental destruction.


 

Any OS can boot from IODD MINI with encryption,
If the OS supports USB booting.
You can also use it in the usual way.





You can use IODD MINI with smart TVs,
mobile devices and all devices equiped USB MSD host.
 

1.8-inch color LCD makes it even more comfortable.
Pull-down menu and Multi-language.
Many Startup keys.
The LCD provides QR code, if error message occurs.





USB 3.0 supports max 5Gbps transfer speeds
and it is more than 10 times comparing with existing 480Mbps USB 2.0.
It also supports 900mA which is 80% higher than USB 2.0 (500mA)
so data loss rates are remarkably lower.


Benchmark test
(Data transfer rate under development)

 

 





 

Real-time Hardware AES 256-BIT XTS
Encryption keeps your data safe.
Nobody can access encrypted data without password.(even Developer)
It is no use hacking or brute-force Attacks.
Reset the password to destroy the IODD MINI data forever.
No one can ever recover it.




 


 

Write Protection mode is selective.
There is one amazing tip.
When this mode is "on", you can change to "off" temporarily.
In next connect, the "on" mode is preserved.

 






 

IODD MINI supports the  Windows To Go.
You can make the whole drive as Windows To Go.
Also, you can make VHD image as Windows To Go.
and IODD MINI can boot the VHD image.
Of course you can use it with encryption mode.

 




more information visit our website [iodd]

 

 







 


IODD MINI is under development.
The project is currently undergoing the ES stage.
We aim to establish mass production in early fall of 2017.
If the funding is successful, the period may shorten.


 

 

 

For Funding

Q.How long does the fund last?
A.60 days from the funding start date.

Q.When can I see a working prototype?
A.April 2017 is our goal.

Q.Is there any extra benefit if the fund goes far beyond the goal?
A.Of course.We are preparing additional rewards.Just in case.

Q. Are the early bird Perk really 200?
A.It can not be added for the benefit of the early bird user.


For Product

Q.Can I mount an ISO file to install a window or other OS?
A.Yes, you can.You can also select and mount VHD images.

Q.What partition type does it supports?
A.NTFS, exFAT, and FAT32 are supported for virtual drive functions.
    For general purpose use, any partition types are available.

Q.Can encryption mode be selective? Or is it a default?
A.it is selective.

Q.I've never seen such a USB drive before.
    I wonder what it looks like when it's actually used.
A.It's almost identical to our existing product (IODD 2541),
    but IODD MINI is smaller and faster.
    check  the Amazon review here Read Review

Q.Can I replace internal memory?
A.No.Can't do it.
    if You can do it forcibly,you lose warranty.

Q.Does it works on old PC?
A.No problem if your device supports USB devices.
   

 

For Shipping

Q.When does the shipping start?
A.It starts in August 2017.

Q.How about shipping?
A.We will use UPS, EMS or international air express mail by location.

Q.How do I deal with defective products?​
A.We will exchange with new products.(Within 15 days after receipt)

Q.Is the invoice attached?
A.Yes, it is.

story:
The keyboard for professionals.

● Increase your productivity by never leaving the home row.

● Improve your posture by typing on two, separate keyboard halves.

● Remap your keys in any way you want.

● Extend the UHK with add-on modules such as a trackball, trackpoint, touchpad, or a key cluster.

● Experience how a keyboard can be different, yet familiar.

The Ultimate Hacking Keyboard is a split mechanical keyboard which utilizes Cherry MX-style switches. It’s also a fully programmable keyboard which can be vastly customized for your needs. If you need a compact, ergonomic keyboard or are looking for the perfect programming keyboard, look no further!

Increased Ergonomics

Two keyboard halves result in a more natural typing posture - rather than forcing your wrists to adapt to a straight keyboard, you can adjust your keyboard so that your wrists are straight. The halves are connected by a bridge cable which expands and shrinks as needed, occupying minimal desk space.

The halves connect together securely as one piece, which is useful for transportation purposes or if you happen to prefer a one-piece keyboard.

When connected, you can unplug the bridge cable since there are connectors right between the halves that firmly mate upon connection.

Improved Productivity

For maximum touch-typing productivity, you should never leave the home row. Most keyboards have their keys arranged into various blocks, forcing you to leave the home row quite often to access navigation and function keys. The Ultimate Hacking Keyboard, as you will see below, solves this problem with layers.

Thanks to the compact design, reaching the mouse is also faster, as your hands only need to travel the minimum distance required.

Built to Last

High-end mechanical key-switches are used for a flawless typing experience. Unlike the switches of regular keyboards, these provide a satisfying tactile feel. They endure not 5 but 50 million keystrokes, do not degrade over their lifetime, and are replaceable.

The halves are connected by precision-machined, hardened-steel guides mounted to the stainless steel plates that form the endoskeleton of the keyboard. These guides, combined with a pair of neodymium magnets, not only result in a smooth connect/split experience but also create supreme durability.

Take a Closer Look

Geek out with a 3D model! You can rotate, zoom, and pan the keyboard rendering. Go full screen to see all the little details, and cycle through the annotations for even more info.

Open Hardware, Software, and Firmware

The UHK was never meant to be a black box. It’s very important for us to open up the design so that you can infinitely customize it to your needs. We know that this mindset pushes innovation forward and it resonates with many of you. Check out the GitHub repository for releases of UHK firmware, electronics design files, bootloaders, and the configuration application, Agent. With even more to come that will help with unique module design, etc.

 

Key Cluster Module

This module features 3 regular keys, 2 buttons and a mini trackball which can also be pressed - acting as an extra button. This is the only currently available module for the left keyboard half.

Trackball Module

The trackball features excellent precision and usability and is well-suited to be used by a thumb. This module is designed for the right keyboard half.

Trackpoint Module

The trackpoint surely brings back fond memories for those of you who have owned an IBM ThinkPad laptop in the past. With it, you can not only move the pointer, but click by pressing it. This module is designed for the right keyboard half.

Touchpad Module

The touchpad shouldn’t be stranger to anyone, given that it’s a part of pretty much every laptop and netbook ever manufactured. This add-on takes it to another level by placing the touchpad where it’s easier to reach - right at the middle of the keyboard. Of course, you can emulate clicking with a simple tap. This module is designed for the right keyboard half.

What’s in the Box

From top to bottom:

  • Lock screw and hex key for permanently connecting the keyboard halves if you happen to always prefer a one-piece keyboard.
  • USB Mini-B to A cable: 1.8 meters long (~6 feet)
  • Spring cable: 0.35 - 0.65 meter long (~1-2 feet), featuring 4P4C RJ11 connectors
  • Left and right keyboard halves

Make Your Choice

With the UHK, you’ve got options: You can choose keycap labeling, ISO or ANSI configuration, and even the key-switches themselves!

Keycap labeling

Stay tuned for even more labeling options for your UHK! Due to high demand, we’ll be considering alternative layouts like Dvorak and Colemak, as well as labeling for other countries. We’ll be taking a poll to help us make the decisions, so please sign up for notifications (in the text field under the video) if you’d like to shape the future of UHK!

Labeling makes a statement about your preferred operating system. Or you can make an entirely different statement, by opting for a completely blank keyboard.

ANSI vs ISO

ANSI and ISO are the two standard keyboard layouts. ANSI is mostly used in the US - and ISO is the international standard set-up. They’re very similar, but ISO has an extra key next to the Left Shift key.

Note: the UHK ISO configuration features a bar-shaped Enter, rather than the L shaped Enter keys used on most ISO keyboards.

Case color

Customize your look! Made available as a stretch goal during the campaign, you have four color options for the UHK case besides the standard black.

Key-switch type

Key-switch type is the defining factor determining the feel of any keyboard. We offer six switch types, each with their own character and corresponding color.

If you’re just not sure which to choose, don’t worry! We suggest simply choosing in a left-to-right fashion - so if the Blue/tactile switches sound good to you, that’s the most popular choice. If Blue doesn’t sound like a good fit, Brown would likely be your next best option. And if not Brown, then choose Red. The first three options are preferred by most.

  • Blue switches are a great choice for hardcore touch typists since these switches have a highly tactile nature, but they’re the loudest of all so your environment must tolerate some noise.
  • Brown switches are also a good choice for typists because they’re tactile as well, though a lot less noisy than Blue switches. Given their internal construction these switches are easier to double-tap, making them preferred by gamers.
  • Red switches are primarily meant for gamers. They’re non-tactile, smooth to press, and super-easy to double-tap.
  • Black switches are similar to Red switches but stiffer, making them less prone to accidental key presses.
  • Clear switches are similar to Brown switches but stiffer.
  • Green switches are similar to Blue switches but stiffer

Bulk discounts

If you’re looking to equip your whole office, or just plan on giving the best presents ever, we’ve got you covered. Buy five keyboards and get them for $207 each (a 10% savings), or get ten keyboards for $195 each (~15% savings). Just make your purchase, write “bulk discount” in the comments at checkout, and your discount will be applied on the back-end as a refund. You’ll get a new email confirmation to confirm.

The Four Layers of the Factory Keymap

Layers provide a way to map multiple functions to a single key. Think of the Fn key of laptops, but unlike laptops, there is not one but three layer-switcher keys, namely Mod, Fn, and Mouse. These three, in addition to the Base Layer, give you four separate layers.

Please realize that touch typists all around the world only utilize nine of their ten fingers on regular keyboards because everyone presses space with either the left or right thumb, leaving the other thumb unutilized. The Mod keys are strategically placed so that both of your thumbs can be utilized, allowing you to reach the Mod layer’s navigation functionality quicker than navigating on regular keyboards.

The Base layer contains the regular alphanumeric keys. It also includes the Super key, which acts as the Windows key on Microsoft Windows platforms or as the Command key on Apple Macintosh platforms.

The mod layer contains often-used navigation and function keys. The Mod keys are thumb activated and thus very easily accessible. You’re able to navigate quickly without moving your hands around, saving you a lot of time over the long run.

The Fn layer contains media keys to adjust the volume, navigate across tracks and launch often-used applications. Many of these functions can often be found on laptops.

The Mouse layer enables you to control the mouse pointer and trigger mouse clicks and scroll-wheel movements, purely using keys and without leaving your keyboard.

Ultimate Configurability

The factory keymap is just the start! You can redefine the mapping in any way you see fit - and create multiple, custom, application-specific keymaps. Do you prefer exotic layouts? Looking for a Dvorak keyboard or a Colemak keyboard? Or do you want to use the Vim keymap? How about swapping Space and Mod? Any other crazy remapping ideas? Or do you just want to make your life a little easier with some convenient shortcuts? We’ve got you covered!

  • A number of keymaps can be defined.
  • Within a keymap there are 4 layers (Base layer, Mod layer, Fn layer, Mouse layer).
  • By default the base layer is active. Other layers can be activated by pressing the relevant layer switcher key (Mod, Fn, or Mouse). Any key of the base layer can be made a layer switcher key.
  • Within a layer any action can be bound to any key.
  • An action can be a key action, mouse action, macro action, or a keymap switcher action.
  • A key action emits a scancode like “L”, along with optional modifiers, so it can also emit Left Shift + Left Alt + Tab, for example. These shortcuts compose with regular modifiers. A key action can also be dual-role which acts as a normal modifier, like Control when pressed along with another key but behaves as another key like Escape when pressed in itself.
  • A mouse action is move {left, right, up, down}, scroll {left, right , up, down}, or click {left, middle, right}.
  • A macro action is a sequence of key actions, mouse actions and delays.
  • A keymap switcher action switches to the specified keymap.
  • All the above items must fit into the 32 kbyte onboard EEPROM which basically means dozens of keymaps and macros.
  • Various other parameters can also be specified such as the speed and acceleration of the mouse pointer.

Hand Movements Minimized

Using a keyboard and mouse requires extensive motion. Hundreds, if not thousands of motions are made every day, so they really add up.

Extensive hand movement happens during typing across the various blocks of a regular keyboard.

Using the UHK while typing requires minimal hand movement.

Regular keyboards place the mouse far from the home row, so it takes a lot of effort to reach for it!

The mouse is very close to the home row of the Ultimate Hacking Keyboard, so it takes minimal effort on to reach out for it. Using the built in mouse functionality layer can save even more movements.

FAQ

Does the UHK use genuine Cherry MX switches?

Only for the clear and green switches - for any other, we use Kailh because Cherry has been having major supply chain issues. According to our experience, Kailh switches are just as high quality as Cherry’s. The clear and green switches are genuine Cherry switches because there are no Kailh alternatives. Luckily, we were able to find enough Cherry clear and green stock!

You’re welcome to read more about the reasons we chose Kailh.

On which platforms does Agent run?

Being a NW.js (node-webkit) application, Agent runs on Microsoft Windows, Apple OS X and GNU/Linux platforms.

How much does the UHK weigh? How big is it?

I like that the keyboard halves can get so far apart, but how can I attach the halves where I want them? Like on the side of an armchair?

We had this exact use-case in mind when designing the stainless steel threaded inserts. There are four per halve, and allow you to put screws in from the back so you can mount your keyboard to almost anything.

Do you plan to release a Bluetooth version or a version featuring a matrix/columnar layout?

We’re considering it but not anytime soon.

What can be seen on the LED display?

From left to right 1) Caps Lock icon, 2) status icon showing whether Agent, the configuration application is connected to the keyboard, 3) status icon showing whether adaptive mode is enabled to auto-switch keymaps according to the current application and 4) the three letter abbreviation of the actual keymap.

What devices is the UHK compatible with?

You probably want to use the Ultimate Hacking Keyboard with your desktop machine or laptop in which case you should be covered. Windows, Macintosh and Linux supports UHK unless you’re using an ancient operating system that doesn’t support USB keyboards and mice.

UHK also works with phones and tablets that support USB OTG and USB HID devices which is the vast majority of recent devices. The following tables feature the devices we tested. If your device is not featured in these tables then connect a USB keyboard and USB mouse to it - and if that works then it will almost certainly work with UHK.

Please note that Windows phones are not supported because the Windows Phone operating system doesn’t support USB OTG.

How is this keyboard connected to my PC / laptop / tablet / phone?

This is a USB keyboard and a USB Mini-B to USB A cable connects it to your computer. If you want to connect it to a phone or tablet that has a USB micro B connector then you’ll also need a USB OTG adapter cable.

Keycap FAQ

What kind of keycap profile do you use?

We use OEM profile keycaps.

How is the durability of the buttons on the case?

These two buttons right under the space bar are designed in a way that they won’t break easily. There’s a hook inside that doesn’t allow these keycaps to move upwards and break.

What material the keycaps are made of?

We offer laser-engraved ABS keycaps. We’ll look into providing PBT keycaps but not anytime soon.

I want to swap the keycaps. Which of your keycaps are non-standard?

Non-standard keycaps are Space, Mod, Right Control, and Backspace. All the others are standard.

Module FAQ

Is the touchpad multi-touch capable?

Unfortunately, it isn’t. A while back, I contacted with Synaptics, another huge multi-touch touchpad manufacturer. When I asked for their datasheets, they wanted me to sign an NDA (non-disclosure agreement). I didn’t want to corrupt the open source spirit of the UHK, so I refused. Based on your comments, I’m sure that many of you feel the same way. If any of you know a multi-touch touchpad manufacturer who doesn’t insist on NDAs, then please get in touch with me and I’ll contact them.

Can [your favorite add-on module] be switched from moving the pointer to scrolling by keeping another key pressed?

Yes, this will be possible. You’ll be able to specify a set of layer switcher keys (of Mod, Fn, Mouse), and keeping one of those key pressed will activate the non-default mode of pointer modules (moving vs scrolling). You’ll also be able to specify the default mode for each add-on module, of course.

Is it possible to right click and scroll with the touchpad alone?

Yes! By default, these features are supported out of the box. The upper right region of the trackpad emulates right click. There’s also a scroll zone on the right side and an outer drag and drop zone.

Will the add-ons be compatible with the palm rest?

Yes!

Will 3rd parties be able to make and sell their own add-ons? Open API, 3D-printable CAD data, and easy-to-buy connectors are really expected for 3rd party module developers.

The answer is yes to all of the above. We’d love to see more modules and empower the community to make them!
story_txt:
The keyboard for professionals.● Increase your productivity by never leaving the home row.● Improve your posture by typing on two, separate keyboard halves.● Remap your keys in any way you want.● Extend the UHK with add-on modules such as a trackball, trackpoint, touchpad, or a key cluster.● Experience how a keyboard can be different, yet familiar.The Ultimate Hacking Keyboard is a split mechanical keyboard which utilizes Cherry MX-style switches. It’s also a fully programmable keyboard which can be vastly customized for your needs. If you need a compact, ergonomic keyboard or are looking for the perfect programming keyboard, look no further!Increased ErgonomicsTwo keyboard halves result in a more natural typing posture - rather than forcing your wrists to adapt to a straight keyboard, you can adjust your keyboard so that your wrists are straight. The halves are connected by a bridge cable which expands and shrinks as needed, occupying minimal desk space.The halves connect together securely as one piece, which is useful for transportation purposes or if you happen to prefer a one-piece keyboard.When connected, you can unplug the bridge cable since there are connectors right between the halves that firmly mate upon connection.Improved ProductivityFor maximum touch-typing productivity, you should never leave the home row. Most keyboards have their keys arranged into various blocks, forcing you to leave the home row quite often to access navigation and function keys. The Ultimate Hacking Keyboard, as you will see below, solves this problem with layers.Thanks to the compact design, reaching the mouse is also faster, as your hands only need to travel the minimum distance required.Built to LastHigh-end mechanical key-switches are used for a flawless typing experience. Unlike the switches of regular keyboards, these provide a satisfying tactile feel. They endure not 5 but 50 million keystrokes, do not degrade over their lifetime, and are replaceable.The halves are connected by precision-machined, hardened-steel guides mounted to the stainless steel plates that form the endoskeleton of the keyboard. These guides, combined with a pair of neodymium magnets, not only result in a smooth connect/split experience but also create supreme durability.Take a Closer LookGeek out with a 3D model! You can rotate, zoom, and pan the keyboard rendering. Go full screen to see all the little details, and cycle through the annotations for even more info.Open Hardware, Software, and FirmwareThe UHK was never meant to be a black box. It’s very important for us to open up the design so that you can infinitely customize it to your needs. We know that this mindset pushes innovation forward and it resonates with many of you. Check out the GitHub repository for releases of UHK firmware, electronics design files, bootloaders, and the configuration application, Agent. With even more to come that will help with unique module design, etc. Key Cluster ModuleThis module features 3 regular keys, 2 buttons and a mini trackball which can also be pressed - acting as an extra button. This is the only currently available module for the left keyboard half.Trackball ModuleThe trackball features excellent precision and usability and is well-suited to be used by a thumb. This module is designed for the right keyboard half.Trackpoint ModuleThe trackpoint surely brings back fond memories for those of you who have owned an IBM ThinkPad laptop in the past. With it, you can not only move the pointer, but click by pressing it. This module is designed for the right keyboard half.Touchpad ModuleThe touchpad shouldn’t be stranger to anyone, given that it’s a part of pretty much every laptop and netbook ever manufactured. This add-on takes it to another level by placing the touchpad where it’s easier to reach - right at the middle of the keyboard. Of course, you can emulate clicking with a simple tap. This module is designed for the right keyboard half.What’s in the BoxFrom top to bottom:
Lock screw and hex key for permanently connecting the keyboard halves if you happen to always prefer a one-piece keyboard.
USB Mini-B to A cable: 1.8 meters long (~6 feet)
Spring cable: 0.35 - 0.65 meter long (~1-2 feet), featuring 4P4C RJ11 connectors
Left and right keyboard halves
Make Your ChoiceWith the UHK, you’ve got options: You can choose keycap labeling, ISO or ANSI configuration, and even the key-switches themselves!Keycap labelingStay tuned for even more labeling options for your UHK! Due to high demand, we’ll be considering alternative layouts like Dvorak and Colemak, as well as labeling for other countries. We’ll be taking a poll to help us make the decisions, so please sign up for notifications (in the text field under the video) if you’d like to shape the future of UHK!Labeling makes a statement about your preferred operating system. Or you can make an entirely different statement, by opting for a completely blank keyboard.ANSI vs ISOANSI and ISO are the two standard keyboard layouts. ANSI is mostly used in the US - and ISO is the international standard set-up. They’re very similar, but ISO has an extra key next to the Left Shift key.Note: the UHK ISO configuration features a bar-shaped Enter, rather than the L shaped Enter keys used on most ISO keyboards.Case colorCustomize your look! Made available as a stretch goal during the campaign, you have four color options for the UHK case besides the standard black.Key-switch typeKey-switch type is the defining factor determining the feel of any keyboard. We offer six switch types, each with their own character and corresponding color.If you’re just not sure which to choose, don’t worry! We suggest simply choosing in a left-to-right fashion - so if the Blue/tactile switches sound good to you, that’s the most popular choice. If Blue doesn’t sound like a good fit, Brown would likely be your next best option. And if not Brown, then choose Red. The first three options are preferred by most.
Blue switches are a great choice for hardcore touch typists since these switches have a highly tactile nature, but they’re the loudest of all so your environment must tolerate some noise.
Brown switches are also a good choice for typists because they’re tactile as well, though a lot less noisy than Blue switches. Given their internal construction these switches are easier to double-tap, making them preferred by gamers.
Red switches are primarily meant for gamers. They’re non-tactile, smooth to press, and super-easy to double-tap.
Black switches are similar to Red switches but stiffer, making them less prone to accidental key presses.
Clear switches are similar to Brown switches but stiffer.
Green switches are similar to Blue switches but stiffer
Bulk discountsIf you’re looking to equip your whole office, or just plan on giving the best presents ever, we’ve got you covered. Buy five keyboards and get them for $207 each (a 10% savings), or get ten keyboards for $195 each (~15% savings). Just make your purchase, write “bulk discount” in the comments at checkout, and your discount will be applied on the back-end as a refund. You’ll get a new email confirmation to confirm.The Four Layers of the Factory KeymapLayers provide a way to map multiple functions to a single key. Think of the Fn key of laptops, but unlike laptops, there is not one but three layer-switcher keys, namely Mod, Fn, and Mouse. These three, in addition to the Base Layer, give you four separate layers.Please realize that touch typists all around the world only utilize nine of their ten fingers on regular keyboards because everyone presses space with either the left or right thumb, leaving the other thumb unutilized. The Mod keys are strategically placed so that both of your thumbs can be utilized, allowing you to reach the Mod layer’s navigation functionality quicker than navigating on regular keyboards.The Base layer contains the regular alphanumeric keys. It also includes the Super key, which acts as the Windows key on Microsoft Windows platforms or as the Command key on Apple Macintosh platforms.The mod layer contains often-used navigation and function keys. The Mod keys are thumb activated and thus very easily accessible. You’re able to navigate quickly without moving your hands around, saving you a lot of time over the long run.The Fn layer contains media keys to adjust the volume, navigate across tracks and launch often-used applications. Many of these functions can often be found on laptops.The Mouse layer enables you to control the mouse pointer and trigger mouse clicks and scroll-wheel movements, purely using keys and without leaving your keyboard.Ultimate ConfigurabilityThe factory keymap is just the start! You can redefine the mapping in any way you see fit - and create multiple, custom, application-specific keymaps. Do you prefer exotic layouts? Looking for a Dvorak keyboard or a Colemak keyboard? Or do you want to use the Vim keymap? How about swapping Space and Mod? Any other crazy remapping ideas? Or do you just want to make your life a little easier with some convenient shortcuts? We’ve got you covered!
A number of keymaps can be defined.
Within a keymap there are 4 layers (Base layer, Mod layer, Fn layer, Mouse layer).
By default the base layer is active. Other layers can be activated by pressing the relevant layer switcher key (Mod, Fn, or Mouse). Any key of the base layer can be made a layer switcher key.
Within a layer any action can be bound to any key.
An action can be a key action, mouse action, macro action, or a keymap switcher action.
A key action emits a scancode like “L”, along with optional modifiers, so it can also emit Left Shift + Left Alt + Tab, for example. These shortcuts compose with regular modifiers. A key action can also be dual-role which acts as a normal modifier, like Control when pressed along with another key but behaves as another key like Escape when pressed in itself.
A mouse action is move {left, right, up, down}, scroll {left, right , up, down}, or click {left, middle, right}.
A macro action is a sequence of key actions, mouse actions and delays.
A keymap switcher action switches to the specified keymap.
All the above items must fit into the 32 kbyte onboard EEPROM which basically means dozens of keymaps and macros.
Various other parameters can also be specified such as the speed and acceleration of the mouse pointer.
Hand Movements MinimizedUsing a keyboard and mouse requires extensive motion. Hundreds, if not thousands of motions are made every day, so they really add up.Extensive hand movement happens during typing across the various blocks of a regular keyboard.Using the UHK while typing requires minimal hand movement.Regular keyboards place the mouse far from the home row, so it takes a lot of effort to reach for it!The mouse is very close to the home row of the Ultimate Hacking Keyboard, so it takes minimal effort on to reach out for it. Using the built in mouse functionality layer can save even more movements.FAQDoes the UHK use genuine Cherry MX switches?Only for the clear and green switches - for any other, we use Kailh because Cherry has been having major supply chain issues. According to our experience, Kailh switches are just as high quality as Cherry’s. The clear and green switches are genuine Cherry switches because there are no Kailh alternatives. Luckily, we were able to find enough Cherry clear and green stock!You’re welcome to read more about the reasons we chose Kailh.On which platforms does Agent run?Being a NW.js (node-webkit) application, Agent runs on Microsoft Windows, Apple OS X and GNU/Linux platforms.How much does the UHK weigh? How big is it?I like that the keyboard halves can get so far apart, but how can I attach the halves where I want them? Like on the side of an armchair?We had this exact use-case in mind when designing the stainless steel threaded inserts. There are four per halve, and allow you to put screws in from the back so you can mount your keyboard to almost anything.Do you plan to release a Bluetooth version or a version featuring a matrix/columnar layout?We’re considering it but not anytime soon.What can be seen on the LED display?From left to right 1) Caps Lock icon, 2) status icon showing whether Agent, the configuration application is connected to the keyboard, 3) status icon showing whether adaptive mode is enabled to auto-switch keymaps according to the current application and 4) the three letter abbreviation of the actual keymap.What devices is the UHK compatible with?You probably want to use the Ultimate Hacking Keyboard with your desktop machine or laptop in which case you should be covered. Windows, Macintosh and Linux supports UHK unless you’re using an ancient operating system that doesn’t support USB keyboards and mice.UHK also works with phones and tablets that support USB OTG and USB HID devices which is the vast majority of recent devices. The following tables feature the devices we tested. If your device is not featured in these tables then connect a USB keyboard and USB mouse to it - and if that works then it will almost certainly work with UHK.Please note that Windows phones are not supported because the Windows Phone operating system doesn’t support USB OTG.How is this keyboard connected to my PC / laptop / tablet / phone?This is a USB keyboard and a USB Mini-B to USB A cable connects it to your computer. There’s a hook inside that doesn’t allow these keycaps to move upwards and break.What material the keycaps are made of?We offer laser-engraved ABS keycaps. We’ll look into providing PBT keycaps but not anytime soon.I want to swap the keycaps. Which of your keycaps are non-standard?Non-standard keycaps are Space, Mod, Right Control, and Backspace. All the others are standard.Module FAQIs the touchpad multi-touch capable?Unfortunately, it isn’t. A while back, I contacted with Synaptics, another huge multi-touch touchpad manufacturer. When I asked for their datasheets, they wanted me to sign an NDA (non-disclosure agreement). I didn’t want to corrupt the open source spirit of the UHK, so I refused. Based on your comments, I’m sure that many of you feel the same way. There’s also a scroll zone on the right side and an outer drag and drop zone.Will the add-ons be compatible with the palm rest?Yes!Will 3rd parties be able to make and sell their own add-ons? Open API, 3D-printable CAD data, and easy-to-buy connectors are really expected for 3rd party module developers.The answer is yes to all of the above. story:
O3Tube Remote Control is an App, which lets you to connect online video services in your mobile devices with your smart TV, computer, laptop, etc. 

Control videos from your smart phone or tablet, create playlists  and  watch them more comfortable on bigger screen!






Download this application (it’s available on Google Play and App Store) on your mobile device and create an account. Then you can add your devices. By clicking ‘Add new device’ you will generate a code. Please open the site http://device.o3tube.com


on the device you want to add, then insert generated code from your mobile, fill form and accept it by clicking ‘Register’. Your device will be added so then you can choose video service, find content by using ‘Search video’ bar, choose specific video, watch it  comfortable  e.g. on TV and control with your mobile or tablet – change volume, play or pause video, create your personal playlists by clicking  ‘Add to playlist’  button, etc. Now all your devices can be connected and you can keep up with modern solutions!

Current Step : 

1) Design Webpage

Site :  http://www.o3tube.com ( in development )

Remote Control : http://remote.o3tube.com ( in development)

Device : http://device.o3tube.com ( on development )


2) Remote control in development ( at the moment only Youtube connection )


3) Device app ( web and Android ) in development 



Future steps : 



1) Connection to various streaming services like Vimeo, Ustreaming, Vk , Facebook Video  etc. etc.




2) Implementation of the control functions , add favorite , add playlist , into playlist can be added video from different streaming services ,





3) Multy device control  ( control more devices at the same time and with the same remote control .) 





4) Api implementation for external App




For Super and Extra Pack : 







For Extra Pack :

Ads Views 10 second on Device                                                          1.000.000  views Pack


Ads Example :

story:
If you like flipCharge but does not want to buy it, please, contribute development of project by sharing information about it in family and with your friends in social networks!


* Smart Charging Chip - detect which type of device is connected and automatically switch between Universal, Apple and Samsung specifications, allowing you to always get the fastest charging speed supported by your device and the USB socket.


TWO TYPES AVAILABLE:

flipCharge SIMPLE - THIS IS CABLE WITHOUT SMART CHIP! For those who want just cable without advanced functions!  This cable is fully reversible and it will charge and both sides of the Type-A work with Sync + Charge.

flipCharge - fully reversible charging cable with SMART CHIP built in directly in USB Type-A connector.


flipCharge is fully reversible charging cable with advanced features.
  1. USB connector with build in Smart Charging Chip;
  2. Strong and durable nylon;
  3. Aluminium connectors;
  4. Tangle free;
  5. 120 cm length for optimal use;
  6. Fully reversible;

Our working prototype.


flipCharge is the charger cable your device should have came with. With flipCharge you can charge your device in half the time and get on with your life. 




flipCharge uses new SmartCharge chip, which will  detect which type of device is connected and automatically switch between Universal, Apple and Samsung specifications, allowing you to always get the fastest charging speed supported by your device and the USB socket. 

flipCharge can be connected in two ways. In regular mode it will charge and sync. But in flip mode it will charge your device at max power!

JUST FLIP
AND CHARGE YOUR DEVICE FASTER!





flipCharge is available in black or white with Lightning or reversible MicroUSB connector.

Lightning for Apple production:

 - iPhone 5,  iPhone 5,  iPhone 5s,  iPhone 6,  iPhone 6 plus

 - iPad mini,  iPad mini 2,  iPad mini 3,  iPad Air 2,  iPad Air 3,  iPad with Retina                display

 - iPod touch 5th Generation  16GB / 32GB / 64GB,  iPod nano 7th  Generation

MicroUSB or Reversible MicroUSB for every mobile phone or tablet PC with MicroUSB:

- Android - Samsung Galaxy, HTC, LG, etc.

- Windows Phone - All versions

- Blackberry - All versions


One of the biggest challenges is the manufacturing process. Quality control will be at the top of the list and most important issue. There are many reasons why the manufacturer's cooperation will not be easy. We understand that Indiegogo backers want their product as soon as possible, but we are limited by factory's capabilities. In our experience, most pre-production samples still have a slight variation from the final mass produced unit.


When will I get to choose the color and model of my flipCharge? 

Few weeks after campaign ends,  backers will be contacted to confirm color choices, and  select between whether they would like the MicroUSB, reversible MicroUSB  or Lightning version.


What if i have changed shipping address since i backed your project and i need it amended?

No problem,when the survey arrives you will be able to amend and verify the shipping address.


Am I supposed to manually add shipping if I'm not in the US?

Yes, you have to add shipping on top of your selected perk. When you pledge, manually add an additional $5 to the price of the perk you want. We will do the matching at the end of the campaign.


What do I do if I forget to pay for shipping?

No problem. Click the contribute now button at the top of the page and manually enter $5. It will be added to your pledge amount. Enter the same personal information you did on your initial order. We will do the matching ourselves at the end of the campaign.


When are you going to be shipping my flipCharge? 

Estimated national and international shipping is Q4 2015


I asked for my perk to be sent to the wrong address! What do I do?

We will be contacting all our contributors few weeks before expected shipping about their product choice. When we do, please respond and let us know the correct address where you would like your flipCharge shipped.


Is flipCharge compatible with the new iPhone 6 and 6 plus? 

It sure is!


What is flipCharge made of?

flipCharge has a durable aluminium enclosure and we use high quality materials for the other parts.


Will flipCharge work with my iPhone case?

We know how annoying it can be to have to remove your case, just to plug in your phone, so we kept the port small to fit with all cases.


Is flipCharge waterproof?

flipCharge is splashproof 


We`ll be glad to answer any of your questions!

info@flipcharge.mobi



Apple, iPhone and Lightning are trademarks of Apple Inc., registered in the U.S. and in other countries. Android is a trademark of Google Inc. Windows Phone is either a registered trademark or trademark of Microsoft Corporation in the United States and/or other countries.

It sure is!

What is flipCharge made of?
flipCharge has a durable aluminium enclosure and we use high quality materials for the other parts.

Will flipCharge work with my iPhone case?
We know how annoying it can be to have to remove your case, just to plug in your phone, so we kept the port small to fit with all cases.

Is flipCharge waterproof?
flipCharge is splashproof 

We`ll be glad to answer any of your questions!
info@flipcharge.mobi






Apple, iPhone and Lightning are trademarks of Apple Inc., registered in the U.S. and in other countries. Android is a trademark of Google Inc. Windows Phone is either a registered trademark or trademark of Microsoft Corporation in the United States and/or other countries.

story:
Hi there!

Our names are Dor Bichler and Reef Finkelshtein, it’s nice to meet you!

We're 21 years old and we’re currently soldiers in the IDF.

We met in our hometown, a little place called Pardesiya in Israel, and we’ve been best friends ever since.

We've been through so much together in life, and we always had the habit of thinking of creative ideas and inventing stuff.




Lately, we’ve been trying to think of cool ideas to develop and not just dream about. We were searching for problems we encounter in our own lives that have no satisfying solutions yet.

One day it just clicked! We came across a basic need which has no immediate solution.

As soldiers, during trainings out of base or on long bus rides, we use our smartphones not only for communication purposes but mainly for entertainment, as this is the only real fun we can usually have due to the circumstances.

Watching TV shows or movies on smartphones can sometimes be exhausting. It’s not easy to hold them for too long, and stabilising them using random objects never really works.

We encountered that problem over and over again, and so we realised that we must think of a simple idea that will solve it once and for all.

We are proud to introduce you to the Igloophone, a revolutionary invention that changes smartphone usage experience!


Our main goal was to invent a holder that fits our bodies and that may also function as a standard holder and lay on any surface.

We started working with a product engineer, and after two months of hard work we finally had the perfect prototype ready!

We then consulted with many people and asked for specialists opinions in order to decide if we should continue the development process or not. The reviews were great, and we decided to go for it.

Our first goal was to manufacture a small amount of Igloophones and get first usage reactions, and so we managed to manufacture the first 200 pieces in three different colours!

Our next step was to spread the word, give a few samples to digital stores and ask for their opinions on it, and also see what our friends and family have to say.

The responses were amazing and the demand was gradually increasing, and now we’re on the verge of expanding, improving the product and manufacturing larger amounts.

With your help, we'll be able to achieve our next goals:

- Improve the current product.

- Manufacture 2,500 pieces.

- Expand publishing and marketing of the product in Israel and around the world.

The Igloophone is the only smartphone holder which may easily be applied on the knee and allow you to watch long videos or use your smartphone for a long continuous time without having to change positions or suffer from any pains.

Throughout this whole process we've been working almost completely on our own, with a little help from friends and specialists, and as we got to know more people in the business, we gained more experience and learned a lot.

As a result of this project, we even decided to enrich our knowledge and we both signed up for a business course.

If you guys decide to helps us get to the goal budget, we’ll be able to make that dream come true and continue to develop this awesome invention.

This project is very important to us. The Igloophone is getting a lot of enthusiasm and attention from people who get to know it, and we don’t want to disappoint anyone. We want the Igloophone to travel around the world and that every one that needs one will be able to get it, and we are sure that it can help many people just like it’s helping us!

If you cannot invest any money in our project, it really is okay! But if you liked it, do share! Spread the word on social media and tell your friends about it. It would help us just as much.

We’ll appreciate any kind of help.

Thank you!

story:
Do you constantly forget to keep your power banks charged? We've built the perfect system to combat an ever-growing problem. The Novi charges up to 8 portable batteries at once, allowing your entire household to stay charged every day. All you need to do is keep a Novi by the door, and pick one up daily before you leave the house. Pop one back the following morning and exchange it for a freshly charged unit - simple!

 



Each Novi pod is powered by LunaPulse technology. Rather than recharging using standard USB cables, each pod uses magnets instead, and is recharged via magnets. This keeps Novi Pods at low temperatures, optimizing speed charging relative to ensuring safety as a top priority. 

This technology also ensures each Novi Pod charges smartphones super fast, in under 90 minutes. 







The Novi was designed with ergonomics and portability in mind. Its sleek and compact appearance ensures it stylishly fits into any environment.

We set out to make it the best looking, and efficient charger on the current market. For its exterior we used a matte rubber coat that leaves a smooth finish. It's soft to the touch, and comfortable to grip.

The Novi is also the perfect solution for businesses. Imagine popping into a restaurant and being able to easily charge your phone. Here's how we think it can work best.


















Seriously, we've done everything to make sure this is amazingly safe.


George and Karen have been friends since they were 10. They've always been united by their passion for all things geek. 18 years after they met, they decided to start a company together to bring to life their passion for lifestyle electronics. 

George started his career in import and export in Hong Kong, while Karen worked in the advertising industry. 

Find out more about us from our website, www.mm-goi.com

story:
THEFTMINATOR


Have you ever faced to theft of your bike? - This kind of property like bikes and nowadays also e-bikes, segways etc. are exposed to wicked hands of thiefs..  and bikes are pretty vulnerable even in the case of locking by powerful locks or thick chains, so seems that there is a space for additional security improovements - something what could disrupts sawing, cutting :) - and it is an active security and very well known Alarms that's main idea of Theftminator : provide active security for this kind of movable property.

My name is Igor Collak(IT,techie, ) and few years ago I decided to design and construct this product and try to fill a potential gap in the market. 

Design a new product is always difficult even for well established companies, this is even more true in the case of small companies or start-ups  - but what we learned months ago is that introducing and distributing newly designed product is about same level of difficultness as its designing.. that’s why we decided to go crowdfunding way and for same reason this campaign is crucial for us.

Contribution in this campaign could be liken to this :  You bought a new car and spent almost all of your resources, but at half-way of your way home you run out gasoline and stuck .. so thats it -please contribute with some 'gasoline' or 'push' this project like a car on the road.  :)  Thank You so much!

What We Need & What You Get


We will need 80000$ to break and start produce our product in larger series, it is totally known that any production is much more less expensive when it could run in mass and that's of course also our case, another crucial aspect in such business is advertisement this is another field where part of raised funds will be used. If we do not reach our campaign goal we will use raised money same way as if we were successful.

We offer5 perks :

Worldwide market: 

1. Remote controller encapsulation as keychain  25$


2. Remote controller encapsulation  as keychain+ 10% off on future TR order 30$


3D Remote controller

****************************************************************************

EU market: 
1. TR (Theftminator alarm) 65$


2. TR (Theftminator alarm 2x remote controller) 79$


3D TR-Theftminator


*************************************************************************
FREE SHIPPING FOR EACH PERK !!!


(Unfortunatelly we now can not offer TR (Theftminator alarm) for US market because product was designed for European market and complies European regulations for electronic products- it is CE certified, but our next main goal is to design also version for US market which will comply FCC regulations.

Usage
We believe that we made useful and handy product, active security could really help in lot of cases of stealing, personally most people what I know that possess a bike also have experience that their bike has been stolen..



No more annoying surprises..

-Theftminators protects whole object and not only its parts.. 


Let's complicate the work of thieves..

-In the most cases thief tries to be 'invisible' - Theftminator has a preventive effect deterring the offender to finish a theft..


Theftminator is friendly to security locks..

You can increase protection by using unique feature: mechanical connection with any lock or chain..  in this case any manipulation with lock is impossible without 100dB jingle..


Risks & Challenges

Biggest risk what we may encounter is lack of interest about this product, however this does not impact any single order what we receive we'll be only limited to do it in tiny scale.

From technical perspective we are able to overcome most of obstacles as we did so far, our plan is further improve TR and introduce it to US market with FCC certified version.

Regarding US perks: this is really contribution by kindness, but we tried to make also this perk as attractive as we could and this remote controller encapsulation could serve as pretty keychain, (or some information holder, or e.g label for dog,pet) 

Our product is finished we are in distribution phase and massive production currently we have completed 200pcs and 1000pcs are before final assembly.

Other Ways You Can Help

We would like to say THANK YOU! for all of you which this product attract interest and we appreciate that you like, share or spread this Idea.   This is web presentation of Theftminator :  www.theftminator.eu

story:
Our Story

Hello, we are the minds behind Drive Control. Our mission is to save lives by stopping cell phone distractions when driving. These distractions include texting, emails, calls and overall notifications.  Using your cell phone when driving is a huge epidemic that is sweeping our nation and causing accidents and deaths.  The families impacted by these accidents on both sides endure extreme heartache, especially knowing that it could have been avoided.  Today, the number of accidents caused by cell phones and driving exceeds DWI. It needs to STOP.

Here are some statistics:

  • 82% of all Americans between the ages of 16-17 own cell phones and 32% admit to texting while driving.
  • 11 teens die every day because of cell phone distractions. That is over 4,000 teens a year and does not include their victims.
  • In 2011, nearly one in five crashes (17%) were related to cell phone distractions.

Our team has created a real App (you can actually have it on your phone today but we are in testing mode) that holds and silences texts, calls, and other notifications while driving on both Android and Apple cell phones.  The App is developed and in it’s final testing phase.  We are on track to release the product in March.  Our goal is to make it FREE to as many people as possible the first year. 

Up to launching our project on Indiegogo (January 18, 2015), 90% of what you see has been donated.  Nialls, the lead programmer, has dedicated hundreds of hours working with Google, Android, Apple and writing code. Rhythm has worked on marketing, meeting with potential donors (which helped us cover the costs of our video) and over all product strategy.  The only person who has been paid is Martin, the Apple Developer.  Instead of pursuing a full time job, he has been working for us on our project.   He is an amazing coder on the Apple side and we need him in order to successfully launch the product; part of our funding will be allocated to keep both of these guys on the development team.  

What We Need To Keep Coding

We want to raise $150,000. We know that is a lot of money so read about what we will use it for with our development:

#1 - Programmers  

  • Right now we are currently testing the application and plan to have it available for purchase in March of 2015.  However, in order to scale Drive Control beyond a small group of users, Nialls, Martin and another programmer will need to come on Full Time. Up until now, Nialls has dedicated 100% of his time to the project for free. We want to keep him!  We also need to pay for Martin – he has unlocked doors to Apple that we did not think could be unlocked.  It would also help to have one more programmer who can help with load balancing, security and updates.  We estimate that the cost will be between $80,000 - $100,000 for all of them.  As you can imagine, cell phones are constantly being updated with new software (think of all the software updates you do during the year) and we want to make sure it works on new and older cell phones. There are over 4,500 android phones and on the market and we want this to run on all phones.

#2 – Marketing

  • We MUST spread the word about Drive Control.  Rhythm is the visionary and Heather has helped to spread the word via emails and her social media.  Heather has marketed Intel Programs, Medical Services and even started her own Business, however, marketing an App is new to all of us.  We need to allocate dollars towards spreading the word.  We expect that this may cost $40,000 - $50,000. 

Our Team

Rhythm Badal – Idea Visionary

I may look like 16 that’s because I am 16.

I started driving a year ago. When I first started driving, I was really disciplined with turning off my cell phone.  However, I became more relaxed about it as I wanted to listen to my music and have access to the GPS function.  Before I knew it, I was looking at texts, making phone calls and not paying great attention to driving.  I am not alone; I have seen my friends and others do it. I came up with this idea and approached my dad who got super excited.  He put me in touch with Nialls in the fall of 2014 and together we started down the development path.  

Nialls Chavez – Lead Developer

I may look like I'm 16 but I am really 24.

When Rhythm and John approached me, I was really excited about using technology to save lives.  I love that my code and ideas can be bundled into an App to help people.  Before working with Drive Control, I studied at the University of New Mexico (UNM) and received my Bachelors in Computer Science.  I graduated in 2011, but have worked in the private sector as a web and applications developer for over 6 years.  I spent 2 of those years working for the private company LAVU.  In the spring of 2014, I decided to go back to UNM for my Masters degree with a focus on Cyber-Security. 

Martin Tice – Apple Developer

Like Nialls, I look younger then I am. (It's a Programmer thing)

I worked with Nialls for two years at LAVU and found that we really had similar minds when it came to coding and development. We work well together and that is so important when you code – especially into the late hours of the night.  Nialls approached me with this idea and I was immediately “On-Board.” I am the developer for IOS systems and a graduate from the University of New Mexico’s computer science department.

Heather Badal – Marketing

I am 45 and try hard not to look older

I have a Masters in Business and spent over 11 years working for Intel Corporation in Purchasing, Contracting, Public Relations, e-Business and Software Development. I left Intel, almost 10 years ago, to work with my husband in his Mobile Medical Business.  We ended up merging our Business with a National Company, United Therapies.  Shortly after the merger, I started my own company, Flawless Skin Spa.  In starting my own business, I did everything – Human Resources, Competitive Analysis, Marketing Strategy, ROI, Cash Flow Analysis, Web-site Development, Customer Service – you name it. In fact, I did everything but Accounting and Financial Management – that is where Robin Chavez came into the picture.

Robin Chavez – Business Manger

I am older then 45 but won’t tell you by how much!

I manage the books of all the Badal’s companies and recently took on a Management Role in their most recent venture, a Surgical Center that I helped to license and build. I came to know John and Heather when I was looking to re-enter the workforce (almost 10 years ago) after having home-schooled my children (Nialls included).  I have extensive experience in managing financials/books, payroll, working with banks for loans, monthly reconciliations, taxes & now building, staffing and running a Surgical Center.

John Badal – Overall Project Manger

I am close to 50 and proud of it!

I am the Vice President of Sales for United Therapies.  I have started, managed, sold, merged and acquired companies in my career.  My industry expertise has been in the Medical Industry but I know that my skills in business can be applied in any industry. When Rhythm came to me about her idea, I thought it was perfect timing as she had just started driving.  I have enjoyed working with these young entrepreneurs and helping them take an idea and bring it to fruition.  Please help us continue the development and save lives.

Drive Control - Business Model

Our app is unique in that it has three versions when it comes to downloading.

#1  INDIVIDUAL                                                                                                                                 

Cost - Free first year and .99/year after

  • This version can be downloaded for free – no cost at all for the first year!  All the user has to do is modify their phone settings to allow Drive Control to automatically start when the user is in a car traveling over 10mph.  The App will automatically hold/hide incoming calls, emails, texts and notifications until the car is traveling less then 10mph.  This is perfect for the person who needs a little more “Self-Control” when it comes to responding to their cell phone. 

#2  GUARDIAN (Parent) / DRIVER                                                                                            

Cost - First 2 weeks free - $4.99/Month after - That is the price of a Latte!

  • This version can be downloaded for free for two weeks so you can see how you like it. This version is perfect for parents with teenagers who have recently gotten their driver’s licenses.  Teenagers are the primary group of drivers who believe that they can drive and text at the same time (in fact, many of them think they are really good at it). 
  • With this version, a Guardian/Parent is always notified when their teen is in a car traveling over 10 Mph.  What is even better, they are notified if the teen has NOT engaged Drive Control.  At this point, the parent can decide if they want to engage Drive Control remotely.  We are the only app on the market that allows this functionality. 
  • There are many other features:  a Parent can “Ping” the location of their teen at any time, set limits for speeding (ie – a parent is notified when their teen travels in a car over 75 mph) and even establish “override” numbers that can break-through the App in the event of an emergency.

#3  SMALL BUSINESS  / DRIVERS                                                                                      

Cost – In Development

  • This piece is currently under heavy development. If you are a small business owner and have employees who need to drive to and from a worksite, this mode will allow you to do everything in the parent/guardian version and include a suite of reporting features which will allow you to better manage your employees. Our goal is to role this out in Early August.

What Makes Drive Control Unique

  • Drive Control is a one of a kind App that allows you to do the following:
  • Your phone's settings can be modified so that the Drive Control App is automatically activated to hold texts, emails and calls when in a moving vehicle.
  • Parents can receive notifications when the app is activated, deactivated or NOT even activated.
  • Parents can receive notifications when their teenager is in a car and has NOT activated the app. The parent can then decide whether or not to activate the App remotely.
  • Parents can receive notifications should the driver exceed certain speed limit (like 85 MPH).
  • Drivers can access music and GPS when the app is activated
  • Parents can "Ping" the location of the driver.
  • Parents can over-ride the App to communicate with the driver.
  • Drive Control runs on Android and Apple cell phones.
  • Drive Control does not require lots of data from your data plan.
  • The App continues to work in rural areas where the Internet is spotty.
  • This App was developed for parents and young drivers but it can be used in businesses where employees drive trucks and cars on a day-to-day basis.

One Last Thing

Drive Control has the potential to save 1,000's of lives but we need your help.  I encourage you to watch our video (at the top of the page), as you know, our goal is to raise $150,000.  Please consider a donation.  If you are not in a position to donate, please consider sharing our story in an email with your friends.  We hope to use social media to spread the word so any help you can give us via FB & Twitter would be much appreciated. (Especially if you know Oprah!).  

Thank You so Very Much! - The Drive Control Team


FAQ

Q: What if certain people still need to get a hold of me, even while driving?

A: We understand that life is crazy and that there may be emergency situations in which notifications NEED to get through, so we developed what we call “white listed phone numbers”. With this feature, numbers that are on this list will always get through even when driving. However, we encourage you to pull over and come to a complete stop before answering your phone.

Q: What if I still need to be able to access my GPS, or want to listen to music while driving, will this app allow me to do so?

A: Drive Control is designed to be as minimally while still working to keep you safe on the road. When driving mode is activated, even if you leave the app to engage an App like Spottily, you will not see notifications come through, and phone calls will be hidden, until driving is completed.  

Q: What if my spouse and I want to both monitor our driver?

A: We have multiple subscription packages to suit your individual needs. We allow up to three guardians and three drivers per account. This may change in the future, depending on demand.

Q: What if I have an iPhone and my drivers/employees have Android devices, will it still work?

A:  Yes! We will be releasing both the Android and iPhone versions of Drive Control simultaneously!

If you have any more questions please feel free to contact us either in the comments section or by messaging us directly!
