and 32% admit to texting while driving.


11 teens die every day because of cell phone distractions. That
is over 4,000 teens a year and does not include their victims.


In 2011,
nearly one in five crashes (17%) were related to cell phone distractions.


Our team has created a real App (you
can actually have it on your phone today but we are in testing mode) that holds and silences texts,
calls, and other notifications while driving on both Android and Apple cell
phones.  The App is developed and in it’s
final testing phase.  We are on track to
release the product in March.  Our goal
is to make it FREE to as many people as possible the first year.  
Up to launching our project on
Indiegogo (January 18, 2015), 90% of what you see has been donated.  Nialls, the lead programmer, has dedicated
hundreds of hours working with Google, Android, Apple and writing code. Rhythm
has worked on marketing, meeting with potential donors (which helped us cover the costs of our video) and over all product strategy.  The only person who has been paid is Martin,
the Apple Developer.  Instead of pursuing a full time job, he has been working for us on our project.   He is an amazing coder on
the Apple side and we need him in order to successfully launch the product;
part of our funding will be allocated to keep both of these guys on the development team.  What We Need To Keep CodingWe want to raise $150,000. We know that is a lot of money so read about what we will use it for with our development:#1 - Programmers  
Right now we are currently testing the application and plan to have it available for purchase in March of 2015.  However, in order to scale Drive Control beyond a small group of users, Nialls, Martin and another programmer will need to come on Full Time. Up until now, Nialls has dedicated 100% of his time to the project for free. We want to keep him!  We also need to pay for Martin – he has unlocked doors to Apple that we did not think could be unlocked.  It would also help to have one more programmer who can help with load balancing, security and updates.  We estimate that the cost will be between $80,000 - $100,000 for all of them.  As you can imagine, cell phones are constantly being updated with new software (think of all the software updates you do during the year) and we want to make sure it works on new and older cell phones. There are over 4,500 android phones and on the market and we want this to run on all phones.
#2 – Marketing
We MUST spread the word about Drive Control.  Rhythm is the visionary and Heather has helped to spread the word via emails and her social media.  Heather has marketed Intel Programs, Medical Services and even started her own Business, however, marketing an App is new to all of us.  We need to allocate dollars towards spreading the word.  We expect that this may cost $40,000 - $50,000. 
Our TeamRhythm Badal – Idea VisionaryI may look like 16 that’s because I am 16.I started driving a year ago. When I first started driving, I was really disciplined with turning off my cell phone.  However, I became more relaxed about it as I wanted to listen to my music and have access to the GPS function.  Before I knew it, I was looking at texts, making phone calls and not paying great attention to driving.  I am not alone; I have seen my friends and others do it. I came up with this idea and approached my dad who got super excited.  He put me in touch with Nialls in the fall of 2014 and together we started down the development path.  Nialls Chavez – Lead DeveloperI may look like I'm 16 but I am really 24.When Rhythm and John approached me, I was really excited about using technology to save lives.  I love that my code and ideas can be bundled into an App to help people.  Before working with Drive Control, I studied at the University of New Mexico (UNM) and received my Bachelors in Computer Science.  I graduated in 2011, but have worked in the private sector as a web and applications developer for over 6 years.  I spent 2 of those years working for the private company LAVU.  In the spring of 2014, I decided to go back to UNM for my Masters degree with a focus on Cyber-Security. Martin Tice – Apple DeveloperLike Nialls, I look younger then I am. (It's a Programmer thing)I worked with Nialls for two years at LAVU and found that we really had similar minds when it came to coding and development. We work well together and that is so important when you code – especially into the late hours of the night.  Nialls approached me with this idea and I was immediately “On-Board.” I am the developer for IOS systems and a graduate from the University of New Mexico’s computer science department.Heather Badal – MarketingI am 45 and try hard not to look olderI have a Masters in Business and spent over 11 years working for Intel Corporation in Purchasing, Contracting, Public Relations, e-Business and Software Development. I left Intel, almost 10 years ago, to work with my husband in his Mobile Medical Business.  We ended up merging our Business with a National Company, United Therapies.  Shortly after the merger, I started my own company, Flawless Skin Spa.  In starting my own business, I did everything – Human Resources, Competitive Analysis, Marketing Strategy, ROI, Cash Flow Analysis, Web-site Development, Customer Service – you name it. In fact, I did everything but Accounting and Financial Management – that is where Robin Chavez came into the picture.Robin Chavez – Business MangerI am older then 45 but won’t tell you by how much!I manage the books of all the Badal’s companies and recently took on a Management Role in their most recent venture, a Surgical Center that I helped to license and build. I came to know John and Heather when I was looking to re-enter the workforce (almost 10 years ago) after having home-schooled my children (Nialls included).  I have extensive experience in managing financials/books, payroll, working with banks for loans, monthly reconciliations, taxes & now building, staffing and running a Surgical Center.John Badal – Overall Project MangerI am close to 50 and proud of it!I am the Vice President of Sales for United Therapies.  I have started, managed, sold, merged and acquired companies in my career.  My industry expertise has been in the Medical Industry but I know that my skills in business can be applied in any industry. When Rhythm came to me about her idea, I thought it was perfect timing as she had just started driving.  I have enjoyed working with these young entrepreneurs and helping them take an idea and bring it to fruition.  Please help us continue the development and save lives.
Drive Control - Business Model
Our app is unique in that it has three
versions when it comes to downloading. 
#1  INDIVIDUAL                                                                                                                                 Cost - Free first year and .99/year
after

This version can be downloaded for
free – no cost at all for the first year! 
All the user has to do is modify their phone settings to allow Drive
Control to automatically start when the user is in a car traveling over
10mph.  The App will automatically
hold/hide incoming calls, emails, texts and notifications until the car is
traveling less then 10mph.  This is
perfect for the person who needs a little more “Self-Control” when it comes to
responding to their cell phone. 

#2  GUARDIAN (Parent) / DRIVER                                                                                            Cost - First 2 weeks free -
$4.99/Month after - That is the price of a Latte!


This version can be downloaded for
free for two weeks so you can see how you like it. This version is perfect for
parents with teenagers who have recently gotten their driver’s licenses.  Teenagers are the primary group of drivers
who believe that they can drive and text at the same time (in fact, many of
them think they are really good at it). 


With this version, a Guardian/Parent
is always notified when their teen is in a car traveling over 10 Mph.  What is even better, they are notified if the
teen has NOT engaged Drive Control.  At
this point, the parent can decide if they want to engage Drive Control
remotely.  We are the only app on the
market that allows this functionality. 


There are many other features:  a Parent can “Ping” the location of their
teen at any time, set limits for speeding (ie – a parent is notified when their
teen travels in a car over 75 mph) and even establish “override”
numbers that can break-through the App in the event of an emergency.


#3  SMALL BUSINESS  / DRIVERS                                                                                      Cost – In Development

This piece is currently under heavy
development. If you are a small business owner and have employees who need to
drive to and from a worksite, this mode will allow you to do everything in the
parent/guardian version and include a suite of reporting features which will allow
you to better manage your employees. Our goal is to role this out in Early
August.

What Makes Drive Control Unique


Drive Control is a one of a kind App
that allows you to do the following:


Your phone's settings can be modified
so that the Drive Control App is automatically activated to hold texts, emails
and calls when in a moving vehicle.


Parents can receive notifications
when the app is activated, deactivated or NOT even activated.


Parents can receive notifications
when their teenager is in a car and has NOT activated the app. The parent can
then decide whether or not to activate the App remotely.


Parents can receive notifications
should the driver exceed certain speed limit (like 85 MPH).


Drivers can access music and GPS when
the app is activated


Parents can "Ping" the
location of the driver.


Parents can over-ride the App to
communicate with the driver.


Drive Control runs on Android and
Apple cell phones.


Drive Control does not require lots
of data from your data plan.


The App continues to work in rural
areas where the Internet is spotty.

This App was developed for parents
and young drivers but it can be used in businesses where employees drive trucks
and cars on a day-to-day basis.

One Last Thing
Drive Control has the potential to
save 1,000's of lives but we need your help.  I encourage you to watch our
video (at the top of the page), as you know, our goal is to raise $150,000.  Please consider a
donation.  If you are not in a position to donate, please consider sharing
our story in an email with your friends.  We hope to use social media to spread the
word so any help you can give us via FB & Twitter would be much
appreciated. (Especially if you know Oprah!).  Thank You so Very Much! - The Drive Control TeamFAQQ: What if certain people still need to get a hold of me, even while driving?A: We understand that life is crazy and that there may be emergency situations in which notifications NEED to get through, so we developed what we call “white listed phone numbers”. With this feature, numbers that are on this list will always get through even when driving. However, we encourage you to pull over and come to a complete stop before answering your phone.Q: What if I still need to be able to access my GPS, or want to listen to music while driving, will this app allow me to do so?A: Drive Control is designed to be as minimally while still working to keep you safe on the road. When driving mode is activated, even if you leave the app to engage an App like Spottily, you will not see notifications come through, and phone calls will be hidden, until driving is completed.  Q: What if my spouse and I want to both monitor our driver?A: We have multiple subscription packages to suit your individual needs. We allow up to three guardians and three drivers per account. This may change in the future, depending on demand.Q: What if I have an iPhone and my drivers/employees have Android devices, will it still work?A:  Yes! We will be releasing both the Android and iPhone versions of Drive Control simultaneously!If you have any more questions please feel free to contact us either in the comments section or by messaging us directly!

story:
SMS&Phone Control Center (SPCC) 

by UltimateTouch Softwares


Get the best application you need !


Your are tired of being spammed, or disturbed by unwanted and repetitive phone calls or SMS... You prefer to maintain your SMS conversations private and protected. You would like to accept SMS or phone calls only from your contacts. You would like

 automatic call log deletion for selected contacts. You would like all this to be easily managed.


For many reasons, you would like to take control of the incoming communications, you want to be able to manage all.




This application is made for you to provide:

  • SMS blocking
  • Phone call blocking
  • Privatising SMS (Private Inbox)
  • Call log deletion


We have already planned more functionalities for the final version we will provide to you. During our campaign, you are welcome to suggest new functionalities.

SPCC user interface has been made to be user friendly without small inaccessible menus. It is fast, efficient. You won't find any annoying advertisement.

Here are some screenshots showing our software.

Please visit our site www.ultimatetouch-softwares.com for further information, more pictures, slide show.

Who are we?

Our startup was founded by two persons in early 2015 in Switzerland. Tarek Al-Atassi from Switzerland, graduated as an engineer in Communication System from SFIT(Swiss Federal Institude of Technologies or EPFL in French), specialized in mobile communication. Tarun Wadhwa is from India, an experienced developer holding a Master degree in Computer Science. This collaboration stems from a long friendship, work and knowledge sharing and alike interests in mobile communication softwares.

Tarek Al-Atassi:

  • Co-Founder of the company, in charge of the management, consultant IT for linux, network consultant, official website manager.
  • Programming : GUI and parts of backend

Tarun Wadhwa

  • Co-Founder of the company
  • Programming: Backend, reverse engineering and parts of the GUI

Our story

After a period of market analysis and with the emergence of new companies such as Jolla and seeing the Ubuntu Touch campaign on Indiegogo, we made a complete survey of the market. I was myself among contributors for Ubuntu Touch, as we use Ubuntu as our main OS on our personal computers.

As many people we regretted the loss of smart phones such as Nokia N9. We searched for a real alternative and it yielded us to buy two Jolla phones. We then dove into specifications of our first application. We splitted the work to code the backend and the user interface. Today the application's main functionalities have been tested and are working as expected. Programming such application requires strong reverse engineering and proven coding skills.

We believe in the future of the platform provided by Jolla based on QML/C++/Silica, but we believe more generally that the future will be oriented on multiplatforms frameworks based on linux kernel and programmed by C++ for backends and frontends such as QML/HTML5/CSS3/etc...

Nowadays, there is a real need of alternatives for innovative OS systems such as Sailfish, Ubuntu Touch, Tizen, Blackberry OS, etc and probably others coming up in the future.

We are commited and enthusiastic to work in this field and provide new applications through our new startup UltimateTouch-Softwares for different platforms.

Our first realisation is SPCC (SMS&Phone Control Center) software that we present here in this campaign. We are currently developing it and will be available to sell soon.

Why Jolla phone? Ubuntu phone?

Nowadays we have been told about the tracking of people by companies and governments, and we find softwares full of advertisements bugging the users without talking about virus and malwares.

It is a general problem in closed source OS, the user cannot know what the OS does, in fact the OS manages what the user can do. In Open Source it is the opposite, you can know what the OS does for you.

Jolla is using open source linux kernel for their Sailfish OS, and Ubuntu as well. They both have no advertisements in their softwares and high level of security with much less problem of virus and malwares. But most of all, they use compiled native code efficient and real multitasking. It is not interpreted pseudo code. This make the phone using less resources and make it run fast. Sailfish requires much less resources while being able to run android application.

Jolla Phone is a new way of thinking. Their OS is "unlike" and based on innovative gestures. On Jolla site, you can read:

"The world doesn’t need yet another smartphone – it needs a new way of thinking."

Jolla provide an independant OS that offers a certain level of privacy (of course if they do not install android application that might track the user...)

We invite you to visit the site of Jolla for those who do not know this innovative company. We remind you that Jolla is among the best startup in the world and since more than one year they have provided their unlike Sailfish OS ahead of Ubuntu phone.

Why Crowdfunding

First of all, our ambition today is to create a company and to provide more softwares to the community of users of Jolla phone and Ubuntu phone as well, in a short future. To create a company, you need assets too and cash to manage development related activities. Until now, we financed all by our own resources and we feel limited without a real push.

We planned to ask the community of users of Jolla phone to support us and our development for SPCC by using crowdfunding to make a real push in our personal investment and to sense the interest of the community for our work.

We live in a world where most banks do not play their initial role to support small businesses and startups since the world crisis occured. It became more and more complicated to raise in a reasonable time funds from them.

How the funding will be used

We need to finance:

  • Phones, tablets: for development and intensive real time tests before release.
  • Computer hardware: without computer we can not code, and actually we would need a new computer and a new screen.
  • Web Development (shop, may be a forum)
  • Assets to officially register our company to the commerce chamber.
  • Lawyer's fees and so on...

Where we go

In the case our campaign succeeds, we will be able to speed up further developments and make new applications. We are planning to convert our site into a shop and may be, offer a forum.

We have been developing many ideas, that will be disclosed at right time.

What we offer

  • SPCC softwares for Sailfish and possibly for Ubuntu (version coming up).
  • We offer full commitment for developing professional applications and excellent support to our customers.
  • We want to provide smart softwares to the community of new OSs.

Beyond the funds

  • You can contribute to our dream in other ways than funds. We are looking to spread the information about us to specialized forums for Jolla and on Facebook or Tweeter. We are looking for partnerships or/and sponsors.
  • You can contribute for our web development.

by UltimateTouch Softwares

Your are tired of being spammed, or disturbed by unwanted and repetitive phone calls or SMS... You prefer to maintain your SMS conversations private and protected.  You would like to accept SMS or phone calls only from your contacts. You would like

Here are some screenshots showing our software.



Home page

The Home Screen user sees on successful login. Two buttons here, first one to manage filtered contact list and second one to go to private SMS inbox.


Filtered List
User defined Filtered Contacts List showing contacts with customisable filters for each contact.


Manual add

Adding contact(s) to your filter list, another way of defining contact other than selecting from system phonebook. Multiple contacts (no limit) can be added in one go.


Phonebook

User may select contacts from phonebook. Each contact may be customised individually by choosing combination of options along with each contact. All selected contacts get added to the filter list.


Settings


The User can turn ON or OFF services, and enable or disable three other options.

story:
Comzapp Language Translation Inspires Confidence. 

There is a big language barrier in the world even today.  Don't you agree?. 

Today, forget about wasting your precious time & money learning new languages. The piles of paper dictionaries or expensive services of personal human translators & slow mobile translations that needs internet, that does not always work wherever you go! 

COMZAPP, is a new voice translating device that will revolutionize language translation by helping you talk and communicate more than 45 Languages in real time instantly offline. No internet needed. 

COMZAPP, a new technology communications will help you make language barriers a thing of the past. 

How Comzapp Benefits You

COMZAPP, works offline it is faster and more reliable since it does not rely on the quality of the internet connection.  Languages downloaded with bluetooth vocabularies into your mobile and to communicate with others without internet connection. No one can do that right now and we want to be first among the others who will provide such function to our consumers. 

Easy To Operate 

COMZAPP, operate untilizing your existing mobile phone online connecting with Android or IOS network. COMZAPP connect to the phone with bluetooth. The translation itself is made through already existing voice translator services like; 
Google translate https://translate.google.com/#auto/ar/how%20are...
Siri services visit: http://www.apple.com/ios/siri/

Helping you with a free of charge app on your phone, you will have the ability to use any language available online. Outside sound will not prevent COMZAPP offline translation device communicating effectively. All new updates and improvements of the languages will be free of charge for all users. All you have to do is update COMZAPP.

Do You Want To Speak Different Languages Easily & With Confidence? 
You Need Comzapp

It has two modes of voice translation. You just simply set your native language, then the language to translate to. By pressing the first button and speaking your phrase COMZAPP in turn will instantly translate and pronounce it in a language you have selected. By pressing second button, COMZAPP will translate speech from the foreign language, then instantly speak in your native language! All at the press of a button!    

COMZAPP Set in Black/White/Green: Includes - Black/White/Green COMZAPP, Stainless Steel Clip and Neck Strap 

Aluminum COMZAPP Set In Silver/Red:

 Includes - Silver or Red Aluminum COMZAPP, Stainless Steel Clip and Neck Strap.

Help us reach $150,000 Aluminum COMZAPP

Help us reach $250,000 Touch Buttons COMZAPP and we can build functionally to help make language barriers a thing of the past. 

Subject to best efforts our final design

To Order More Than 1 Aluminum Set:

  1. Choose the Perk with multiple COMZAPP Sets.
  2. Add $25 for every Aluminum version.

For example: You've ordered 5 COMZAPP Sets and your pledge is $190. You want to get 2 ordinary COMZAPP sets and 3 Aluminum COMZAPP sets. So you have to add 3*$25 = $75 to your existing pledge.

Help Spread The Word!

Your Support Is Appreciated!

Although our goal is to raise at least $25,000 the more money we raise, the more faster product we'll be able to produce and promote. Together we can help prevent language barriers for any traveller on holidays, vacations, business with foreigners & any other situation. With your support, we will help make language barriers a thing of the past one language at a time. "Lets make it happen." 


Your smartphone + Comzapp bluetooth device transforms into a language translation.


CNBC News: Google & Microsoft trying to break the language barrier.  

Mail Online News: Bill Gates regrets never having learnt a foreign language


Online News: Mark Zuckerberg public business speech shows why knowing a different language is so important & useful to you today.


Looks Great Anywhere!

COMZAPP, Neck Strap

COMZAPP, Stainless Steel Clip

Stainless Steel Clip Can Be Used In Several Ways

COMZAPP, A Great New Years Present For Her & Him!


Featuring Your Device 

  • Contemporary design   
  • Light weight and hands-free   
  • Can be easily clipped onto your clothes or worn around your neck   
  • Long battery life   
  • One single charge will last up to 13 hours.  Even longer if blue tooth is turned off, after downloading your languages.
  • Free of charge updates.
  • Small microphone
  • Speakers for incoming calls
  • Bluetooth for connecting to other devices.
  • Ear phones port
  • Speakers port to communicate with

You Wanted Language Options So Here You Go; 

Afrikaans, Arabic, Belarusian, Bulgarian, Catalan, Chinese (Cantonese), Chinese (Mandarin), Chinese (Taiwan), Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch (The Netherlands), English (Australian), English (Canada), English (India), English (UK), English (US), Finnish, French, French (Canada), German, Greek, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Irish, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Latin, Latvian, Lithuanian, Malay, Maltese, Maori (NZ), Moldavian, Mongolian, Norwegian, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese (Brazil), Romanian, Russian, Slovak, Spanish, Spanish (Mexican), Swedish, Tagalog, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Uzbek, Vietnamese.

Help Comzapp Take Off

  • Today our prototypes are now getting COMZAPP into production and profitability. In performing to improve the application through COMZAPP that will function with your mobile device. While we're close to entering production, your support will help fund: 

    • Finalize application

    • Bulk production order

    • Support marketing efforts and First distribution of COMZAPP

    Together, with your support, we will help make language barriers a thing of the past. 
    Help bring COMZAPP to life!

Possible Challenges - 

We have put alot of time & effort developing and perfecting this product, however there will always be improvements and innovations that we hope will be informed by your feedback. By pledging to support this innovation you are doing so with the understanding that this is a new product that you are making possible - allowing cutting edge technology to be realised. The more money we raise, the faster more product we'll be able to produce & promote. With your support, we will help make language barriers a thing of the past. 

"You can never understand one language until you understand at least two more."

  • FAQs:

    1. Can we ship internationally? Yes! Please add $20 USD to your pledge for international shipping.

    2. Can I change my shipping address if I move? Yes, we will reach out to everyone 30 days prior to shipping your device to confirm your address and make any necessary changes. Message us if your email changes, as we'll be using that to contact you.

    3. I picked a perk with a color choice. How do I make my selection? We'll email you when it's time to ship to pick a color of your choice.

    4. I have a question and need to talk to someone about my pledge. Feel free to contact us facebook; Comzapp  twitter; @Comzapp  We'll do our best to respond within 3 business days. 

    5.  What is the accuracy regarding the translations output?. Your smartphone + Comzapp bluetooth device are two of the most important issues we're working hard on in our final versions of the products accuracy. We won't release a product until we feel it meets our high expectations of what consumers want and need.

    6. Will you be FDA approved? We intend to ship devices subject to FDA approval.

    7. How do I add $20 (USD) international shipping? If you've already made a pledge, please hit the 'Contribute Now' button and add your shipping fee. Use the same email address you used to pledge so we can match the payment during fulfillment. Sorry for the additional step required but we're super excited to bring this product to international markets. 


Comzapp Inspires Confidence. 

Please contribute & share COMZAPP amongst your friends and relatives in Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media sites you are a part of and together we will bring COMZAPP to life! 

If you have problems with payments, please contact us for easy access. facebook; Comzapp  twitter; @Comzapp to make transactions easier and safer for you. Make a pledge below.

Disclaimer

Please note; We are very confident that we will deliver to you all our backers. In advance we would like to thank you so much for all your amazing support and contributions. Charles Barry Tasker.
story_txt:
Comzapp Language Translation Inspires Confidence. 
There is a big language barrier in the world even today.  Don't you agree?. Today, forget about wasting your precious time & money learning new languages. The piles of paper dictionaries or expensive services of personal human translators & slow mobile translations that needs internet, that does not always work wherever you go! COMZAPP, is a new voice translating device that will revolutionize language translation by helping you talk and communicate more than 45 Languages in real time instantly offline. No internet needed. COMZAPP, a new technology communications will help you make language barriers a thing of the past. 





How Comzapp Benefits You


COMZAPP, works offline it is faster and more reliable since it does not rely on the quality of the internet connection.  Languages downloaded with bluetooth vocabularies into your mobile and to communicate with others without internet connection. No one can do that right now and we want to be first among the others who will provide such function to our consumers. 





Easy To Operate 


COMZAPP, operate untilizing your existing mobile phone online connecting with Android or IOS network. COMZAPP connect to the phone with bluetooth. The translation itself is made through already existing voice translator services like; Google translate https://translate.google.com/#auto/ar/how%20are...

Siri services visit: http://www.apple.com/ios/siri/


Helping you with a free of charge app on your phone, you will have the ability to use any language available online. Outside sound will not prevent COMZAPP offline translation device communicating effectively. All new updates and improvements of the languages will be free of charge for all users. All you have to do is update COMZAPP.

Do You Want To Speak Different Languages Easily & With Confidence? 
You Need Comzapp

It has two modes of voice translation. You just simply set your native language, then the language to translate to. By pressing the first button and speaking your phrase COMZAPP in turn will instantly translate and pronounce it in a language you have selected. By pressing second button, COMZAPP will translate speech from the foreign language, then instantly speak in your native language! All at the press of a button!

Add $25 for every Aluminum version.

For example: You've ordered 5 COMZAPP Sets and your pledge is $190. You want to get 2 ordinary COMZAPP sets and 3 Aluminum COMZAPP sets. So you have to add 3*$25 = $75 to your existing pledge.
Help Spread The Word!







Your Support Is Appreciated!



Although our goal is to raise at least $25,000 the more money we raise, the more faster product we'll be able to produce and promote. Together we can help prevent language barriers for any traveller on holidays, vacations, business with foreigners & any other situation. With your support, we will help make language barriers a thing of the past one language at a time. "Lets make it happen." 

Your smartphone + Comzapp bluetooth device transforms into a language translation.


CNBC News: Google & Microsoft trying to break the language barrier.  






Mail Online News: Bill Gates regrets never having learnt a foreign language






Online News: Mark Zuckerberg public business speech shows why knowing a different language is so important & useful to you today.   



Looks Great Anywhere!




COMZAPP, Neck Strap

Stainless Steel Clip Can Be Used In Several Ways






COMZAPP, A Great New Years Present For Her & Him!



Featuring Your Device 


Contemporary design   
Light weight and hands-free   
Can be easily clipped onto your clothes or worn around your neck   
Long battery life   
One single charge will last up to 13 hours.  Even longer if blue tooth is turned off, after downloading your languages.
Free of charge updates.
Small microphone

Bluetooth for connecting to other devices.

Help Comzapp Take Off

Today our prototypes are now getting COMZAPP into production and profitability. In performing to improve the application through COMZAPP that will function with your mobile device. While we're close to entering production, your support will help fund:

story:
Short Summary

I am a Mineplex Sr.Moderator. What I want to do is create an Application (App) that will take data from Mineplex.com, Youtube.com/MineplexOffical and Twitter.com/MineplexOfficial and display it in a user friendly way. It will also have push notifications for mineplex events and breaking news. 

What We Need & What You Get

We need $500 for the development of the Application. $400 will go towards the development of the application and $100 for it's "ping" server. By Donating you will help us publish this application! 

Perks of Donating

  1.  $2, you'll get a big thank you from the team! 
  2. $5, you'll get your name included in our contributor list within the App Description. (Perks for $2 included)
  3. $10, you'll be a part of the Beta Testing stage of the application. You'll be notified via email when this stage is taking place. (Perks for $2 and $5 included)
  4. $20, you'll be a part of the Alpha Testing stage. You'll be notified via email when this stage is taking place. (Perks for $2, $5, and $10)

Risks & Challenges

Please read this before you support us. When you support us, you do not know if we will hit our goal or not. We have to hit our goal exactly to release the app. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't support us monetarily, that's fine! Just share our story!

 

DISCLAMER!!

This application is coded by MineplexPolice. He may be part of Mineplex, but this app is not supported by Mineplex. This is just a way to bring content supplied by Mineplex all into one app.

story:
Short Summary

Weather Sync Wardrobe

    Have you ever woke up in the morning and wondered what to wear? You probably started the day looking at the phone or the news channel. Then, knowing the weather for the day you are most likely standing in front of the closet and looking at the clothes and asking yourself: What should I wear today that fits the weather?

    For that question we have a solution for you. Our Weather Synchronized Wardrobe will pick several options of clothes for you. The only thing you need is clothes! Our closet is programmed to pick the best material (silk, wool, cotton) for the upcoming day that matches the weather. You don’t need to think and make hard decisions about your style for the day. The closet does it for you. You only need to pick from the colors. In addition, the wardrobe can give you suggestion of different types of looks but in the end it’s all up to you. You are the stylist. The closet is just a little helper. 

What We Need & What You Get

WSW (Weather Synchronized Wardrobe) is based on the carousel mechanism powered by the electrical motor. The wireless rely will communicate with the application on your phone/tablet or stationary computer. Depending on the weather application will send out command to a rely which in turn will roll in front a segment of clothes that best fits for this particular weather.

What we need for a test run:

1.  Carousel mechanism

2.  Wireless rely

3.  Application development

Problems and risks:

This concept requires large closets. The mechanism needs high sealing. The WSW most likely fit needs of people who owe big apartments or houses with large closets. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please send out suggestions on how would you want your customized WSW.

story:
Who We are and Why are we doing this?

Meet some of the people behind World At Competition startup, the web platform that aims to empower youngsters with opportunities* worldwide.

We are small, young but motivated team that truly represents the world:

  • Denys, Ukraine, CEO and Founder (currently in Portugal);
  • Hasan, Bangladesh, Developer;
  • Dima, Ukraine, Designer (currently in Bulgaria);
  • Yuri, Ukraine, International Coordinator (currently in Estonia);
  • Diletta, Italy, PR (currently in the USA).

Each of us has tried some kind of exchange program, volunteering, won a grant or achieved a scholarship. We also know how difficult and time-consuming it is to find relative opportunities. That is why the team came together to change that with one simple solution under World At Competition.

While we planned to deliver beta for the first users by November 3rd, a little problem seemed to undermine our mission.


Laptop or Nothing

Back to the topic:

  • Our Designer lost any chance to recover his old laptop;
  • Crowdfunding is the last option we try now (and it's always been; check out previous campaigns of Denys and Dima to understand the value they created with help of IndieGoGo community);
  • This campaign is fast and relatively unprepared due to the urgency of the problem: if the Designer has no laptop, we would not be able to deliver a prototype on time;
  • However, if we do, you'll co-found a promising startup that will unite some of the brightest youths from around the Earth;
  • Only 7 days, only full amount, only with your help.

Choice explained

Dima needs MacBook Pro with 15" Retina display as 

  • it is perfect for design work due to its resolution, especially if you perform in tech and art (you want that amazing picture, right?);
  • the power of this model resolves pain with big projects (and literally saves nerves and time);

  • Andy from My Tech Methods explains it in detail;
  • the amount we raise reflects the price of the laptop at the local Apple store in Sofia, Bulgaria (where the Designer is currently based) and does not include IndieGoGo commission.

Invest in WAC because:

  1. We are going to be a Spotify of opportunities (why not);
  2. We aim big with a humble budget, still successfully;
  3. We do good while planning on a massive return due to unique business model(s);
  4. It is the Platform of Awesomeness. Invest in Awesomeness!
  5. #GetMacForWAC and receive some cool, unique rewards (not plain T-shirts, ha).

All are real drawings by Dima aka Frost, WAC designer and simply cool, creative folk.

Other Ways You Can Help

We know some of you are unable to help financially, but your support can be as big as sending a link to one friend or a community of same-minded people.

Besides, you can:

  • Join our Beta list; be the Early Bird and see us growing from the start;
  • Invite an organization that offers a scholarship or grant (could be a university or NGO/foundation) to become our partner and benefit from reaching even more potential candidates;
  • Spread a word in your school or college; after all, it's all about passionate youth for whom we do all this;
  • Simply tweet #GetMacForWAC and let us know by adding @wac_startup!

Share the Chance

*Opportunities - here we mean grants, scholarships, volunteering, competitions, exchange programs, internships, conferences and many more to make the best out of professional and personal growth.

BIG Thanks to

Filippo Nardi (freestyler, Italy), Eda Engin (international student and EVS volunteer, Turkey), and incredible Pedro Queirós from Portugal for making the promo video possible and supporting WAC team throughout the time (he is also Adamastor staff member where everything happened).
Also, thank you the WAC community, coordinators and simply people who share our mission. Without you there is no point of the whole thing.
Denys thanks N. for even more inspiration.

WAC is member and participant of
